quotes.quote: Pacifism is a virtue indisguishable from cowardice.
quotes.author: Brent Weeks

quotes.quote: My pacifism is not based on any intellectual theory but on a deep antipathy to every form of cruelty and hatred.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: Pacifism, the preaching of peace in the abstract, is one of the means of duping the working class.
quotes.author: Vladimir Lenin

quotes.quote: Pacifism is objectively pro-Fascist.
quotes.author: George Orwell

quotes.quote: Pacifism as a mass movement aims to avoid suffering; pacifists often say that no cause is worth suffering or dying for. The ethos of Solidarity is based on an opposite premise - that there are causes worth suffering and dying for.
quotes.author: Adam Michnik

quotes.quote: How ironic for peacemaking efforts to discover that hatred is stronger for many than love; that the longing to achieve power through military victories makes so many men lose their reason, forget all shame, and betray history.
quotes.author: Oscar Arias Sanchez

quotes.quote: The goal of pacifism is possible only though a supranational organization. To stand unconditionally for this cause is the criterion of true pacifism.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: Pacifism will remain an ideal, war a fact, and if the White race decides to wage it no longer, the dark ones will, and will become the masters of the world.
quotes.author: Oswald Spengler

quotes.quote: A pacifism which can see the cruelties only of occasional military warfare and is blind to the continuous cruelties of our social system is worthless.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: Pacifism in the face of war is not only irresponsible - it is immoral. Refusing to meet force with force in the name of peace will beget not peace, but further death and destruction, the very violence the pacifists seek to avoid.
quotes.author: David Limbaugh

quotes.quote: There are causes worth dying for, but none worth killing for.
quotes.author: Albert Camus

quotes.quote: Pacifism is a shifty doctrine under which a man accept the benefits of the social group without being willing to pay-and claims a halo for his dishonesty.
quotes.author: Robert Heinlein

quotes.quote: Pacifism means letting the non-pacifists have control ... Pacifism will remain an ideal, war a fact. If the white races are resolved never to wage war again, the colored will act differently and become rulers of the world.
quotes.author: Oswald Spengler

quotes.quote: Pacifism simply is not a matter of calm looking on; it is hard work.
quotes.author: Käthe Kollwitz

quotes.quote: Pacifism is objectively pro-fascist. This is elementary common sense. If you hamper the war effort of one side, you automatically help out that of the other. Nor is there any real way of remaining outside such a war as the present one. In practice, 'he that is not with me is against me'.
quotes.author: George Orwell

quotes.quote: We must begin to inculcate our children against militarism by educating them in the spirit of pacifism. Our schoolbooks glorify war and conceal it's horror. I would teach peace rather than war.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: Pacifism, to me, is primarily a way of actively struggling against injustice and inhumanity; My kind of pacifism may be called "non-violent resistance".
quotes.author: Dwight Macdonald

quotes.quote: The conflict between pacifism and socialism ultimately reflects a greater quandary of how one engages with such a system.
quotes.author: Hal Duncan

quotes.quote: The main problem with pacifism is that it doesn't work in all situations. The main problem with pacifists is that they're convinced it does.
quotes.author: Burt Prelutsky

quotes.quote: Peacemaking calls for courage, much more so than warfare.
quotes.author: Pope Francis

quotes.quote: Pacifism is a nice idea but it can get you killed. We're not there yet. Evolution is slow, small pox is fast.
quotes.author: George Carlin

quotes.quote: Being a pacifist to save your own life is normal, being a pacifist for the lives of others is true pacifism.
quotes.author: Ammon Hennacy

quotes.quote: The river...smelled like a packing house of fish but it looked like the melted, dark eyes of a million girls.
quotes.author: Hortense Calisher

quotes.quote: Method is like packing things in a box; a good packer will get in half as much again as a bad one.
quotes.author: Cecil

quotes.quote: The lawns looked artificial, like green excelsior or packing material.
quotes.author: Saul Bellow

quotes.quote: I'm packing things for heaven / For surely they'll have room / A must to bring my clothes along / And even my perfume.
quotes.author: Carol Lynn Stevenson

quotes.quote: I'm packing things for heaven / Eternity will call / I've got to bring my jewels for which / My royalty does fall.
quotes.author: Carol Lynn Stevenson

quotes.quote: Let your boat of life be light, packed with only what you need— a homely home and simple pleasures, one or two friends, worth the name, someone to love and someone to love you, a cat, a dog, and a pipe or two, enough to eat and enough to wear, and a little more than enough to drink; for thirst is a dangerous thing.
quotes.author: Jerome K. Jerome

quotes.quote: Don't pack away your dreams and put them in the storage.
quotes.author: Renata Brown

quotes.quote: Every container has a capacity. Don't accept more than you can handle.
quotes.author: Renata Brown

quotes.quote: Eventually you'll have to unpack your stuff and figure out where it belongs.
quotes.author: Renata Brown

quotes.quote: Like things belong with like things — don't pack the toaster with the silk gown.
quotes.author: Renata Brown

quotes.quote: Put a label on it...call it what it is. You'll thank yourself later.
quotes.author: Renata Brown

quotes.quote: You must carry all you need on your back and on your person, everything necessary to sustain you for the duration of your trip.
quotes.author: Dave Canterbury

quotes.quote: Convenience items are those that you don't have to pack but you would like to bring along to make things enjoyable or to make some tasks a bit easier.
quotes.author: Dave Canterbury

quotes.quote: By focusing on core temperature control and comfort when planning your packing, you will make room for convenience items that make for memorable times in the wild.
quotes.author: Dave Canterbury

quotes.quote: You don't need so many things to be included in your luggage bag. Take only things which are necessary and has some value.
quotes.author: Amanda Walton

quotes.quote: Packing is basically: If you're going on a weekend, then just take what you're really going to wear. And how many times are you going to leave the room? If that makes any sense. Like if you're going to sleep, read, and sit by a fire chunky knit sweaters, leggings, comfortable boots. But if you're going on like a party weekend, then bring your favorite pieces and make sure you'll wear them.
quotes.author: Rachel Zoe

quotes.quote: When preparing to travel, lay out all your clothes and all your money. Then take half the clothes and twice the money
quotes.author: Susan Heller

quotes.quote: Packing for a trip can be exciting, but unpacking is always depressing.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: When the fishbowl gets too small, it's time to pack up and leave and jump into the lake or ocean.
quotes.author: Travie McCoy

quotes.quote: Everything you own must be able to fit inside one suitcase; then your mind might be free.
quotes.author: Charles Bukowski

quotes.quote: When you get back from a trip, make a note of what you didn't wear. This will avoid packing it unnecessarily next time.
quotes.author: Robert Powell

quotes.quote: What you pack says something about who you are.
quotes.author: Allison Vesterfelt

quotes.quote: You have wants , desires, needs, and ideas. These are all things you 'pack' with you for the journey. You might not even know you're carrying them, but they're in there. You're walking around with a heavy suitcase.
quotes.author: Allison Vesterfelt

quotes.quote: We are all carrying baggage— things we've picked up at home, past experiences, expectations for what's ahead.
quotes.author: Allison Vesterfelt

quotes.quote: If you're going on a hiking trip, you choose a bag that's just big enough to fit the bare necessities. You'll need a bag that can stand up to the natural elements and challenges of hiking, one that can take the sweat and the scraping of tree bark and being thrown down in the dirt for a break to get some water.
quotes.author: Allison Vesterfelt

quotes.quote: Be like a duck. Calm on the surface, but always paddling like the dickens underneath.
quotes.author: Michael Caine

quotes.quote: You don't paddle against the current, you paddle with it. And if you get good at it, you throw away the oars.
quotes.author: Kris Kristofferson

quotes.quote: You are your own cannoe and you are your own paddle, so paddle your own cannoe. Society had taught us to give away our power and abilities by making us to believe that other people are responsible for our success and failure. That is not fair!
quotes.author: Israelmore Ayivor

quotes.quote: The first river you paddle runs through the rest of your life. It bubbles up in pools and eddies to remind you who you are.
quotes.author: Lynn Culbreath Noel

quotes.quote: As one goes through life, one learns that if you don't paddle your own canoe, you don't move.
quotes.author: Katharine Hepburn

quotes.quote: Paddling a canoe is a source of enrichment and inner renewal.
quotes.author: Pierre Trudeau

quotes.quote: I've always thought you should concentrate on paddling your own canoe.
quotes.author: John Dos Passos

quotes.quote: I love the paddle board. It's just a really good way to recenter. Being on the water is really peaceful, and you have to focus on your balance and holding yourself up. Doing a little bit of yoga under the sun on the water is really, really magical.
quotes.author: Jamie Anderson

quotes.quote: To some people, I may seem calm. But if you could peer beneath the surface, you would see that I'm like a duck--paddling, paddling, paddling.
quotes.author: Scott Stossel

quotes.quote: Everyone gets caught inside when surfing. You have 2 options. Give up or paddle outside. Life is the same. Keep paddling!
quotes.author: Gerry Lopez

quotes.quote: Voyage upon life's sea, To yourself be true, And, whatever your lot may be, Paddle your own canoe.
quotes.author: Sarah Bolton

quotes.quote: Unless you paddle for the wave, you'll never know if you could catch it. But once you do... Ride it as long as you can. Love as long as you can.
quotes.author: Abigail Spencer

quotes.quote: If life is like a canoe in a raging river then wisdom is the paddle to successfully navigate.
quotes.author: Orrin Woodward

quotes.quote: Most people don't want to be saved. Besides, if you keep bailing everybody out, they'll never learn to paddle on their own.
quotes.author: Lauren Oliver

quotes.quote: The rule of the universe is that others can do for us what we cannot do for ourselves, and one can paddle every canoe except one's own.
quotes.author: C. S. Lewis

quotes.quote: Everything that we want is downstream... And you don't have even have to turn the boat and paddle downstream, just let go of the oars, the current will carry you.
quotes.author: Esther Hicks

quotes.quote: Life ain't that hard too. Hardship is like vast sea, take the paddle and sails over the sea.
quotes.author: Kauser

quotes.quote: There are many rivers to cross to our successful destinations. Never fear the crocodiles. They may look frightful, but they will not harm you. You will get there! With the right attitude, you ignore the ugly face of the shore and you can paddle your boat to the right destination!
quotes.author: Israelmore Ayivor

quotes.quote: But I think that I have already been moving too long in a sphere which is not my own. Flying fishes can hold out for a time in the air, but soon they must splash back into the water; allow me, too, to paddle in my own element.
quotes.author: Ivan Turgenev

quotes.quote: Forgetting isn't enough. You can paddle away from the memories and think they are gone. But they will keep floating back, again and again and agian. They circle you, like sharks. Until, unless, something, someone? Can do more than just cover the wound.
quotes.author: Sara Zarr

quotes.quote: My own plans are made. While I can, I sail east in the Dawn Treader. When she fails me, I paddle east in my coracle. When she sinks, I shall swim east with my four paws. And when I can swim no longer, if I have not reached Aslan's country, or shot over the edge of the world into some vast cataract, I shall sink with my nose to the sunrise.
quotes.author: C.S. Lewis

quotes.quote: Life is like a paddle, depends on us how fast we move to achieve the goal and shine in the success.
quotes.author: Meghan Pathak

quotes.quote: If you want to change the world, find someone to help you paddle.
quotes.author: William H. McRaven

quotes.quote: Have you seen a duck gliding smoothly on water? Does it ever look like it is paddling furiously underneath the surface? I don't have to show that I am working very hard.
quotes.author: Salman Khan

quotes.quote: You are likely to fall when you stop paddling your bicycle. Such is life. As long as you don’t give up, you will never end up failing!
quotes.author: Israelmore Ayivor

quotes.quote: Prejudice is a raft onto which the shipwrecked mind clambers and paddles to safety.
quotes.author: Ben Hecht

quotes.quote: Refuse to accept the belief that your professional relevance, career success or financial security turns on the next update on the latest technology. Sometimes it's good to put the paddle down and just let the canoe glide.
quotes.author: Simon Mainwaring

quotes.quote: Six days shalt thou paddle and pack, but on the seventh thou shall wash thy socks.
quotes.author: Aldo Leopold

quotes.quote: Life is like a boat you move on when you paddle and stay in the same place if not.
quotes.author: African Proverb

quotes.quote: Love is the castle, doubt is the moat, desire is the paddle and hope is the boat.
quotes.author: Kellie Elmore

quotes.quote: The great pagan world of which Egypt and Greece were the last living terms once had a vast and perhaps perfect science of its own, a science in terms of life. In our era this science crumbled into magic and charlatanry. But even wisdom crumbles.
quotes.author: D. H. Lawrence

quotes.quote: Abject fear of pagan gods is little different from abject worship of them.
quotes.author: Gene Edward Veith Jr.

quotes.quote: The pagan loves the earth in order to enjoy it and confine himself within it; the Christian in order to make it purer and draw from it the strength to escape from it.
quotes.author: Pierre Teilhard de Chardin

quotes.quote: The authentic pagan has no need of religion because, whatever religion can provide, he already has it.
quotes.author: Rajneesh

quotes.quote: If a pagan asks you to show him your faith, take him into church and place him before the icons.
quotes.author: John Of Damascus

quotes.quote: The happy pagan is wrapped up in the belief that this world and the success it affords are the greatest pursuits in life. He or she feels no need for anything transcendent.
quotes.author: Ravi Zacharias

quotes.quote: Many believe that pagan worship is a thing of the past, but it is ever present-we have just given it a new name: pop culture.
quotes.author: Billy Graham

quotes.quote: When a pagan race comes in contact with a Christian race, they are converted, absorbed, or exterminated.
quotes.author: Joseph R. Bartlett

quotes.quote: The great pagan sadness of modern man is largely due to his premonition of ultimate disaster.
quotes.author: Francis Stuart Campbell

quotes.quote: There is something pagan in me that I cannot shake off. In short, I deny nothing, but doubt everything.
quotes.author: Lord Byron

quotes.quote: The pagan gods are not dead, but can return to topple science with superstition and modern man with bestial pleasures that pre-date civilisation.
quotes.author: Richard Luckhurst

quotes.quote: To a pagan, there is no purpose to suffering. As a result, he lives a life of loneliness and frustration.
quotes.author: Mother Angelica

quotes.quote: The pagans do not know God, and love only the earth. The Jews know the true God, and love only the earth. The Christians know the true God, and do not love the earth.
quotes.author: Blaise Pascal

quotes.quote: Pagans exalt sacred things, the Prophets extol sacred deeds.
quotes.author: Abraham Joshua Heschel

quotes.quote: The heathen in his blindness Bows down to wood and stone.
quotes.author: Reginald Heber

quotes.quote: Heathen, n. A benighted creature who has the folly to worship something that he can see and feel.
quotes.author: Ambrose Bierce

quotes.quote: The heathen spirit is wingless. It cannot lift itself to heights from which the totality of being is visible, and it therefore loses itself in details.
quotes.author: Sholem Asch

quotes.quote: Heathens are unredeemed outcasts from heaven who roam the planet without hope of surviving the deaths of their bodies. They may have values, but they are not secured by any divine source. Yet we embrace this because we think it represents the truth.
quotes.author: Julian Baggini

quotes.quote: The pagan religion, which prohibited only some of the grosser crimes, and which stopped the hand but meddled not with the heart, might have crimes that were inexplicable.
quotes.author: Baron de Montesquieu

quotes.quote: I believe in God, only I spell it Nature.
quotes.author: Frank Lloyd Wright

quotes.quote: Often pagans, with their eyes wide open, do not see very clearly.
quotes.author: Georges Rouault

quotes.quote: Infidels: Repent of Mohammedanism or burn in hell forever, throughout eternity.
quotes.author: J. B. Stoner

quotes.quote: Many infidels have maintained that Ignorance is the mother of Devotion.
quotes.author: James Boswell

quotes.quote: Only a heathen would bring a gun to a sword fight. And only a moron would bring a sword to a gunfight.
quotes.author: Derek Landy

quotes.quote: For an atheist you will be always considered as a human no matter what, but for a religious if you don't belong with them, you are always an infidel.
quotes.author: M.F. Moonzajer

quotes.quote: Your pain is the breaking of the shell that encloses your understanding.
quotes.author: Khalil Gibran

quotes.quote: We must all suffer from one of two pains: the pain of discipline or the pain of regret. The difference is discipline weighs ounces while regret weighs tons.
quotes.author: Jim Rohn

quotes.quote: Without pain, there would be no suffering, without suffering we would never learn from our mistakes. To make it right, pain and suffering is the key to all windows, without it, there is no way of life.
quotes.author: Angelina Jolie

quotes.quote: Pain is temporary. It may last a minute, or an hour, or a day, or a year, but eventually it will subside and something else will take its place. If I quit, however, it lasts forever.
quotes.author: Lance Armstrong

quotes.quote: When you can't remember why you're hurt, that's when you're healed.
quotes.author: Jane Fonda

quotes.quote: I have learned now that while those who speak about one's miseries usually hurt, those who keep silence hurt more.
quotes.author: C. S. Lewis

quotes.quote: Pain is such an uncomfortable feeling that even a tiny amount of it is enough to ruin every enjoyment.
quotes.author: Will Rogers

quotes.quote: Pain is inevitable. Suffering is optional.
quotes.author: Buddhist proverb

quotes.quote: Pain is what the world inflicts upon us. Suffering is our emotional reaction when we fail to make the difficult conscious choice to choose Joy.
quotes.author: Jonathan Lockwood Huie

quotes.quote: If you aren't in the moment, you are either looking forward to uncertainty, or back to pain and regret.
quotes.author: Jim Carrey

quotes.quote: God gave us pain to remind us we are alive, so we will learn to value the joys and beauty of the world.
quotes.author: Tom Corr

quotes.quote: Much of your pain is the bitter potion by which the physician within you heals your sick self.
quotes.author: Khalil Gibran

quotes.quote: An hour of pain is as long as a day of pleasure.
quotes.author: English Proverb

quotes.quote: Pain and pleasure like light and darkness, succeed each other.
quotes.author: Lawrence Stone

quotes.quote: Pain is immune to empathy...like love.
quotes.author: Barbara Lazear Ascher

quotes.quote: Pain is like a love affair. When it’s over it’s over.
quotes.author: Elyse Sommer

quotes.quote: People in pain are like the wandering minstrels of the Renaissance. Any occupied space becomes their court. If the story’s told often enough, perhaps the demons will become manifest. Made visible and mastered though words.
quotes.author: Barbara Lazear Ascher

quotes.quote: Even pain has its joy.
quotes.author: Russian Proverb

quotes.quote: The pain of the little finger is felt by the whole body.
quotes.author: Filipino Proverb

quotes.quote: Pain is the only evil I know about. It’s the only one I can fight.
quotes.author: Walter M. Miller

quotes.quote: Sometimes pain can drive a man harder than pleasure.
quotes.author: Don Ingalls

quotes.quote: He was wise to the ways of pain. He had to be, for he felt none.
quotes.author: James Tiptree

quotes.quote: It is our suffering that brings us together. It is not love. Love does not obey the mind, and turns to hate when forced. The bond that binds us is beyond choice. We are brothers. We are brothers in what we share. In pain, which each of us must suffer alone, in hunger, in poverty, in hope, we know our brotherhood.
quotes.author: Ursula K. Le Guin

quotes.quote: The best way of handling pain was to study it objectively.
quotes.author: Arthur C. Clarke

quotes.quote: Pain can be controlled, you just disconnect it.
quotes.author: James Cameron

quotes.quote: Who can remember pain, once it’s over? All that remains of it is a shadow, not in the mind even, in the flesh. Pain larks you, but too deep to see.
quotes.author: Margaret Atwood

quotes.quote: Pain is the universe unguarded.
quotes.author: Steve Aylett

quotes.quote: Pain is the substance of life and the root of personality, because only suffering is a person.
quotes.author: Miguel de Unamuno y Jugo

quotes.quote: There is nothing more suitable for the purposes of the universe than pain; never a day when you suffer is a lost day.
quotes.author: Amado Nervo

quotes.quote: Men are more sensitive to pain than to pleasures.
quotes.author: Tito Livio

quotes.quote: Paint the essential character of things.
quotes.author: Camille Pissarro

quotes.quote: Life is a great big canvas; throw all the paint you can at it.
quotes.author: Danny Kaye

quotes.quote: A great artist can paint a great picture on a small canvas.
quotes.author: Charles Dudley Warner

quotes.quote: If you hear a voice within you say you cannot paint, then by all means paint, and that voice will be silenced.
quotes.author: Vincent Van Gogh

quotes.quote: Paint as you see and be accurate in your drawing: the whole secret of your art is there.
quotes.author: William Bouguereau

quotes.quote: All you need to paint is a few tools, a little instruction, and a vision in your mind.
quotes.author: Bob Ross

quotes.quote: Painting is silent poetry, and poetry is painting that speaks.
quotes.author: Plutarch

quotes.quote: Painting is easy when you don't know how, but very difficult when you do.
quotes.author: Edgar Degas

quotes.quote: To live is to paint, it is to create; but while we are painting, we are being painted, being created as well!
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.quote: Paint from the inside out.
quotes.author: George De Groat

quotes.quote: A painter paints his pictures on canvas. But musicians paint their pictures on silence. We provide the music, and you provide the silence.
quotes.author: Leopold Stokowski

quotes.quote: If you paint in your mind a picture of bright and happy expectations, you put yourself into a condition conducive to your goal.
quotes.author: Norman Vincent Peale

quotes.quote: Painting is another form of thinking.
quotes.author: Gerhard Richter

quotes.quote: An artist is forced by others to paint out of his own free will.
quotes.author: Willem de Kooning

quotes.quote: Paint what you are, paint what you believe, paint what you feel.
quotes.author: Ben Shahn

quotes.quote: Painting is just another way of keeping a diary.
quotes.author: Pablo Picasso

quotes.quote: Your painting is a measure of your mind.
quotes.author: Millard Sheets

quotes.quote: Paint what you see, not what you know.
quotes.author: Charles Webster Hawthorne

quotes.quote: Painting is not about what you see, its about what you don't see.
quotes.author: Bernd Haussmann

quotes.quote: Painting is like child birth you forget how hard it is until you do it again.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Dazzle like an Impressionistic painting in which every brush stroke tells and contains something germane to the whole.
quotes.author: V. S. Pritchett

quotes.quote: I paint what I see.
quotes.author: E. B. White

quotes.quote: What do you paint when you paint on a wall? Do you paint just anything at all? Will there be any doves, or a tree in fall? Or a hunting scene, like an English hall?
quotes.author: E. B. White

quotes.quote: Painting is the grandchild of nature. It is related to God.
quotes.author: Rembrandt van Rijin

quotes.quote: There are painters who transform the sun to a yellow spot, but there are others who with the help of their art and their intelligence transform a yellow spot into the sun.
quotes.author: Pablo Picasso

quotes.quote: Art is either plagiarism or revolution.
quotes.author: Paul Gauguin

quotes.quote: The position of the artist is humble. He is essentially a channel.
quotes.author: Piet Mondrian

quotes.quote: All art is an imitation of nature.
quotes.author: Seneca

quotes.quote: I don't paint things. I only paint the difference between things.
quotes.author: Henri Matisse

quotes.quote: There is nothing more difficult for a truly creative painter than to paint a rose, because before he can do so he has first to forget all the roses that were ever painted.
quotes.author: Henri Matisse

quotes.quote: Do not take life too seriously. You will never get out of it alive.
quotes.author: Elbert Hubbard

quotes.quote: Always remember that you are absolutely unique. Just like everyone else.
quotes.author: Margaret Mead

quotes.quote: I'm sorry, if you were right, I'd agree with you.
quotes.author: Robin Williams

quotes.quote: Any girl can be glamorous. All she has to do is stand still and look stupid.
quotes.author: Hedy Lamarr

quotes.quote: Progress is man's ability to complicate simplicity.
quotes.author: Thor Heyerdahl

quotes.quote: But there was no use pretending: I was not the sort of person who counted blessings; I was the sort of person for whom there could never be enough blessings.
quotes.author: Jamaica Kincaid

quotes.quote: Over by the campfire, Tyson let loose with his paintball gun. A blue projectile splattered against one of the centaurs, hurling him backward into the lake. The centaur came up grinning, covered in swamp muck and blue paint, and gave Tyson two thumbs up.
quotes.author: Rick Riordan

quotes.quote: I looked over at the campfire, where three party ponies were teaching Tyson to operate a paintball gun. I hoped they knew what they were getting into.
quotes.author: Rick Riordan

quotes.quote: Bongo's sobs are hurled out like paintballs from a skirmish gun until the force diminishes into a trickle of sobs.
quotes.author: Emma Cameron

quotes.quote: I'm looking for the perfect paintball movie.
quotes.author: William Shatner

quotes.quote: When I was in high school, I loved paintball. I saved up my allowances and started my own paintball supply company.
quotes.author: Ryan Holmes

quotes.quote: You jealous rightly so I used to care, but no I wasn't lookin' for no paintball signature you wanted
quotes.author: Bonzai

quotes.quote: Paintballs shot at they truck, blaow! Look at y'all runnin' your mouth again When you ain't seen
quotes.author: Eminem

quotes.quote: With you tonight Wanna go first? Take off! If I bring you to the plate, will you play ball? I'm a hit it hard like a paintball.
quotes.author: Chris Brown

quotes.quote: I spent that on some paintball guns, Crash the party in this bitch its crackin just like the limos was You ain't gotta find me.
quotes.author: Chief Keef

quotes.quote: Daddy was an outlaw, ride with the eight ball Guns in the ride, we ain't talking 'bout paintball Don't mean I won't get in the paint Know last rapper that I came for got mangled (Got mangled).
quotes.author: Yelawolf

quotes.quote: Only thing you niggaz ever shot was a paintball, or a cap gun, You could get your hat spun, You gotta known I clap my gun, Man, You ain't that dumb!
quotes.author: Cassidy

quotes.quote: Mind of a leader, drama of a gang banger If a nigga come on property I ain't gonna call There'll be a splatter on ya shirt, and it ain't paintball.
quotes.author: Lloyd Banks

quotes.quote: Cops out here shooting coloreds like it's paintball I'll be chilling on a cloud above the rainfall I can take you so high it numb your face off.
quotes.author: Jaron Michael

quotes.quote: Young money men play paintball games Here comes the war - put out the lights on the Age of Reason.
quotes.author: New Model Army

quotes.quote: I'm on the grind, skateboard I'mma go nuts, acorn They tried to take shots, paintball But I'll cross when I want like a jaywalk.
quotes.author: Lady Leshurr

quotes.quote: With some paintballs, shots sound like Goose Goose Willy Wonka, I got no cellings, if I do, I finna need a new roof limitation.
quotes.author: Mick Jenkins

quotes.quote: Paintball is much more fun when the other people at Walmart don't know we are playing.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Sure we could replace war with paintball battles. But it would escalate to paint grenades, paint bombs, weapons of mass paint. I don't want to live in a world where my kids have to worry about what color they will be in the morning.
quotes.author: Dan Florence

quotes.quote: Life begins in 10 seconds
quotes.author: Rocky Knuth

quotes.quote: You gas up the marker, put on the gloves, strap on the mask, and walk onto the field.. it doesn't matter that you failed a test, that your girlfriend broke up with you last night, or that you got a ticket on the way there... your world is right for the next couple hours, this is your heaven on earth.. live it.. love it.. Paintball for life..
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Painting is just another way of keeping a diary.
quotes.author: Pablo Picasso

quotes.quote: Painting is self-discovery. Every good artist paints what he is.
quotes.author: Jackson Pollock

quotes.quote: Painting is concerned with all the 10 attributes of sight; which are: Darkness, Light, Solidity and Colour, Form and Position, Distance and Propinquity, Motion and Rest.
quotes.author: Leonardo da Vinci

quotes.quote: Painting is an illusion, a piece of magic, so what you see is not what you see.
quotes.author: Philip Guston

quotes.quote: Good painting is like good cooking; it can be tasted, but not explained.
quotes.author: Maurice de Vlaminck

quotes.quote: Painting is an infinitely minute part of my personality.
quotes.author: Salvador Dali

quotes.quote: Painting is easy when you don't know how, but very difficult when you do.
quotes.author: Edgar Degas

quotes.quote: Painting is not for me either decorative amusement, or the plastic invention of felt reality; it must be every time: invention, discovery, revelation.
quotes.author: Max Ernst

quotes.quote: Every painting is a voyage into a sacred harbour.
quotes.author: Giotto di Bondone

quotes.quote: The painting has a life of its own. I try to let it come through.
quotes.author: Jackson Pollock

quotes.quote: Painting is a nail to which I fasten my ideas.
quotes.author: Georges Braque

quotes.quote: Painting from nature is not copying the object; it is realizing one's sensations.
quotes.author: Paul Cezanne

quotes.quote: A good painting to me has always been like a friend. It keeps me company, comforts and inspires.
quotes.author: Hedy Lamarr

quotes.quote: Painting is by nature a luminous language.
quotes.author: Robert Delaunay

quotes.quote: Painting is a blind man's profession. He paints not what he sees, but what he feels, what he tells himself about what he has seen.
quotes.author: Pablo Picasso

quotes.quote: In painting you must give the idea of the true by means of the false.
quotes.author: Edgar Degas

quotes.quote: Painting is an essentially concrete art and can only consist of the representation of real and existing things.
quotes.author: Gustave Courbet

quotes.quote: The point of painting is not really deception or imitation.
quotes.author: A. S. Byatt

quotes.quote: Painting is a faith, and it imposes the duty to disregard public opinion.
quotes.author: Vincent Van Gogh

quotes.quote: Painting will have to deal more fully and less obliquely with life and nature's phenomena before it can again become great.
quotes.author: Edward Hopper

quotes.quote: Painting is a source of endless pleasure, but also of great anguish.
quotes.author: Balthus

quotes.quote: For me, painting is a way to forget life. It is a cry in the night, a strangled laugh.
quotes.author: Georges Rouault

quotes.quote: One learns about painting by looking at and imitating other painters.
quotes.author: Frank Stella

quotes.quote: Painting is the aesthetic side of the object but it has never been original, has never been its own goal.
quotes.author: Kazimir Malevich

quotes.quote: Painting becomes interesting when it becomes timeless.
quotes.author: Peter Doig

quotes.quote: Painting calmed the chaos that shook my soul.
quotes.author: Niki de St. Phalle

quotes.quote: Painting does what we cannot do - it brings a three-dimensional world into a two-dimensional plane.
quotes.author: Chuck Jones

quotes.quote: Painting is the frozen evidence of a performance.
quotes.author: Chuck Close

quotes.quote: Painting contains a divine force which... makes the dead seem almost alive.
quotes.author: Leon Battista Alberti

quotes.quote: Painting is the passage from the chaos of the emotions to the order of the possible.
quotes.author: Balthus

quotes.quote: The battle between two men over a girl is the same as the fight for two men over a piece of land. It is all about desire. There is no difference between a love triangle and the conflict between Israel and Palestine.
quotes.author: Bruno Dumont

quotes.quote: Every Jew in Palestine is a bit of an Arab, and no Arab in Israel can deny that he's a little Jewish.
quotes.author: Yasmina Khadra

quotes.quote: Jews and Muslims 'dialoguing' has nothing to do with Palestine. The problem is settler colonialism, apartheid and occupation, not religion.
quotes.author: Remi Kanazi

quotes.quote: Is there any wilderness of sand in the deserts of Arabia, is there any prospect of desolation among the ruins of Palestine, which can rival the repelling effect on the eye, and the depressing influence on the mind, of an English country town in the first stage of its existence, and in the transition state of its prosperity?
quotes.author: Wilkie Collins

quotes.quote: Palestine belongs to the Arabs in the same sense that England belongs to the English or France to the French.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: The metaphor for Palestine is stronger than the Palestine of reality.
quotes.author: Marmoud Darwish

quotes.quote: An hour of violin lessons in Berlin is an hour where you get the child interested in music. An hour in a violin lesson in Palestine is an hour away from violence, is an hour away from fundamentalism.
quotes.author: Daniel Barenboim

quotes.quote: I prefer being penetrated by iron to seeing Palestine is loose.
quotes.author: Theodor Herzl

quotes.quote: Palestine is the cement that holds the Arab world together, or it is the explosive that blows it apart.
quotes.author: Yasser Arafat

quotes.quote: It's very hard to talk about Palestine to Jewish people - they see me as a betrayer.
quotes.author: Miriam Margolyes

quotes.quote: We know too well that our freedom is incomplete without the freedom of the Palestinians.
quotes.author: Nelson Mandela

quotes.quote: The Partition of Palestine is illegal. It will never be recognized .... Jerusalem was and will for ever be our capital. Eretz Israel will be restored to the people of Israel. All of it. And for Ever.
quotes.author: Menachem Begin

quotes.quote: Palestine is about how we drink the water, whether we are being ecological or not. Palestine is our way of exercising our daily living. That's what's going to solve the problem of Palestine. It's also how we think of ourselves spiritually. This kind of disconnectedness is harmful to the person who is acting that way and is sometimes annoying.
quotes.author: Elia Suleiman

quotes.quote: I'm trying to use Palestine as a microcosm of the world, but maybe the world is a microcosm of Palestine. We're living in a moment that has lost attachment to the ideology behind boundaries.
quotes.author: Elia Suleiman

quotes.quote: The tomb in Palestine Is not the porch of spirits lingering. It is the grave of Jesus, where he lay.
quotes.author: Wallace Stevens

quotes.quote: Palm trees were fanned by a warm, light breeze, and they rolled down their windows to smell the sea.
quotes.author: Jude Watson

quotes.quote: The roots of the aged palm tree exceed those of the young one; the old have a greater attachment to the world.
quotes.author: Saib Tabrizi

quotes.quote: Palm trees are growin' and a warm breeze a blowing. I picture myself right there, on some beach, somewhere.
quotes.author: Blake Shelton

quotes.quote: I haven't bought a yacht or an island or even a palm tree.
quotes.author: David A. Siegel

quotes.quote: Grow as a palm-tree on God's Mount Zion; howbeit shaken with winds, yet the root is fast.
quotes.author: Samuel Rutherford

quotes.quote: Like a palm tree by the ocean that endures the greatest winds because it knows how to gracefully bend.
quotes.author: Stephen Kendrick

quotes.quote: I remember when the palm trees were short and Tomorrowland was modern.
quotes.author: Taylor Negron

quotes.quote: I am a champion palm tree! I know that I can sustain the hurricanes in life, because I paid the price and my roots of faith have grown down deep.
quotes.author: John Di Lemme

quotes.quote: Branches of palm are its spars and rails, fibres of palm are its woven sails, and the rope is of palm that idly trails!
quotes.author: John Greenleaf Whittier

quotes.quote: Palm-tree: single-legged giant, topping other trees, peering at the firmament - It longs to pierce the black cloud-ceiling and fly away, away, if only it had wings.
quotes.author: Rabindranath Tagore

quotes.quote: But fair the exil'd Palm-tree grew midst foliage of no kindred hue.
quotes.author: Felicia Dorothea Hemans

quotes.quote: And is the palm tree ever standing, amid the fierce glare beating down, the pilgrim in the desert luring to shelter 'neath her shadow crown?
quotes.author: Mikhail Yuryevich Lermontov

quotes.quote: Palm tree in my garden. I've got a palm tree in my garden. Oh yeah, a palm tree in my garden. Oh, lucky me, oh oh lucky me.
quotes.author: Hooyoosay

quotes.quote: Lately, I've been coming up just like a palm tree people surrounding me.
quotes.author: Macy Gray

quotes.quote: Waiting for a palm tree sunshine, all my good times I'll run to you.
quotes.author: Lowell

quotes.quote: A palm tree in the moon when a comet comes out to fall.
quotes.author: Brian Wilson

quotes.quote: See me sitting in the palm tree looking down at people passing by sitting here no-one can harm me.
quotes.author: ABBA

quotes.quote: Little palm tree you moved out to stand in long lines.
quotes.author: Sonntag

quotes.quote: If palm tree shade makes a perfect tent then wasted time is time well spent.
quotes.author: Brett Eldredge

quotes.quote: Underneath the palm tree it's paradise, it's paradise.
quotes.author: Yeek

quotes.quote: Got a palm tree paradise way out in the countryside.
quotes.author: Florida Georgia Line

quotes.quote: Palm tree silhouette smells amazing.
quotes.author: M.I.A.

quotes.quote: You're in the wind just like a palm tree in a storm but I'll be the only one to break and fall.
quotes.author: Andra Day

quotes.quote: Oh, the taller that the palm tree grows, the sweeter is the bark.
quotes.author: Tommy Makem

quotes.quote: The palm tree's just a picture on a postcard.
quotes.author: John Denver

quotes.quote: Walking through forests of palm tree apartments.
quotes.author: Jethro Tull

quotes.quote: Under palm tree's to white sand everything is a price man
quotes.author: Ja Rule

quotes.quote: Sleep under a palm tree feel the rush of the ocean.
quotes.author: Kelly Clarkson

quotes.quote: It is the nature of the strong heart, that like the palm tree it strives ever upwards when it is most burdened.
quotes.author: Philip Sidney

quotes.quote: The first rule of hurricane coverage is that every broadcast must begin with palm trees bending in the wind.
quotes.author: Carl Hiaasen

quotes.quote: Where there is a perfect pancake flip, there is life.
quotes.author: Mahoatmeal Ghandi

quotes.quote: There was no time for chit-chat when there were chocolate chip pancakes to be eaten.
quotes.author: Kristen Day

quotes.quote: There is hardship in everything except eating pancakes.
quotes.author: Charles Spurgeon

quotes.quote: Pancakes don't make the world go 'round. Pancakes are what makes the ride worthwhile.
quotes.author: Frankfurterlin P. Jones

quotes.quote: Just 'cause you pour syrup on something doesnt make it pancakes.
quotes.author: Samuel L. Jackson

quotes.quote: All you need is pancakes. Pancakes are all you need.
quotes.author: John Lennon

quotes.quote: Griddle cakes, pancakes, hot cakes, flapjacks: why are there four names for grilled batter and only one word for love?
quotes.author: George Carlin

quotes.quote: Someone who eats pancakes and jam can't be so awfully dangerous. You can talk to him.
quotes.author: Tove Jansson

quotes.quote: We pancaked with a pancake that was more than a pancake.
quotes.author: Edgar Allen Po

quotes.quote: There has never been a sadness that can't be cured by breakfast food.
quotes.author: Ron Swanson

quotes.quote: In a big family the first child is kind of like the first pancake. If it's not perfect, that's okay, there are a lot more coming along.
quotes.author: Antonin Scalia

quotes.quote: If you want pancakes for breakfast, offer to help make them.
quotes.author: Cynthia Lewis

quotes.quote: There's nothing better than cake but more cake.
quotes.author: Harry S. Truman

quotes.quote: Tis better to have eaten a pancake than never to have eaten a pancake at all.
quotes.author: Alfred Lord Denny'son

quotes.quote: Pancakes were meant to be flipped!
quotes.author: Anthony T. Hincks

quotes.quote: No matter how flat you make your pancakes, it still has two sides.
quotes.author: Daniel Tosh

quotes.quote: Maybe love was a woman feeding him pancakes. Maybe it was someone sitting across from him sipping orange juice just to please him.
quotes.author: Christine Feehan

quotes.quote: There is no remedy for pancakes but to pancake more.
quotes.author: Henry David Chorizeau

quotes.quote: People are so used to eating terrible pancakes, no matter how you mess up, they're going to be great. And if you make fresh orange juice, they'll be over the moon.
quotes.author: Ruth Reichl

quotes.quote: There are two sides to a pancake. One is brown and fluffy; the other is burnt.
quotes.author: Bill Parcells

quotes.quote: As is always the way with pancakes, the first hotcake to come out of the pan will probably be a bit misshapen. Just scoff it, and carry on with the rest.
quotes.author: Yotam Ottolenghi

quotes.quote: Sheldon likes pancakes because they make good tents He's making himself a window.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: A waffle is like a pancake with a syrup trap.
quotes.author: Mitch Hedberg

quotes.quote: We experience moments absolutely free from worry. These brief respites are called panic.
quotes.author: Cullen Hightower

quotes.quote: Panic causes tunnel vision. Calm acceptance of danger allows us to more easily assess the situation and see the options.
quotes.author: Simon Sinek

quotes.quote: A financial panic is a very bad thing, but a government panic can do far greater damage in a far shorter time.
quotes.author: Tom McClintock

quotes.quote: Panic implies that there is no rational thought taking place. That we are frozen and incapable of adjusting. Powerless to logic, and subject to seemingly unthinkable behavior.
quotes.author: Anthony Scaramucci

quotes.quote: If you panic that's a good way to lose. You have to stay in control.
quotes.author: Ted Turner

quotes.quote: Panic is a sudden desertion of us, and a going over to the enemy of our imagination.
quotes.author: Christian Nestell Bovee

quotes.quote: Panic is not an effective long-term organizing strategy.
quotes.author: Starhawk

quotes.quote: Panic is an incredibly catalyzing creative force. And almost out of sheer necessity, I found I had to talk about myself and my real life as it is effectively lived by me.
quotes.author: John Hodgman

quotes.quote: There's no panic like the panic you momentarily feel when your hand or head is stuck in something.
quotes.author: Peter Kay

quotes.quote: Panic is the sudden realization that everything around you is alive.
quotes.author: William S. Burroughs

quotes.quote: Depression is anger slowed down; panic is grief speeded up.
quotes.author: Ann-Marie MacDonald

quotes.quote: Panic is the great access of creativity because that's the only way to get rid of your mind.
quotes.author: Shekhar Kapur

quotes.quote: Panic is highly contagious, especially in situations when nothing is known and everything is in flux.
quotes.author: Stephen King

quotes.quote: If you're tearing around in a panic about something, then it puts everyone else in a panic as well.
quotes.author: Julie Andrews

quotes.quote: Panic, a deep abiding, free-floating anxiety, often without any reason or logical basis.
quotes.author: Nelson DeMille

quotes.quote: When in danger or in doubt, run in circles, scream and shout.
quotes.author: Andrews McMeel

quotes.quote: Anyone who isn't confused really doesn't understand the situation.
quotes.author: Edward Murrow

quotes.quote: Don't let aging get you down. It's too hard to get back up.
quotes.author: John Wagner

quotes.quote: High-tech tomatoes. Mysterious mile. Supers quash. Are we supposed to eat this stuff? Or is it going to eat us?
quotes.author: Anita Manning

quotes.quote: Every faculty...I possess can be used as an instrument with which to worry myself.
quotes.author: Mark Rutherford

quotes.quote: Try not to worry... take each day just one anxiety attack at a time.
quotes.author: Tom Wilson

quotes.quote: Love looks forward, hate looks back, anxiety has eyes all over its head.
quotes.author: Mignon McLaughlin

quotes.quote: We are, perhaps, uniquely among the earth's creatures, the worrying animal.
quotes.author: Lewis Thomas

quotes.quote: I accept chaos. I'm not sure whether it accepts me.
quotes.author: Bob Dylan

quotes.quote: It's nice to see that look of alarm on the faces of the others.
quotes.author: Graham Chapman

quotes.quote: The reason why worry kills more people than work is that more people worry than work.
quotes.author: Robert Frost

quotes.quote: Don't worry that children never listen to you; worry that they are always watching you.
quotes.author: Robert Fulghum

quotes.quote: Life is not a spectacle or a feast; it is a predicament.
quotes.author: George Santayana

quotes.quote: Dread of disaster makes everybody act in the very way that increases the disaster.
quotes.author: Bertrand Russell

quotes.quote: Every day I run scared. That's the only wayy I an stay ahead.
quotes.author: John Johnson

quotes.quote: When I consider that the noble animals have been exterminated here - the cougar, panther, lynx, wolverine, wolf, bear, moose, deer, the beaver, the turkey, etc, etc - I cannot but feel as I lived in a tamed, and, as it were, emasculated country.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: Be like the panther kind, the ghost of forest, too quick to take hold of any opportunity that comes your way and too stealthy to be noticed when you climb to the top because success breeds haters.
quotes.author: Younes Tarantino

quotes.quote: I had never seen the jungle. They fed me behind bars from an iron pan till one night I felt that I was Bagheera - the Panther - and no man's plaything, and I broke the silly lock with one blow of my paw and came away; and because I had learned the ways of men, I became more terrible in the jungle than Shere Khan.
quotes.author: Rudyard Kipling

quotes.quote: But I welcome the darkness where the two eyes of that soft panther glow. The darkness is my cultural broth. The enchanted darkness. I go on speaking to you, risking disconnection: I’m subterraneously unattainable because of what I know.
quotes.author: Clarice Lispector

quotes.quote: The god we now behold with opened eyes, A herd of spotted panthers round him lies In glaring forms; the grapy clusters spread On his fair brows, and dangle on his head.
quotes.author: Ovid

quotes.quote: Because I’m a cat. A big one, the Panther of Rough Storms, in fact. But still a cat. If there’s a saucer of milk to spill, I’d rather spill it than let it lie. If my mistress grows absent-minded and leaves a ball of yarn about, I’ll bat it between my paws, and unravel it. Because it’s fun. Because it’s what cats do best.
quotes.author: Catherynne M. Valente

quotes.quote: The entire history of humanity is marked by a single inexorable movement - from animal instinct toward rational thought, from inborn behavior toward acquired knowledge. A half-grown panther abandoned in the wilderness will grow up to be a perfectly normal panther. But a half-grown child similarly abandoned will grow up into an unrecognizable savage, unfit for normal society. Yet there are those who insist the opposite: that we are creatures of instinct, like wolves.
quotes.author: Philipp Meyer

quotes.quote: If she had not been alone, she would never have seen the panther or felt the hope it spread into the world like rings around the splash of a rock thrown into a still lake.
quotes.author: Charles Frazier

quotes.quote: She understood perfectly that when the object of anticipation becomes paramount, trouble begins to lurk like a panther.
quotes.author: Richard Ford

quotes.quote: There is no beast, no rush of fire, like woman so untamed. She calmly goes her way where even panthers would be shamed.
quotes.author: Aristophanes

quotes.quote: [Beauty is] a delicate bait with a deadly hook; a sweet panther with a devouring paunch, a sour poison in a silver pot.
quotes.author: John Lyly

quotes.quote: The nature of a panther is that he never attacks. But if anyone attacks or backs into a corner, the panther comes up to wipe that aggressor or that attacker out.
quotes.author: Huey Newton

quotes.quote: Yes, we do defend our office as we do defend our homes. This is a constitutional right everybody has, and nothing's funny about that. The only reason they get mad at the Black Panther Party when you do it is for the simple reason that we're political.
quotes.author: Fred Hampton

quotes.quote: If you look at the true essence of the Black Panthers, they were more of a community protection group.
quotes.author: Anthony Mackie

quotes.quote: My mother was a woman. A black woman. A single mother. Raising two kids on her own. So she was dark skinned. Had short hair. Got no love from nobody except for a group called the Black Panthers. So that's why she was a Black Panther.
quotes.author: Tupac Shakur

quotes.quote: A lot of people don't understand the Black Panthers Party's relationship with white mother country radicals.
quotes.author: Fred Hampton

quotes.quote: A father is a fellow who has replaced the currency in his wallet with snapshots of his kids.
quotes.author: Michael Forest

quotes.quote: Being a father is the most rewarding thing a man whose career has plateaued can do.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: Every father should remember one day his son will follow his example, not his advice.
quotes.author: Charles Kettering

quotes.quote: Fathers are biological necessities, but social accidents.
quotes.author: Margaret Mead

quotes.quote: What the father kept silent the son speaks out.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.quote: A father is a man who expects his son to be as good a man as he meant to be.
quotes.author: Frank A. Clark

quotes.quote: It is a wise father that knows his own child.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: The greatest mark of a father is how he treats his children when no one is looking.
quotes.author: Dan Pearce

quotes.quote: A family needs a father to anchor it.
quotes.author: L. Tom Perry

quotes.quote: An angry father is most cruel towards himself.
quotes.author: Publilius Syrus

quotes.quote: It is much easier to become a father than to be one.
quotes.author: Kent Nerburn

quotes.quote: No love is greater than that of a father for His son.
quotes.author: Dan Brown

quotes.quote: Good fathers not only tell us how to live, they show us.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: A father carries pictures where his money used to be.
quotes.author: Steve Martin

quotes.quote: One father is more than a hundred schoolmasters.
quotes.author: George Herbert

quotes.quote: A father is a man who fails every day.
quotes.author: Michael Chabon

quotes.quote: A father's disappointment can be a very powerful tool.
quotes.author: Michael Bergin

quotes.quote: The most important thing a father can do for his children is to love their mother.
quotes.author: Theodore Hesburgh

quotes.quote: Fathers have a lot to do to make up for having sons.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.quote: Being a father makes everything in the world make sense.
quotes.author: Cameron Mathison

quotes.quote: Real Fathers are men of integrity & honour. Their word is their bond.
quotes.author: Fela Durotoye

quotes.quote: A successful father is not more successful than his children.
quotes.author: Raheel Farooq

quotes.quote: A father knows his child's heart, as only a child can know his fathers.
quotes.author: Kazuo Koike

quotes.quote: The love of a father is one of nature's greatest masterpieces.
quotes.author: Helen Lowrie Marshall

quotes.quote: Real fathers are solution providers and not a part of the problem to be solved.
quotes.author: Fela Durotoyev

quotes.quote: Be the best father you can be to your children. Because nothing is more important.
quotes.author: Barack Obama

quotes.quote: A father's duty is to make his home a place of happiness and joy.
quotes.author: Ezra Taft Benson

quotes.quote: Every father knows at once too much and too little about his own son.
quotes.author: Fanny Fern

quotes.quote: A righteous father protects his children with his time and presence.
quotes.author: Howard W. Hunter

quotes.quote: A father is the template of a man Nature gives a girl.
quotes.author: Allison Pearson

quotes.quote: The paparazzi do what they do, man. They have a job, too.
quotes.author: Tracy Morgan

quotes.quote: The paparazzi and the press have given me a voice. No matter how I got the voice, it's there.
quotes.author: Kevin Federline

quotes.quote: I believe in equality for everyone, except reporters and photographers.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: The paparazzi are usually waiting at the end of the block. It's pretty irritating. But you know, what are you going to do? I complain about it, still nothing changes. I try to wear the same outfit all the time. I try to be really boring and have a really bland expression on my face, but it doesn't seem... I think they're waiting for me to fall off my bike or something. I don't feel like a prisoner. But do I get annoyed that I can't go for a bike ride or a walk without people following me? Yeah, I do.
quotes.author: Madonna

quotes.quote: I had a horrifying frightful encounter with the paparazzi while I was with my baby. Because of a recent incident when I was trapped in my car without my baby by a throng of paparazzi, I was terrified that this time the physically aggressive paparazzi would put both me and my baby in danger. I instinctively took measures to get my baby and me out of harm's way, but the paparazzi continued to stalk us, and took photos of us which were sold to the media. I love my child and would do anything to protect him.
quotes.author: Britney Spears

quotes.quote: The paparazzi are nothing but dogs of war, after the death in a car crash of Diana, Princess of Wales.
quotes.author: Catherine Deneuve

quotes.quote: To take the commercial photographer's studio on location, the photographer takes his mind-set to make the photograph he wants. Once on location you need to be self-sufficient.
quotes.author: Nancy Hopkins Reily

quotes.quote: The paparazzi is named for the 1960 movie La Dolce Vita irksome photographer character named Paparazzo.
quotes.author: Nancy Hopkins Reily

quotes.quote: Paparazzi does exist, and there are some quite spectacular shots of me buying a piece of furniture or cigarettes. It's super annoying every time.
quotes.author: Mads Mikkelsen

quotes.quote: You love the paparazzi, love the fame. Even you know it causes me pain.
quotes.author: Lady Gaga

quotes.quote: I like the famous I am now: I walk into other people’s paparazzi photos, but I can also get a restaurant reservation.
quotes.author: Meg Ryan

quotes.quote: A selfie is paparazzi for people who aren't vibrant enough to attract paparazzi.
quotes.author: Dennis Miller

quotes.quote: Autographs and everything? I mean, just the one commercial, and you have paparazzi?
quotes.author: Kate

quotes.quote: Well, the paparazzi, they snapped a pic and it's going to be out in the morning.
quotes.author: Shay

quotes.quote: Make fun of me all you want, but school pictures are everything to me. They're great practice for getting photographed by the paparazzi. Invasive as the press may be, stars are dependent on them for their fame, and I feel I must be prepared.
quotes.author: Rachel Berry

quotes.quote: Break the story in heavy type / the news is running late tonight. / Be-decked with Nikon necklaces / hear the Paparazzi cries. / Under their noses walk / the famous in disguise. / Conspicuously huddled there / but no-one stops to look. / They've got their crayons out / to color in the book. / Snap it up, flash away / steal a camel for a day. / Break the story in heavy type / Paparazzi won't be home tonight. / Paparazzi...write it down. / Paparazzi...turn it around. / Paparazzi...take it, fake it, / break it. / `Cos it's a story.
quotes.author: Adele Margaret Anderson

quotes.quote: Paparazzi after my shows asking me questions / God fed up with my soul so ain't no blessing / Happiness can't be bought or sold, I learned my lesson / Now I see what fame will really get you / Bottle by the night stand, that ease the stress / Dealing with depression, pills on the dresser / Fiending for affection so I'm buying out the section / Now I see what fame really gets you.
quotes.author: Justin Scott

quotes.quote: Red carpet massacre / Don't want to hassle you / Red carpet massacre / Death-stalk paparazzi yeah / Red carpet massacre / It's going to mess with you / We're in business / You're on the hit list.
quotes.author: John Nigel Taylor

quotes.quote: What I do with my life / Ain't nobody's biz / What I do with my time / I wish you'd let me live / See everywhere I go / Your cameras follow me / Don't you know frames cover my eyes? / So my tears you never see / Tell me how much more / Do you think that I can take / Have the chauffeur drive me home / Paparazzi's at my gate / Try to ruin me, I ain't gonna let you do / Got a call from the Marshall firm / Somebody else want to sue.
quotes.author: Stephen Edward Huff

quotes.quote: Red carpet photographers maintain a respectful distance, whereas paparazzi are known to "get in the celebrity's face without any respect for the celebrity's personal space."
quotes.author: Jennifer Graylock

quotes.quote: We have a love-hate relationship. I need them, and they need me.
quotes.author: Halle Berry

quotes.quote: We recognized long ago that the paparazzi were just trying to do their job. Same with the press.
quotes.author: Kardashians

quotes.quote: That is the biggest form of bullying ever, the paparazzi. Printing lies, making accusations, it's just bullying.
quotes.author: Mila Kunis

quotes.quote: I've been... chased by paparazzi, and they run lights, and they chase you and harass you the whole time. It happens all over the world, and it has certainly gotten worse. You don't know what it's like being chased by them.
quotes.author: Tom Cruise

quotes.quote: You know when you eat too many sweets and get diabetes? Paparazzi are the diabetes of materialistic culture.
quotes.author: Shirley MacLaine

quotes.quote: When you have the paparazzi hiding in the bushes outside your home, the only thing you can control is how you respond publicly.
quotes.author: Portia de Rossi

quotes.quote: A paparazzi is merely an extremely nosy nobody with a cameraâ€”and bills to pay.
quotes.author: Mokokoma Mokhonoana

quotes.quote: Paparazzi will try to get the most controversial picture of you in a compromising position because that's how they're going to sell it.
quotes.author: Goldie Hawn

quotes.quote: If you have paparazzi, you know you've gotten somewhere.
quotes.author: Vanessa Hudgens

quotes.quote: PaperÂ is more patient than man.
quotes.author: Anne Frank

quotes.quote: Blank paper always symbolizes the anxiety of the painter.
quotes.author: Claude Picasso

quotes.quote: PaperÂ is to write things down that we need to remember. Our brains are used to think.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: To put what you see on paper is the same as funneling what you feel through yourself as a performer.
quotes.author: Rod Taylor

quotes.quote: So often is the virgin sheet ofÂ paperÂ more real than what one has to say, and so often one regrets having marred it.
quotes.author: Harold Acton

quotes.quote: PaperÂ acts as an eraser on the mind, as soon as you look at what you've written.
quotes.author: Dylan Moran

quotes.quote: Anything onÂ paperÂ is obsolete.
quotes.author: Craig Reucassel

quotes.quote: A blank piece ofÂ paperÂ is God's way of telling us how hard it is to be God.
quotes.author: Sidney Sheldon

quotes.quote: I speak to theÂ paper, as I speak to the first person I meet.
quotes.author: Michel de Montaigne

quotes.quote: This paper will no doubt be found interesting by those who take an interest in it.
quotes.author: John Dalton

quotes.quote: A piece of paper doesn't make you a pastor any more than making predictions makes you a prophet.
quotes.author: D.R. Silva

quotes.quote: But onÂ paper, things can live forever. OnÂ paper, a butterfly never dies.
quotes.author: Jacqueline Woodson

quotes.quote: PaperÂ remains the standard to which digital media can only aspire.
quotes.author: Leah Price

quotes.quote: It is in front of the theÂ paperÂ that the artist creates himself.
quotes.author: Stephane Mallarme

quotes.quote: If they give you ruledÂ paper, write the other way.
quotes.author: Juan Ramon Jimenez

quotes.quote: A blank page ofÂ paperÂ and a pen is the greatest invention its so exciting to be confronted by possibility.
quotes.author: Nicky Wire

quotes.quote: A piece ofÂ paperÂ makes you an officer, a radio makes you a commander.
quotes.author: General Omar Bradley

quotes.quote: PaperÂ isn't important. It's the words on them that are important.
quotes.author: Margaret Atwood

quotes.quote: Fill yourÂ paperÂ with the breathings of your heart.
quotes.author: William Wordsworth

quotes.quote: Who knew paper and ink could be so vicious.
quotes.author: Kathryn Stockett

quotes.quote: It's curious how easy it is to tell a piece ofÂ paperÂ what you don't dare say to someone's face.
quotes.author: Carlos Ruiz Zafón

quotes.quote: Only on paper has humanity yet achieved glory, beauty, truth, knowledge, virtue, and abiding love.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: PaperÂ is poverty. It is only the ghost of money, and not money itself.
quotes.author: Thomas Jefferson

quotes.quote: A piece of paper or a photograph is as much an object, or as 'material' as a ton of lead.
quotes.author: Lucy R. Lippard

quotes.quote: PublishedÂ papers may omit important steps and the memory of men of science, even the greatest, is sadly fallible.
quotes.author: John Desmond Bernal

quotes.quote: Behind every piece ofÂ paperÂ lies a human situation.
quotes.author: Edward T. Hall

quotes.quote: TheÂ paperÂ is patient, but the reader is not.
quotes.author: Joseph Joubert

quotes.quote: In the surface of theÂ paperÂ there is only length and width-there is no such thing as thickness.
quotes.author: John Clayton

quotes.quote: When the weight of theÂ paperÂ equals the weight of the airplane, only then you can go flying.
quotes.author: Donald Wills Douglas

quotes.quote: The four walls ofÂ paperÂ are like a prison because every idea wants to spring out in all directions - everything is connected with everything else, sometimes more than others.
quotes.author: Ted Nelson

quotes.quote: Human language is lit with animal life: we play cats-cradle or have hare-brained ideas; we speak of badgering; or outfoxing someone; to squirrel something away and to ferret it out.
quotes.author: Jay Griffiths

quotes.quote: Your library is your paradise.
quotes.author: Desiderius Erasmus

quotes.quote: There is a kind of serenity in love which is almost a paradise.
quotes.author: Alain Badiou

quotes.quote: Paradise is exactly like where you are right now... only much, much better.
quotes.author: Laurie Anderson

quotes.quote: Paradise was made for tender hearts; hell, for loveless hearts.
quotes.author: Voltaire

quotes.quote: The only paradise is paradise lost.
quotes.author: Marcel Proust

quotes.quote: Those who promise us paradise on earth never produced anything but a hell.
quotes.author: Karl Popper

quotes.quote: A fool's paradise is a wise man's hell!
quotes.author: Thomas Fuller

quotes.quote: Time has shown that Paradise is not cheap, and neither is Hell unnecessary.
quotes.author: Said Nursi

quotes.quote: Recollection is the only paradise from which we cannot be turned out.
quotes.author: Jean Paul

quotes.quote: Children are the keys of paradise.
quotes.author: Eric Hoffer

quotes.quote: Oxford, the paradise of dead philosophies.
quotes.author: George Santayana

quotes.quote: God comes first. Paradise is not cheap.
quotes.author: Hakeem Olajuwon

quotes.quote: Hell is where everyone is doing his own thing. Paradise is where everyone is doing God's thing.
quotes.author: Thomas Howard

quotes.quote: We must prefer real hell to an imaginary paradise.
quotes.author: Simone Weil

quotes.quote: He who indulges in falsehood will find the paths of paradise shut to him.
quotes.author: Abu Bakr

quotes.quote: Every beloved object is the center point of a paradise.
quotes.author: Novalis

quotes.quote: A worker's paradise is a consumer's hell.
quotes.author: Esther Dyson

quotes.quote: Paradise is too perfect for humanity.
quotes.author: Dario Argento

quotes.quote: The heart of man is, so to speak, the paradise of God.
quotes.author: Alphonsus Liguori

quotes.quote: The path to paradise begins in hell.
quotes.author: Dante Alighieri

quotes.quote: Even paradise could become a prison if one had enough time to take notice of the walls.
quotes.author: Morgan Rhodes

quotes.quote: God hides the fires of hell within paradise.
quotes.author: Paulo Coelho

quotes.quote: Certainly paradise, whatever, wherever it be, contains flaws. If it did not, it would be incapable of drawing the hearts of men or angels.
quotes.author: Henry Miller

quotes.quote: Whoever threads a path seeking knowledge, Allah will make easy for him the path to paradise.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Paradise is open to all kind hearts.
quotes.author: Pierre Jean de Beranger

quotes.quote: He who aspires to paradise should learn to deal with people with kindness.
quotes.author: Abu Bakr

quotes.quote: Privacy is paradise.
quotes.author: Holly Hunter

quotes.quote: I am the wisest man alive, for I know one thing, and that is that I know nothing.
quotes.author: Plato

quotes.quote: An empty head is not really empty; it is stuffed with rubbish. Hence the difficulty of forcing anything into an empty head.
quotes.author: Eric Hoffer

quotes.quote: Only you can take responsibility for your happiness..but you can't do it alone. It's the great paradox of being human.
quotes.author: Simon Sinek

quotes.quote: The way of paradoxes is the way of truth. To test Reality we must see it on the tight-rope. When the Verities become acrobats we can judge them.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: The paradox of simplicity is that making things simpler is hard work
quotes.author: Bill Jensen

quotes.quote: To live fully, one must be free, but to be free one must give up security. Therefore, to live one must be ready to die. How's that for a paradox?
quotes.author: Tom Robbins

quotes.quote: By denying scientific principles, one may maintain any paradox.
quotes.author: Galileo Galilei

quotes.quote: Give a man a fish and you feed him for a day; teach a man to fish and you feed him for a lifetime.
quotes.author: Lao Tzu

quotes.quote: Conservatives are not necessarily stupid, but most stupid people are conservatives.
quotes.author: John Stuart Mill

quotes.quote: Man is an embodied paradox, a bundle of contradictions
quotes.author: Charles Caleb Colton

quotes.quote: If you don't risk anything, you risk even more.
quotes.author: Erica Jong

quotes.quote: In love the paradox occurs that two beings become one and yet remain two.
quotes.author: Erich Fromm

quotes.quote: A fear of weakness only strengthens weakness.
quotes.author: Criss Jami

quotes.quote: But human experience is usually paradoxical, that means incongruous with the phrases of current talk or even current philosophy.
quotes.author: George Eliot

quotes.quote: When a paradox is widely believed, it is no longer recognized as a paradox
quotes.author: Mason Cooley

quotes.quote: The paradox is that when resistance is fully accepted, the resistance disappears
quotes.author: Adyashanti

quotes.quote: A mind all logic is like a knife all blade. It makes the hand bleed that uses it.
quotes.author: Rabindranath Tagore

quotes.quote: There are two tragedies in life. One is to lose your heart's desire. The other is to gain it.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: Paradox with him was only truth standing on its head to attract attention
quotes.author: Earl Warren

quotes.quote: How wonderful that we have met with a paradox. Now we have some hope of making progress.
quotes.author: Niels Bohr

quotes.quote: It is a paradoxical but profoundly true and important principle of life that the most likely way to reach a goal is to be aiming not at that goal itself but at some more ambitious goal beyond it.
quotes.author: Arnold Toynbee

quotes.quote: The paradox of reality is that no image is as compelling as the one which exists only in the mind's eye.
quotes.author: Shana Alexander

quotes.quote: The way I feel about music is that there is no right and wrong. Only true and false.
quotes.author: Fiona Apple

quotes.quote: The more we do, the more we can do; the more busy we are, the more leisure we have.
quotes.author: William Hazlitt

quotes.quote: I'm not offended until you think I'm offended.
quotes.author: Criss Jami

quotes.quote: The thinker without a paradox is like a lover without a feeling: a paltry mediocrity.
quotes.author: Soren Kierkegaard

quotes.quote: Men have two greatest fears: the first fear is the fear of being needed, and the second fear is the fear of not being needed.
quotes.author: C. JoyBell C.

quotes.quote: Paradox is the pathos or the passion of philosophy.
quotes.author: Gilles Deleuze

quotes.quote: There is an ecstasy that marks the summit of life, and beyond which life cannot rise. And such is the paradox of living, this ecstasy comes when one is most alive, and it comes as a complete forgetfulness that one is alive.
quotes.author: Jack London

quotes.quote: Life is a paradox, you're damned if you do and damned if you don't
quotes.author: Nancy Cartwright

quotes.quote: The idea of the paranoid style as a force in politics would have little contemporary relevance or historical value if it were applied only to men with profoundly disturbed minds. It is the use of paranoid modes of expression by more or less normal people that makes the phenomenon significant.
quotes.author: Richard Hofstadter

quotes.quote: Paranoia is just another word for ignorance.
quotes.author: Hunter S. Thompson

quotes.quote: Paranoia reduces anxiety and guilt by transferring to the other all the characteristics one does not want to recognize in oneself. It is maintained by selective perception and recall. We only see and acknowledge those negative aspects of the enemy that support the stereotype we have already created.
quotes.author: Sam Keen

quotes.quote: The worm of paranoia begins to eat into even the hardest adversary.
quotes.author: David Ignatius

quotes.quote: Paranoia plays into all of us. Trust is a terrifying idea of not knowing who we can rely on.
quotes.author: Eric Christian Olsen

quotes.quote: Just because you're paranoid doesn't mean they aren't after you.
quotes.author: Kurt Cobain

quotes.quote: Paranoia is just a heightened sense of awareness.
quotes.author: John Lennon

quotes.quote: The paranoid is never entirely mistaken.
quotes.author: Sigmund Freud

quotes.quote: A paranoid thinks that sinister forces are out to get him, not realizing that they are out to get everybody.
quotes.author: Robert Breault

quotes.quote: Paranoia is the delusion that your enemies are organized.
quotes.author: Arthur D. Hlavaty

quotes.quote: Paranoia is just another word for longevity.
quotes.author: Laurell K. Hamilton

quotes.quote: Paranoia is reality seen on a finer scale.
quotes.author: Philo Gant

quotes.quote: Don't be afraid of losing a little power in daily associations. People who seek power and knowledge aren't misers. They aren't afraid. That is paranoid.
quotes.author: Frederick Lenz

quotes.quote: Paranoia was always a potential side effect.
quotes.author: Kimberly Derting

quotes.quote: A paranoid is someone who has all the facts.
quotes.author: William S. Burroughs

quotes.quote: Even paranoid people have enemies.
quotes.author: Henry A. Kissinger

quotes.quote: In this world only the paranoid survive.
quotes.author: Dean Koontz

quotes.quote: It's amazing where the paranoid mind can take you.
quotes.author: Bill Ayers

quotes.quote: Sometimes paranoia's just having all the facts.
quotes.author: William S. Burroughs

quotes.quote: There is no such thing as paranoia. No. Not in the 21st century. Paranoia is just another word for ignorance.
quotes.author: Dr. Hunter S. Thompson

quotes.quote: Being slightly paranoid is like being slightly pregnant - it tends to get worse.
quotes.author: Molly Ivins

quotes.quote: We need to tell the difference between being paranoid and being careful.
quotes.author: Parry Aftab

quotes.quote: Paranoia has a sharper taste if the danger is real.
quotes.author: Pat Conroy

quotes.quote: Paranoid is what people who are trying to take advantage call you in an effort to get you to drop your guard.
quotes.author: Matt Damon

quotes.quote: There is no such thing as paranoia. Your worst fears can come true at any moment.
quotes.author: Hunter S. Thompson

quotes.quote: If you act out of a paranoid fear of something happening, you will always make that thing happen.
quotes.author: John Green

quotes.quote: Only the paranoid survive.
quotes.author: Andy Grove

quotes.quote: The secret to a happy, successful life of paranoia is to keep careful track of your persecutors.
quotes.author: Tyrone Hayes

quotes.quote: A paranoid is someone who knows a little of what's going on.
quotes.author: William S. Burroughs

quotes.quote:
You're mind is working at its best when you're being paranoid.
You explore every avenue and possibility of your situation
at high speed with total clarity.
quotes.author: Banksy

quotes.quote: The life of a mother is the life of a child: you are two blossoms on a single branch.
quotes.author: Karen Maezen Miller

quotes.quote: I'm beginning to perceive motherhood as a long, slow letting go, of which birth is just the first step.
quotes.author: Sandra Steingraber

quotes.quote: Parents can only give good advice or put them on the right paths, but the final forming of a person's character lies in their own hands
quotes.author: Anne Frank

quotes.quote: Parents need to fill a child's bucket of self-esteem so high that the rest of the world can't poke enough holes to drain it dry.
quotes.author: Alvin Price

quotes.quote: Encourage & support your kids because 'Children are apt to live up to what you believe of them.
quotes.author: Lady Bird Johnson

quotes.quote: When you give a little of yourself to a child, you give a little of yourself to their future!
quotes.author: Kevin Heath

quotes.quote: We never know the love of the parent till we become parents ourselves.
quotes.author: Henry Ward Beecher

quotes.quote: If you are a parent, open doors to unknown directions to the child so he can explore. Don't make him afraid of the unknown,give him support
quotes.author: Osho

quotes.quote: Parenthood...It's about guiding the next generation, and forgiving the last.
quotes.author: Peter Krause

quotes.quote: Sometimes the strength of motherhood is greater than natural laws.
quotes.author: Barbara Kingsolver

quotes.quote: There is nothing that moves a loving father's soul quite like his child's cry.
quotes.author: Joni Eareckson Tada

quotes.quote: I mean, when the world comes for your children, with the knives out, it's your job to stand in the way.
quotes.author: Joe Hill

quotes.quote: Parenthood is the opiate of the masses.
quotes.author: Chuck Palahniuk

quotes.quote: If we never have headaches through rebuking our children, we shall have plenty of heartaches when they grow up.
quotes.author: Charles Haddon Spurgeon

quotes.quote: The danger of motherhood. you relive your early self, through the eyes of your mother.
quotes.author: Joyce Carol Oates

quotes.quote: It's our children who teach us how to be parents.
quotes.author: Susie Morgenstern

quotes.quote: There is no such thing as a perfect parent. So just be a real one.
quotes.author: Sue Atkins

quotes.quote: Whatever you would have your children become, strive to exhibit in your own lives and conversation.
quotes.author: Lydia H. Sigourney

quotes.quote: Where parents do too much for their children, the children will not do much for themselves.
quotes.author: Elbert Hubbard

quotes.quote: Let parents bequeath to their children not riches, but the spirit of reverence.
quotes.author: Plato

quotes.quote: Parentage is a very important profession, but no test of fitness for it is ever imposed in the interest of the children.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: The most important thing that parents can teach their children is how to get along without them
quotes.author: Frank A. Clark

quotes.quote: Stop trying to perfect your child, but keep trying to perfect your relationship with him.
