quotes.author: Dr. Henker

quotes.quote: Praise your children openly, reprehend them secretly.
quotes.author: W. Cecil

quotes.quote: Your children will become what you are; so be what you want them to be
quotes.author: David Bly

quotes.quote: Kids are like a mirror, what they see and hear they do. Be a good reflection for them.
quotes.author: K. Heath

quotes.quote: The rules for parents are but three...love, limit, and let them be.
quotes.author: Elaine M. Ward

quotes.quote: If your child has a weakness, teach them how to turn it into a strength! The only Failure is not trying.
quotes.author: Kevin Heath

quotes.quote: Love is giving your kids your undivided attention and time
quotes.author: Kevin Heath

quotes.quote: If you want your children to improve, let them overhear the nice things you say about them to others.
quotes.author: Haim Ginott

quotes.quote: All parents damage their children. It cannot be helped. Youth, like pristine glass, absorbs the prints of its handlers. Some parents smudge, others crack, a few shatter childhoods completely into jagged little pieces, beyond repair.
quotes.author: Mitch Albom

quotes.quote: We never know the love of a parent till we become parents ourselves.
quotes.author: Henry Ward Beecher

quotes.quote: I also believe that parents, if they love you, will hold you up safely, above their swirling waters, and sometimes that means you'll never know what they endured, and you may treat them unkindly, in a way you otherwise wouldn't.
quotes.author: Mitch Albom

quotes.quote: Parents often talk about the younger generation as if they didn't have anything to do with it.
quotes.author: Haim Ginott

quotes.quote: The best inheritance a parent can give his children is a few minutes of his time each day.
quotes.author: Orlando A. Battista

quotes.quote: Parents need to fill a child's bucket of self-esteem so high that the rest of the world can't poke enough holes to drain it dry
quotes.author: Alvin Price

quotes.quote: As parents, we guide by our unspoken example. It is only when we're talking to them that our kids aren't listening.
quotes.author: Robert Brault

quotes.quote: The pressures of being a parent are equal to any pressure on earth. To be a conscious parent, and really look to that little being's mental and physical health, is a responsibility which most of us, including me, avoid most of the time because it's too hard.
quotes.author: John Lennon

quotes.quote: The joys of parents are secret, and so are their griefs and fears: they cannot utter the one, nor will they utter the other.
quotes.author: Francis Bacon

quotes.quote: Our parents deserve our honor and respect for giving us life itself. Beyond this they almost always made countless sacrifices as they cared for and nurtured us through our infancy and childhood, provided us with the necessities of life, and nursed us through physical illnesses and the emotional stresses of growing up.
quotes.author: Ezra Taft Benson

quotes.quote: One of the greatest titles in the world is parent, and one of the biggest blessings in the world is to have parents to call mom and dad.
quotes.author: Jim Demint

quotes.quote: It is time for parents to teach young people early on that in diversity there is beauty and there is strength.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.quote: Parents can only give good advice or put them on the right paths, but the final forming of a person's character lies in their own hands.
quotes.author: Anne Frank

quotes.quote: A parent who has never apologized to his children is a monster. If he's always apologizing, his children are monsters.
quotes.author: Mignon McLaughlin

quotes.quote: At the end of the day, the most overwhelming key to a child's success is the positive involvement of parents.
quotes.author: Jane D. Hull

quotes.quote: There are no illegitimate children only illegitimate parents.
quotes.author: Leon R. Yankwich

quotes.quote: Parents are the bones on which children sharpen their teeth.
quotes.author: Peter Ustinov

quotes.quote: Parents lend children their experience and a vicarious memory; children endow their parents with a vicarious immortality.
quotes.author: George Santayana

quotes.quote: To lose one parent may be regarded as a misfortune... to lose both seems like carelessness.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: Where parents do too much for their children, the children will not do much for themselves.
quotes.author: Elbert Hubbard

quotes.quote: Parents wonder why the streams are bitter, when they themselves have poisoned the fountain.
quotes.author: John Locke

quotes.quote: If you've never been hated by your child, you've never been a parent.
quotes.author: Bette Davis

quotes.quote: Your parents, they give you your life, but then they try to give you their life.
quotes.author: Chuck Palahniuk

quotes.quote: A mother is not a person to lean on but a person to make leaning unnecessary.
quotes.author: Dorothy C. Fisher

quotes.quote: The best that a parent can be... A demonstrator...A consistant, constant demonstrator of being in your own vortex.
quotes.author: Abraham-Hicks

quotes.quote: The best thing you can give children, next to good habits, are good memories.
quotes.author: Sydney J. Harris

quotes.quote: The child supplies the power, but the parents have to do the steering.
quotes.author: Benjamin Spock

quotes.quote: Every parent is a teacher... But not all parents teach.
quotes.author: Anthony Douglas Williams

quotes.quote: As a parent, you will often serve as an inadvertent example to your child. A child will model himself after you in many areas: how you deal with frustration, settle disagreements and cope with not being able to have the things that you want, to name just three.
quotes.author: Lawrence Balter

quotes.quote: When things turn out pretty much as expected, parents give little thought to how much they have influenced the outcome. When things don't turn out as expected, parents give a great deal of thought to the role they play.
quotes.author: Arlene Harder

quotes.quote: Parental love is the only love that is truly selfless, unconditional and forgiving.
quotes.author: Dr T.P.Chia

quotes.quote: What it's like to be a parent: It's one of the hardest things you'll ever do but in exchange it teaches you the meaning of unconditional love.
quotes.author: Nicholas Sparks

quotes.quote: Parents were the only ones obligated to love you; from the rest of the world you had to earn it.
quotes.author: Ann Brashares

quotes.quote: Affirming words from moms and dads are like light switches. Speak a word of affirmation at the right moment in a child's life and it's like lighting up a whole roomful of possibilities.
quotes.author: Gary Smalley

quotes.quote: The depth of the love of parents for their children cannot be measured. It is like no other relationship. It exceeds concern for life itself. The love of a parent for a child is continuous and transcends heartbreak and disappointment.
quotes.author: James E. Faust

quotes.quote: We never know the love of a parent till we become parents ourselves.
quotes.author: Henry Ward Beecher

quotes.quote: When you look into your mother's eyes, you know that is the purest love you can find on this earth.
quotes.author: Mitch Albom

quotes.quote: It's a funny thing about mothers and fathers. Even when their own child is the most disgusting little blister you could ever imagine, they still think that he or she is wonderful.
quotes.author: Roald Dahl

quotes.quote: The most loving parents and relatives commit murder with smiles on their faces. They force us to destroy the person we really are: a subtle kind of murder.
quotes.author: Jim Morrison

quotes.quote: My parents are my backbone. Still are. They're the only group that will support you if you score zero or you score 40.
quotes.author: Kobe Bryant

quotes.quote: Each day of our lives we make deposits in the memory banks of our children.
quotes.author: Charles R. Swindoll

quotes.quote: By loving them for more than their abilities we show our children that they are much more than the sum of their accomplishments.
quotes.author: Eileen Kennedy-Moore

quotes.quote: A father's goodness is higher than the mountain, a mother's goodness deeper than the sea.
quotes.author: Japanese Proverb

quotes.quote: A parent's love is whole no matter how many times divided.
quotes.author: Robert Brault

quotes.quote: That's the nature of being a parent, Sabine has discovered. You'll love your children far more than you ever loved your parents, and - in the recognition that your own children cannot fathom the depth of your love - you come to understand the tragic, unrequited love of your own parents.
quotes.author: Ursula Hegi

quotes.quote: The best inheritance a parent can give his children is a few minutes of his time each day.
quotes.author: O. A. Battista

quotes.quote: If you raise your children to feel that they can accomplish any goal or task they decide upon, you will have succeeded as a parent and you will have given your children the greatest of all blessings.
quotes.author: Brian Tracy

quotes.quote: As your kids grow they may forget what you said, but won't forget how you made them feel
quotes.author: Kevin Heath

quotes.quote: No language can express the power, and beauty, and heroism, and majesty of a mother's love. It shrinks not where man cowers, and grows stronger where man faints, and over wastes of worldly fortunes sends the radiance of its quenchless fidelity like a star.
quotes.author: Edwin Hubbell Chapin

quotes.quote: Parents need to fill a child's bucket of self-esteem so high that the rest of the world can't poke enough holes to drain it dry
quotes.author: Alvin Price

quotes.quote: Don't throw away your friendship with your teenager over behavior that has no great moral significance. There will be plenty of real issues that require you to stand like a rock. Save your big guns for those crucial confrontations.
quotes.author: Dr. James Dobson

quotes.quote: Making the decision to have a child is momentous. It is to decide forever to have your heart go walking around outside your body.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Stone

quotes.quote: We must love them for themselves, and not for the best of ourselves in them, and that is a great deal harder to do. Loving our own children is an exercise for the imagination.
quotes.author: Andrew Solomon

quotes.quote: The Parental predisposition to love prevails in the most harrowing of circumstances.
quotes.author: Andrew Solomon

quotes.quote: A Parents love is whole, no matter how many times it’s divided.
quotes.author: Robert Brault

quotes.quote: No matter how far we come, our parents are always in us.
quotes.author: Brad Meltzer

quotes.quote: Parents of young children should realize that few people, and maybe no one, will find their children as enchanting as they do.
quotes.author: Barbara Walters

quotes.quote: In some sense every parent does love their children. But some parents are too broken to love them well.
quotes.author: Wm. Paul Young

quotes.quote: Love is the chain whereby to bind a child to its parents
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.quote: There is no friendship, no love, like that of the parent for the child.
quotes.author: Henry Ward Beecher

quotes.quote: Paris is a wonderful city. I can't say I belong to an especially anglophone community.
quotes.author: Marilyn Hacker

quotes.quote: In Paris, our lives are one masked ball.
quotes.author: Gaston Leroux

quotes.quote: Being a Parisian is not about being born in Paris, it is about being reborn there.
quotes.author: Sacha Guitry

quotes.quote: In Paris, you're as far as possible from the land of pleasant smiles.
quotes.author: Kanye West

quotes.quote: To study in Paris is to be born in Paris!
quotes.author: Victor Hugo

quotes.quote: No one has the right to change Paris, the protesters say, and argue that the city is the patrimony of all mankind.
quotes.author: John Vinocur

quotes.quote: When good Americans die, they go to Paris.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: There's something about Paris, people just don't have anything else do there but love each other.
quotes.author: Louis Garrel

quotes.quote: In Paris, I really do like to try and do nothing... but that's impossible.
quotes.author: Christian Louboutin

quotes.quote: If you have ever walked in Paris, you will see that Paris will ever walk in your memoires!
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.quote: Paris has always seemed ... the only city where you can live and express yourself as you please.
quotes.author: Natalie Clifford Barney

quotes.quote: Another well-known Paris landmark is the Arc de Triomphe, a moving monument to the many brave women and men who have died trying to visit it.
quotes.author: Dave Barry

quotes.quote: You'll have to fall in love at least once in your life, or Paris has failed to rub off on you.
quotes.author: E. A. Bucchianeri

quotes.quote: Paris is a city of gaieties and pleasures, where four fifths of the inhabitants die of grief.
quotes.author: CHAMFORT

quotes.quote: Good talkers are only found in Paris.
quotes.author: Francois Villon

quotes.quote: If you are lucky enough to have lived in Paris as a young man, then wherever you go for the rest of your life, it stays with you, for Paris is a moveable feast.
quotes.author: Ernest Hemingway

quotes.quote: Paris is so very beautiful that it satisfies something in you that is always hungry in America.
quotes.author: Ernest Hemingway

quotes.quote: London is a riddle. Paris is an explanation.
quotes.author: G.K. Chesterton

quotes.quote: That Paris exists and anyone could choose to live anywhere else in the world will always be a mystery to me.
quotes.author: Marion Cotillard

quotes.quote: There should be a name for the syndrome that occurs when you're in Paris and you already miss it.
quotes.author: Rosecrans Baldwin

quotes.quote: A breath of Paris preserves the soul.
quotes.author: Victor Hugo

quotes.quote: I fly to Paris and discover how to make love to God.
quotes.author: Ann Voskamp

quotes.quote: Paris was a museum displaying exactly itself.
quotes.author: Jeffrey Eugenides

quotes.quote: Paris is a hard place to leave, even when it rains incessantly and one coughs continually from the dampness.
quotes.author: Willa Cather

quotes.quote: You belong to me and all Paris belongs to me and I belong to this notebook and this pencil.
quotes.author: Ernest Hemingway

quotes.quote: With an apple I will astonish Paris.
quotes.author: Paul Cezanne

quotes.quote: Paris is the happiest city in the world tonight. All Paris is dancing in the streets.
quotes.author: Larry LeSueur

quotes.quote: There are only two places in the world where we can live happy: at home and in Paris.
quotes.author: Ernest Hemingway

quotes.quote: In Paris, everybody wants to be an actor; nobody is content to be a spectator.
quotes.author: Jean Cocteau

quotes.quote: People come to Paris, to the capital, to give their lives a sense of belonging, of an almost mythical participation in society.
quotes.author: Marguerite Duras

quotes.quote: Everybody needs beauty as well as bread, places to play in and pray in, where nature may heal and give strength to body and soul.
quotes.author: John Muir

quotes.quote: There are no words that can tell the hidden spirit of the wilderness, that can reveal its mystery, its melancholy, and its charm.
quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.quote: And Reality is hard. It is no walk in the park, this thing called life.
quotes.author: Patty Duke

quotes.quote: Parks are but pavement disguised with a growth of grass.
quotes.author: George Gissing

quotes.quote: Parks are idealizations of nature, but nature in fact is not a condition of the ideal.
quotes.author: Robert Smithson

quotes.quote: Within National Parks is room, glorious room, room in which to find ourselves, in which to think and hope, to dream and plan, to rest and resolve.
quotes.author: Enos Mills

quotes.quote: The scenic ideals that surround even our national parks are carriers of a nostalgia for heavenly bliss and eternal calmness.
quotes.author: Robert Smithson

quotes.quote: The world is a playground, and death is the night
quotes.author: Rumi

quotes.quote: Parks and playgrounds are the soul of a city.
quotes.author: Marty Rubin

quotes.quote: It is the child in man that is the source of his uniqueness and creativeness, and the playground is the optimal milieu for the unfolding of his capacities and talents.
quotes.author: Eric Hoffer

quotes.quote: Make your race a playground, not a proving ground.
quotes.author: Lauren Fleshma

quotes.quote: A national park is not a playground. It's a sanctuary for nature and for humans who will accept nature on nature's own terms.
quotes.author: Michael Frome

quotes.quote: Behind every great amusement park is a great fan site.
quotes.author: Walt Disney

quotes.quote: Preserving parks and open spaces is a winner because it doesn't need to be explained to everyday Americans.
quotes.author: Frank Luntz

quotes.quote: The true object of all human life is play. Earth is a task garden; heaven is a playground.
quotes.author: Gilbert K. Chesterton

quotes.quote: They say a happy childhood is a lousy preparation for life. Kids who spend their playground days fat, ginger or gay know the truth.
quotes.author: Adam Baker

quotes.quote: Parkour is like Golf. The better you play the less you need to do.
quotes.author: Anan Anwar

quotes.quote: Free Runners are like kids on playground.
quotes.author: Jason Paul

quotes.quote: Obstacles are found everywhere, and in overcoming them we nourish ourselves.
quotes.author: David Belle

quotes.quote: Parkour belongs to the ones who live it, not the ones who want to live thanks to it
quotes.author: David Belle

quotes.quote: Timing, Precision and playfulness.
quotes.author: Jason Paul

quotes.quote: Many people open their mind through different things like music and painting, as well as Parkour. How is not important. What is important is to open your mind because you gain some freedom through it.
quotes.author: David Belle

quotes.quote: Parkour does not have to be liked or disliked! Parkour is here and it will stay here forever! Because it was born from a pure heart and nourished from all the love that a son can give to his father!
quotes.author: David Belle

quotes.quote: One of the main points of the philosophy behind parkour is being able to help people. To teach them they way themselves, to gain confidence in themselves, building up from simple moves to more complex things, to teach them that they are worthwhile people.
quotes.author: Chris Hayes

quotes.quote: Parkour teaches you to be sure of what you are able to do.
quotes.author: David Belle

quotes.quote: Parkour was never invented by anyone, it's always been here.
quotes.author: Sebastien Foucan

quotes.quote: You don't need any money to do Parkour, just a pair of good shoes and that's all.
quotes.author: David Belle

quotes.quote: So if you do acrobatics things on the street with no other goal than showing off, please don't say it's parkour. Acrobatics existed long time ago before parkour.
quotes.author: David Belle

quotes.quote: They run around, try new things and test out their limits.
quotes.author: Jason Paul

quotes.quote: There are no limits, only obstacles, and any obstacle can be overcome.
quotes.author: David Belle

quotes.quote: The way of the parkour is to continue, not to stay here.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Choreography is simpler than you think. Just go and do, and don't think so much about it. Just make something interesting.
quotes.author: George Balanchine

quotes.quote: The best part of falling is getting back up again.
quotes.author: David Belle

quotes.quote: First, do it. Second, do it well. Third, do it well and fast that means you're a professional.
quotes.author: David Belle

quotes.quote: Train not to get something right, train so that you can never get it wrong
quotes.author: David Belle

quotes.quote: The evolution of Parkour sort of happens with time and age as you change, and the body has a certain memory of Parkour. There is a sort of thing that remains intrinsic, but then the choreography will adapt to whatever the necessity of each particular film needs.
quotes.author: David Belle

quotes.quote: Rails, walls and rooftops are no longer boundaries, but instead have now become part of my playground. This playground also exists in my mind as I mentally push myself further than I ever thought possible.
quotes.author: Ethan Scarlett

quotes.quote: Parkour for me has been a step change in the way I view life and interact with others. It has given me discipline to train, confidence in life and myself and camaraderie with fellow participants.
quotes.author: Sam Kilby

quotes.quote: Parkour allows me to be free, and express the way I feel.
quotes.author: Sam Kilby

quotes.quote: I moved just because it was fun, but now what was once just a game has become an art that carries me through reality in a state of balanced imagination!
quotes.author: Daniel Arroyo

quotes.quote: Parkour to me represents freedom, joy and happiness, and it what has driven me to continue to progress through not only my environment, but also life itself.
quotes.author: Ethan Scarlett

quotes.quote: The feeling of freedom and happiness that Parkour gives me is addictive and therefore has created a new way of life for me.
quotes.author: Ethan Scarlett

quotes.quote: For me Parkour is a life experience, an evolution which nourishes the self and the personality of the person who practices it.
quotes.author: Yoann Leroux

quotes.quote: Parkour means creating a mix of Urban Arts, which mix together to create one's own personal style.
quotes.author: Yoann Leroux

quotes.quote: Parkour is the bread and the other Urban Arts are the ingredients that you choose to put between the two slices!
quotes.author: Yoann Leroux

quotes.quote: The best thing about Parkour is the 'lifestyle' as we experience this lifestyle every moment, every second of the day as we are not only a family, but a community which pushes its limits whether it be against oneself or against the street.
quotes.author: Yoann Leroux

quotes.quote: Participation trophies are the soul herpes of a generation.
quotes.author: Christopher Titus

quotes.quote: Audience participation should extend from on-stage to backstage to under the stage.
quotes.author: David Lee Roth

quotes.quote: Any participation, even in the smallest public function, is useful.
quotes.author: John Stuart Mill

quotes.quote: Life is a flow of love, only your participation is requested.
quotes.author: Harbhajan Singh Yogi

quotes.quote: It is only by participation in a rational, practice-based community that one becomes rational.
quotes.author: Alasdair MacIntyre

quotes.quote: It may be possible through detachment, to gain knowledge that is 'useful;' but only through participation is it possible to gain the knowledge that is helpful.
quotes.author: Harry Stack Sullivan

quotes.quote: Participation is easily obtained with Latin chant.
quotes.author: Richard Morris

quotes.quote: Personal participation is the universal principle of knowing.
quotes.author: Michael Polanyi

quotes.quote: Such happiness as life is capable of comes from the full participation of all our powers in the endeavor to wrest from each changing situations of experience its own full and unique meaning.
quotes.author: John Dewey

quotes.quote: Citizen participation is a device whereby public officials induce nonpublic individuals to act in a way the officials desire.
quotes.author: Daniel Patrick Moynihan

quotes.quote: The worst thing you can do to anybody trying to be creative is to demand participation in their vision.
quotes.author: Chuck Klosterman

quotes.quote: Participation - that's what's gonna save the human race.
quotes.author: Pete Seeger

quotes.quote: There are many types of participation. One can observe so intensely that one becomes part of the action, but without being an active participant.
quotes.author: Jerzy Kosinski

quotes.quote: People's participation is the essence of good governance.
quotes.author: Narendra Modi

quotes.quote: Openness and participation are antidotes to surveillance and control.
quotes.author: Howard Rheingold

quotes.quote: Participation in a society is not an artistic choice, it's a human need.
quotes.author: Ai Weiwei

quotes.quote: No experience in this world has ever been cathartic without the willing participation of the individual. Life does not automatically bestow wisdom or growth on anyone just for showing up.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Gilbert

quotes.quote: “Play invites participation.”
quotes.author: Brian Goodwin

quotes.quote: Many activities and team play participation will give you a training that will prove invaluable later on in life.
quotes.author: Walter Annenberg

quotes.quote: We always hear about the rights of democracy, but the major responsibility of it is participation.
quotes.author: Wynton Marsalis

quotes.quote: “If you want to do something that really changes someone’s life, the best thing you can do is make the person you’re trying to help a participant in the process.”
quotes.author: John Stahl-Wert

quotes.quote: Conflict cannot survive without your participation.
quotes.author: Wayne Dyer

quotes.quote: “Winning is something, but participation is everything.”
quotes.author: Debasish Mridha

quotes.quote: “A bird cannot fly with one wing only. Human spaceflight cannot develop any further without the active participation of women.”
quotes.author: Valentina Tereshkova

quotes.quote: Freedom is participation in power.
quotes.author: Marcus Tullius Cicero

quotes.quote: Health is a function of participation.”
quotes.author: Werner Erhard

quotes.quote: “Life is for participating, not for spectating."
quotes.author: Kathrine Switzer

quotes.quote: “There’s a fine line between participation and mockery"
quotes.author: Scott Adams

quotes.quote: Life it is not just a series of calculations and a sum total of statistics, it’s about experience, it’s about participation, it is something more complex and more interesting than what is obvious.”
quotes.author: Daniel Libeskind

quotes.quote: “Hope is born of participation in hopeful solutions.”
quotes.author: Marianne Williamson

quotes.quote: The partner that you have is supposed to make you a better person, and when you're happy, you're a better person.
quotes.author: Bai Ling

quotes.quote: Don't look for a partner who is eye candy. Look for a partner who is soul food.
quotes.author: Karen Salmansohn

quotes.quote: There is an interaction and action, reaction between two people. One should show honesty in a relationship. Be honest to your partner and tell him everything. How long can you do things with dishonesty and that's wrong. Don't get into a relationship if you can't be honest.
quotes.author: Randeep Hooda

quotes.quote: The most empowering relationships are those in which each partner lifts the other to a higher possession of their own being.
quotes.author: Pierre Teilhard de Chardin

quotes.quote: The best partnerships aren't dependent on a mere common goal but on a shared path of equality, desire, and no small amount of passion.
quotes.author: Sarah MacLean

quotes.quote: Find a partner who can bear all your weak points and still not use them against you.
quotes.author: Tshepo Koos Maluleke

quotes.quote: The ability to compromise is not a diplomatic politeness toward a partner but rather taking into account and respecting your partner's legitimate interests.
quotes.author: Vladimir Putin

quotes.quote: It's easy to get wrapped up in sharing everyday life with a partner. It's fun to get lost in love and romance. It's the best. But holding on to yourself while doing that is the most important thing.
quotes.author: Brittany Murphy

quotes.quote: Having a partner definitely allows you to take more risks.
quotes.author: Arianna Huffington

quotes.quote: The most important career decision you'll make is who your life partner is.
quotes.author: Sheryl Sandberg

quotes.quote: In choosing a partner, always pick the optimist.
quotes.author: Tony Lema

quotes.quote: Partnership is not a posture but a process-a continuous process that grows stronger each year as we devote ourselves to common tasks.
quotes.author: John F. Kennedy

quotes.quote: The most important quality in a partner is a sense of humour.
quotes.author: Clare Balding

quotes.quote: When two partners always agree, one of them aint necessary.
quotes.author: Burt Lancaster

quotes.quote: All men and women have an equal need for love. When these needs are not fulfilled it is easy to have our feelings hurt, for which we blame our partner.
quotes.author: John Gray

quotes.quote: Everybody need a partner to stand right by their side. Not only down for the good times. But also down through the bad times.
quotes.author: Will Smith

quotes.quote: A partner to share the ups and downs with. Honor and strength, and knowing you're stronger together than apart.
quotes.author: Donna Alward

quotes.quote: A partner can encourage you, maybe even stop you from falling, but they can't get you to the top. That's entirely up to you.
quotes.author: Roland Smith

quotes.quote: Be with those who bring out the best in you, not the stress in you.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Don't take your frustrations out on your partner. They should be the one person you can go to and feel at peace.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: No partner in a love relationship should feel that he has to give up an essential part of himself to make it viable.
quotes.author: May Sarton

quotes.quote: Equal partners aren't always what we envision as being manifestly equal. Equality can come in many different shapes and sizes and combinations.
quotes.author: Ben Kingsley

quotes.quote: A partner is someone who makes you more than you are, simply by being by your side.
quotes.author: Albert Kim

quotes.quote: Happiness is having a dream you cannot let go of and a partner who would never ask you to.
quotes.author: Robert Brault

quotes.quote: In almost every marriage there is a selfish and an unselfish partner. A pattern is set up and soon becomes inflexible, of one person always making the demands and one person always giving way.
quotes.author: Iris Murdoch

quotes.quote: A true relationship is having someone who accepts your past, supports your present, loves you and encourages your future!
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: You're not looking for perfection in your partner. Perfection is all about the ego. With soulmate love, you know that true love is what happens when disappointment sets in and you're willing to deal maturely with these disappointments.
quotes.author: Karen Salmansohn

quotes.quote: If women feel they are able to go from partner to partner without feeling emotionally invested and ultimately hurt, they should go for it.
quotes.author: Chris Evans

quotes.quote: One partner is always more in love than the other.
quotes.author: Francoise Sagan

quotes.quote: It's fun to have a partner who understands your life and lets you be you.
quotes.author: Kim Kardashian

quotes.quote: Spring is nature's way of saying 'Let's party!'
quotes.author: Robin Williams

quotes.quote: That's what life is all about: Let's have a party. Let's have it tonight.
quotes.author: Lilly Pulitzer

quotes.quote: Good parties create a temporary youthfulness.
quotes.author: Mason Cooley

quotes.quote: Life is a party. Dress for it.
quotes.author: Audrey Hepburn

quotes.quote: Never be the first to arrive at a party or the last to go home and never, never be both.
quotes.author: David Brown

quotes.quote: I always think the opening moments of a party are the hardest, before everyone has had enough to drink.
quotes.author: Stephanie Clifford

quotes.quote: What I don't like about office Christmas parties is looking for a job the next day.
quotes.author: Phyllis Diller

quotes.quote: Never miss a party...good for the nerves--like celery.
quotes.author: F. Scott Fitzgerald

quotes.quote: Parties are the nightly ritual of the sophisticated society.
quotes.author: Dominick Dunne

quotes.quote: The dying process begins the minute we are born, but it accelerates during dinner parties.
quotes.author: Carol Matthau

quotes.quote: A little party never killed nobody.
quotes.author: Fergie

quotes.quote: It's not about going to a party. It's life as a party.
quotes.author: Diane Von Furstenberg

quotes.quote: Live to work. Work to party. Party to live.
quotes.author: Yevgen Reztsov

quotes.quote: Nothing spoils a good party like a genius.
quotes.author: Elsa Maxwell

quotes.quote: I don't go to parties to meet men. I go to parties to stand in a corner and watch people.
quotes.author: Candace Bushnell

quotes.quote: I am thankful for the mess to clean after a party because it means I have been surrounded by friends.
quotes.author: Nancie J. Carmody

quotes.quote: I go out partying to figure out exactly who I'm making music for. You can't just guess.
quotes.author: Will.I.Am

quotes.quote: I can always tell what kind of a time I'm having at a party by the look on my wife's face.
quotes.author: John Bedrosian

quotes.quote: She's afraid that if she leaves, she'll become the life of the party
quotes.author: Groucho Marx

quotes.quote: My advice for life: dance and sing your song while the party is still on.
quotes.author: Rasheed Ogunlaru

quotes.quote: One cannot have too large a party. A large party secures its own amusement.
quotes.author: Jane Austen

quotes.quote: You should always leave the party 10 minutes before you actually do.
quotes.author: Gary Larson

quotes.quote: A party without cake is just a meeting.
quotes.author: Julia Child

quotes.quote: If you're not invited to the party, throw your own.
quotes.author: Diahann Carroll

quotes.quote: I can party like a twenty-four-year-old but it takes me almost a week to recover.
quotes.author: Amy Poehler

quotes.quote: Friends will always be there for the party. REAL friends will be there after the party...
quotes.author: Bray Love

quotes.quote: When life gives you lemons, find someone who has vodka and throw a party.
quotes.author: Charith Thilina

quotes.quote: When you're the most happening person at the party, it's time to leave
quotes.author: Kelly Cutrone

quotes.quote: You gotta have life your way. If you ain't losing your mind, you ain't partying right.
quotes.author: Young Jeezy

quotes.quote: Now is the time for all good men to come to the aid of the party.
quotes.author: Charles E. Weller

quotes.quote: Partying is such sweet sorrow.
quotes.author: Rhonda Byrne

quotes.quote: There's always some amount of gradual, slow burning destruction over the course of partying.
quotes.author: Gavin Degraw

quotes.quote: Never be the first to arrive at a party or the last to go home, and never, ever be both.
quotes.author: David Brown

quotes.quote: No party is any fun unless seasoned with folly.
quotes.author: Desiderius Erasmus

quotes.quote: Nothing makes you more tolerant of a neighbor's noisy party than being there.
quotes.author: Franklin P Jones

quotes.quote: Life may not be the party we hoped for, but while we're here we should dance.
quotes.author: Proverb

quotes.quote: When you're out there partying, horsing around, someone out there at the same time is working hard. Someone is getting smarter and someone is winning. Just remember that.
quotes.author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

quotes.quote: At every party there are two kinds of people -- those who want to go home and those who don't. The trouble is, they are usually married to each other.
quotes.author: Ann Landers

quotes.quote: When you work hard...it's only fair that you party hard.
quotes.author: Conor Maynard

quotes.quote: Party hard, study harder!
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Enjoy your life...let loose, party hard and just have a good time.
quotes.author: Demi Lovato

quotes.quote: Party like there is no tomorrow!
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: I am thankful for the mess to clean after a party because it means I have been surrounded by friends.
quotes.author: Nancie J. Carmody

quotes.quote: The more you praise and celebrate your life, the more there is in life to celebrate.
quotes.author: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.quote: At a dinner party one should eat wisely but not too well, and talk well but not too wisely.
quotes.author: William Somerset Maugham

quotes.quote: Partying is such sweet sorrow.
quotes.author: Robert Byrne

quotes.quote: If you go to a costume party at your boss's house, wouldn't you think a good costume would be to dress up like the boss's wife? Trust me, it's not.
quotes.author: Jack Handey

quotes.quote: It was an insanely huge party, and I just got back, and...I may have partied too much, but you know I have to fly drugged. So I'm still slightly drugged, and I'm sure somewhere in me. I'm still partying.
quotes.author: Whoopi Goldberg

quotes.quote: Every once in a while, when there weren't other projects or on Friday afternoons when the whole crew got stoned and drank beer and were therefore reluctant to operate power tools, everybody would come down to the cellar and we'd have a shoveling party.
quotes.author: David Gessner

quotes.quote: Most of the rich have like partying, and since the less rich like being the admiring guests of their financial betters, there is a never-ending stream of party-fodder.
quotes.author: Robert Frost and Michael Deakin

quotes.quote: If you want to succeed, you've got to organize your priorities. Sleeping is more important than partying.
quotes.author: Rita Mae Brown

quotes.quote: I know I had a couple of drinks last night, but I didn't expect to wake up in Sun Valley, Idaho.
quotes.author: Jimmy Demaret

quotes.quote: remember, the party is not about you; it's about your desire to bring pleasure to others.
quotes.author: George Washington

quotes.quote: The mark of a successful party is that people hate to see it end, and it is the rare host who is not flattered to find people lingering. But there are limits and exceptions, and good guests know when to go home.
quotes.author: George Washington

quotes.quote: If it isn't the phone ringing' / It’s the doorbell dingalingin' / Oh, this party is starting to go / Over the top into I don't know / How many people are here? / Did you say we're already ‘outta beer?
quotes.author: Robert Curran

quotes.quote: May I join you in the doghouse, Rover? / I wish to retire till the party's over. / Since three o'clock I've done my best / To entertain each tiny guest.
quotes.author: Ogden Nash

quotes.quote: There's a party being planned / Only royalty allowed / You must be a follower of Jesus / And be a apart of that crowd / Come as you are / No special dress attire / You will definitely get drunk / From the Holy Ghost and Fire.
quotes.author: Nancy McDonald

quotes.quote: What life expects of us is that we celebrate.
quotes.author: José Eduardo Agualusa

quotes.quote: Celebrate every success, but don't forget to enjoy those scars of failures.
quotes.author: Debashis Mridha

quotes.quote: Life is short, wear your party pants.
quotes.author: Loretta LaRoche

quotes.quote: Passion will move men beyond themselves, beyond their shortcomings, beyond their failures.
quotes.author: Joseph Campbell

quotes.quote: Passion is energy. Feel the power that comes from focusing on what excites you.
quotes.author: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.quote: Nothing is as important as passion. No matter what you want to do with your life, be passionate.
quotes.author: Jon Bon Jovi

quotes.quote: If you can't figure out your purpose, figure out your passion. For your passion will lead you right into your purpose.
quotes.author: Bishop T.D. Jakes

quotes.quote: Chase down your passion like it's the last bus of the night.
quotes.author: Terri Guillemets

quotes.quote: Without passion man is a mere latent force and possibility, like the flint which awaits the shock of the iron before it can give forth its spark.
quotes.author: Amiel

quotes.quote: Our passion are the true phoenixes; when the old one is burnt out, a new one rises from its ashes.
quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.quote: Only passions, great passions can elevate the soul to great things.
quotes.author: Denis Diderot

quotes.quote: Passion, though a bad regulator, is a powerful spring.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Passion makes idiots of the cleverest men, and makes the biggest idiots clever.
quotes.author: Francois de la Rochefoucauld

quotes.quote: Passion is the genesis of genius.
quotes.author: Galileo Galilei

quotes.quote: There is no passion to be found playing small ? in settling for a life that is less than the one you are capable of living.
quotes.author: Nelson Mandela

quotes.quote: Great dancers are not great because of their technique, they are great because of their passion.
quotes.author: Martha Graham

quotes.quote: Nothing great in the world was accomplished without passion.
quotes.author: Georg Wilhelm Friedrich Hegel

quotes.quote: Follow your passion, and success will follow you.
quotes.author: Terri Guillemets

quotes.quote: Passion is one great force that unleashes creativity, because if you're passionate about something, then you're more willing to take risks.
quotes.author: Yo-Yo Ma

quotes.quote: Without passion you don't have energy, without energy you have nothing.
quotes.author: Donald Trump

quotes.quote: It is your passion that empowers you to be able to do that thing you were created to do.
quotes.author: T. D. Jakes

quotes.quote: One person with passion is better than forty people merely interested.
quotes.author: E. M. Forster

quotes.quote: There is no greatness without a passion to be great, whether it's the aspiration of an athlete or an artist, a scientist, a parent, or a businessperson.
quotes.author: Anthony Robbins

quotes.quote: Man is only truly great when he acts from the passions.
quotes.author: Benjamin Disraeli

quotes.quote: Passions are likened best to floods and streams: The shallow murmur, but the deep are dumb.
quotes.author: Walter Raleigh

quotes.quote: All passion becomes strength when it has an outlet.
quotes.author: George Eliot

quotes.quote: Our passion is our strength.
quotes.author: Billie Joe Armstrong

quotes.quote: Passion requires focused direction, and that direction must come from three other areas: your purpose, your talents, and your needs.
quotes.author: Steve Pavlina

quotes.quote: The passions are like fire, useful in a thousand ways and dangerous only in one, through their excess.
quotes.author: Christian Nevell Bovee

quotes.quote: All you need is passion. If you have a passion for something, you'll create the talent.
quotes.author: Yanni

quotes.quote: A genuine passion is like a mountain stream; it admits of no impediment; it cannot go backward; it must go forward.
quotes.author: Bovee.

quotes.quote: Passion is the drunkenness of the mind.
quotes.author: South.

quotes.quote: A great leader's courage to fulfill his vision comes from passion, not position.
quotes.author: John C. Maxwell

quotes.quote: Until we have a passionate love for our Lord in the Most Blessed Sacrament we shall accomplish nothing.
quotes.author: Saint Peter

quotes.quote: Love, genuine passionate love, was his for the first time.
quotes.author: Jack London

quotes.quote: If there is no passionate love for Christ at the center of everything, we will only jingle and jangle our way across the world, merely making a noise as we go.
quotes.author: William Wilberforce

quotes.quote: Passionate love produces distorted visions of actual people. Men who are too much in love expect such extraordinary happiness from marriage that they are frequently disappointed.
quotes.author: Andre Maurois

quotes.quote: When I am with you, the only place I want to be is closer.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: The hours I spend with you I look upon as sort of a perfumed garden, a dim twilight, and a fountain singing to it. You and you alone make me feel that I am alive. Other men it is said have seen angels, but I have seen thee and thou art enough.
quotes.author: George Moore

quotes.quote: The simple lack of her is more to me than others' presence.
quotes.author: Edward Thomas

quotes.quote: We loved with a love that was more than love.
quotes.author: Edgar Allan Poe

quotes.quote: My heart beats faster as you take my hand, my love grows stronger as you touch my soul.
quotes.author: A.C. Van Cherub

quotes.quote: Her lips on his could tell him better than all her stumbling words.
quotes.author: Margaret Mitchell

quotes.quote: Love is that splendid triggering of human vitality... the supreme activity which nature affords anyone for going out of himself toward someone else.
quotes.author: Jose Ortega Y Gasset

quotes.quote: I wanted the heat and the sweat and the passion of a man that I could love and trust. And I wanted to give myself to him: not for advantage, but for desire.
quotes.author: Philippa Gregory

quotes.quote: Romantic love is a passionate spiritual-emotional-sexual attachment between a man and a woman that reflects a high regard for the value of each other's person.
quotes.author: Nathaniel Branden

quotes.quote: There's this place in me where your fingerprints still rest, your kisses still linger, and your whispers softly echo. It's the place where a part of you will forever be a part of me.
quotes.author: Gretchen Kemp

quotes.quote: We efface an hour by passionate love, without twists, without aftertaste. When it is finished, it is not finished, we lie still in each other's arms lulled by our love, by tenderness -- sensuality in which the whole being can participate.
quotes.author: Anais Nin

quotes.quote: We lie in each other's arms eyes shut and fingers open and all the colors of the world pass through our bodies like strings of fire.
quotes.author: Marge Piercy

quotes.quote: Ancient lovers believed a kiss would literally unite their souls, because the spirit was said to be carried in one's breath.
quotes.author: Eve Glicksman

quotes.quote: 'Passion' a word which involves so many feelings. I feel it when we touch; I feel it when we kiss; I feel it when I look at you. For you are my passion; my one true love.
quotes.author: S. Richardson

quotes.quote: I love thee to the depth and breadth and height my soul can reach.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Barrett Browning

quotes.quote: I can no longer think of anything but you. In spite of myself, my imagination carries me to you. I grasp you, I kiss you, I caress you, a thousand of the most amorous caresses take possession of me.
quotes.author: Honoré de Balzac

quotes.quote: My heart to you is given: Oh, do give yours to me; We'll lock them up together, and throw away the key.
quotes.author: Frederick Saunders

quotes.quote: My love for you is deathless, it seems to bind me to you with mighty cables that nothing but Omnipotence could break...
quotes.author: Sullivan Ballou

quotes.quote: I almost wish we were butterflies and liv'd but three summer days - three such days with you I could fill with more delight than fifty common years could ever contain.
quotes.author: John Keats

quotes.quote: Two lovers in the rain have no need of an umbrella.
quotes.author: Japanese Proverb

quotes.quote: You know you're in love when you don't want to fall asleep because reality is finally better than your dreams.
quotes.author: Theodor Seuss Geisel

quotes.quote: So dear I love him, that with him all deaths I could endure, without him live no life.
quotes.author: John Milton

quotes.quote: I can forget my very existence in a deep kiss of you.
quotes.author: Byron Caldwell Smith

quotes.quote: Come, live in my heart and pay no rent.
quotes.author: Samuel Lover

quotes.quote: But you've slipped under my skin, invaded my blood and seized my heart.
quotes.author: Maria V. Snyder

quotes.quote: We would be together and have our books and at night be warm in bed together with the windows open and the stars bright.
quotes.author: Ernest Hemingway

quotes.quote: When introverts are in conflict with each other...it may require a map in order to follow all the silences, nonverbal cues and passive-aggressive behaviors!
quotes.author: Adam S. McHugh

quotes.quote: Their anxiety and distrust of the connection of others will manifest in anxious monitoring, over-giving, passive aggressive approaches to anger and chronic worry. For them, failure to anticipate and meet the needs of others equals abandonment.
quotes.author: Mary Crocker Cook

quotes.quote: Fine! He is being passive aggressive with me, and it's gonna backfire; I'm gonna be active friendly.
quotes.author: Natalya Vorobyova

quotes.quote: A passive aggressive behavior would never lead to real solutions.
quotes.author: Signe Whitson

quotes.quote: Passive aggressive people consistently makes you feel like you are on an emotional roller coaster.
quotes.author: Izey Victoria Odiase

quotes.quote: Passive aggressive persons may express their anger covertly by choosing not to share information when it could prevent a problem.
quotes.author: Psychology Today

quotes.quote: Passive aggressive persons are known for verbally complying with a request, but behaviorally delaying its completion.
quotes.author: Psychology Today

quotes.quote: Passive aggressive behavior is counter productive. Communication is key to a healthy personal and work relationship.
quotes.author: Izey Victoria Odiase

quotes.quote: Since passive aggression is motivated by a person’s belief that expressing anger directly will only make his life worse, the passive aggressive person uses phrases like “Fine” and “Whatever” to express anger indirectly and to shut down direct, emotionally honest communication.
quotes.author: Psychology Today

quotes.quote: Passive-aggressive behavior consumes unnecessary time and resources. Say what you mean, let’s resolve the issue, and move on to more productive tasks.
quotes.author: Izey Victoria Odiase

quotes.quote: Never judge someone until you've walked a mile in his shoes. That way, when you do judge him, you're a mile away and you have his shoes.
quotes.author: Emo Philips

quotes.quote: Never push a loyal person to the point where they no longer care.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Whatever you do always give 100%. Unless you're donating blood.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: You are free to choose, but you are not free to alter the consequences of your decisions.
quotes.author: Ezra Taft Benson

quotes.quote: Some people are like clouds ... When they're gone it's a beautiful day.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Never judge anyone until you walk a mile in their shoes. Unless they're bad shoes. Then you should totally say something.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Love without sacrifice is like theft.
quotes.author: Nassim Nicholas Taleb

quotes.quote: Some people just need a high-five. In the face. With a chair.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Passive pleasure is no pleasure at all.
quotes.author: Arthur Adamov

quotes.quote: We met for a reason, either you're a blessing or a lesson.
quotes.author: Frank Ocean

quotes.quote: Sometimes it's not the people who change, it's the mask that falls off.
quotes.author: Haruki Murakami

quotes.quote: Believe you can and you're halfway there to convincing yourself to do something stupid.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Most people are passive aggressive in this world. I have the idea that the human being is born with a kind of reservoir of aggression. We are inherently somewhat aggressive creatures and we either channel that in direct ways or we channel it in indirect ways and become passive aggressive.
quotes.author: Robert Greene

quotes.quote: I'm not passive aggressive. If something bothers me, I think about it, then I act on it. I express it.
quotes.author: Anton Yelchin

quotes.quote: Passive aggressive behavior creates distance in a relationship because issues and problems of an increasingly bothering nature are not discussed.
quotes.author: Preston Ni

quotes.quote: You guys are so caught up in your polished images and your passive aggressive comments that no one ever comes right out and says anything.
quotes.author: Richelle Mead

quotes.quote: That's passive-aggressively meant for a specific person but I don't have the balls to actually tell them or anyone else how I feel to their face.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: Passive aggressive behavior is often seen in the people who have not learned how to express their feelings, needs and desires to others.
quotes.author: David Walter Rousch

quotes.quote: Passive aggressive personality unable to express aggression directly, these people express hostility indirectly.
quotes.author: David Walter Rousch

quotes.quote: Passive aggressive behavior seems to be one step ahead of his or her supervisor, the youth can cause tremendous headaches for authority figures.
quotes.author: David Walter Rousch

quotes.quote: The past is the past, you cant change it. All you can do is look forward to the future.
quotes.author: Ashlee VanDyken

quotes.quote: It is not the past that matters but the future.
quotes.author: Varun Ravikumar

quotes.quote: The present defines the future. The future builds on the foundation of the past.
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: Your past success is a foundation into future success.
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: It is possible to reclaim your future, to build a happy life despite an imperfect past. We can order the universe to our will and mind.
quotes.author: Katherine Marsh

quotes.quote: Your past is just a story. And once you realize this it has no power over you.
quotes.author: Chuck Palahniuk

quotes.quote: I like the dreams of the future better than the history of the past.
quotes.author: Thomas Jefferson

quotes.quote: The past cannot be changed. The future is yet in your power.
quotes.author: Mary Pickford

quotes.quote: In this bright future you can't forget your past.
quotes.author: Bob Marley

quotes.quote: Forget the past - the future will give you plenty to worry about.
quotes.author: George Allen, Sr.

quotes.quote: Study the past, if you would divine the future.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: Whatever your past has been, you have a spotless future.
quotes.author: Melanie Gustafson

quotes.quote: We are made wise not by the recollection of our past, but by the responsibility for our future.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: There are certain moments when we might wish the future were built by men of the past.
quotes.author: Jean Rostand

quotes.quote: You can never plan the future by the past.
quotes.author: Edmund Burke

quotes.quote: No amount of sophistication is going to allay the fact that all your knowledge is about the past and all your decisions are about the future.
quotes.author: Ian Wilson

quotes.quote: Trying to tear down the past prohibits you from building up your future.
quotes.author: Lil Wayne

quotes.quote: I am not interested in the past, except as the road to the future.
quotes.author: Gianni Versace

quotes.quote: To design the future effectively, you must first let go of your past.
quotes.author: Charles J. Givens

quotes.quote: The best way to predict the future is to study the past, or prognosticate.
quotes.author: Robert Kiyosaki

quotes.quote: Fear not for the future, weep not for the past.
quotes.author: Percy Bysshe Shelley

quotes.quote: You can't let your past hold your future hostage.
quotes.author: LL Cool J

quotes.quote: The past resembles the future more than one drop of water resembles another.
quotes.author: Ibn Khaldun

quotes.quote: Laugh about the past and dream about the future.
quotes.author: Rosemary M. Wixom

quotes.quote: We are all here for some special reason. Stop being a prisoner of your past. Become the architect of your future.
quotes.author: Robin Sharma

quotes.quote: Your past is important but it is not nearly as important to your present as the way you see your future.
quotes.author: Tony Campolo

quotes.quote: In this bright future you can't forget your past.
quotes.author: Bob Marley

quotes.quote: Regardless of your past, your tomorrow is a clean slate. You can choose what you want to write on that slate.
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.quote: You cannot change the past, but your future is spotless. You can write on it what you will.
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.quote: Don't worry about people from your past there's a reason why they didn't make it to your future.
quotes.author: Adam Lindsay Gordon

quotes.quote: Men who think that a woman's past love affairs lessen her love for them are usually stupid and weak.
quotes.author: Marilyn Monroe

quotes.quote: Love doesn't erase the past, but it makes the future different.
quotes.author: Gary Chapman

quotes.quote: Love doesn't keep a score of wrongs. Love doesn't bring up past failures. (1 Cor 13:5)
quotes.author: Gary Chapman

quotes.quote: A million words would not bring you back, I know because I've tried. Neither would a million tears, I know because I've cried.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Just because you have a past with someone, doesn't mean you should have a future with them.
quotes.author: Robert Tew

quotes.quote: He loved me. He loved me, but he doesn't love me anymore, and it's not the end of the world.
quotes.author: Jennifer Weiner

quotes.quote: To love and win is the best thing. To love and lose is the next best.
quotes.author: William Makepeace Thackeray

quotes.quote: Everyone's allowed to be in love with the wrong person at some point. In fact, it's a mistake not to be.
quotes.author: Harriet Evans

quotes.quote: Hearts live by being wounded.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: A sad thing in life is that sometimes you meet someone who means a lot to you only to find out in the end that it was never bound to be and you just have to let go.
quotes.author: Dave Matthews Band

quotes.quote: Don't dwell on what went wrong. Instead, focus on what to do next. Spend your energies on moving forward toward finding the answer.
quotes.author: Denis Waitley

quotes.quote: We are not held back by the love we didn't receive in the past,but by the love we're not extending in the present.
quotes.author: Marianne Williamson

quotes.quote: He who has loved and who betrays love does harm not only to the image of the past, but to the past itself.
quotes.author: Theodor Adorno

quotes.quote: I haven't had that one great love, which is good. I don't want that to be in the past - I want it to be in the future.
quotes.author: Taylor Swift

quotes.quote: As the time has passed, there are two things i've learned.Forget that you're gone and to value on what I have left.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: If two past lovers can remain friends, it's either, they were never really in love, or they still are.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: It's better to have loved and lost than to do forty pounds of laundry a week.
quotes.author: Laurence J Peter

quotes.quote: Unfortunately, we all have that one person we'd take back any second no matter how much they hurt us in the past.
quotes.author: Tinku Razoria

quotes.quote: He fell on me like a wave. But like a wave hewashed away, leaving no sign that he hadbeen there.
quotes.author: Louise Erdich

quotes.quote: You must live through the time that everything hurts.
quotes.author: Stephen Spender

quotes.quote: To meet, to know, to love and then to part,Is the sad tale of many a heart.
quotes.author: Samuel Taylor Coleridge

quotes.quote: Eyes, look your last!Arms, take your last embrace.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: Right now you can cry to your hearts content. But trust me, someday you will wake and forget about him.
quotes.author: Cinta Pertama

quotes.quote: At some point, you have to realize that some people can stay in your heart but not in your life.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: She still talks to me now, only now she talks to me in my dreams. And I can't wait to go to sleep tonight because we have a lot to talk about. I love you.
quotes.author: Jamie Foxx

quotes.quote: I keep coming back to you in my head, but you couldn't know that, and I have no carbons.
quotes.author: Adrienne Rich

quotes.quote: You cannot miss what you have never had.
quotes.author: Christopher Paolini

quotes.quote: Some people don't realize what they have until it's gone, but that does not always mean they are supposed to get it back.
quotes.author: Stephan Labossiere

quotes.quote: I don't think much about guys from the past. I'm glad I knew them, but there's a reason they didn't make it into my future.
quotes.author: Lorraine Zago Rosenthal

quotes.quote: We are all trying to get over the person who broke our hearts. We are all far from perfect.
quotes.author: Alex Rosa

quotes.quote: If you slurp them, so be it. Because the truly best way, the only classical and true way to eat pasta , is with gusto.
quotes.author: James Beard

quotes.quote: Those places I don't understand, just doing bad food. It takes some doing. Making good pasta is so much easier than making bad stuff. It actually takes quite an effort to make poor linguine pomodora.
quotes.author: Anthony Bourdain

quotes.quote: In order to create a little bit of confidence, start cooking with pasta. Pasta is phenomenal. Once you've cooked pasta properly for the first time it becomes second nature.
quotes.author: Gordon Ramsay

quotes.quote: Pasta is always the same, yet always different. It has a comforting familiarity with it's pale golden color and chewy, wheaten taste.
quotes.author: James Beard

quotes.quote: Italians love their pasta l-o-n-g. They love to twirl it on a fork and get a full bite. A broken up pasta doesn’t feel as good in your mouth as a nice rolled up forkful of spaghetti.
quotes.author: Lidia Bastianich

quotes.quote: Spaghetti can be eaten most successfully if you inhale it like a vacuum cleaner.
quotes.author: Sophia Loren

quotes.quote: If you're going to buy pasta, you should buy dry pasta. If you're going to make it you can make the real thing, but you shouldn't buy fresh pasta.
quotes.author: Mario Batali

quotes.quote: I'd much rather eat pasta and drink wine than be a size 0.
quotes.author: Sophia Loren

quotes.quote: Pasta doesn't make you fat. How much pasta you eat makes you fat.
quotes.author: Giada De Laurentiis

quotes.quote: What does Karl Marx put on his pasta? Communist Manipesto!
quotes.author: Stephen Colbert

quotes.quote: In an Italian home, pasta’s the first thing you see in the kitchen. My grandmother was making pasta all day. It’s kind of like the entry-level dish. Gnocchi was the first classic that I made.
quotes.author: Joe Bastianich

quotes.quote: You can buy a good pasta but when you cook it yourself it has another feeling.
quotes.author: Agnes Varda

quotes.quote: Life is a combination of magic and pasta.
quotes.author: Federico Fellini

quotes.quote: If you can't pass the ball properly, a bowl of pasta's not going to make that much difference!
quotes.author: Harry Redknapp

quotes.quote: If kids can learn how to make a simple Bolognese sauce, they will never go hungry. It's pretty easy to cook pasta, but a good sauce is way more useful.
quotes.author: Emeril Lagasse

quotes.quote: I eat a little bit of everything and not a lot of anything. Everything in moderation. I know that's really hard for people to understand, but I grew up in an Italian family where we didn't overdo anything. We ate pasta, yes, but not a lot of it.
quotes.author: Giada De Laurentiis

quotes.quote: Those who forget the pasta are condemned to reheat it.
quotes.author: Anon

quotes.quote: Prayer, study, and suffering make a pastor.
quotes.author: Martin Luther

quotes.quote: A real pastor will always show respect for people.
quotes.author: Pastor Adelaja Sunday

quotes.quote: Pastors are highly susceptible to the sin of sloth.
quotes.author: Eugene H. Peterson

quotes.quote: A pastor who does not pray daily for his congregation is not a pastor.
quotes.author: Dietrich Bonhoeffer

quotes.quote: The pastor owns the opportunity to issue of the flock that it is OK not to be OK.
quotes.author: Matt Chandler

quotes.quote: The goal of the pastor is not to get people to show up but to get people to grow up.
quotes.author: John Maxwell

quotes.quote: Preaching is the pastor's main work, and preaching is heart work, not just mental work.
quotes.author: John Piper

quotes.quote: Pastors need to find their place in the community of believers by spending time with God.
quotes.author: John C. Maxwell

quotes.quote: Pastor: One employed by the wicked to prove to them by his example that virtue doesn't pay.
quotes.author: H. L. Mencken

quotes.quote: Pastors spend a good bit of time helping people with their sin. Who helps them with their sin?
quotes.author: Johnny Hunt

quotes.quote: Qualifications of a pastor: the mind of a scholar, the heart of a child, and the hide of a rhinoceros
quotes.author: Stuart Briscoe

quotes.quote: If you as a pastor don't have a passion for evangelism then don't be surprised if your people don't either.
quotes.author: Aubrey Malphurs

quotes.quote: Pastors must welcome the lost sheep. Actually, I made a mistake. I said welcome, rather, go out and find them.
quotes.author: Pope Francis

quotes.quote: The pastor who cares about the spiritual growth of his people must make God and His Word the centerpiece of his ministry.
quotes.author: Steven J. Lawson

quotes.quote: If a pastor focuses only on teaching, he grows members with big ears and rears but tiny hands and hearts.Service is MODELED not taught.
quotes.author: Rick Warren

quotes.quote: Pastors have historically understood their primary battle to be not the battle to build a big church, but the battle against the power of sin.
quotes.author: John Ortberg

quotes.quote: The role of the pastor is to embody the gospel. And of course to get it embodied, which you can only do with individuals, not in the abstract.
quotes.author: Eugene H. Peterson

quotes.quote: Pastors must practice a two-fold program of cultural engagement: deconstruction and demystification of cultural idols, and reconstruction and re-enchantment of a gospel-shaped worldview.
quotes.author: Timothy Keller

quotes.quote: The pastor ought to have two voices: one, for gathering the sheep; and another, for warding off and driving away wolves and thieves. The Scripture supplies him with the means of doing both.
quotes.author: John Calvin

quotes.quote: To be a good pastor one must have the wisdom of a Solomon, the intuition of a Newton, the patience of Job, the thinking faculties of an Einstein, and a compassion likened unto the Son of God.
quotes.author: Reverend Sidney E. Slaton

quotes.quote: The pastor should always be pure in thought ... no impurity ought to pollute him who has undertaken the office of wiping away the stains in the hearts of others ... for the hand that would cleanse from dirt must be clean, lest, being itself sordid with clinging mire, it soil whatever it touches all the more.
quotes.author: Pope Gregory I

quotes.quote: Today, more pastors than ever need profound encouragement and rejuvenation.
quotes.author: Will Graham

quotes.quote: The experienced pastor will recognize to which situation humor belongs and to which belongs sobriety.
quotes.author: Thomas Oden

quotes.quote: Pastors are sent to utter the deep things of God for the conviction of sin, and for edification and comfort.
quotes.author: T. B. Joshua

quotes.quote: Only a real pastor and a true leader will be looking for ways to train and equip his people to develop their potential.
quotes.author: Pastor Adelaja Sunday

quotes.quote: For pastors who have a dream and who are walking in obedience but still don't have the resources they need, don't worry. Keep walking in obedience.
quotes.author: John C. Maxwell

quotes.quote: A pastor should never complain about his congregation, certainly never to other people, but also not to God. A congregation has not been entrusted to him in order that he should become its accuser before God and men.
quotes.author: Dietrich Bonhoeffer

quotes.quote: The most important thing a pastor does is stand in a pulpit every Sunday and say, 'Let us worship God.' If that ceases to be the primary thing I do in terms of my energy, my imagination, and the way I structure my life, then I no longer function as a pastor.
quotes.author: Eugene H. Peterson

quotes.quote: It is the responsibility of Pastors to encourage, also by their personal witness, the practice of Eucharistic adoration, and exposition of the Blessed Sacrament in particular, as well as prayer of adoration before Christ present under the Eucharistic species.
quotes.author: Pope John Paul II

quotes.quote: Let's be pastors who cast vision that are worth people giving their life for.
quotes.author: Matthew Carter

quotes.quote: It is not too late to take another path.
quotes.author: David Suzuki

quotes.quote: There are no wrong turns, only unexpected paths.
quotes.author: Mark Nepo

quotes.quote: The path of your life can change in an instant.
quotes.author: Ann Brashares

quotes.quote: Take the path that leads to nowhere. It's the most fun.
quotes.author: Teresa Mummert

quotes.quote: A path is a prior interpretation of the best way to traverse a landscape.
quotes.author: Rebecca Solnit

quotes.quote: Over every mountain there is a path, although it may not be seen from the valley.
quotes.author: Theodore Roethke

quotes.quote: If you find a path with no obstacles, it probably doesn't lead anywhere.
quotes.author: Frank A. Clark

quotes.quote: Every path, every street in the world is your walking meditation path.
quotes.author: Nhat Hanh

quotes.quote: We cannot hold a torch to light another's path without brightening our own.
quotes.author: Ben Sweetland

quotes.quote: Follow your path, and let the people talk.
quotes.author: Dante Alighieri

quotes.quote: Sometimes the right path is not always the easiest one.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: If the path be beautiful, let us not ask where it leads.
quotes.author: Anatole France

quotes.quote: Just because God's path isn't always understandable, doesn't mean it's not the right path.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Don't confuse your path with your destination. Just because it's stormy now doesn't mean that you aren't headed for sunshine.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: If the path before you is clear, you're probably on someone else's.
quotes.author: Joseph Campbell

quotes.quote: Remember when life's path is steep to keep your mind even.
quotes.author: Horace

quotes.quote: Every path has its puddle.
quotes.author: English Proverb

quotes.quote: The path to success is to take massive, determined action.
quotes.author: Tony Robbins

quotes.quote: All paths are the same, leading nowhere. Therefore, pick a path with heart!
quotes.author: Carlos Castaneda

quotes.quote: If you're walking down the right path and you're willing to keep walking, eventually you'll make progress.
quotes.author: Barack Obama

quotes.quote: There are several paths one can take, but not every path is open to you.
quotes.author: Claire Bloom

quotes.quote: Pursue some path, however narrow and crooked, in which you can walk with love and reverence.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: The straight path must sometimes be crooked
quotes.author: Carole Wilkinson

quotes.quote: One path alone leads to a life of peace. The path of virtueâ€¦..
quotes.author: Juvenal

quotes.quote: No one saves us but ourselves. No one can and no one may. We ourselves must walk the path.
quotes.author: Buddha

quotes.quote: Choosing a path means having to miss out on others.
quotes.author: Paulo Coelho

quotes.quote: The path of least resistance is the path of the loser.
quotes.author: H G Wells

quotes.quote: The path to youth takes a lifetime.
quotes.author: Pablo Picasso

quotes.quote: There is not one path. There is not even the right path. There is only your path.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Do not go where the path may lead, go instead where there is no path and leave a trail.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: A weed is a plant we've found no use for yet.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: All in good time.
quotes.author: Horace

quotes.quote: Anyone can hold the helm when the sea is calm.
quotes.author: Publilius Syrus

quotes.quote: At the bottom of patience one finds heaven.
quotes.author: Kanuri (West African) (on patience)

quotes.quote: At the gate of patience there is no crowding.
quotes.author: Moroccan (on patience)

quotes.quote: Bear and forbear.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: By diligence and patience, the mouse bit in two the cable.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: Don't cross the bridge til you come to it.
quotes.author: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow

quotes.quote: Don't cry before you are hurt.
quotes.author: Scottish Proverb

quotes.quote: Don't expect things to go right the first time.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Don't halloo until you're out of the wood.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: Don't let anyone get your goat.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Don't put the cart before the horse.
quotes.author: John Heywood

quotes.quote: Drive gently over the stones.
quotes.author: Jonathan Swift

quotes.quote: Everything comes to those who wait.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Genius is only a great aptitude for patience.
quotes.author: Georges-Louis Leclerc de Buffon

quotes.quote: God did not create hurry.
quotes.author: Finnish (on balance and moderation)

quotes.quote: Grain by grain a loaf, stone by stone, a castle.
quotes.author: Yugoslavian (on patience)

quotes.quote: Haste has no blessing.
quotes.author: Swahili (East African) (on patience)

quotes.quote: Haste makes waste.
quotes.author: John Heywood

quotes.quote: Hasty climbers have sudden falls.
quotes.author: Robert Greene

quotes.quote: Keep your shirt on.
quotes.author: American Saying

quotes.quote: Never change horses in midstream.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.quote: Never cut what can be untied.
quotes.author: Portuguese Proverb

quotes.quote: One step at a time.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Patience is a virtue.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Patience is bitter but its fruit is sweet.
quotes.author: French Proverb

quotes.quote: Patience is the companion of wisdom.
quotes.author: St. Augustine

quotes.quote: The continuous drip polishes the stone.
quotes.author: Peruvian (on patience)

quotes.quote: The more you ask how much longer it will take, the longer the journey seems.
quotes.author: Maori (on journeys; Ed. Note: Parents everywhere can certainly relate to this saying!)

quotes.quote: We have to constantly critique imperialist white supremacist patriarchal culture because it is normalized by mass media and rendered unproblematic.
quotes.author: Bell Hooks

quotes.quote: Why is it that many contemporary male thinkers, especially men of color, repudiate the imperialist legacy of Columbus but affirm dimensions of that legacy by their refusal to repudiate patriarchy?
quotes.author: Bell Hooks

quotes.quote: In the face of patriarchy, it is a brave act indeed for both men and women to embrace, rather than shame or attempt to eradicate, the feminine.
quotes.author: Alanis Morissette

quotes.quote: Patriarchy is a fundamental imbalance underlying society and it's one we rarely address because it's so universal. But as I get older, I see that peace is a product of balance.
quotes.author: Ani DiFranco

quotes.quote: What feminism calls patriarchy is simply civilization, an abstract system designed by men but augmented and now co-owned by women.
quotes.author: Camille Paglia

quotes.quote: Patriarchy's chief institution is the family. It is both a mirror of and a connection with the larger society; a patriarchal unit within a patriarchal whole.
quotes.author: Kate Middleton

quotes.quote: Recorded history starts with a patriarchal revolution. Let it continue with the matriarchal counterrevolution that is the only hope for the survival of the human race.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Gould Davis

quotes.quote: The feminists who are aware of the effects of patriarchy realize that we are all in the same boat from the dangers of patriarchy, and that the oppression of women is universal.
quotes.author: Nawal El Saadawi

quotes.quote: Recognition of the harm that patriarchy has caused to people and the planet does not mean that men are wrong and women are right; rather it is a call for new organizational forms and for relishing gender differences within a context of equality.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Lesser

quotes.quote: Perhaps patriarchy's greatest psychological weapon is simply its universality and longevity. ... Patriarchy has a still more tenacious or powerful hold through its successful habit of passing itself off as nature.
quotes.author: KATE MILLETT

quotes.quote: Overturning patriarchy does not mean replacing men's dominance with women's dominance. That would merely maintain the patriarchal pattern of dominance. We need to transform the pattern itself.
quotes.author: Petra Kelly

quotes.quote: We are still in various kinds of patriarchal systems. The very definition of patriarchy is that men control women as the means of reproduction, so the idea that a woman's main role is to have children often means society wants more workers, more soldiers. The idea that how many children we have should be controlled by the family, the church, the nation - by anyone but women themselves - is still very deep and very strong.
quotes.author: Gloria Steinem

quotes.quote: The partriarchal family, with its division of fuctions between a providing and protective father and a home-making, submissive mother, however satisfactory it may have been in its time, had outlived its day. Bread-winning is no longer a monopoly of men, and home-making should no longer be the monopoly of women.
quotes.author: Alva Myrdal

quotes.quote: The enemy of feminism isn’t men. It’s patriarchy, and patriarchy is not men. It is a system, and women can support the system of patriarchy just as men can support the fight for gender equality.
quotes.author: Justine Musk

quotes.quote: No wonder male religious leaders so often say that humans were born in sin—because we were born to female creatures. Only by obeying the rules of the patriarchy can we be reborn through men. No wonder priests and ministers in skirts sprinkle imitation birth fluid over our heads, give us new names, and promise rebirth into everlasting life.
quotes.author: Gloria Steinem

quotes.quote: Some gender norms are healthy, some are unhealthy - you must wake up from the patriarchal sleep to recognize which is which.
quotes.author: Abhijit Naskar

quotes.quote: The people who hold that our culture is an oppressive patriarchy, they don't want to admit that the current hierarchy might be predicated on competence.
quotes.author: Jordan Peterson

quotes.quote: The patriarchy is alive and well in Egypt and the wider Arab world. Just because we got rid of the father of the nation in Egypt or Tunisia, Mubarak or Ben Ali, and in a number of other countries, does not mean that the father of the family does not still hold sway.
quotes.author: Shereen El Feki

quotes.quote: Patriarchal religions, like Judaism and Christianity, established and upheld the 'man's world.'
quotes.author: Barbara G. Walker

quotes.quote: The crisis facing men is not the crisis of masculinity, it is the crisis of patriarchal masculinity. Until we make this distinction clear, men will continue to fear that any critique of patriarchy represents a threat.
quotes.author: Bell Hooks
