quotes.quote: A pessimist is one who makes difficulties of his opportunities and an optimist is one who makes opportunities of his difficulties.
quotes.author: Harry S Truman

quotes.quote: A pessimist is somebody who complains about the noise when opportunity knocks.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: A pessimist sees problems in opportunities whereas an optimist sees opportunities in problems.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: An optimist stays up until midnight to see the new year in. A pessimist stays up to make sure the old year leaves.
quotes.author: Bill Vaughan

quotes.quote: There is no sadder sight than a young pessimist, except an old optimist.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: Pessimism is only the name that men of weak nerve give to wisdom.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: A pessimist is a person who has had to listen to too many optimists.
quotes.author: Don Marquis

quotes.quote: Optimists focus on the place they are going. Pessimists focus on the obstacles along the route. To become an optimist simply look ahead.
quotes.author: Simon Sinek

quotes.quote: Pessimism is, in brief, playing the sure game. It is the only view of life in which you can never be disappointed.
quotes.author: Thomas Hardy

quotes.quote: A pessimist is one who builds dungeons in the air.
quotes.author: Walter Winchell

quotes.quote: The optimist proclaims that we live in the best of all possible worlds; and the pessimist fears this is true.
quotes.author: James Branch Cabell

quotes.quote: A pessimist is a man who thinks everybody is as nasty as himself, and hates them for it.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: Every pessimist who ever lived has been buried in an unmarked grave. Tomorrow has always been better than today, and it always will be.
quotes.author: Will Harvey

quotes.quote: The pessimist is seldom an agitating individual. His creed breeds indifference to others, and he does not trouble himself to thrust his views upon the unconvinced.
quotes.author: Agnes Repplier

quotes.quote: The pessimist waits for better times, and expects to keep on waiting; the optimist goes to work with the best that is at hand now, and proceeds to create better times.
quotes.author: Christian D. Larson

quotes.quote: The pessimist reason that things just happen, where the optimist believe that things happen for a reason.
quotes.author: Anthony Liccione

quotes.quote: A pessimist is a man who has been compelled to live with an optimist.
quotes.author: Elbert Hubbard

quotes.quote: To the pessimist the light at the end of the tunnel is another train.
quotes.author: Joan Rivers

quotes.quote: A pessimist is a man who tells the truth prematurely.
quotes.author: Cyrano de Bergerac

quotes.quote: A pessimist finds the darkness around the light but an optimist becomes the light in the darkness.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: A pessimist sees only the dark side of the clouds, and mopes; a philosopher sees both sides, and shrugs; an optimist doesn't see the clouds at all he's walking on them.
quotes.author: Leonard Louis Levinson

quotes.quote: If having a soul means being able to feel love and loyalty and gratitude, then animals are better off than a lot of humans.
quotes.author: James Herriot

quotes.quote: Until one has loved an animal, a part of one's soul remains unawakened.
quotes.author: Anatole France

quotes.quote: Dogs are not our whole life, but they make our lives whole.
quotes.author: Roger Caras

quotes.quote: What we have once enjoyed we can never lose;All that we love deeply,becomes a part of us.
quotes.author: Helen Keller

quotes.quote: Grief is like the ocean; it comes on waves ebbing and flowing. Sometimes the water is calm, and sometimes it is overwhelming. All we can do is learn to swim.
quotes.author: Vicki Harrison

quotes.quote: love knows not its own depth until the hour of separation.
quotes.author: Kabil Gibran

quotes.quote: A pet is never truly forgotten until it is no longer remembered.
quotes.author: Lacie Petitto

quotes.quote: Nothing to be done really about animals. Anything you do looks foolish._ The answer isn't in us. It's almost as if were put here on earth to show how silly they aren't. _
quotes.author: Russell Hoban

quotes.quote: There is no death. Only a change of worlds._
quotes.author: Chief Seattle

quotes.quote: I was a dog in a past life. Really. I'll be walking down the street and dogs will do a sort of double take. Like, Hey, I know him.
quotes.author: William H. Macy

quotes.quote: Animals are reliable; many full of love, true in their affections, predictable in their actions, grateful, and loyal. Difficult standards for people to live up to.
quotes.author: Alfred A. Montapert

quotes.quote: We must embrace pain and burn it as fuel for our journey
quotes.author: Kenji Miyazawa

quotes.quote: His ears were often the first thing to catch my tears
quotes.author: Elizabeth Barrett Browning

quotes.quote: Give sorrow words. The grief that does not speak whispers the o'er-fraught heart, and bids it break
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: The risk of love is loss, and the price of loss is grief. But the pain of grief is only a shadow when compared with the pain of never risking love.
quotes.author: Hilary Stanton Zunin

quotes.quote: Many who have spent a lifetime in it can tell us lessof love than the child that lost a dog yesterday.
quotes.author: Thornton Wilder

quotes.quote: If there are no dogs in Heaven, then when I die I want to go where they went.
quotes.author: Will Rogers

quotes.quote: Ask the beasts and they will teach you the beauty of this earth.
quotes.author: St. Francis of Assisi.

quotes.quote: Dogs come into our lives to teach us about love, they depart to teach us about loss. A new dog never replaces an old dog, it merely expands the heart. If you have loved many dogs your heart is very big.
quotes.author: Erica Jong

quotes.quote: Not the least hard thing to bear when they go from us, these quiet friends, is that they carry away with them so many years of our own lives.
quotes.author: John Galsworthy

quotes.quote: The bond with a dog is as lasting as the ties of this earth can ever be
quotes.author: Konrad Lorenz

quotes.quote: Agreeable friends - they ask no questions, they pass no criticisms.
quotes.author: George Elliot

quotes.quote: I know God would never give me something that I could not handle. I just wish he didn't trust me so much.
quotes.author: Mother Teresa

quotes.quote: Friendship is precious, not only in the shade, but in the sunshine of life.
quotes.author: Thomas Jefferson

quotes.quote: With eye upraised his master's look to scan, The joy, the solace, and the aid of man: The rich man's guardian and the poor man's friend, The only creature faithful to the end.
quotes.author: George Crabbe

quotes.quote: Death ends a life, not a relationship.
quotes.author: Jack Lemmon

quotes.quote: God's finger touched him, and he slept.
quotes.author: Alfred Tennyson

quotes.quote: That one true heart was left behind!What feeling do we ever findTo equal among human kindA dog's fidelity!
quotes.author: Thomas Hardy

quotes.quote: Although the world is full of suffering, it is full also of the overcoming of it.
quotes.author: Helen Keller

quotes.quote: Our sweetest experiences of affection are meant to point us to that realm which is the real and endless home of the heart.
quotes.author: enry Ward Beecher

quotes.quote: Pets are humanizing. They remind us we have an obligation and responsibility to preserve and nurture and care for all life.
quotes.author: James Cromwell

quotes.quote: Parrots make great pets. They have more personality than goldfish.
quotes.author: Chevy Chase

quotes.quote: An animal's eyes have the power to speak a great language.
quotes.author: Martin Buber

quotes.quote: Animals are reliable, many full of love, true in their affections, predictable in their actions, grateful and loyal. Difficult standards for people to live up to.
quotes.author: Alfred A. Montapert

quotes.quote: I really love pets. They're like children. They know if you really love them or not. You can't fool them.
quotes.author: Donna Douglas

quotes.quote: Pets have more love and compassion in them than most humans.
quotes.author: Robert Wagner

quotes.quote: Pets, like their owners, tend to expand a little over the Christmas period.
quotes.author: Frances Wright

quotes.quote: Most pets display so many humanlike traits and emotions it's easy to forget they're not gifted with the English language and then get snubbed when we talk to them and they don't say anything back.
quotes.author: Stephenie Geist

quotes.quote: To me, a cat is an easy pet, they don't need any spoiling or looking after.
quotes.author: Karl Pilkington

quotes.quote: Sometimes losing a pet is more painful than losing a human because in the case of the pet, you were not pretending to love it.
quotes.author: Amy Sedaris

quotes.quote: Your pet is not your friend. It is your hostage.
quotes.author: Scott Dikkers

quotes.quote: Animals are such agreeable friends they ask no questions, they pass no criticisms.
quotes.author: George Eliot

quotes.quote: Just watching my cats can make me happy.
quotes.author: Paula Cole

quotes.quote: Dogs are better than human beings because they know but do not tell.
quotes.author: Emily Dickinson

quotes.quote: It's difficult to understand why people don't realize that pets are gifts to mankind.
quotes.author: Linda Blair

quotes.quote: I really love animals. My cat is my little soul mate. He's not just a cat, he's my friend.
quotes.author: Tracey Emin

quotes.quote: We have three cats. It's like having children, but there is no tuition involved.
quotes.author: Ron Reagan

quotes.quote: If you are a dog and your owner suggests that you wear a sweater suggest that he wear a tail.
quotes.author: Fran Lebowitz

quotes.quote: Dogs are my favorite people.
quotes.author: Richard Dean Anderson

quotes.quote: Dogs really are perfect soldiers. They are brave and smart; they can smell through walls, see in the dark, and eat Army rations without complaint.
quotes.author: Susan Orlean

quotes.quote: There's a saying. If you want someone to love you forever, buy a dog, feed it and keep it around.
quotes.author: Dick Dale

quotes.quote: Actually, my dog I think is the only person who consistently loves me all the time.
quotes.author: H. G. Bissinger

quotes.quote: I used to love dogs until I discovered cats.
quotes.author: Nafisa Joseph

quotes.quote: It's true, you can never eat a pet you name. And anyway, it would be like a ventriloquist eating his dummy.
quotes.author: Alexander Theroux

quotes.quote: I think there's something great and generic about goldfish. They're everybody's first pet.
quotes.author: Paul Rudd

quotes.quote: I love animals and feel very strongly that people should not be allowed to buy a pet if they are not able to look after it.
quotes.author: Kirsty Gallacher

quotes.quote: My idea of a perfect pet is a really, really big dog! Huge!
quotes.author: Emily Vancamp

quotes.quote: Cats are connoisseurs of comfort.
quotes.author: James Herriot

quotes.quote: Until one has loved an animal, a part of one's soul remains unawakened
quotes.author: Anatole France

quotes.quote: Dogs do speak, but only to those who know how to listen.
quotes.author: Orhan Pamuk

quotes.quote: Never fear being a petty fool it means you ain't dying.
quotes.author: Timothy Spall

quotes.quote: Beware of those who attribute petty instructions to God.
quotes.author: Abdul Sattar Edhi

quotes.quote: Gradually the feeling wears off, and I feel swamped again by the inexplicable pettiness of being alive.
quotes.author: Sebastian Faulks

quotes.quote: I fly because it releases my mind from the tyranny of petty things.
quotes.author: Antoine de Saint-Exupéry

quotes.quote: Party loyalty lowers the greatest men to the petty level of the masses.
quotes.author: Jean De La Bruyere

quotes.quote: The art of giving orders is not to try to rectify the minor blunders and not to be swayed by petty doubts.
quotes.author: Sun Tzu

quotes.quote: Reproof should not exhaust its power upon petty failings.
quotes.author: Samuel Johnson

quotes.quote: The petty man wants to use God for himself; the ambitious man wants God to use him for God.
quotes.author: Criss Jami

quotes.quote: The constant petty behests of life permit few opportunities for major satisfactions, and when one is offered it should be seized.
quotes.author: Rex Stout

quotes.quote: Our thoughts are broadcasts of the soul, not secrets of the brain. Kind ones bring us happiness; petty ones, untold pain.
quotes.author: Ritu Ghatourey

quotes.quote: Why, man, he doth bestride the narrow world. Like a Colossus; and we petty men. Walk under his huge legs, and peep about. To find ourselves dishonourable graves.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: Petty things don't bother me as much as they used to.
quotes.author: Rebecca Lobo

quotes.quote: The arch-flatterer, with whom all the petty flatterers have intelligence, is a man's self.
quotes.author: Francis Bacon

quotes.quote: To be able to always have a super sense of who I was and my own real identity and be petty and seem informed and always thinking in thoughts would be great.
quotes.author: Jeff Goldblum

quotes.quote: It is better to lose everything you have to keep the balance of justice level, than to live a life of petty privilege devoid of true freedom.
quotes.author: Bryant H. McGill

quotes.quote: Petty mindedness instructs eyes to see everything from an appropriate standpoint, beautifulness could be looked otherwise.
quotes.author: Toba Beta

quotes.quote: Guilt is petty; I am above guilt.
quotes.author: Susan Cheever

quotes.quote: Petty laws breed great crimes.
quotes.author: Ouida

quotes.quote: It's smallness is not petty; on the contrary, it is profound.
quotes.author: Jan Morris

quotes.quote: It is not true that suffering ennobles the character; happiness does that sometimes, but suffering for the most part, makes men petty and vindictive.
quotes.author: W. Somerset Maugham

quotes.quote: Great necessity elevates man, petty necessity casts him down.
quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.quote: The man of petty ambition if invited to dinner will be eager to be set next his host.
quotes.author: Theophrastus

quotes.quote: More than jealousy or possessiveness pettiness kills love.
quotes.author: Marty Rubin

quotes.quote: Don't sweat the petty things and don't pet the sweaty things.
quotes.author: George Carlin

quotes.quote: An ambition to excel in petty things obstructs the progress to nobler aims.
quotes.author: Christian Nestell Bovee

quotes.quote: Mankind accepts good fortune as his due, but when bad occurs, he thinks it was aimed at him, done to him, a hex, a curse, a punishment by his deity for some transgression, as though his god were a petty storekeeper, counting up the day's receipts.
quotes.author: Sheri S. Tepper

quotes.quote: Good manners are made up of petty sacrifices.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: I get so tired listening to one million dollars here, one million dollars there, it's so petty.
quotes.author: Imelda Marcos

quotes.quote: Don't be afraid of failure; be afraid of petty success.
quotes.author: Maude Adams

quotes.quote: Be master of your petty annoyances and conserve your energies for the big, worthwhile things. It isn't the mountain ahead that wears you out - it's the grain of sand in your shoe.
quotes.author: Robert Service

quotes.quote: Apple and apricot seeds contain a vitamin called B12, which I found to be illegal to sell in pharmacies. You can buy all kinds of vitamins in pharmacies, but not B12.
quotes.author: Robin Sacredfire

quotes.quote: Bags and boxes of the iconic confections begin filling pharmacy shelves in early January each year, replacing what's left of the season's marked-down Christmas candy.
quotes.author: Deborah A. Levine

quotes.quote: Before you take the first pill from a newly dispensed prescription, read the name on the pill, or show it to a trusted person who has taken this medication for some time, to be sure the pharmacist did not dispense the wrong medication by mistake, even though the label reads as you think it should.
quotes.author: Lincoln

quotes.quote: If Jack Nicklaus had to play my tee shots, he couldn't break 80. He'd be a pharmacist with a string of drugstores in Ohio.
quotes.author: Lee Trevino

quotes.quote: Gemma Galgani, the patron saint of hospital pharmacists was the sickly daughter of a pharmacist who lived in Italy in the early twentieth century.
quotes.author: Alicia Alvrez

quotes.quote: A man of very moderate ability may be a good physician, if he devotes himself faithfully to the work.
quotes.author: Oliver Wendell Holmes

quotes.quote: You are more than just a pill counter.
quotes.author: Alex Barker

quotes.quote: Pharmacists have and will continue to affect in positive ways our nation's health care system and lead from many types of positions and in many practice settings.
quotes.author: Paul W. Abramowitz

quotes.quote: It is easy to get a thousand prescriptions, but hard to get one single remedy.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: You can't go to the pharmacy to buy a pack of experience, you have to be in those games in order to acquire that experience.
quotes.author: Bob Hartley

quotes.quote: If you need a prescription drug, you may be able to find it at your local pharmacy, or a less expensive generic version may be available.
quotes.author: Amanda Walker

quotes.quote: We have a pharmacy inside us that is absolutely exquisite. It makes the right medicine, for the precise time, for the right target organ with no side effects.
quotes.author: Deepak Chopra

quotes.quote: The best and most efficient pharmacy is within your own system.
quotes.author: Robert Peale

quotes.quote: Medicine is not a science; it is empiricism founded on a network of blunders.
quotes.author: Emmet Densmore

quotes.quote: The marvelous pharmacy that was designed by nature and placed into our being by the universal architect produces most of the medicines we need.
quotes.author: Norman Cousins

quotes.quote: When religion was strong and science weak, men mistook magic for medicine; now,when science is strong and religion weak, men mistake medicine for magic.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Today, pharmacists are an essential part of every health care team and are recognized as drug therapy experts.
quotes.author: Paul W. Abramowitz

quotes.quote: Pharmacy is a profession and not just the place of employment where you just show up and serve patients.
quotes.author: Stephen J. Allen

quotes.quote: A pharmacist's head is always on a swivel and our ears are always open.
quotes.author: Richard Waithe

quotes.quote: The authors compare the workday of a teacher to that of an actual pharmaceutical sales rep, side by side, to highlight the stark differences.
quotes.author: Jack Bowen

quotes.quote: But up to seven I lived exclusively on allopathic medicines. Not that I needed them, for I don't think I did; It was for economy; my father took a drug store for a debt and it made cod-liver cheaper than the other breakfast foods.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: Now I know why drug stores have lunch counters; They lose a lot of money on food and make a big profit on bicarbonate of soda.
quotes.author: Deanna Durbin

quotes.quote: As pharmacology matured further, the concept of making synthetic drugs through chemical synthesis began to take hold.
quotes.author: Miles Hacker

quotes.quote: Pharmacy is controlled not only by laws and regulations but also by the profession by approving standards of practice, peer review, a code of ethics, and excellent leadership.
quotes.author: William N. Kelley

quotes.quote: Pharmacists exist because society says there needs to be someone in the healthcare system to oversee the drug-use process
quotes.author: William N. Kelley

quotes.quote: Pharmacy has been consistently rated the most trusted profession.
quotes.author: William N. Kelley

quotes.quote: American pharmacy can be proud that women are included in the profession almost from its beginning.
quotes.author: William N. Kelley

quotes.quote: The presence of pharmacists in patient care units to allow direct interaction with physicians, nurses, and other health care providers appears to be the most important factor in achieving good patient outcomes.
quotes.author: Thomas R. Brown

quotes.quote: Effective philanthropy requires a lot of time and creativity - the same kind of focus and skills that building a business requires.
quotes.author: Bill Gates

quotes.quote: Never doubt that a small group of thoughtful, committed citizens can change the world. Indeed, it is the only thing that ever has.
quotes.author: Eli Broad

quotes.quote: Philanthropy is commendable, but it must not cause the philanthropist to overlook the circumstances of economic injustice which make philanthropy necessary.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King, Jr.

quotes.quote: True philanthropy requires a disruptive mindset, innovative thinking and a philosophy driven by entrepreneurial insights and creative opportunities.
quotes.author: Naveen Jain

quotes.quote: Philanthropy is involved with basic innovations that transform society, not simply maintaining the status quo or filling basic social needs that were formerly the province of the public sector.
quotes.author: David Rockefeller

quotes.quote: Billions are wasted on ineffective philanthropy. Philanthropy is decades behind business in applying rigorous thinking to the use of money.
quotes.author: Michael Porter

quotes.quote: Philanthropy without scale and sustainability is like any other bad business that will simply wither and die on the vine.
quotes.author: Naveen Jain

quotes.quote: Philanthropy should be taking much bigger risks that business. If these are easy problems, business and government can come in and solve them.
quotes.author: Bill Gates

quotes.quote: The results of philanthropy are always beyond calculation.
quotes.author: Mary Ritter Beard

quotes.quote: My theme for philanthropy is the same approach I used with technology: to find a need and fill it.
quotes.author: An Wang

quotes.quote: The most generous part of your philanthropy could be the time you put in toprocure the same results and same outcomes and same returns you demand inbusiness.
quotes.author: Andrew Forrest

quotes.quote: There's a lot of complacency in philanthropy. People figure organizations are trying to do good, and that's enough, even if the results aren't there. But that's wasteful and inefficient. It crowds out better programs.
quotes.author: Dustin Moskovitz

quotes.quote: Large-scale philanthropy, based in the private - not the public - sector, is a relatively recent historical development.
quotes.author: Peter Diamandis

quotes.quote: Philanthropy is no longer about writing a check for $10,000 to the opera.
quotes.author: Jacqueline Novogratz

quotes.quote: Philanthropy is almost the only virtue which is sufficiently appreciated by mankind. Nay, it is overrated; and it is our selfishness which overrates it.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: We can all make a difference in the lives of others in need, because it is the most simple of gestures that make the most significant of differences.
quotes.author: Miya Yamanouchi

quotes.quote: I think it's important that we give back to society and our fellow man regardless of our professions. We all need help at times. And when we support each other, we're all a little stronger.
quotes.author: Rhonda Hopkins

quotes.quote: No act of kindness, no matter how small, is ever wasted.
quotes.author: Aesop

quotes.quote: I will continue to distribute blankets, sleeping bags, warm clothing and food on a regular basis, in the hope that my modest efforts will give some comfort to those people we are able to help.
quotes.author: Mohamed Al-Fayed

quotes.quote: I have found that among its other benefits, giving liberates the soul of the giver.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.quote: We often excuse our own want of philanthropy by giving the name of fanaticism to the more ardent zeal of others.
quotes.author: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow

quotes.quote: All philanthropy... is only a savory fumigation burning at the mouth of a sewer. This incense offering makes the air more endurable to passers-by, but it does not hinder the infection in the sewer from spreading.
quotes.author: Ellen Key

quotes.quote: To give away money is an easy matter and in any man's power. But to decide to whom to give it and how large and when, and for what purpose and how, is neither in every man's power nor an easy matter.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: Every charitable act is a stepping stone towards heaven.
quotes.author: Henry Ward Beecher

quotes.quote: The truth of the matter is: you can create a great legacy, and inspire others, by giving it to philanthropic organizations.
quotes.author: Michael Bloomberg

quotes.quote: The test of a civilization is in the way that it cares for its helpless members.
quotes.author: Pearl S. Buck

quotes.quote: Real generosity toward the future lies in giving all to the present.
quotes.author: Albert Camus

quotes.quote: No person was ever honored for what he received. Honor has been the reward for what he gave.
quotes.author: Calvin Coolidge

quotes.quote: Nothing brings me more happiness than trying to help the most vulnerable people in society. It is a goal and an essential part of my life - a kind of destiny. Whoever is in distress can call on me. I will come running wherever they are.
quotes.author: Princess Diana

quotes.quote: Generosity is the flower of justice.
quotes.author: Nathaniel Hawthorne

quotes.quote: Philosophy is a battle against the bewitchment of our intelligence by means of our language.
quotes.author: Ludwig Wittgenstein

quotes.quote: The sum total of all possible knowledge of God is not possible for a human being, not even through a true revelation. But it is one of the worthiest inquiries to see how far our reason can go in the knowledge of God.
quotes.author: Immanuel Kant

quotes.quote: Happiness can be found, even in the darkest of times, if one only remembers to turn on the light.
quotes.author: Albus Dumbledore

quotes.quote: The greatest happiness of the greatest number is the foundation of morals and legislation.
quotes.author: Jeremy Bentham

quotes.quote: To live a creative life, we must lose our fear of being wrong.
quotes.author: Joseph Chilton Pearce

quotes.quote: It is the privilege of true genius, And especially genius who opens up a new path, To make great mistakes with impunity.
quotes.author: Lewis Carrol

quotes.quote: Human behavior flows from three main sources: desire, emotion, and knowledge.
quotes.author: Plato

quotes.quote: Philosophy is common sense with big words.
quotes.author: James Madison

quotes.quote: Wise men speak because they have something to say; Fools because they have to say something.
quotes.author: Plato

quotes.quote: All things have sprung from nothing and are borne forward to infinity. Who can follow out such an astonishing career? The Author of these wonders, and He alone, can comprehend them.
quotes.author: Blaise Pascal

quotes.quote: Philosophy must indeed recognize the possibility that the people rise to it, but must not lower itself to the people.
quotes.author: Georg Wilhelm Friedrich Hegel

quotes.quote: You are never too old to set another goal. Or to dream a new dream.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: Happiness is something final and complete in itself, As being the aim and end of practical activities whatever... Happiness then we define as the active exercise of the mind In conformity with perfect goodness or virtue.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: Entities should not be multiplied unnecessarily.
quotes.author: William of Ockham

quotes.quote: It is undesirable to believe a proposition when there is no ground whatever for supposing it true.
quotes.author: Bertrand Russell

quotes.quote: There is no good in arguing with the inevitable. The only argument available with an east wind is to put on your overcoat.
quotes.author: James Rusell Lowell

quotes.quote: Ride the energy of your own unique spirit.
quotes.author: Gabrielle Roth

quotes.quote: Do not pray for an easy life, pray for the strength to endure a difficult one.
quotes.author: Bruce Lee

quotes.quote: There are far better things ahead than any we leave behind.
quotes.author: C. S. Lewis

quotes.quote: One cannot step twice in the same river.
quotes.author: Heraclitus

quotes.quote: We live in the best of all possible worlds.
quotes.author: Gottfried Wilhelm Leibniz

quotes.quote: There will be no end to the troubles of states, or of humanity itself, till philosophers become kings in this world, or till those we now call kings and rulers really and truly become philosophers.
quotes.author: Plato

quotes.quote: Any philosophy that can fit into a nutshell belongs there.
quotes.author: Grenville Kleiser

quotes.quote: An invasion of armies can be resisted, but not an idea whose time has come.
quotes.author: Victor Hugo

quotes.quote: The Intentionality of the mind not only creates the possibility of meaning, but limits its forms.
quotes.author: John Searle

quotes.quote: I think therefore I am.
quotes.author: Rene Descartes

quotes.quote: You can't do without philosophy, since everything has its hidden meaning which we must know.
quotes.author: Maxim Gorky

quotes.quote: To believe only possibilities is not faith, but mere Philosophy.
quotes.author: Sir Thomas Browne

quotes.quote: Live simply that others may simply live.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: Philosophy, a route of many roads leading from nowhere to nothing.
quotes.author: Ambrose Bierce

quotes.quote: I have three phobias which, could I mute them, would make my life as slick as a sonnet, but as dull as ditch water: I hate to go to bed, I hate to get up, and I hate to be alone.
quotes.author: Tallulah Bankhead

quotes.quote: A new study shows that having a severe phobia can hasten aging. But what if my greatest fear IS aging?!?
quotes.author: Stephen Colbert

quotes.quote: I hear a lot of talk today about xenophobia. Is it really phobia if you have something to be afraid of?
quotes.author: Bill Maher

quotes.quote: As with most phobias, the fear of flying does make some sense, but if ever there was a fear worth quashing then this is it. After all, life is short, and there's a great big world to explore out there.
quotes.author: Beth Ditto

quotes.quote: The discovery of phobias by psychiatrists has done much to clear the atmosphere. Whereas in the old days a person would say: 'Let's get the heck out of here!' today she says: 'Let's get the heck out of here! I've got claustrophobia.
quotes.author: Robert Benchley

quotes.quote: Don't let fear or insecurity stop you from trying new things. Believe in yourself. Do what you love. And most importantly, be kind to others, even if you don't like them.
quotes.author: Stacy London

quotes.quote: Fear keeps us focused on the past or worried about the future. If we can acknowledge our fear, we can realize that right now we are okay. Right now, today, we are still alive, and our bodies are working marvelously. Our eyes can still see the beautiful sky. Our ears can still hear the voices of our loved ones.
quotes.author: Thich Nhat Hanh

quotes.quote: Fear is a powerful beast. But we can learn to ride it.
quotes.author: Justine Musk

quotes.quote: Our deepest fear is not that we are inadequate. Our deepest fear is that we are powerful beyond measure. It is our Light, not our Darkness, that most frightens us.
quotes.author: Marianne Williamson

quotes.quote: Fear has many eyes and can see things underground.
quotes.author: Miguel de Cervantes

quotes.quote: You can conquer almost any fear if you will only make up your mind to do so. For remember, fear doesn't exist anywhere except in the mind.
quotes.author: Dale Carnegie

quotes.quote: Being aware of your fear is smart. Overcoming it is the mark of a successful person.
quotes.author: Seth Godin

quotes.quote: Fear is pain arising from the anticipation of evil.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: Fear is often our immediate response to uncertainty. There's nothing wrong with experiencing fear. They key is not to get stuck in it.
quotes.author: Gabrielle Bernstein

quotes.quote: Fear is the mother of morality.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.quote: Do the thing you fear most and the death of fear is certain.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: The fears you run away from run toward you. The fears you don't own will own you. But behind every fear wall lives a precious treasure.
quotes.author: Robin S. Sharma

quotes.quote: Fear of death increases in exact proportion to increase in wealth.
quotes.author: Ernest Hemingway

quotes.quote: There's something about most phobias where there's a tiny, tiny corner where you think this really actually could happen.
quotes.author: Roz Chast

quotes.quote: The oldest and strongest emotion of mankind is fear, and the oldest and strongest kind of fear is fear of the unknown.
quotes.author: H. P. Lovecraft

quotes.quote: Fear makes strangers of people who would be friends.
quotes.author: Shirley MacLaine

quotes.quote: Ultimately we know deeply that the other side of every fear is freedom.
quotes.author: Marilyn Ferguson

quotes.quote: Fear has its use but cowardice has none.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: The only thing we have to fear is fear itself.
quotes.author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quotes.quote: Tell us your phobias and we will tell you what you are afraid of.
quotes.author: Robert Benchley

quotes.quote: Fear is the main source of superstition, and one of the main sources of cruelty. To conquer fear is the beginning of wisdom.
quotes.author: Bertrand Russell

quotes.quote: Fear is not a good teacher. The lessons of fear are quickly forgotten.
quotes.author: Mary Catherine Bateson

quotes.quote: Fear is our deepest and strongest emotion, and the one which best lends itself to the creation of nature-defying illusions.
quotes.author: H. P. Lovecraft

quotes.quote: Fear of something is at the root of hate for others, and hate within will eventually destroy the hater.
quotes.author: George Washington Carver

quotes.quote: Fear of failure must never be a reason not to try something.
quotes.author: Frederick W. Smith

quotes.quote: No matter how many times we burst into flames, we can always rise from the ashes.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Like a phoenix from the ashes, they may defeat you, burn you, insult you, injure you, and abandon you. But they will not, shall not, and cannot destroy you. For you, like Rome, were built on ashes, and you, like a phoenix, know how to resurrect.
quotes.author: Nikita Gill

quotes.quote: Hope rises like a phoenix from the ashes of shattered dreams.
quotes.author: S. A. Sachs

quotes.quote: Sometimes you have to burn yourself to the ground before you can rise like a phoenix from the ashes.
quotes.author: Jens Lekman

quotes.quote: And God help you if you are a phoenix, and you dare to rise up from the ash. A thousand eyes will smolder with jealousy while you are just flying past.
quotes.author: Ani DiFranco

quotes.quote: It's best to have failure happen early in life. It wakes up the Phoenix bird in you so you rise from the ashes.
quotes.author: Anne Baxter

quotes.quote: The wild woman rises like a phoenix from the ashes of her life, to become the heroine of her own legend.
quotes.author: Shikoba

quotes.quote: Our greatest glory is not in never failing, but in rising every time we fall.
quotes.author: Confuscious

quotes.quote: And when all that was left was ashes, she would again clothe herself in flame. Rising from the dust of her past to rekindle the spark of her future. She was a Phoenix, her own salvation; rebirthed, renewed, resurrected.
quotes.author: LaRhonda Toreson

quotes.quote: Whether we remain the ash or become the Phoenix is up to us.
quotes.author: Ming-Dao Deng

quotes.quote: Only the phoenix rises and does not descend. And everything changes. And nothing is truly lost.
quotes.author: Neil Gaiman

quotes.quote: Sometimes you have to kind of die inside in order to rise from your own ashes and believe in yourself and love yourself to become a new person.
quotes.author: Gerard Way

quotes.quote: Sometimes you just have to die a little inside in order to be reborn and rise again as a stronger and wiser version of you.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: What matters most is how well you walk through the fire.
quotes.author: Charles Bukowski

quotes.quote: The phoenix must burn to emerge.
quotes.author: Janet Fitch

quotes.quote: Often it's the deepest pain which empowers you to grow into your highest self.
quotes.author: Karen Salmansohn

quotes.quote: Our passion ignites us. Rapture spawns the inferno in which we perish, entwined. From smoldering coals we are formed and, from our ashes, we rise. Discovered in the aftermath, our memory, our birth scars; third degree madness. Identical imperfections. Forever branded.
quotes.author: Lennon Hodson

quotes.quote: In order to rise from its own ashes, a phoenix first must burn.
quotes.author: Octavia Butler

quotes.quote: The phoenix hope, can wing her way through the desert skies, and still defying fortune's spite; revive from ashes and rise.
quotes.author: Miguel de Cervantes

quotes.quote: Our passions are the true phoenixes; when the old one is burnt out, a new one rises from its ashes.
quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.quote: You may kill a fire. And everything you know falls to dust and ash. Yet the remarkable treasure in this seemingly hopeless pile, is hidden deep within. The burning embers incarnate the perpetual desire to go from spark to flame.
quotes.author: Akilnathan Logeswaran

quotes.quote: From the ashes, a fire shall be woken, a light from the shadows shall spring.
quotes.author: J.R.R. Tolkien

quotes.quote: And let it direct your passion with reason, that your passion may live through its own daily resurrection, and like the phoenix rises above its own ashes.
quotes.author: Khalil Gibran

quotes.quote: Suffering can lead to transformation. And redemption. And marvelous mystery.
quotes.author: Dr. Allen Hunt

quotes.quote: Temper us in fire, and we grow stronger. When we suffer, we survive.
quotes.author: Cassandre Clare

quotes.quote: Don't hoard the past. Don't cherish anything. Burn it. The artist is the phoenix who burns to emerge.
quotes.author: Janet Fitch

quotes.quote: If there is in fact, a heaven and a hell, all we know for sure is that hell will be a viciously overcrowded version of Phoenix.
quotes.author: Hunter S. Thompson

quotes.quote: Once you’ve had your life burn down, it takes time to be a Phoenix.
quotes.author: Sharon Stone

quotes.quote: The phoenix. The gentlest and most wonderful of its kind. Mesmerizing beauty and brillant colour. Its cry synonymous to a lovely song. But comes time, consumes itself in its own magnificent flame. And from its own ashes, will rise and reborn anew.
quotes.author: Kahit Minsan

quotes.quote: Here in this suffering, all previous beliefs are called into question. They are consumed in the fire sparked and fueled by our own illusion. The pain becomes the ashes we are now entombed in. It is only when we find ourselves at this most imprisoned of junctures that we emerge again, the phoenix of our very life which is ever so much more beautiful than the last one.
quotes.author: Teal

quotes.quote: If someone doesn't respond to a phone call, I think they've died.
quotes.author: Charlie Brooker

quotes.quote: Growing up in the days when you still had to punch buttons to make a telephone call, I could recall the numbers of all my close friends and family. Today, I'm not sure if I know more than four phone numbers by heart. And that's probably more than most.
quotes.author: Joshua Foer

quotes.quote: Everyone talks about how we're on our phones all the time, but the fact remains that when I'm away on a film set for two months, I can Skype my family. I remember the phone calls my parents had to make when my dad was away for a while when I was younger - that once-a-week expensive phone call! The time pressure on talking to your father!
quotes.author: Domhnall Gleeson

quotes.quote: The hardest thing which I've experienced is calling up my father, Rance Howard, who's a wonderful actor, and telling him I've had to cut him out of the movie, which I've had to do twice. That's a lump-in-the-throat phone call.
quotes.author: Aaron Howard

quotes.quote: When I was in the Peace Corps I never made a phone call. I was in Central Africa; I didn't make a phone call for two years. I was in Uganda for another four years and I didn't make a phone call. So for six years I didn't make a phone call, but I wrote letters, I wrote short stories, I wrote books.
quotes.author: Paul Theroux

quotes.quote: I get a phone call once every 18 months from some mad person who wants me to do something for less than no money and they give me about a week's notice. That's my film career, most of the time.
quotes.author: Dylan Moran

quotes.quote: I had an awkward moment when I got a phone call from the person pretending to be Winnie Mandela. 'Winnie' sounded about 12 years old, unfortunately - she'd probably been pushed to the telephone because she was the only one who spoke English.
quotes.author: James Veitch

quotes.quote: I got a phone call from Jon Favreau saying, 'I need the voice of a personality-less robot, and I thought of you immediately.' I thought that was the funniest thing I ever heard, so I said, 'Yes.'
quotes.author: Paul Bettany

quotes.quote: Have you ever felt like a phone call that's been disconnected?
quotes.author: Shannon Doherty

quotes.quote: I don't understand this whole Twitter, Facebook stuff. I don't get it. Make a phone call. Talk to somebody.
quotes.author: James Avery

quotes.quote: E.T. phone home.
quotes.author: E.T.

quotes.quote: What I like best is a book that's at least funny once in a while. What really knocks me out is a book that, when you're all done reading it, you wish the author that wrote it was a terrific friend of yours and you could call him up on the phone.
quotes.author: J. D. Salinger

quotes.quote: Well, if I called the wrong number, why did you answer the phone?
quotes.author: James Thurber

quotes.quote: Phone a friend.
quotes.author: Chris Tarrant

quotes.quote: The Internet is an élite organization; most of the population of the world has never even made a phone call.
quotes.author: Noam Chomsky

quotes.quote: Right now, 65 percent of the world’s households have no phone service. Half of the world’s population has never made a phone call. Iceland has more Internet hosts than all of Africa. Today, I challenge the business community to create a global business plan — to put data and voice telecommunication within an hour’s walk of everybody on the planet by the end of the next decade.
quotes.author: Al Gore

quotes.quote: It’s the friends you can call up at 4 a.m. that matter.
quotes.author: Marlene Dietrich

quotes.quote: She looked as if her phone had been ringing continually ever since she had reached puberty.
quotes.author: J.D. Salinger

quotes.quote: He felt no rage, only a calm and icy distance, as if this man, who had been both a friend and an adviser, was now talking to him on a bad phone line from an ice floe in the Arctic.
quotes.author: Helen Simonson

quotes.quote: The silence [at the other end of telephone] . . . felt absolute, as if he had been trying to telephone God.
quotes.author: William McIlvanney

quotes.quote: The real motive behind the popularity of cell phones is not convenience, but a base desire to be self-important. Cell-phone babblers are never really able to be present ‘in the moment’, since they are constantly trying to impress an audience with the implication that behind these mysterious phone calls very important things are taking place.
quotes.author: Natalie Silvers

quotes.quote: In heaven, when the blessed use the telephone they will say what they have to say and not a word besides.
quotes.author: W. Somerset Maugham

quotes.quote: If you were going to die soon and had only one phone call you could make, who would you call and what would you say? And why are you waiting?
quotes.author: Stephen Levine

quotes.quote: Many are called but few are called back.
quotes.author: Mary Tricky

quotes.quote: She had to have a telephone. There was no one to whom she wanted to talk but she had to have a telephone.
quotes.author: Joan Didion

quotes.quote: I don’t answer the phone. I get the feeling whenever I do that there will be someone on the other end.
quotes.author: Fred Couples

quotes.quote: Today the telephone takes precedence over everything. It reaches a point of terrorism, particularly at dinnertime.
quotes.author: Niels Diffrient

quotes.quote: Rule number one: call your mother. And then call her again.
quotes.author: Mark Shields

quotes.quote: J.D. Salinger wrote a masterpiece, The Catcher in the Rye, recommending that readers who enjoy a book call up the author; then he spent his next twenty years avoiding the telephone.
quotes.author: John Updike

quotes.quote: My sole inspiration is a telephone call from a producer.
quotes.author: Cole Porter

quotes.quote: The moment you sense someone is making something because they think people are gonna buy it or like it, it's just so phony! The public has a nose for phony like nobody else.
quotes.author: Zooey Deschanel

quotes.quote: People striving for approval from others become phony.
quotes.author: Ichiro Suzuki

quotes.quote: The true definition of a phony is a high flyer with low mileage; a person who offers a worldview from the comforts of his/her living room.
quotes.author: Johnnie Dent Jr.

quotes.quote: I let people see the cracks in my life. We can't be phony. We've got to keep it real.
quotes.author: Charles R. Swindoll

quotes.quote: Just be honest with who you are. Don't pretend to be something you're not. Don't be a phony. Walk your talk. That's how God works, so doing it is emulating how Source works.
quotes.author: Wayne Dyer

quotes.quote: Be daring enough to be different, humble enough to make mistakes, wild enough to be burnt in the fire of love, real enough to make others see how phony you are.
quotes.author: Brennan Manning

quotes.quote: The one person to distrust is the one who never makes a mistake. Either he is a phony, or he stays with the safe, the tried, and the trivial.
quotes.author: Peter Drucker

quotes.quote: Learn your instrument. Be honest. Don't do anything phony. There is so much crap floating around. There is plenty of room for a bit of honest writing.
quotes.author: Christine McVie

quotes.quote: Advertising design, in persuading people to buy things they don`t need, with money they don`t have, in order to impress others who don`t care, is probably the phoniest field in existence today.
quotes.author: Victor Papanek

quotes.quote: Understanding comes hard to persons of high rank who are accustomed to phony lifestyles that involve no daily work.
quotes.author: Kenzaburo Oe

quotes.quote: Level with your child by being honest. Nobody spots a phony quicker than a child.
quotes.author: Mary MacCracken

quotes.quote: Leadership is getting players to believe in you. If you tell a teammate you're ready to play as tough as you're able to, you'd better go out there and do it. Players will see right through a phony. And they can tell when you're not giving it all you've got.
quotes.author: Larry Bird

quotes.quote: Politicians make phony promises all the time that they can't deliver.
quotes.author: Larry Hogan

quotes.quote: That Hollywood thing, where everybody hugs and kisses everybody else - I always stiffen. It's an assumed familiarity. It's phony.
quotes.author: Jennifer Tilly

quotes.quote: I mention my age because I find people in this country - women, not men, of course - women are so troubled by their age. There's a culture of youth, and it's a phony culture.
quotes.author: Teresa Heinz

quotes.quote: Strip away the phony tinsel of Hollywood and you'll find the real tinsel underneath.
quotes.author: Oscar Levant

quotes.quote: Photographers mistake the emotion they feel while taking the photo as a judgment that the photograph is good.
quotes.author: Garry Winogrand

quotes.quote: A camera is a save button for the mind's eye.
quotes.author: Roger Kingston

quotes.quote: A photograph is a moral decision taken in one eighth of a second.
quotes.author: Salman Rushdie

quotes.quote: Character, like a photograph, develops in darkness.
quotes.author: Yousuf Karsh

quotes.quote: A photograph is the illusion of a literal description of how the camera saw a piece of time and space.
quotes.author: Garry Winogrand

quotes.quote: Its one thing to make a picture of what a person looks like, its another thing to make a portrait of who they are.
quotes.author: Paul Caponigro

quotes.quote: Photographs open doors into the past, but they also allow a look into the future.
quotes.author: Sally Mann

quotes.quote: The best thing about a picture is that it never changes, even when the people in it do.
quotes.author: Andy Warhol

quotes.quote: A good snapshot keeps a moment from running away.
quotes.author: Eudora Welty

quotes.quote: There are no bad pictures; that's just how your face looks sometimes.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.quote: When you photograph people in colour you photograph their clothes. But when you photograph people in B&W, you photograph their souls!
quotes.author: Ted Grant

quotes.quote: It is more important to click with people than to click the shutter.
quotes.author: Alfred Eisenstaedt

quotes.quote: A photograph is a click away. A good photograph is a thousand clicks away and a better one, a million clicks away.
quotes.author: Kowtham Kumar

quotes.quote: There is one thing the photograph must contain, the humanity of the moment.
quotes.author: Robert Frank

quotes.quote: Taking pictures is savoring life intensely, every hundredth of a second.
quotes.author: Marc Riboud

quotes.quote: A click of the shutter, a crank of the film, and you've caught forever a significant bit of life.
quotes.author: Willis Peterson

quotes.quote: We are making photographs to understand what our lives mean to us.
quotes.author: Ralph Hattersley

quotes.quote: Taking an image, freezing a moment, reveals how rich reality truly is.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: The single most important component of a camera is the twelve inches behind it.
quotes.author: Ansel Adams

quotes.quote: Seeing is not enough; you have to feel what you photograph.
quotes.author: Andre Kertesz

quotes.quote: To take a photograph is to participate in another person's mortality, vulnerability, mutability. Precisely by slicing out this moment and freezing it, all photographs testify to time's relentless melt.
quotes.author: Susan Sontag

quotes.quote: In photography there is a reality so subtle that it becomes more real than reality.
quotes.author: Alfred Stieglitz

quotes.quote: Great photography is about depth of feeling, not depth of field.
quotes.author: Peter Adams

quotes.quote: If you want to be a better photographer, stand in front of more interesting stuff.
quotes.author: Jim Richardson

quotes.quote: To take photographs means to recognize simultaneously and within a fraction of a. It is putting one's head, one's eye and one's heart on the same axis.
quotes.author: Henri Cartier-Bresson

quotes.quote: A good photograph is knowing where to stand.
quotes.author: Ansel Adams

quotes.quote: Photography takes an instant out of time, altering life by holding it still.
quotes.author: Dorothea Lange

quotes.quote: Photography is a contest between a photographer and the presumptions of approximate and habitual seeing. The contest can be held anywhere.
quotes.author: John Szarkowski

quotes.quote: The picture that you took with your camera is the imagination you want to create with reality.
quotes.author: Scott Lorenzo

quotes.quote: Photography is an art of observation. It has little to do with the things you see and everything to do with the way you see them.
quotes.author: Elliott Erwitt

quotes.quote: A picture is a secret about a secret, the more it tells you the less you know.
quotes.author: Diane Arbus

quotes.quote: Taking pictures is savoring life intensely, every hundredth of a second.
quotes.author: Marc Riboud

quotes.quote: A good snapshot keeps a moment from running away.
quotes.author: Eudora Welty

quotes.quote: If you see something that moves you, and then snap it, you keep a moment.
quotes.author: Linda McCartney

quotes.quote: In photography there is a reality so subtle that it becomes more real than reality.
quotes.author: Alfred Stieglitz

quotes.quote: Photograph: a picture painted by the sun without instruction in art.
quotes.author: Ambrose Bierce

quotes.quote: The camera doesn't make a bit of difference. All of them can record what you are seeing. But, you have to SEE.
quotes.author: Ernst Haas

quotes.quote: Maybe because it's entirely an artist's eye, patience and skill that makes an image and not his tools.
quotes.author: Ken Rockwell

quotes.quote: When you photograph people in colour you photograph their clothes. But when you photograph people in B&W, you photograph their souls!
quotes.author: Ted Grant

quotes.quote: Photography does not create eternity, as art does; it embalms time, rescuing it simply from its proper corruption.
quotes.author: Andre Bazin

quotes.quote: The camera cannot lie, but it can be an accessory to untruth.
quotes.author: Harold Evans

quotes.quote: Photography takes an instant out of time, altering life by holding it still.
quotes.author: Dorothea Lange

quotes.quote: There is only you and your camera. The limitations in your photography are in yourself, for what we see is what we are.
quotes.author: Ernst Haas

quotes.quote: Photography is a small voice, at best, but sometimes one photograph, or a group of them, can lure our sense of awareness.
quotes.author: W. Eugene Smith

quotes.quote: Most things in life are moments of pleasure and a lifetime of embarrassment; photography is a moment of embarrassment and a lifetime of pleasure.
quotes.author: Tony Benn

quotes.quote: Photography is an art of observation. It has little to do with the things you see and everything to do with the way you see them.
quotes.author: Elliott Erwitt

quotes.quote: A photograph can be an instant of life captured for eternity that will never cease looking back at you.
quotes.author: Brigitte Bardot

quotes.quote: It is one thing to photograph people. It is another to make others care about them by revealing the core of their humanness.
quotes.author: Paul Strand

quotes.quote: Photography is the only language that can be understood anywhere in the world.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: There are no rules for good photographs, there are only good photographs.
quotes.author: Ansel Adams

quotes.quote: You don't take a photograph, you make it.
quotes.author: Ansel Adams

quotes.quote: Beauty can be seen in all things, seeing and composing the beauty is what separates the snapshot from the photograph.
quotes.author: Matt Hardy

quotes.quote: I always thought good photos were like good jokes. If you have to explain it, it just isn't that good.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Photography, as a powerful medium of expression and communications, offers an infinite variety of perception, interpretation and execution.
quotes.author: Ansel Adams

quotes.quote: What the human eye observes causally and incuriously, the eye of the camera notes with relentless fidelity.
quotes.author: Berenice Abbott

quotes.quote: Sometimes you can tell a large story with a tiny subject.
quotes.author: Eliot Porter

quotes.quote: Photography can only represent the present. Once photographed, the subject becomes part of the past.
quotes.author: Berenice Abbott

quotes.quote: Photography concentrates one's eye on the superficial. For that reason it obscures the hidden life which glimmers through the outlines of things like a play of light and shade. One can't catch that even with the sharpest lens.
quotes.author: Karl Heiner

quotes.quote: The camera can photograph thought. It's better than a paragraph of sweet polemic.
quotes.author: Dirk Bogarde

quotes.quote: Photography records the gamut of feelings written on the human face, the beauty of the earth and skies that man has inherited and the wealth and confusion man has created.
quotes.author: Edward Steichen

quotes.quote: An excellent photograph is the one which has excellently captured an excellent moment!
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.quote: Photography is the only language that can be understood anywhere in the world.
quotes.author: Bruno Barbey

quotes.quote: A picture is worth a thousand words.
quotes.author: Arthur Brisbane

quotes.quote: A good snapshot keeps a moment from running away.
quotes.author: E. Welty

quotes.quote: To take a picture is to have an interest in things as they are, in the status quo remaining unchanged, to be in complicity with whatever makes a subject interesting, worth photographing including, when that is the interest, another person's pain or misfortune.
quotes.author: Susan Sontag

quotes.quote: Capture every moments of your life.
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: It is easy to take a photograph, but it is harder to make a masterpiece in photography than in any other art medium.
quotes.author: Ansel Adams

quotes.quote: Photography is an adventure just as life is an adventure.
quotes.author: Harry Callahan

quotes.quote: In a photo shoot, you have to be very comfortable in your own skin. It's all about confidence-boosting and putting on armor.
quotes.author: Adelaide Clemens

quotes.quote: Photography is the simplest thing in the world, but it is incredibly complicated to make it really work.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Photography takes an instant out of time, altering life by holding it still.
quotes.author: Dorothea Lange

quotes.quote: It is more important to click with people than to click the shutter.
quotes.author: Alfred Stieglitz

quotes.quote: Photography is an act of love.
quotes.author: Jay Maisel

quotes.quote: A good photograph is knowing where to stand.
quotes.author: Ansel Adams

quotes.quote: Most photo shoots are a beautiful dress, a natural location, and poses.
quotes.author: Jenna Dewan

quotes.quote: A perfectly clear photograph is a distortion of reality.
quotes.author: David Lentz

quotes.quote: Photography captures a moment in time. Art captures time in a moment.
quotes.author: Joyce Wycoff

quotes.quote: Photography is a very forgiving medium. Anybody that can afford film and a camera can make pictures.
quotes.author: Todd Walker

quotes.quote: A good photograph is one that communicates a fact, touches the heart and leaves the viewer a changed person for having seen it. It is, in a word, effective.
quotes.author: Irving Penn

quotes.quote: Photo shoots for underage girls are like letting an ant walk around with honey.
quotes.author: Janice Dickinson

quotes.quote: Photography is the easiest thing to make, and one of the hardest things to make well.
quotes.author: Jerry Saltz

quotes.quote: Photography's beauty is to find beauty even in ugly situations.
quotes.author: Biju Karakkonam

quotes.quote: The best thing about a picture is that it never changes, even when the people in it do.
quotes.author: Andy Warhol

quotes.quote: Photography is all about secrets. The secrets we all have and will never tell.
quotes.author: Kim Edwards

quotes.quote: Photographing a culture in the here and now often means photographing the intersection of the present with the past.
quotes.author: Diane Arbus

quotes.quote: Photography was the first available demonstration that light could indeed exert an action sufficient to cause changes in material bodies.
quotes.author: Henry Fox Talbot

quotes.quote: Photography is an art which touches and grips one's own heart's blood.
quotes.author: Edvard Munch

quotes.quote: Photography is the easiest medium with which to be merely competent. Almost anybody can be competent. It's the hardest medium in which to have some sort of personal vision and to have a signature style.
quotes.author: Chuck Close

quotes.quote: It's true that a picture is worth a thousand words, but it's also true that a word is worth a thousand pictures.
quotes.author: Marty Johncox

quotes.quote: Taking pictures is savoring life intensely, every hundredth of a second.
quotes.author: Marc Riboud

quotes.quote: A great personality is the most important beauty of any woman. Physical appearance is only temporary.
quotes.author: Edmond Mbiaka

quotes.quote: I'm intrigued by the way in which physical appearance can often direct a person's life; things happen differently for a beautiful woman than for a plain one.
quotes.author: Penelope Lively

quotes.quote: People will make judgments before you even speak based on the way you look. Most definitely your physical appearance matters. The way you dress, your hygiene - it all matters.
quotes.author: Jonathan Adler

quotes.quote: I've learned over the years that sooner or later a person's physical appearance comes to resemble whatever is in their heart.
quotes.author: Damien Echols

quotes.quote: It is true that women tend to be more identified with their bodies because in this crazy world, both men and women measure women's value as human beings in relationship to their physical appearance.
quotes.author: Andrew Cohen

quotes.quote: We place such crazy importance on physical appearance in our image-obsessed culture, on youth and beauty to define our sense of self-worth, that aging, by default, becomes a kind of defect, something secret and corrosive and shameful.
quotes.author: Ruth Ozeki

quotes.quote: I feel it is important not to get overly obsessed and overly carried away with just the physical aspect. There is more to beauty than just the physical appearance. You are also a complete person, and a woman should have an identity beyond just the way she looks.
quotes.author: Katrina Kaif

quotes.quote: I think that being happy makes the biggest impact on your physical appearance.
quotes.author: Drew Barrymore

quotes.quote: Don't judge people by their physical appearances if you truly want to get to know them. Just watch their frequent footsteps and you would surely know their true personalities.
quotes.author: Edmond Mbiaka

quotes.quote: Possibly because I grew up not feeling very confident about my own physical appearance, I developed internal devices so that I could integrate into society.
quotes.author: Shirley Mans

quotes.quote: I eat anything, and I'm not preoccupied with my figure. The most important [thing] is that the people accept me for my music, not for physical appearances.
quotes.author: Selena Gomez

quotes.quote: Polite strangers often tell soothing lies about our physical appearance that prevent many of us from facing, discussing and solving our real problems.
quotes.author: Martha Beck

quotes.quote: Modeling is not something you excel because you are clever but is based on physical appearance, but then you have to be a businesswoman, like, to keep your longevity
quotes.author: Gelila Bekele

quotes.quote: Focusing on worldly achievements and acceptance has never been the way to true happiness, and an obsessive, discontent with our physical appearance can lead to unhappiness if not despair.
quotes.author: Pamela H. Hansen

quotes.quote: Beauty cannot be limited to physical appearances... because beauty can be felt without being seen.
quotes.author: Rebekah Elizabeth Gamble

quotes.quote: There are actually some men in the world who care more about a women's character than her physical appearance.
quotes.author: Jody Hedlund

quotes.quote: If you understand that you are not just your appearance or your physical body, you will be better equipped to handle negative feelings or imperfection regarding your outward appearance
quotes.author: Sunday Adelaja

quotes.quote: Don't get caught up in the 'look' thing. Sometimes, we as men and women, the first thing that attracts us to someone is their physical appearance, and that's not always a good thing because what's good on the outside Is not always good on the inside.
quotes.author: Keith Sweat

quotes.quote: For me, changing my physical appearance for a character is never a problem. If I have to look a certain way for a role, I just do it.
quotes.author: Alia Bhatt

quotes.quote: Mind control is built on lies and manipulation of attachment needs.
quotes.author: Valerie Sinason

quotes.quote: That awkward moment at Physical Therapy when you've completely lost count of your reps.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: You can find hope in despair. Dwell on positive thoughts.
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: Physical therapy has a high burnout rate. The long hours of intense one on one time is emotionally fatiguing. And while we universally love our patients, there's always one rotten apple in the bunch who just breaks you down.
quotes.author: Adele Levine

quotes.quote: All the material wealth cannot be substituted for the spiritual, physical, emotion and mental well-being.
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: A physical therapist does some unbelievable stretching with me.
quotes.author: Brian O'Driscoll

quotes.quote: The good physician treats the disease; the great physician treats the patient who has the disease.
quotes.author: William Osler

quotes.quote: A physician is not angry at the intemperance of a mad patient, nor does he take it ill to be railed at by a man in fever. Just so should a wise man treat all mankind, as a physician does his patient, and look upon them only as sick and extravagant.
quotes.author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

quotes.quote: The young physician starts life with 20 drugs for each disease, and the old physician ends life with one drug for 20 diseases.
quotes.author: William Osler

quotes.quote: The role of a clown and a physician are the same - it's to elevate the possible and to relieve suffering.
quotes.author: Patch Adams

quotes.quote: A physician is obligated to consider more than a diseased organ, more even than the whole man - he must view the man in his world.
quotes.author: Harvey Cushing

quotes.quote: My job as a physician is to make sure I have provided my patients with the best options to make the decisions that affect their lives.
quotes.author: Ami Bera

quotes.quote: The physician must be able to tell the antecedents, know the present, and foretell the future — must mediate these things, and have two special objects in view with regard to disease, namely, to do good or to do no harm.
quotes.author: Hippocrates

quotes.quote: He who cures a disease may be the skillfullest, but he that prevents it is the safest physician.
quotes.author: Thomas Fuller

quotes.quote: He's the best physician that knows the worthlessness of the most medicines.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: A physician is an unfortunate gentleman who is every day required to perform a miracle; namely to reconcile health with intemperance.
quotes.author: Voltaire

quotes.quote: The true physician is also a ruler having the human body as a subject, and is not a mere money-maker.
quotes.author: Plato

quotes.quote: Physicians of all men are most happy; what good success they have, the world proclaimeth, and what faults they commit, the earth covereth.
quotes.author: Francis Quarles

quotes.quote: A young physician fattens the churchyard.
quotes.author: French Proverb

quotes.quote: When he can render no further aid, the physician alone can mourn as a man with his incurable patient. This is the physician's sad lot.
quotes.author: Arateus of Cappadocia

quotes.quote: The physician himself, if sick, actually calls in another physician, knowing that he cannot reason correctly if required to judge his own condition while suffering.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: Every physician must be rich in knowledge, and not only of that which is written in books; his patients should be his book, they will never mislead him.
quotes.author: Paracelsus

quotes.quote: A physician is nothing but a consoler of the mind
quotes.author: Petronius

quotes.quote: The physician can bury his mistakes, but the architect can only advise his clients to plant vines
quotes.author: Frank Lloyd Wright

quotes.quote: A physician can sometimes parry the scythe of death, but has no power over the sand in the hourglass
quotes.author: Hester Lynch Piozzi

quotes.quote: Our reliance on the physician is a kind of despair of ourselves.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: The best physician is he who can distinguish the possible from the impossible.
quotes.author: Herophilos

quotes.quote: A physician's physiology has much the same relation to his power of healing as a cleric's divinity has to his power of influencing conduct.
quotes.author: Samuel Butler

quotes.quote: He is the best physician who is the most ingenious inspirer of hope.
quotes.author: Samuel Taylor Coleridge

quotes.quote: A careful physician, before he attempts to administer a remedy to his patient, must investigate not only the malady of the man he wishes to cure, but also his habits when in health, and his physical constitution.
quotes.author: Marcus Tullius Cicero

quotes.quote: Physics is the most fundamental, and least significant, of the sciences.
quotes.author: Ken Wilber

quotes.quote: Physics is an attempt conceptually to grasp reality as something that is considered to be independent of its being observed. In this sense one speaks of physical reality.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: Physics is, hopefully, simple. Physicists are not.
quotes.author: Edward Teller

quotes.quote: Physics tells us observations can't be predicted absolutely. Rather, there's a range of possible observations each with a different probability.
quotes.author: Robert Lanza

quotes.quote: The knowledge of the soul is knowledge of the universe.
quotes.author: Alexis Karpouzos

quotes.quote: Newton's laws of physics can rarely be applied to the real world. There is more to life than cause and effect. Things just aren't that simple.
quotes.author: Amy Zhang

quotes.quote: Physics is the only profession in which prophecy is not only accurate but routine.
quotes.author: Neil deGrasse Tyson

quotes.quote: In the beginning there was nothing, which exploded.
quotes.author: Terry Pratchett

quotes.quote: Physics investigates the essential nature of the world, and biology describes a local bump. Psychology, human psychology, describes a bump on the bump.
quotes.author: Willard Van Orman Quine

quotes.quote: In physics, to be in two places at the same time would be a miracle; in politics it seems not merely normal, but natural.
quotes.author: Charles Edison

quotes.quote: Man is an artifact designed for space travel. He is not designed to remain in his present biologic state any more than a tadpole is designed to remain a tadpole.
quotes.author: William S. Burroughs

quotes.quote: Only two things are infinite, the universe and human stupidity, and I'm not sure about the former.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: Everything we call real is made of things that cannot be regarded as real.
quotes.author: Niels Bohr

quotes.quote: The people who actually make the advances in theoretical physics don't think in these categories that the philosophers and the historians of science subsequently invent for them.
quotes.author: Stephen Hawking

quotes.quote: All creation necessarily ends in this: creators, powerless, fleeing from the things they have wrought
quotes.author: David Eagleman

quotes.quote: Measure what can be measured, and make measureable what cannot be measured.
quotes.author: Galileo Galilei

quotes.quote: No two electrons in the same state? That is why atoms are so unnecessarily big, and why metal and stone are so bulky.
quotes.author: Paul Ehrenfest

quotes.quote: It would be better for the true physics if there were no mathematicians on earth.
quotes.author: Daniel Bernoulli

quotes.quote: Physics has found no straight lines. Instead, the physical universe consists of only waves undulating back and forth allowing for corrections and balance.
quotes.author: R. Buckminster Fuller

quotes.quote: For us physicists believe the separation between past, present, and future is only an illusion, although a convincing one.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: Quantum physics thus reveals a basic oneness of the universe.
quotes.author: Erwin Schrodinger

quotes.quote: The development of physics, like the development of any science, is a continuous one.
quotes.author: Owen Chamberlain

quotes.quote: The fundamental concept in social science is power, in the same sense in which energy is the fundamental concept in physics.
quotes.author: Bertrand Russell

quotes.quote: It is the nature of physics to hear the loudest of mouths over the most comprehensive ones.
quotes.author: Criss Jami

quotes.quote: Physics is really nothing more than a search for ultimate simplicity, but so far all we have is a kind of elegant messiness.
quotes.author: Bill Bryson

quotes.quote: Physics is about questioning, studying, probing nature. You probe, and, if you're lucky, you get strange clues.
quotes.author: Lene Hau

quotes.quote: Calculate the fine structure constant from first principles.
quotes.author: David J. Griffiths

quotes.quote: There is nothing that living things do that cannot be understood from the point of view that they are made of atoms acting according to the laws of physics.
quotes.author: Richard P. Feynman

quotes.quote: If all of mathematics disappeared, physics would be set back by exactly one week.
quotes.author: Richard P. Feynman

quotes.quote: Physics is experience, arranged in economical order.
quotes.author: Ernst Mach

quotes.quote: The piano ain't got no wrong notes.
quotes.author: Thelonious Monk

quotes.quote: The piano is able to communicate the subtlest universal truths by means of wood, metal and vibrating air.
quotes.author: Kenneth R. Miller

quotes.quote: A piano might fall on your head, he said, but it also might not. And in the meantime you never know. Something nice might happen.
quotes.author: Meg Rosoff

quotes.quote: The piano is an orchestra with 88 things, you know.
quotes.author: Vladimir Horowitz

quotes.quote: In piano, if you try to force hitting this key and that key, it's very broken. It's not pretty. When you're in archery, you can't try to force it step-by-step-by-step. Then the shot doesn't flow and it's not a good shot. If you just let the performance flow, it's really beautiful.
quotes.author: Miranda Leek

quotes.quote: Piano was well, all musical instruments were taught in this very rigid, formal, classical method when I was young.
quotes.author: Hugh Laurie

quotes.quote: A piano in the house, when I came home from school and was able to play all these different notes with all theses different sounds, I really found that fascinating.
quotes.author: Ella Henderson

quotes.quote: The Steinway piano with its beauty and power is the perfect medium for expressing the performer's art, drama and poetry.
quotes.author: Van Cliburn

quotes.quote: The piano is a reasonably quiet instrument, and I suppose it's quite strange to have it with such loud music.
quotes.author: Barry Burns

quotes.quote: Piano playing is a dying art. I love the fact that I can be one guy with one instrument evoking an emotional and musical experience.
quotes.author: Jon Bon Jovi

quotes.quote: The piano keys are black and white but they sound like a million colors in your mind.
quotes.author: Maria Cristina Mena

quotes.quote: The piano is always true to me. In times of despair, happiness, and joy, its mood is always my own.
quotes.author: Bradley Joseph

quotes.quote: The piano is a monster that screams when you touch its teeth.
quotes.author: Andres Segovia

quotes.quote: For the piano and me it is always a blind date! I meet different pianos every single day. I can't take my piano with me like a bassist can take his instrument. So whenever I arrive I am a bit nervous to see what kind of piano is waiting for me.
quotes.author: Hiromi

quotes.quote: The piano has eighty-eight keys, and you have to be able to play all of them. And the range of white to black is analogous to the eighty-eight keys and you have to be able to play all eighty-eight keys in that palette from white to black.
quotes.author: Ansel Adams

quotes.quote: Life is like a piano. White keys are happy moments and the black ones are sad moments. Both keys are played together to give us the sweet music called Life.
quotes.author: Suzy Kassem

quotes.quote: In the piano, one has the instrument complete before he begins; but in the case of the voice, the instrument has to be developed by study.
quotes.author: Alma Gluck

quotes.quote: Piano is very elegant. I also think it's a very truthful instrument.
quotes.author: Howard Shore

quotes.quote: The piano and the singing are two equal things to me maybe not inseparable but very connected. You can say they are like two equal voices.
quotes.author: Agnes Obel

quotes.quote: To play piano is a significant part of my life, my existence. It fulfills a very physical & spiritual need for me.
quotes.author: Michel Legrand

quotes.quote: The piano is telling the story as well. It takes a poem, which is already very rich, and you hear it set to music.
quotes.author: William Ferguson

quotes.quote: The piano as a medium for expression is a whole world by itself. No other instrument can fill or replace its own say in the world of emotion, sentiment, poetry, imagery and fancy.
quotes.author: Leopold Godowsky

quotes.quote: Color is the keyboard, the eyes are the harmonies, the soul is the piano with many strings. The artist is the hand that plays, touching one key or another, to cause vibrations in the soul.
quotes.author: Wassily Kandinsky

quotes.quote: The piano is the social instrument par excellence drawing-room furniture, a sign of bourgeois prosperity, the most massive of the devices by which the young are tortured in the name of education and the grown-up in the name of entertainment.
quotes.author: Jacques Barzun

quotes.quote: Pianos tend to get better as they age, the more you play them. They grow into their sound.
quotes.author: Alicia Witt

quotes.quote: Piano playing is more difficult than statesmanship. It is harder to awake emotions in ivory keys than it is in human beings.
quotes.author: Ignacy Jan Paderewski

quotes.quote: I believe in using the entire piano as a single instrument capable of expressing every possible musical idea.
quotes.author: Oscar Peterson

quotes.quote: Prayer is when you talk to God. Meditation is when you're listening. Playing the piano allows you to do both at the same time.
quotes.author: Kelsey Grammer

quotes.quote: As for the piano, the faster her fingers flew over it, the more he marveled. She struck the keys with aplomb and ran from one end of the keyboard to the other without a stop.
quotes.author: Gustave Flaubert

quotes.quote: Among the delights of Summer were picnics to the woods.
quotes.author: George Brandes

quotes.quote: A picnic is more than eating a meal, it is a pleasurable state of mind.
quotes.author: DeeDee Stovel

quotes.quote: Unless you are at a picnic, life is no picnic.
quotes.author: Jane Wagner

quotes.quote: The examined life is no picnic.
quotes.author: Robert Fulghum
