quotes.quote: The things that make me happiest in the whole world are going on the occasional picnic, either with my children or with my partner; big family gatherings; and being able to go to the grocery store - if I can get those things in, I'm doing good.
quotes.author: Kate Winslet

quotes.quote: If the rain spoils our picnic, but saves a farmer's crop, who are we to say it shouldn't rain?
quotes.author: Tom Barrett

quotes.quote: I've liked lots of people 'til I went on a picnic jaunt with them.
quotes.author: Bess Truman

quotes.quote: There's something so intimate about a picnic with your guy. And as the temperature begins to rise, eating outside becomes refreshing and romantic.
quotes.author: Katie Lee

quotes.quote: My perfect day would be to go on a picnic up Mt. Wilson with Christopher Isherwood, Greta Garbo, Aldous Huxley, and Bertrand Russell.
quotes.author: Jane Fitch

quotes.quote: People don’t want to go to the dump and have a picnic, they want to go out to a beautiful place and enjoy their day. And so I think our job is to try to take the environment, take what the good Lord has given us, and expand upon it or enhance it, without destroying it.
quotes.author: Jack Nicklaus

quotes.quote: There are few things so pleasant as a picnic lunch eaten in perfect comfort.
quotes.author: W. Somerset Maugham

quotes.quote: Things taste better outdoors. And if it's a forbidden thing, so much the better.
quotes.author: Franny Billingsley

quotes.quote: Picnics are very dear to those who are in the first stage of the tender passion.
quotes.author: Arthur Conan Doyle

quotes.quote: Tea to the English is really a picnic indoors.
quotes.author: Alice Walker

quotes.quote: Anyone who thinks that the climbing of Denali is a picnic is badly mistaken.
quotes.author: Hudson Stuck

quotes.quote: You bring your own weather to the picnic.
quotes.author: Harlan Coben

quotes.quote: One compensation of old age is that it excuses you from picnics.
quotes.author: William Feather

quotes.quote: That portion of reality that can be composed within a frame can be understood.
quotes.author: Robert Brault

quotes.quote: Taking pictures is savoring life intensely, every hundredth of a second.
quotes.author: Marc Riboud

quotes.quote: Pictures can be pretty deceptive.
quotes.author: Gayle Forman

quotes.quote: Photograph: a picture painted by the sun without instruction in art.
quotes.author: Ambrose Bierce

quotes.quote: A photograph is usually looked at ? seldom looked into.
quotes.author: Ansel Adams

quotes.quote: A good snapshot stops a moment from running away.
quotes.author: Eudora Welty

quotes.quote: There is no such thing as inaccuracy in a photograph. All photographs are accurate. None of them is the truth.
quotes.author: Richard Avedon

quotes.quote: A great photograph is one that fully expresses what one feels, in the deepest sense, about what is being photographed.
quotes.author: Ansel Adams

quotes.quote: Photographs that transcend but do not deny their literal situation appeal to me.
quotes.author: Sam Abell

quotes.quote: The best images are the ones that retain their strength and impact over the years, regardless of the number of times they are viewed.
quotes.author: Anne Geddes

quotes.quote: You don't take a photograph, you make it.
quotes.author: Ansel Adams

quotes.quote: A photograph is a secret about a secret. The more it tells you the less you know.
quotes.author: Diane Arbus

quotes.quote: The whole point of taking pictures is so that you don't have to explain things with words.
quotes.author: Elliott Erwitt

quotes.quote: Photographs open doors into the past, but they also allow a look into the future.
quotes.author: Sally Mann

quotes.quote: If your pictures aren't good enough, you aren't close enough.
quotes.author: Robert Capa

quotes.quote: That's the thing about pictures: they seduce you.
quotes.author: David Byrne

quotes.quote: Taking photos is a form of collecting.
quotes.author: Martin Parr

quotes.quote: The best portraits are those in which there is a slight mixture of caricature.
quotes.author: Thomas Babington Macaulay

quotes.quote: Every portrait that is painted with feeling is a portrait of the artist, not of the sitter.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: All we see of someone at any moment is a snapshot of their life, there in riches or poverty, in joy or despair. Snapshots don't show the million decisions that led to that moment.
quotes.author: Richard Bach

quotes.quote: No painting can tell the truth of a single instant; nosnapshot can do anything else.
quotes.author: John A Kouwenhoven

quotes.quote: There are only two styles of portrait painting; the serious and the smirk.
quotes.author: Charles Dickens

quotes.quote: I believe photos is one of the underlying things in every social network that becomes successful.
quotes.author: Kevin Systrom

quotes.quote: Photos convey a point in time, so for casual snapshots I say wear the trends so you have fun images to look back at.
quotes.author: George Kotsiopoulos

quotes.quote: Pictures deface walls more often than they decorate them.
quotes.author: William Wordsworth

quotes.quote: Pictures must not be too picturesque.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: To make pictures big is to make them more powerful.
quotes.author: Robert Mapplethorpe

quotes.quote: When you're making pictures out of heartfelt passion, it hurts when someone calls them a calculated business move.
quotes.author: Michael Douglas

quotes.quote: Pictures are so good at giving people information that they're not looking for.
quotes.author: Tibor Kalman

quotes.quote: Pictures help you to form the mental mold.
quotes.author: Robert Collier

quotes.quote: The Moon Pie is a bedrock of the country store and rural tradition. It is more than a snack. It is a cultural artifact.
quotes.author: William Ferris

quotes.quote: Pie can't compete with cake. Put candles in a cake, it's a birthday cake. Put candles in a pie, someone's drunk in the kitchen.
quotes.author: Jim Gaffigan

quotes.quote: Pie throwing is kind of a lost art, and although it may be a rather rudimentary, burlesque humor, there's something inherently funny about taking a pie in the face, under the right conditions.
quotes.author: Johnny Carson

quotes.quote: Good apple pies are a considerable part of our domestic happiness.
quotes.author: Jane Austen

quotes.quote: We must have a pie. Stress cannot exist in the presence of a pie.
quotes.author: David Mamet

quotes.quote: Fresh peach pie can lift a bullying reprobate into apologetic courtesy; I have watched it happen.
quotes.author: Leif Enger

quotes.quote: The mellow sweetness of pumpkin pie off a prison spoon is something you will never forget.
quotes.author: Mitchell Burgess

quotes.quote: The future... seems to me no unified dream but a mince pie, long in the baking, never quite done.
quotes.author: Edward Young

quotes.quote: They don't understand that a slice of the pie isn't the whole pie - but they wonder why they are always hungry.
quotes.author: Russell Means

quotes.quote: We're focusing on the whole pie, not a slice. A slice is good, but it's not good enough to get you fat. We're trying to get fat.
quotes.author: Shaquille O'Neal

quotes.quote: Pumpkin pie is a living symbol of mediocrity. The best pumpkin pie you ever ate wasn't all that much different from the worst pumpkin pie you ever ate.
quotes.author: Garrison Keillor

quotes.quote: Negotiations over a shrinking pie are especially difficult because they require an allocation of losses. People tend to be much more easygoing when they bargain over an expanding pie.
quotes.author: Daniel Kahneman

quotes.quote: Pies were invented 12,000 years ago by the Egyptians. It was an easy way to preserve food that would be carried over long distances. They were like ancient Slim Jims.
quotes.author: Craig Ferguson

quotes.quote: Pie...it fills the cracks of the heart. Go away, pain.
quotes.author: Kevin James

quotes.quote: If you wish to make an apple pie from scratch, you must first invent the universe.
quotes.author: Carl Sagan

quotes.quote: A pie in the face is funny. Comedy gold.
quotes.author: Matthew Moy

quotes.quote: No one wants a cherry pie that bites back.
quotes.author: RuPaul

quotes.quote: A slice of pie without cheese is like a kiss without a squeeze.
quotes.author: Stephen King

quotes.quote: If you give everybody a slice of pie, you will still have more than enough.
quotes.author: Jay Leno

quotes.quote: There is nothing better on a cold wintry day than a properly made pot pie.
quotes.author: Craig Claiborne

quotes.quote: Give everyone a chance to have a piece of the pie. If the pie's not big enough, make a bigger pie.
quotes.author: Dave Thomas

quotes.quote: Kitchens were different then, too - not only what came out of them, but their smells and sounds. A hot pie cooling smells different from a frozen pie thawing.
quotes.author: Peg Bracken

quotes.quote: I don't think a really good pie can be made without a dozen or so children peeking over your shoulder as you stoop to look in at it every little while.
quotes.author: John Gould

quotes.quote: God always has another custard pie up his sleeve.
quotes.author: Lynn Redgrave

quotes.quote: I want our pie to grow all the people, but if some other guy's pie is growing a little faster, that's terrific.
quotes.author: Howard Warren Buffett

quotes.quote: Those we love can but walk down to the pier with us - the voyage we must make alone.
quotes.author: William Makepeace Thackeray

quotes.quote: Some people wait so long for their ship to come in, their pier collapses.
quotes.author: John Goddard

quotes.quote: A life spent at the edge of the pier is a life full of regret, a life full of fear.
quotes.author: Ryan Lilly

quotes.quote: It blows a snowing gale in the winter of the year; The boats are on the sea and the crews are on the pier. The needle of the vane, it is veering to and fro, A flash of sun is on the veering of the vane. Autumn leaves and rain, The passion of the gale.
quotes.author: Robert Louis Stevenson

quotes.quote: In my mind, in here, It's like standing too close to the edge on pier where waves spit on toes and scream into ears their wails and woes and deepest fears.
quotes.author: Equivocate words

quotes.quote:
Why don't you go take a short walk on a long pier?
Ha, you can't even get that right! It's take a long walk off a short pier.
quotes.author: Norman Lear

quotes.quote: That ruined pier... it says a thousand things.
quotes.author: Michael Aitkens

quotes.quote: Piers are good places for pondering the eternal enigmas of the universe.
quotes.author: Howard Rodman

quotes.quote: An amusement pier juts out into the sea, a place where strangers meet.
quotes.author: Roy Huggins

quotes.quote: Old Nick, the sea captain, was a rough, tough, jolly sort of fellow. He loved the life of the sea, and he loved to hang out down by the pier where the men dressed as ladies...
quotes.author: Graham Chapman

quotes.quote: Why don't you take a long walk / Off a short pier / You'll just keep messing with my head
quotes.author: Shawn Kichta

quotes.quote: Walking on to a pier was to be transported ever closer to raw, untamed nature, heightening both the sense of admiration of nature and the accomplishment of the individual making the visit.
quotes.author: Fred Gray

quotes.quote: The pier, as a platform from which to view the horizon, allowed people to reflect on themselves, other places and other times.
quotes.author: Fred Gray

quotes.quote: The pier was remarkable in seeming to enable people to journey a little closer to the unobtainable.
quotes.author: Fred Gray

quotes.quote: Despite their popular association with fun and frivolity, the function of piers a both an amusement centre and landing stage.
quotes.author: Martin Easdown

quotes.quote: Piers were also erected in the area for naval and military purposes.
quotes.author: Martin Easdown

quotes.quote: The piers that remain continue to be the focal point of their towns and are, on the whole, much cherished.
quotes.author: Martin Easdown

quotes.quote: The pier was also a magnet for bathing, provide a platform from which to fish, and was a promenade.
quotes.author: Philip L. Fradkin

quotes.quote: A carousel, roller coaster, and huge ballroom were grafted onto the main pier.
quotes.author: Philip L. Fradkin

quotes.quote: Because it's wharves were no longer in major competition for transport duties, the pleasure pier became the main seaside commodity.
quotes.author: Jennifer Krintz

quotes.quote: The natural appeal of the ocean drew a number of tourists that frequented the pier despite its modest design.
quotes.author: Jennifer Krintz

quotes.quote: The notion of a pier made solely for the purpose of walking above the water had a tremendous appeal to people, possibly as a metaphor for humanity conquering the sea.
quotes.author: Jennifer Krintz

quotes.quote: Over the years, the pier has been subject to storms and fires and has been constructed and reconstructed.
quotes.author: Jennifer Krintz

quotes.quote: Simple fishing pier. No souvenir shops for the tourists or fancy restaurants, this early pier attracted those who wanted their catch-of-the-day to feed the family or to be a snapshot to show the folks back home how they caught the big one.
quotes.author: Historical Commision of Redondo Beach

quotes.quote: The new pier, with its restaurant, bar, and bandstand, was built not for serious trade and commerce but solely for holiday treats and pleasures.
quotes.author: Eric Simpson

quotes.quote: If you believe that this life is all there is and there is no greater power than man, you must walk to the end of this pier at sunset.
quotes.author: Donna Calhoun

quotes.quote: The constant about this pier is that it has always made me and mine happy when we walked, sat, or lay on it in the sunlight or moonlight.
quotes.author: Donna Calhoun

quotes.quote: A pier is a disappointed bridge; yet stare at it for long enough and you can dream it to the other side of the Channel.
quotes.author: Julian Barnes

quotes.quote: The owners of these piers have changed, and the piers themselves have seen more interesting sights than most two-by-fours throughout the world.
quotes.author: Donna Calhoun

quotes.quote: Standing on this old pier is a good way for me to reflect.
quotes.author: Donna Calhoun

quotes.quote: A clean pig makes lean bacon.
quotes.author: Serbian Proverb

quotes.quote: A pig may whistle, though it has a bad mouth for it.
quotes.author: English Proverb

quotes.quote: A pig used to dirt turns its nose up at rice.
quotes.author: Japanese Proverb

quotes.quote: A pig's tail will never make a good arrow.
quotes.author: Spanish Proverb

quotes.quote: Child's pig, father's pork.
quotes.author: Portuguese Proverb

quotes.quote: He that has but one pig easily fattens it.
quotes.author: Italian Proverb

quotes.quote: If you catch a pig, catch it by the leg.
quotes.author: Irish Proverb

quotes.quote: If you pull one pig by the tail all the rest will squeal.
quotes.author: Dutch Proverb

quotes.quote: Old pigs have hard snouts.
quotes.author: German Proverb

quotes.quote: Pigs are smart little creatures. They just need love.
quotes.author: Shelley Duvall

quotes.quote: Today's pig is tomorrows bacon!
quotes.author: Hunter S Thompson

quotes.quote: I will never deny that life isn't fair. It seems as though when a woman leaves a man she is strong and independent, but when a man leaves a woman he is a pig and a jerk.
quotes.author: Criss Jami

quotes.quote: A pig resembles a saint in that he is more honored after death than during his lifetime.
quotes.author: Irma S Rombauer

quotes.quote: You can put wings on a pig, but you don't make it an eagle.
quotes.author: William J. Clinton

quotes.quote: You can't fatten the pig on market day.
quotes.author: John Howard

quotes.quote: Never try to teach a pig to sing. You waste your time and you annoy the pig.
quotes.author: Robert A. Heinlein

quotes.quote: Well-being and happiness never appeared to me as an absolute aim. I am even inclined to compare such moral aims to the ambitions of a pig.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: Never try to teach a pig to sing; it wastes your time and it annoys the pig.
quotes.author: Robert Heinlein

quotes.quote: Man thrives where angels would die of ecstasy and where pigs would die of disgust.
quotes.author: Kenneth Rexroth

quotes.quote: Pigs prefer to wallow in clean mud, but if nothing else is available, they will frequently wallow in their own urine, giving rise to the notion that they are dirty animals.
quotes.author: Marvin Harris

quotes.quote: The best pears fall into pigs' mouth.
quotes.author: Italian Proverb

quotes.quote: The life of a pig is short and sweet.
quotes.author: French Proverb

quotes.quote: The worst pig often gets the best pear.
quotes.author: Italian Proverb

quotes.quote: To sheer a pig is to cause a great commotion over very little wool.
quotes.author: Irish Proverb

quotes.quote: To wash a pig is to waste both water and soap.
quotes.author: American Proverb

quotes.quote: What can you expect from a pig but a grunt?
quotes.author: Swedish Proverb

quotes.quote: When the pig has had a bellyful it upsets the trough.
quotes.author: Dutch Proverb

quotes.quote: Whether you ignore a pig or worship that pig from afar, to the pig it's all the same.
quotes.author: Spanish Proverb

quotes.quote: A dead pig is not afraid of boiling water.
quotes.author: Jamaican Saying

quotes.quote: A pig washes in the first pool of water he encounters.
quotes.author: Jamaican Saying

quotes.quote: Pilates is the only exercise program that has changed my body and made me feel great.
quotes.author: Jamie Lee Curtis

quotes.quote: Pilates is gaining the mastery of your mind over the complete control over your body.
quotes.author: Joseph Pilates

quotes.quote: Pilates is definitely my favorite workout because it's hard but at the same time relaxing.
quotes.author: Devon Windsor

quotes.quote: The Pilates Method of Body Conditioning is gaining the mastery of your mind over the complete control of your body.
quotes.author: Joseph Pilates

quotes.quote: Through the Pilates Method of Body Conditioning this unique trinity of a balanced body, mind and spirit can ever be attained. Self-confidence follows.
quotes.author: Joseph Pilates

quotes.quote: You can say what Pilates is in three words. Stretch with Strength and Control. And the control part is the most important because that makes you use your mind.
quotes.author: Romana Kryzanowska

quotes.quote: Pilates is amazing. It makes you conscious of how you have been doing something incorrectly for so long, even something as simple as just standing there.
quotes.author: Jim James

quotes.quote: Pilates has been the perfect solution to maintaining strength and vitality in my life.
quotes.author: Trudie Styler

quotes.quote: Pilates makes you feel good because you're doing something that's good for your body, and you start seeing it. It elongates the muscles.
quotes.author: Behati Prinsloo

quotes.quote: Ten years of Pilates has really changed my body for the better.
quotes.author: Lucy Liu

quotes.quote: Pilates is my favorite core strengthener. I do it three or four times a week. With all the strengthening and lengthening, it's like ballet. Plus, you get to do it lying down!
quotes.author: Emily Vancamp

quotes.quote: Pilates is my favorite meditative way to get in shape. I don't like the gym and I don't like running, so I just lay on my Pilates reformer. It's great.
quotes.author: Lyndsy Fonseca

quotes.quote: Pilates is an awesome cross-training exercise for any sport because it focuses on functional movement.
quotes.author: Natalie Coughlin

quotes.quote: Pilates is phenomenal.
quotes.author: Andre Ward

quotes.quote: I think Pilates is great, especially when you can do it with a trainer who keeps you on track.
quotes.author: Cate Blanchett

quotes.quote: Pilates is amazing, my posture is so much better and I'm even starting to get muscles on my tummy - it's incredible.
quotes.author: Kelly Osbourne

quotes.quote: I found that doing Pilates consistently three to four times a week had an amazing effect on really toning and shaping a tight waist and legs.
quotes.author: Samaire Armstrong

quotes.quote: We are all pilgrims on an elusive and endless road... Despite our attempts to build lives on stone foundations, our spirits continuously flow. Endless streams of consciousness ripple through our minds.
quotes.author: Anthony Lawlor

quotes.quote: Curiosity does, no less than devotion, pilgrims make.
quotes.author: Abraham Cowley

quotes.quote: Oh, we are weary pilgrims; to this wilderness we bring A Church without a bishop, a State without a King.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: We're all pilgrims on the same journey-but some pilgrims have better road maps.
quotes.author: Nelson DeMille

quotes.quote: If you wish to stand and progress as you ought, hold yourself an exile and a pilgrim on the earth.
quotes.author: Thomas a Kempis

quotes.quote: In seeking after what the soul desires we become pilgrims with no home but the path the soul would have us follow.
quotes.author: Michael Meade

quotes.quote: This life of supreme blessedness is an end, and the pilgrim who is striving towards it, the prodigal returning to it, must travel thither, and employ means to get there. He must pass through the country of his animal desires, disentangling himself from their intricacies, simplifying them, overcoming them; this is the way, and he has no enemies but what spring within himself.
quotes.author: James Allen

quotes.quote: For pilgrims walking...every footfall is doubled, landing at once on the actual road and also on the path of faith
quotes.author: Robert Macfarlane

quotes.quote: Day, like a weary pilgrim, had reached the western gate of heaven, and Evening stooped down to unloose the latchets of his sandal shoon.
quotes.author: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow

quotes.quote: All joy emphasises our pilgrim status; always reminds, beckons, awakens desire. Our best havings are wantings.
quotes.author: C.S. Lewis

quotes.quote: Pilgrims are persons in motion passing through territories not their own, seeking something we might call completion, or perhaps the word clarity will do as well, a goal to which only the spirit's compass points the way.
quotes.author: H. Richard Niebuhr

quotes.quote: Like pilgrims to the appointed place we tend; The world's an inn, and death the journey's end.
quotes.author: John Dryden

quotes.quote: Every man, woman, and child on this earth is a wandering pilgrim in his or her own wayâ€”each searching for a belonging place. That sense of belonging is found only as we care for one another.
quotes.author: Seth Adam Smith

quotes.quote: We are all pilgrims in search of the unknown.
quotes.author: Paulo Coelho

quotes.quote: We are pilgrims, not settlers; this earth is our inn, not our home.
quotes.author: John H. Vincent

quotes.quote: Most of us know when and where the Pilgrims landed, but few of us know why.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: This world is magnificent for strangers and pilgrims, but miserable for residents.
quotes.author: Henry Ward Beecher

quotes.quote: When the road ends, and the goal is gained, the pilgrim finds that he has traveled only from himself to himself.
quotes.author: Sathya Baba

quotes.quote: The pilgrim is humble and devout, and human, and charitable, and ready to smile and admire; therefore, he should comprehend the whole of his way, the people in it, and the hills and the clouds, and the habits of the various cities.
quotes.author: Hilaire Belloc

quotes.quote: In dreams we stand in this great democracy of the possible and there we are right pilgrims indeed. There we go forth to meet what we shall meet.
quotes.author: Cormac Mccarthy

quotes.quote: Blessed are they who feel like pilgrims and strangers in this life, and whose best things are all to come!
quotes.author: J. C. Ryle

quotes.quote: We are Godseekers all, though some be churchgoing believers and others pilgrims to an unknown shrine.
quotes.author: Robert Brault

quotes.quote: Pilgrims were people glad to take off their clothing, which was on fire.
quotes.author: Anne Carson

quotes.quote: Guide me, O though great Jehovah / Pilgrim through this barren land; / I am weak, but though art mighty; / Hold me with thy powerful hand; / Bread of Heaven, Bread of Heaven; / Feed me till I want no more.
quotes.author: Peter Williams

quotes.quote: Through the night of doubt and sorrow, / Onward goes the pilgrim band, / Singing songs of expectation, / marching to the Promised Land.
quotes.author: Sabine Baring-Gould

quotes.quote: Sleep sweetly in your humble graves, / Sleep martyrs of a fallen cause!— / Though yet no marble column craves / The pilgrim here to pause.
quotes.author: Henry Timrod

quotes.quote: Centuries of travel lore suggest that when we no longer know where to turn, our real journey has begun. At that crossroads moment, a voice calls to our pilgrim soul.
quotes.author: Phil Cousineau

quotes.quote: When your ship moored in harbor gives you the illusion of being a house...put out to sea. Save your boat's journeying soul, and your own pilgrim soul cost it what may be.
quotes.author: Helder Pessoa Camara

quotes.quote: We search for meaning, we search for belonging, and that means we are all exploring God-territory...The experiential process of interacting with the divine is what counts, the walking along the road, not the milestones.
quotes.author: David Steindl-Rast

quotes.quote: Only the walker who sets out toward ultimate things is a pilgrim. In this lies the terrible difference between tourist and pilgrim
quotes.author: Andrew Schelling

quotes.quote: The innocent seldom find an uncomfortable pillow.
quotes.author: William Cowper

quotes.quote: The pillow smells like the sunlight, a precious smell.
quotes.author: Haruki Murakami

quotes.quote: What a happy and holy fashion it is that those who love one another should rest on the same pillow.
quotes.author: Nathaniel Hawthorne

quotes.quote: When tough times come, it is particularly important to offset them with much gentle softness. Be a pillow.
quotes.author: Vera Nazarian

quotes.quote: When a woman dresses up for an occasion, the man should become the black velvet pillow for the jewel.
quotes.author: John Weitz

quotes.quote: Let gratitude be the pillow upon which you kneel to say your nightly prayer. And let faith be the bridge you build to overcome evil and welcome good.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.quote: For a sick man the world begins at his pillow and ends at the foot of his bed.
quotes.author: Honoré de Balzac

quotes.quote: A ruffled mind makes a restless pillow.
quotes.author: Charlotte Bronte

quotes.quote: An honest man's pillow is his peace of mind.
quotes.author: John Mellencamp

quotes.quote: There is no pillow as soft as a clear conscience.
quotes.author: John Wooden

quotes.quote: Ignorance is the softest pillow on which a man can rest his head.
quotes.author: Michel de Montaigne

quotes.quote: No one realizes how beautiful it is to travel until he comes home and rests his head on his old, familiar pillow.
quotes.author: Lin Yutang

quotes.quote: More than the eyes, pillows understood the pain of tears.
quotes.author: Dhana

quotes.quote: The best advice is found on the pillow.
quotes.author: Danish Proverb

quotes.quote: Fatigue is the best pillow.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: If we want to fight people in the world, we should fight them with pillows – pillows stuffed with food, medicine, music… That would be so much cheaper than bombs.
quotes.author: Alice Walker

quotes.quote: Fear can keep us up all night long, but faith makes one fine pillow.
quotes.author: Philip Gulley

quotes.quote: If one shed tears, they must be shed on one's pillow.
quotes.author: Henry Adams

quotes.quote: Don't leave your dreams on the pillow.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Extend your commitment to your family members. Have respect for elders and be nice to them.they are your soft pillow.
quotes.author: Kishore Bansal

quotes.quote: There has to be this pioneer, the individual who has the courage, the ambition to overcome the obstacles that always develop when one tries to do something worthwhile, especially when it is new and different.
quotes.author: Alfred P. Sloan

quotes.quote: Making you a pioneer only means one thing. You were around at the time.
quotes.author: Red Buttons

quotes.quote: Every time you are tempted to react in the same old way, ask if you want to be a prisoner of the past or a pioneer of the future.
quotes.author: Deepak Chopra

quotes.quote: The way of the pioneer is always rough
quotes.author: Harvey S Firestone

quotes.quote: The settler and pioneer have at bottom had justice on their side; this great continent could not have been kept as nothing but a game preserve for squalid savages.
quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.quote: A pioneer destroys things and calls it civilization.
quotes.author: Charles Marion Russell

quotes.quote: The person who follows the crowd will usually go no further than the crowd. The person who walks alone is likely to find himself in places no one has ever seen before.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: Pioneers may be picturesque figures, but they are often rather lonely ones.
quotes.author: Nancy Astor

quotes.quote: It is often the failure who is the pioneer in new lands, new undertakings, and new forms of expression.
quotes.author: Eric Hoffer

quotes.quote: The pioneers of a warless world are the young men (and women) who refuse military service.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: [The pioneers] woke up each morning with clearly defined purposes and goals that everyone understood: to serve God.
quotes.author: Dieter F. Uchtdorf

quotes.quote: A pioneer is a man who turned all the grass upside down, strung bob-wire over the dust that was left, poisoned the water, cut down the trees, killed the Indian who owned the land and called it progress.
quotes.author: Charles Marion Russell

quotes.quote: Pioneers get slaughtered, and the settlers prosper.
quotes.author: Daymond John

quotes.quote: Woman must be the pioneer in this turning inward for strength. In a sense, she has always been the pioneer
quotes.author: Anne Morrow Lindbergh

quotes.quote: Don't be a prisoner of the past, become a pioneer of the future.
quotes.author: Farshad Asl

quotes.quote: A pioneer family lived beyond the reach of shopping malls.
quotes.author: Stephen Baxter

quotes.quote: On every side, and at every hour of the day, we came up against the relentless limitations of pioneer life.
quotes.author: Anna Howard Shaw

quotes.quote: As early pioneers in the knowing, that when you lose your reason, you attain highest perfect knowing.
quotes.author: Jack Kerouac

quotes.quote: Most pioneers are at the mercy of doubt at the beginning, whether of their worth, of their theories, or of the whole enigmatic field in which they labour.
quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.quote: Each of us is a pioneer and many of us pioneer daily in trying to establish a gospel foothold in distant parts of the world.
quotes.author: Gordon B. Hinckley

quotes.quote: Pioneering is the work of individuals .
quotes.author: Susanne Katherina Langer

quotes.quote: A pioneer is not someone who makes her own soap. She is one who takes up her burdens and walks toward the future
quotes.author: Laurel Thatcher Ulrich

quotes.quote: A pioneer is generally a man who has outlived his credit or fortune in the cultivated parts
quotes.author: Benjamin Rush

quotes.quote: We are all time voyagers leaving history in our wake, pioneering into the future.
quotes.author: Erwin Raphael McManus

quotes.quote: All pioneers are considered to be afflicted with moonstruck madness.
quotes.author: Lucy Maud Montgomery

quotes.quote: America is not a country of immigrants, we are a country of pioneers.
quotes.author: Mike Klepper

quotes.quote: We must still think of ourselves as pioneers to understand the importance of space.
quotes.author: Buzz Aldrin

quotes.quote: A pioneer should have imagination, should be able to enjoy the idea of things more than the things themselves
quotes.author: Willa Cather

quotes.quote: We are pioneers and the history of pioneers is not that good.
quotes.author: Jeff Bezos

quotes.quote: The way of the pioneer is always rough.
quotes.author: Harvey S. Firestone

quotes.quote: There is more treasure in books than in all the pirates' loot on Treasure Island.
quotes.author: Walt Disney

quotes.quote: Even pirates, before they attack another ship, hoist a black flag.
quotes.author: Bela Kiraly

quotes.quote: When a pirate grows rich enough, they make him a prince.
quotes.author: George R R Martin

quotes.quote: Let's jump on board, and cut them to pieces.
quotes.author: Johnson 81

quotes.quote: If the pirate with a scarf had been more poetically minded he'd have thought that her eyes were like a thousand emeralds, glittering in a far-off pirate treasure chest. But he wasn't, so he just thought that she had really really green eyes, a bit like seaweed.
quotes.author: Gideon Defoe

quotes.quote: There's very little admirable about being a pirate. There's very little functional about a pirate. There's very little real about a pirate.
quotes.author: Will Oldham

quotes.quote: There is nothing so desperately monotonous as the sea, and I no longer wonder at the cruelty of pirates.
quotes.author: James Russell Lowell

quotes.quote: Merchant and pirate were for a long period one and the same person. Even today mercantile morality is really nothing but a refinement of piratical morality.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.quote: A pirate spreading misery and ruin over the face of the ocean.
quotes.author: Thomas Jefferson

quotes.quote: I think pirates, like astronauts, particularly for a boy, are always kind of worth thinking about.
quotes.author: Daniel Handler

quotes.quote: It is when pirates count their booty that they become mere thieves.
quotes.author: William Bolitho

quotes.quote: But the pirates never showed, and the slaves found themselves trapped on a narrow peninsula. (Lesson: never trust pirates.)
quotes.author: Erik Sass

quotes.quote: It's funny that pirates were always going around searching for treasure, and they never realized that the real treasure was the fond memories they were creating.
quotes.author: Jack Handey

quotes.quote: Drinking rum before 10 am makes you a pirate, not an alcoholic.
quotes.author: Earl Dibbles Jr.

quotes.quote: Every generation welcomes the pirates from the last.
quotes.author: Lawrence Lessig

quotes.quote: It's more fun to be a pirate than to join the Navy.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.quote: The pirate he will sink you with a kiss, he'll steal your heart and sail away.
quotes.author: Joni Mitchell

quotes.quote: In politics and in trade, bruisers and pirates are of better promise than talkers and clerks.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo

quotes.quote: Pitching is the art of instilling fear.
quotes.author: Sandy Koufax

quotes.quote: Starting pitching will either lead you to the White House or the out house.
quotes.author: Don Cooper

quotes.quote: You know you're pitching well when the batters look as bad as you do at the plate.
quotes.author: Duke Snider

quotes.quote: It's pitching, hitting and defense that wins. Any two can win. All three make you unbeatable.
quotes.author: Joe Garagiola

quotes.quote: Pitching was about fooling people, manipulating them, making them believe in something that ultimately wasn't there. Great pitching was great lying.
quotes.author: Linda Ellerbee

quotes.quote: Hitting is timing. Pitching is upsetting timing.
quotes.author: Warren Spahn

quotes.quote: Pitching keeps you in the games. Home runs win the game.
quotes.author: Earl Weaver

quotes.quote: Pitching always beats batting and vice-versa.
quotes.author: Yogi Berra

quotes.quote: Pitching just felt like the most natural thing in the world.
quotes.author: George Herman

quotes.quote: Try pitching a story of happiness to your editors and their toes are going to curl up.
quotes.author: Jim Crace

quotes.quote: Put the right pitching mechanics together with good health, and there's nothing surprising about lasting a long time.
quotes.author: Nolan Ryan

quotes.quote: When you're pitching, you always have to make continual improvements. You always have to better yourself throughout your career.
quotes.author: Brad Lidge

quotes.quote: Pitching is what you have best on the day you work, and if you cant get your fastball over the plate, then maybe you can win with your curve.
quotes.author: Tom Seaver

quotes.quote: Mental attitude and concentration are the keys to pitching.
quotes.author: Ferguson Jenkins

quotes.quote: Throwing young people on the scrap heap is a public health emergency.
quotes.author: Michael Marmot

quotes.quote: Throwing yourself into a job you enjoy is one of the life's greatest pleasures!
quotes.author: Richard Branson

quotes.quote: Stop throwing away days, weeks, months, and years by simply day-dreaming about what you wish your life would be.
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: To love with the spirit is to pity, and he who pities most loves most.
quotes.author: Miguel de Unamuno

quotes.quote: Where mercy, love, and pity dwell, there God is dwelling too.
quotes.author: William Blake

quotes.quote: That sort of half sigh, which, accompanied by two or three slight nods of the head, is pity's small change in general society.
quotes.author: Charles Dickens

quotes.quote: When the severity of the law is to be softened, let pity, not bribes, be the motive.
quotes.author: Miguel de Cervantes

quotes.quote: Pity addresses the perceived suffering, not the whole individual.
quotes.author: Phil Klay

quotes.quote: Pity may represent little more than the impersonal concern which prompts the mailing of a check, but true sympathy is the personal concern which demands the giving of one's soul.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King, Jr.

quotes.quote: Let no one underestimate the need of pity. We live in a stony universe whose hard, brilliant forces rage fiercely.
quotes.author: Theodore Dreiser

quotes.quote: There is little for the great part of the history of the world except the bitter tears of pity and the hot tears of wrath.
quotes.author: Woodrow Wilson

quotes.quote: Pity the nation that has to silence its writers for speaking their minds.
quotes.author: Arundhati Roy

quotes.quote: Care and pity are two different things.
quotes.author: Vince Staples

quotes.quote: A pity beyond all telling is hid in the heart of love.
quotes.author: William Butler Yeats

quotes.quote: Pity speaks to grief more sweetly than a band of instruments.
quotes.author: Bryan Procter

quotes.quote: Sensual excess drives out pity in man.
quotes.author: Marquis De Sade

quotes.quote: The person who deserves most pity is a lonesome one on a rainy day who doesn't know how to read.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: All those who offer an opinion on any doubtful point should first clear their minds of every sentiment of dislike, friendship, anger or pity.
quotes.author: Sallust

quotes.quote: Only those who spread treachery, fire, and death out of hatred for the prosperity of others are undeserving of pity.
quotes.author: Jose Marti

quotes.quote: It's a mistake to confuse pity with love.
quotes.author: Stanley Kubrick

quotes.quote: Self pity is the worst possible disease that can affect mankind. And if we do just the opposite, which is love, then we have God's feelings with us at all times.
quotes.author: Jon Huntsman, Sr.

quotes.quote: It is easy to condemn, it is better to pity.
quotes.author: Lyman Abbott

quotes.quote: To pity distress is but human; to relieve it is Godlike.
quotes.author: Horace Mann

quotes.quote: Pity the selfishness of lovers: it is brief, a forlorn hope; it is impossible.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Bowen

quotes.quote: Cruelty is softened by fear, not pity.
quotes.author: Mason Cooley

quotes.quote: Compassion has enemies, and those enemies are things like pity, moral outrage, fear.
quotes.author: Joan Halifax

quotes.quote: Then cherish pity, lest you drive an angel from your door.
quotes.author: William Blake

quotes.quote: Pity the meek, for they shall inherit the earth.
quotes.author: Don Marquis

quotes.quote: Pity is the deadliest feeling that can be offered to a woman.
quotes.author: Vicki Baum

quotes.quote: Pity those who nature abuses; never those who abuse nature.
quotes.author: Richard Brinsley Sheridan

quotes.quote: Anger and hate against one we love steels our hearts, but contempt or pity leaves us silent and ashamed.
quotes.author: Edgar Rice Burroughs

quotes.quote: We need to suffer, that we may learn to pity.
quotes.author: Letitia Elizabeth Landon

quotes.quote: There is an electric fire in human nature tending to purify - so that among these human creatures there is continually some birth of new heroism. The pity is that we must wonder at it, as we should at finding a pearl in rubbish.
quotes.author: John Keats

quotes.quote: Pizza is not just a plate of delicious food. It’s meant to be shared; it’s an invitation to gather around the table for community and conviviality. Pizza brings people together.
quotes.author: Marc Vetri

quotes.quote: Every pizza is a personal pizza if you try hard and believe in yourself.
quotes.author: Bill Murray

quotes.quote: Anyone who says money can't buy happiness clearly has never spent their money on pizza.
quotes.author: Andrew W.K.

quotes.quote: Any pizza can be a personal one if you cry while you eat it.
quotes.author: Aparna Nancherla

quotes.quote: One of the best things about pizza night is the mood that comes with it. Memories, along with dinner, are in the making.
quotes.author: Kathryn Kellinger

quotes.quote: What I can tell you for sure is that pizza doesn’t come down to just recipes and formulas. It’s a craft.
quotes.author: Tony Gemignani

quotes.quote: Eating pizza is like having a little heaven in your nose.
quotes.author: Will Advise

quotes.quote: Dough with something on it just works.
quotes.author: Peter Reinhart

quotes.quote: You better cut the pizza in four pieces because I'm not hungry enough to eat six.
quotes.author: Yogi Berra

quotes.quote: There's no better feeling in the world than a warm pizza box on your lap.
quotes.author: Kevin James

quotes.quote: And there is no aspect, no facet, no moment of life that can't be improved with pizza.
quotes.author: Daria Morgendorffer

quotes.quote: Forgiveness is divine, but never pay full price for late pizza.
quotes.author: Michaelangelo, Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles

quotes.quote: Life is mostly pain and struggle; the rest is love and deep dish pizza.
quotes.author: Benedict Smith

quotes.quote: Pizza night is more than dinner; It’s confirmation that all the heaviness of the world will be held at bay—if only for a little while—by a combination of bubbling mozzarella, sweet fennel sausage, and balsamic-glazed radicchio.
quotes.author: Suzanne Lenzer

quotes.quote: The pizza world is a generous community, so there are very few secrets. This is because the truly great pizzaioli know that the real secret is in the craft itself, which is acquired only through relentless practice.
quotes.author: Peter Reinhart

quotes.quote: Great dough is what makes great pizza.
quotes.author: Marc Vetri

quotes.quote: Better ingredients, better pizza - it's not a slogan. It's a way of life.
quotes.author: John Schnatter

quotes.quote: You can't go wrong with pizza, unless it's terrible pizza.
quotes.author: Andy Kindler

quotes.quote: Pizza was made for television in so many ways: it is easy to heat up, easy to divide and easy to eat in a group. It is easy to enjoy, easy to digest and easy-going. It is so Italian!
quotes.author: Yotam Ottolenghi

quotes.quote: Pizza is like the entire food pyramid.
quotes.author: Madeline Oles

quotes.quote: When you experience greatness in anything, even pizza, it spills over into the rest of your life and changes you forever.
quotes.author: Peter Reinhart

quotes.quote: Self-plagiarism is style.
quotes.author: Alfred Hitchcock

quotes.quote: Art is either plagiarism or revolution.
quotes.author: Paul Gauguin

quotes.quote: All originality and no plagiarism makes for dull preaching.
quotes.author: Charles Spurgeon

quotes.quote: If you plagiarize others' techniques, you steel their emotions and tell your spectators a lie with your work. Works as such equal zero.
quotes.author: Wu Guan-Zhong

quotes.quote: There is much difference between imitating a man and counterfeiting him.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: To copy others is necessary, but to copy oneself is pathetic.
quotes.author: Pablo Picasso

quotes.quote: Nothing is said which has not been said before.
quotes.author: Terence

quotes.quote: Writers who copy or plagiarise others are dreaming in another man's sleep.
quotes.author: Fennel Hudson

quotes.quote: He invades authors like a monarch; and what would be theft in other poets is only victory in him.
quotes.author: John Dryden

quotes.quote: Originality is undetected plagiarism.
quotes.author: William Ralph Inge

quotes.quote: If we steal thoughts from the moderns, it will be cried down as plagiarism; if from the ancients, it will be cried up as erudition.
quotes.author: Charles Caleb Colton

quotes.quote: The secret to creativity is knowing how to hide your sources.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: If you steal from one author it's plagiarism; if you steal from many it's research.
quotes.author: Wilson Mizner

quotes.quote: Stealing things is a glorious occupation, particularly in the art world.
quotes.author: Malcolm McLaren

quotes.quote: Plagiarism is the fear of a blank page.
quotes.author: Mokokoma Mokhonoana

quotes.quote: Plagiarism is necessary. Progress implies it.
quotes.author: Isidore Ducasse

quotes.quote: Plagiarists, at least, have the merit of preservation.
quotes.author: Benjamin Disraeli

quotes.quote: Most plagiarists, like the drone, have neither taste to select, industry to acquire, nor skill to improve, but impudently pilfer the honey ready prepared, from the hive.
quotes.author: Walter Colton

quotes.quote: Plagiarists are always suspicious of being stolen from.
quotes.author: Samuel Taylor Coleridge

quotes.quote: To steal ideas from one person is plagiarism; to steal from many is research.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote: Plagiarism brings on bad karma and may lead to reincarnation as a bad piece of art or, worse, a bad politician.
quotes.author: Jacques Vesery

quotes.quote: Everything is not tradition, it's plagiarism.
quotes.author: Eugenio d'Ors

quotes.quote: All work and no plagiarism makes a dull speech.
quotes.author: Jacob Braude

quotes.quote: It's not plagiarism in the digital age â€“ it's repurposing.
quotes.author: Kenneth Goldsmith

quotes.quote: The low-grade plagiarism of popularity will never lead you to true contentment.
quotes.author: T. D. Jakes

quotes.quote: Immature artists imitate. Mature artists steal.
quotes.author: Lionel Trilling

quotes.quote: The ethics of plagiarism have turned into the narcissism of small differences: because journalism cannot own up to its heavily derivative nature, it must enforce originality on the level of the sentence.
quotes.author: Malcolm Gladwell

quotes.quote: Originality is nothing but judicious plagiarism.
quotes.author: Voltaire

quotes.quote: Plagiarism is basic to all culture.
quotes.author: Pete Seeger

quotes.quote: Anticipatory plagiarism occurs when someone steals your original idea and publishes it a hundred years before you were born.
quotes.author: Robert K. Merton

quotes.quote: Without goals, and plans to reach them, you are like a ship that has set sail with no destination.
quotes.author: Fitzhugh Dodson

quotes.quote: A plan relieves you of the torment of choice.
quotes.author: Saul Bellow

quotes.quote: A plan that is not written is just an idea.
quotes.author: Dwain Siady

quotes.quote: Plans are things that change.
quotes.author: Fujio Cho

quotes.quote: A man who does not plan long ahead will find trouble at his door.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: A goal without a plan is just a wish.
quotes.author: Antoine de Saint-Exupéry

quotes.quote: Create a definite plan for carrying out your desire and begin at once, whether you ready or not, to put this plan into action.
quotes.author: Napolean Hill

quotes.quote: A plan is a list of actions arranged in whatever sequence is thought likely to achieve an objective.
quotes.author: John Argenti

quotes.quote: Plans are of little importance, but planning is essential.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: Setting a goal is not the main thing. It is deciding how you will go about achieving it and staying with that plan.
quotes.author: Tom Landry

quotes.quote: If you plan on being anything less than you are capable of being, you will probably be unhappy all the days of your life.
quotes.author: Abraham Maslow

quotes.quote: Plans are only good intentions unless they immediately degenerate into hard work.
quotes.author: Peter Drucker

quotes.quote: Planned or unplanned events have a beginning and an end. All you can do is make them better, shorter, or longer.
quotes.author: Ben Tolosa

quotes.quote: It takes as much energy to wish as it does to plan.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.quote: Make no little plans; they have no magic to stir men's blood. Make big plans, aim high in hope and work.
quotes.author: Daniel H. Burnham

quotes.quote: No plan ever failed due to good planning.
quotes.author: Jury Nel

quotes.quote: Any idea, plan, or purpose may be placed in the mind through repetition of thought.
quotes.author: Napolean Hill

quotes.quote: To achieve great things, two things are needed; a plan, and not quite enough time.
quotes.author: Leonard Bernstein

quotes.quote: Failing to plan is planning to fail.
quotes.author: Alan Lakein

quotes.quote: You can have a plan, but you have to be flexible. Every day is unpredictable, and you just have to go with the flow.
quotes.author: Jane Krakowski

quotes.quote: Planning is bringing the future into the present so that you can do something about it now.
quotes.author: Alan Lakein

quotes.quote: Plans are worthless. Planning is priceless.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: Our goals can only be reached through a vehicle of a plan, in which we must fervently believe, and upon which we must vigorously act. There is no other route to success.
quotes.author: Pablo Picasso

quotes.quote: A good plan, violently executed now, is better than a perfect plan next week.
quotes.author: George S. Patton

quotes.quote: Plan for what it is difficult while it is easy, do what is great while it is small.
quotes.author: Sun Tzu

quotes.quote: Most of us start out with a positive attitude and a plan to do our best.
quotes.author: Marilu Henner

quotes.quote: Life is what happens to us while we are making other plans.
quotes.author: Allen Saunders

quotes.quote: You don't always need a plan. Sometimes you just need to breathe, trust, let go and see what happens.
quotes.author: Mandy Hale

quotes.quote: Plans are invitation to disappointment.
quotes.author: Derek Landy

quotes.quote: A plan is not putting you in a box and forcing you to stay there. A plan is a guide to keep you on course, efficient, and safe.
quotes.author: Amber Hurdle

quotes.quote: We are using resources as if we had two planets, not one. There can be no 'plan B' because there is no 'planet B.'
quotes.author: Ban Ki-moon

quotes.quote: We are on this planet but once, and to spend it holding back our gushing appreciation of the things that light us up is a shameful waste.
quotes.author: Jen Sincero

quotes.quote: We have the most beautiful planet - the Rockies, the purple fields of the United States, the Lake District, the Pyrenees, the turquoise seas of the tropics.
quotes.author: Dan Aykroyd

quotes.quote: So often we talk about saving the planet, but what we really mean is to save the planet the way it is, so we can live here. So that is can sustain us.
quotes.author: Dave Matthews

quotes.quote: The planet's hope and salvation lies in the adoption of revolutionary new knowledge being revealed at the frontiers of science.
quotes.author: Bruce Lipton

quotes.quote: Planet Earth is far more resilient than humans and will certainly outlive us.
quotes.author: Emily Calandrelli

quotes.quote: One planet, one experiment.
quotes.author: E. O. Wilson

quotes.quote: The planet isn't going anywhere. We are.
quotes.author: George Carlin

quotes.quote: The Planet drifts to random insect doom.
quotes.author: William S. Burroughs

quotes.quote: Our planet is a tiny atom in god's kingdom.
quotes.author: Paula Cole

quotes.quote: Any planet is 'Earth' to those that live on it.
quotes.author: Isaac Asimov

quotes.quote: Could it be that the planets are castaway heads.
quotes.author: Visar Zhiti

quotes.quote: My view of our planet was a glimpse of divinity.
quotes.author: Edgar Mitchell

quotes.quote: We batter this planet as if we had someplace else to go.
quotes.author: Ann Druyan

quotes.quote: This planet is a wonderful place, but a vulnerable place.
quotes.author: Assata Shakur

quotes.quote: When you live on a round planet, there's no choosing sides.
quotes.author: Wayne Dyer

quotes.quote: The planet is always half light and half dark, and so are we.
quotes.author: Jennifer Lynch

quotes.quote: There is no planet B. We have to take care of the one we have
quotes.author: Richard Branson

quotes.quote: This planet is our home. Our life and hers are interdependent.
quotes.author: Doreen Valiente

quotes.quote: We occupy the planet with a vengeance. We seek to dominate it.
quotes.author: Henry Rollins

quotes.quote: Unless we keep this planet healthy, everything else is for naught.
quotes.author: Victoria Principal

quotes.quote: An endangered planet may depend on the evolution of consciousness.
quotes.author: Deepak Chopra

quotes.quote: What good is a planet called Earth, after all, if you own no land?
quotes.author: Kurt Vonnegut

quotes.quote: Planet Earth is our shared island, let us join forces to protect it.
quotes.author: Ban Ki-moon

quotes.quote: The planet is in distress and all of the attention is on Paris Hilton.
quotes.author: Al Gore

quotes.quote: Essentially the soul of the planet is being controlled by corporations.
quotes.author: Paul Morley

quotes.quote: A planet is the cradle of mind, but one cannot live in a cradle forever.
quotes.author: Konstantin Tsiolkovsky

quotes.quote: This planet is obviously being used as an insane asylum by other planets.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: Our planet's alarm is going off, and it is time to wake up and take action!
quotes.author: Leonardo DiCaprio

quotes.quote: The destruction of this planet would have no significance on a cosmic scale.
quotes.author: Stanley Kubrick

quotes.quote: Life is a thin narrowness of taken-for-granted, a plank over a canyon in a fog.
quotes.author: Rose Wilder Lane

quotes.quote: The maid that loves goes out to sea upon a shattered plank, and puts her trust in miracles for safety.
quotes.author: Edward Young

quotes.quote: Put the world's greatest philosopher on a plank that is wider than need be; if there is a precipe below, although his reason may convince him that he is safe, his imagination will prevail.
quotes.author: Blaise Pascal

quotes.quote: I stepped from plank to plank so slow and cautiously the stars about my head I felt, about my feet the sea. I knew not but the next would be my final inch - this gave me that precarious gait some call experience.
quotes.author: Emily Dickinson

quotes.quote: Sleeping on a plank has one advantage - it encourages early rising.
quotes.author: Alexandre Dumas

quotes.quote: Whatever stress some may lay upon it, a death-bed repentance is but a weak and slender plank to trust our all on.
quotes.author: Lawrence Sterne

quotes.quote: Let us cling to our principles as the mariner clings to his last plank when night and tempest close around him
quotes.author: Adam Woolever

quotes.quote: I'd rather be buried at sea than on the shore when I come to die. Will you stand by the plank, mates, so I can shake a friendly hand before I sink?
quotes.author: Peter Ustinov

quotes.quote: Trust is the bridge from yesterday to tomorrow, built with planks of thanks.
quotes.author: Ann Voskamp

quotes.quote: Each flitch, each board, each plank can have only one ideal use. The woodworker, applying a thousand skills, must find that ideal use and then shape the wood to realize its true potential.
quotes.author: George Nakashima

quotes.quote: A dead tree, cut into planks and read from one end to the other, is a kind of line graph, with dates down one side and height along the other, as if trees, like mathematicians, had found a way of turning time into form.
quotes.author: Alice Oswald

quotes.quote: Hence a ship is said to be tight, when her planks are so compact and solid as to prevent the entrance of the water in which she is immersed: and a cask is called tight, when the staves are so close that none of the liquid contained therein can issue through or between them.
quotes.author: William Falconer

quotes.quote: What do we plant when we plant the tree? We plant the ship that will cross the sea, we plant the mast to carry the sails, we plant the planks to withstand the gales--the keel, the keelson, and beam and knee--we plant the ship when we plant the tree.
quotes.author: Henry Abbey

quotes.quote: Why do you look at the speck of sawdust in your brother's eye and pay no attention to the plank in your own eye?
quotes.author: Luke 6:41

quotes.quote: I'll walk the plank and I'll jump with a smile, cause if I'm gonna go down I'm gonna do it with style.
quotes.author: Ani DiFranco

quotes.quote: As a very small child I found recorded noise and the solitary singer beneath the spotlight so dramatic and so brave... walking the plank... willingly... It was sink or swim. The very notion of standing there, alone, I found beautiful.
quotes.author: Morissey

quotes.quote: The Democratic party of Florida has put a temperance plank in its platform and the Republican party of every state would nail that plank in their platform if they thought it would carry the election.
quotes.author: Billy Sunday

quotes.quote: You can't hold back. You can't think of the subtleties of playing. You just have to get out and really bare it all, and hopefully you don't fall off the plank. And if you do, hey, pick yourself up, dust yourself down, and start all over again.
quotes.author: Malcolm McDowell

quotes.quote: Her husband had been the nails, the bolts, the rope that held her and her home together. She stood and imagined planks falling off of her arms, tearing free as those nails rusted and the rope frayed and parted deep inside her.
quotes.author: Bryan Costales

quotes.quote: When you're going for a joke, you're stuck out there if it doesn't work. There's nowhere to go. You've done the drum role and the cymbal clash and you're out on the end of the plank.
quotes.author: Bob Newheart

quotes.quote: A plan is the transport medium which conveys a person from the station of dreams to the destination of success. Goals are the transport fees.
quotes.author: Israelmore Ayivor

quotes.quote: A good plan violently executed now is better than a perfect plan executed next week.
quotes.author: George S. Patton

quotes.quote: The planner is a potential dictator who wants to deprive all other people of the power to plan and act according to their own plans. He aims at one thing only: the exclusive absolute preeminence of his own plan.
quotes.author: Ludwig Von Mises

quotes.quote: By failing to prepare, you are preparing to fail.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: All human plans [are] subject to ruthless revision by Nature, or Fate, or whatever one preferred to call the powers behind the Universe.
quotes.author: Arthur C. Clarke

quotes.quote: Planning your life is one way to ensure you are on the winning side more than the losing one.
quotes.author: Steven Redhead

quotes.quote: Strategic planning for the future is the most hopeful indication of our increasing social intelligence.
quotes.author: William H. Hastie

quotes.quote: The more the plans fail, the more the planners plan.
quotes.author: Ronald Reagan

quotes.quote: Planning is a skill and an art which takes a lifetime to master.
quotes.author: Paddick Van Zyl

quotes.quote: There are dreamers and there are planners; the planners make their dreams come true.
quotes.author: Edwin Louis Cole

quotes.quote: To succeed, planning alone is insufficient. One must improvise as well.
quotes.author: Isaac Asimov

quotes.quote: If your priorities don't get scheduled into your planner, other people's priorities will get put into your planner.
quotes.author: Robin Sharma

quotes.quote: When a planner speaks of implementing goals rationally, he implies that it is possible to demonstrate logically and experimentally the relationship between the proposed means and the ends they are intended to further.
quotes.author: Alan A. Altshuler

quotes.quote: A plan is a list of actions arranged in whatever sequence is thought likely to achieve an objective.
quotes.author: John Argenti

quotes.quote: An evil plan does mischief to the planner.
quotes.author: Hesiod

quotes.quote: Plan your next action and next action will plan your life trajectory
quotes.author: Myra Yadav

quotes.quote: When we deal with cities we are dealing with life at its most complex and intense. Planners are guided by principles derived from the behaviour and appearance of suburbs, tuberculosis sanatoria, fairs and imaginary dream cities - from anything but cities themselves.
quotes.author: Jane Jacobs

quotes.quote: Planning is bringing the future into the present so that you can do something about it now.
quotes.author: Alan Lakein

quotes.quote: Plans are of little importance, but planning is essential.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: The plan isn't working because we aren't working the plan
quotes.author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah

quotes.quote: Life is what happens to us while we are making other plans.
quotes.author: Thomas La Mance

quotes.quote: Plans can break down. You cannot plan the future. Only presumptuous fools plan. The wise man steers.
quotes.author: Terry Pratchett

quotes.quote: You don't always need a plan. Sometimes you just need to breathe, trust, let go and see what happens.
quotes.author: Mandy Hale

quotes.quote: To make plans and not make good use of them is like â€œbetraying your success helpmateâ€ after getting to know him. Make plans, get prepared, but let the work be done.
quotes.author: Israelmore Ayivor

quotes.quote: In the planning and designing of new communities, housing projects, and urban renewal, the planners both private and public, need to give explicit consideration to the kind of world that is being created for the children who will be growing up in these settings. Particular attention should be given to the opportunities which the environment presents or precludes for involvement of children both older and younger than themselves.
quotes.author: Urie Bronfenbrenner

quotes.quote: To escape the cycle of tragedy, we (searchers) have to be tough on the ideas of the planners, even while we salute their goodwill.
quotes.author: William Easterly

quotes.quote: No matter what the work you are doing, be always ready to drop it. And plan it, so as to be able to leave it.
quotes.author: Leo Tolstoy

quotes.quote: A designer is a planner with an aesthetic sense.
quotes.author: Bruno Munari

quotes.quote: The state of convenience lies in the hands of proper planning. When you know this, you will become a good planner; and when you become a good planner, you save your life from stress!
quotes.author: Israelmore Ayivor

quotes.quote: Plan strategically and strike it once to win. You can achieve maximum dues with minimum dice if only you are willing to clearly calculate and throw your efforts with optimism
quotes.author: Israelmore Ayivor

quotes.quote: The clearest way into the Universe is through a forest wilderness.
quotes.author: John Muir

quotes.quote: I remember my childhood names for grasses and secret flowers. I remember where a toad may live and what time the birds awaken in the summer -- and what trees and seasons smelled like -- how people looked and walked and smelled even. The memory of odors is very rich.
quotes.author: John Steinbeck

quotes.quote: Love and work are to people what water and sunshine are to plants.
quotes.author: Jonathan Haidt

quotes.quote: Flower will not grow, if the stem doesn't allow
quotes.author: Nayreil

quotes.quote: Thus nature provides a system for proportioning the growth of plants that satisfies the three canons of architecture. All modules are isotropic and they are related to the whole structure of the plant through self-similar spirals proportioned by the golden mean.
quotes.author: Jay Kappraff

quotes.quote: If we plant the right seeds, tomorrow will be better. If you put out good things, then you'll get good things back. That's part of our responsibility as entertainers.
quotes.author: Ben Vereen

quotes.quote: A weed is a plant that has mastered every survival skill except for learning how to grow in rows.
quotes.author: Doug Larson

quotes.quote: Plants can be affected by stray voltage and they may show stunted growth, deformed growth, or go dormant. In extreme cases they may die.
quotes.author: Steven Magee

quotes.quote: Like people, plants respond to extra attention.
quotes.author: H. Peter Loewer

quotes.quote: This wonderful plant has so many uses and yet is often neglected in our society. The primary use of the dandelion plant is for its superior liver cleansing qualities. The plant is a powerhouse of nutrients!
quotes.author: Valerie Hoffman

quotes.quote: What we plant in the soil of contemplation, we shall reap in the harvest of action.
quotes.author: Meister Eckhart

quotes.quote: Working with plants will teach you all other social commitments in a soothing way.
quotes.author: Karthikeyan V

quotes.quote: My fake plants died because I did not pretend to water them.
quotes.author: Mitch Hedberg

quotes.quote: Whatever we plant in our subconscious mind and nourish with repetition and emotion will one day become a reality.
quotes.author: Earl Nightingale

quotes.quote: That one plant should be sown and another be produced cannot happen; whatever seed is sown, a plant of that kind even comes forth.
quotes.author: Guru Nanak

quotes.quote: Every plant has to look good for at least two seasons.
quotes.author: Cheryl Miller

quotes.quote: Call a plant beautiful, and it becomes a flower. Call it ugly, and it becomes a weed.
quotes.author: Jonathan Lockwood Huie

quotes.quote: One day is not enough to green our earth. Planting caring and love is also expecting our earth from us. Do it, It will heal not only the land but also your body and mind.
quotes.author: Karthikeyan V

quotes.quote: Plants are more courageous than almost all human beings: an orange tree would rather die than produce lemons, whereas instead of dying the average person would rather be someone they are not.
quotes.author: Mokokoma Mokhonoana

quotes.quote: A man doesn't plant a tree for himself. He plants it for posterity.
quotes.author: Alexander Smith

quotes.quote: The planting of a tree, especially one of the long-living hardwood trees, is a gift which you can make to posterity at almost no cost and with almost no trouble, and if the tree takes root it will far outlive the visible effect of any of your other actions, good or evil.
quotes.author: George Orwell

quotes.quote: Plants cannot stay safe. Desire for light spools grass out of the ground; desire for a visitor spools red ruffles out of twigs. Desire makes plants very brave, so they can find what they desire; and very tender, so they can feel what they find.
quotes.author: Amy Leach

quotes.quote: Don't judge each day by the harvest you reap but by the seeds that you plant.
quotes.author: Robert Louis Stevenson

quotes.quote: A good farmer never plants all his seeds in a single piece of land.
quotes.author: Habeeb Akande

quotes.quote: He that plants trees, loves others besides himself.
quotes.author: Thomas Fuller

quotes.quote: So plant your own gardens and decorate your own soul, instead of waiting for someone to bring you flowers.
quotes.author: Jorge Luis Borges

quotes.quote: Like a plant that starts up in showers and sunshine and does not know which has best helped it to grow, it is difficult to say whether the hard things or the pleasant things did me the most good.
quotes.author: Lucy Larcom

quotes.quote: Plants are the young of the world, vessels of health and vigor; but they grope ever upward towards consciousness; the trees are imperfect men, and seem to bemoan their imprisonment, rooted in the ground.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: If you plan for a year, plant a seed. If for ten years, plant a tree. If for a hundred years, teach the people. When you sow a seed once, you will reap a single harvest. When you teach the people, you will reap a hundred harvests.
quotes.author: Kuan Chung

quotes.quote: We plant seeds that will flower as results in our lives, so best to remove the weeds of anger, avarice, envy and doubt, that peace and abundance may manifest for all.
quotes.author: Dorothy Day

quotes.quote: â€œPlastic moments" are those periods that overlap when the old has gone but the new has not yet arrived and when the course of history is more open to being shaped and steered than any other time.
quotes.author: Peter Drucker

quotes.quote: In the hierarchy of the major poetic substances, it [plastic] figures as a disgraced material, lost between the effusiveness of rubber and the flat hardness of metal.
quotes.author: Roland Barthes

quotes.quote: Life is half delicious yogurt, half crap, and your job is to keep the plastic spoon in the yogurt.
quotes.author: Scott Adams

quotes.quote: Human behavior is incredibly pliable, plastic.
quotes.author: Philip Zimbardo

quotes.quote: Man is unique not because he does science, and he is unique not because he does art, but because science and art equally are expressions of his marvelous plasticity of mind.
quotes.author: Jacob Bronowski

quotes.quote: Plastic man got no brain, plastic man don't feel no pain.
quotes.author: Ray Davies

quotes.quote: We are so wrapped up in ourselves that we don't need plastic anymore.
quotes.author: Anthony T. Hincks

quotes.quote: We humans have become dependent on plastic for a range of uses, from packaging to products. Reducing our use of plastic bags is an easy place to start getting our addiction under control.
quotes.author: David Suzuki

quotes.quote: Beauty lasts five minutes. Maybe longer if you have a good plastic surgeon.
quotes.author: Tia Carrere

quotes.quote: Of all the waste we generate, plastic bags are perhaps the greatest symbol of our throwaway society. They are used, then forgotten, and they leave a terrible legacy.
quotes.author: Zac Goldsmith

quotes.quote: Matter is plastic in the face of Mind.
quotes.author: Philip Dick

quotes.quote: The plastic artist may or may not be concerned with presenting a superficial appearance of reality, but he is always concerned with the presentation - if not the representation - of the plastic values of reality.
quotes.author: Hans Hofmann

quotes.quote: It doesn't take long to realize you've made the wrong decision. You bump along with your eco-fueled ego in your eco-fueled vehicle and reuse every piece of plastic and glass you encounter, but it isn't enough.
quotes.author: A. J. Lauer

quotes.quote: The plastic virtues: purity, unity, and truth, keep nature in subjection.
quotes.author: Guillaume Apollinaire

quotes.quote: A garden is a complex of aesthetic and plastic intentions and the plant is, to a landscape artist, not only a plant - rare, unusual, ordinary or doomed to disappearance - but it is also a color, a shape, a volume or an arabesque in itself.
quotes.author: Roberto Burle Marx

quotes.quote: The cloning of humans is on most of the lists of things to worry about from science, along with behavior control, genetic engineering, transplanted heads, computer poetry and the unrestrained growth of plastic flowers.
quotes.author: Lewis Thomas

quotes.quote: I've had so much plastic surgery, when I die they will donate my body to tupperware.
quotes.author: Joan Rivers

quotes.quote: The passion of self-aggrandizement is persistent but plastic; it will never disappear from a vigorous mind, but may become morally higher by attaching itself to a larger conception of what constitutes the self.
quotes.author: Charles Horton Cooley

quotes.quote: The pressure to keep up with what society tells us is perfect is causing us to enter a time when women are no longer women, but plastic shells of what women used to be.
quotes.author: Chelsea Hobbs

quotes.quote: Geometry is to the plastic arts what grammar is to the art of the writer.
quotes.author: Guillaume Apollinaire

quotes.quote: Thought dissolves the material universe by carrying the mind up into a sphere where all is plastic.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: What's the whole point of being pretty on the outside when you're so ugly on the inside?
quotes.author: Jess C. Scott

quotes.quote: Exercising the right of occasional suppression and slight modification, it is truly absurd to see how plastic a limited number of observations become, in the hands of men with preconceived ideas.
quotes.author: Sir Francis Galton

quotes.quote: Plastic surgery is a way for people to buy themselves a few years before they have to truly confront what ageing is, which of course is not that your looks are falling apart, but that you are falling apart and some-day you will have fallen apart and ceased to exist.
quotes.author: Nora Ephron

quotes.quote: One man's â€˜magic' is another man's engineering. â€˜Supernatural' is a null word.
quotes.author: Robert A. Heinlein

quotes.quote: The mind-brain is lived only from a first-person perspective, and it is a dynamic, plastic organ that changes in relation to the environment.
quotes.author: Siri Hustvedt

quotes.quote: Poetry is an art practiced with the terribly plastic material of human language.
quotes.author: Carl Sandburg

quotes.quote: Don't treat your heart like an action figure wrapped in plastic and never used.
quotes.author: Amy Poehler

quotes.quote: She got her looks from her father. He's a plastic surgeon.
quotes.author: Groucho Marx

quotes.quote: Against Him those women sin who torment their skin with potions, stain their cheeks with rouge and extend the line of their eyes with black coloring. Doubtless they are dissatisfied with God's plastic skill. In their own persons they convict and censure the Artificer of all things.
quotes.author: Tertullian

quotes.quote: Plastic surgery can't make you younger or more beautiful, because beauty is in your eyes, isn't it? It's in your soul; you can't strap it on.
quotes.author: Sarah Parish

quotes.quote: Everybody does what she needs. And if you want plastic surgery, and then you feel better, why not? There is no law. I've nothing against using something to help your beauty - but do it in a good way, with intelligence.
quotes.author: Monica Bellucci

quotes.quote: Plastic surgery and breast implants are fine for people who want that, if it makes them feel better about who they are. But, it makes these people, actors especially, fantasy figures for a fantasy world. Acting is about being real being honest.
quotes.author: Kate Winslet

quotes.quote: Plastic surgery is like a big elephant sitting in the Hollywood living room.
quotes.author: Patricia Heaton

quotes.quote: Plastic surgery is a postmodern veil.
quotes.author: Nawal El Saadawi

quotes.quote: Money can't buy you happiness but it can pay for the plastic surgery.
quotes.author: Joan Rivers

quotes.quote: If you choose to be Frankenstein with Botox and plastic surgery, you've bought your own private mask.
quotes.author: Frances Conroy

quotes.quote: A good rule to remember for life is that when it comes to plastic surgery and sushi, never be attracted by a bargain.
quotes.author: Graham Norton

quotes.quote: The trouble with plastic surgery is that after 10 years, gravity wins out and you have to have another one in a year or so.
quotes.author: Linda Evans

quotes.quote: Clever plastic surgery can restore an appearance of youth, but nothing changes the expression of age and experience in the eyes.
quotes.author: M.C. Beaton

quotes.quote: When you look at women who have had plastic surgery, they have lost something - usually an expression, something unique to their face.
quotes.author: Bo Derek

quotes.quote: Getting plastic surgery in your late 70's, it's kind of like painting your house as the fire approaches. Just die, there's no shame in it.
quotes.author: Dana Gould

quotes.quote: Plastic surgery is one of the ways that people deal with the aging process. And I don't mean by using it as a form of denial, but as a kind of negotiation with it.
quotes.author: Nora Ephron

quotes.quote: Anybody who is anybody seems to be getting a lift - by plastic surgery these days. It's the new world wide craze that combines the satisfactions of psychoanalysis, massage, and a trip to the beauty salon.
quotes.author: Eugenia Sheppard

quotes.quote: With plastic surgery, the general anesthetic is like a black-velvety sleep, and that's what death is - without waking up to someone clapping and going, 'Joan, wake up, it's all over and you're looking pretty'.
quotes.author: Joan Rivers

quotes.quote: Plastic surgery is a way for people to buy themselves a few years before they have to truly confront what ageing is, which of course is not that your looks are falling apart, but that you are falling apart and some-day you will have fallen apart and ceased to exist.
quotes.author: Nora Ephron

quotes.quote: My thinking about plastic surgery is this. I haven't had it, but never say never. Because when you do, you are definitely going to go there.
quotes.author: Diane Keaton

quotes.quote: I believe if somebody chooses plastic surgery it should be for themselves, not for anyone else.
quotes.author: Ashlee Simpson

quotes.quote: If somebody wants to have plastic surgery, more power to them. I think there's a point where you go overboard.
quotes.author: Shannen Doherty

quotes.quote: I thought that plastic surgery was easy, but it is really serious and is not something you want to mess around with.
quotes.author: Heidi Montag

quotes.quote: If you want to have plastic surgery or cosmetic surgery, live it up; go ahead and have it. But if you don't want to have it, don't have it.
quotes.author: Sharon Stone

quotes.quote: Having plastic surgery is pathetic. You don't look any younger; you look well for a bit until it starts going again, but it takes all the character out.
quotes.author: Judy Parfitt

quotes.quote: I think everyone is forgetting what plastic surgery is for - if you have a face-eating tumour, lose a breast or are involved in a car accident, then it's a good idea.
quotes.author: Sally Phillips

quotes.quote: Play is the beginning of knowledge.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Never play anything the same way twice.
quotes.author: Louis Armstrong

quotes.quote: Play energizes us and enlivens us. It eases our burdens. It renews our natural sense of optimism and opens us up to new possibilities.
quotes.author: Stuart Brown
