quotes.quote: Play needs direction as well as work.
quotes.author: Elbert Hubbard

quotes.quote: Play is a uniquely adaptive act, not subordinate to some other adaptive act, but with a special function of its own in human experience.
quotes.author: Johan Huizinga

quotes.quote: You have to learn the rules of the game. And then you have to play better than anyone else.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: Play becomes joy, joy becomes work, work becomes play.
quotes.author: Johannes Itten

quotes.quote: Play is the work of childhood.
quotes.author: Jean Piaget

quotes.quote: You can discover more about a person in an hour of play than in a year of conversation.
quotes.author: Plato

quotes.quote: We don't stop playing because we grow old; we grow old because we stop playing.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: Children need the freedom and time to play. Play is not a luxury. Play is a necessity.
quotes.author: Kay Redfield Jamison

quotes.quote: The creation of something new is not accomplished by the intellect but by the play instinct.
quotes.author: Carl Jung

quotes.quote: Play is the highest form of research.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: Play is the exultation of the possible.
quotes.author: Martin Buber

quotes.quote: It is better to play than do nothing.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: It is a happy talent to know how to play.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: We are never more fully alive, more completely ourselves, or more deeply engrossed in anything than when we are playing.
quotes.author: Charles Schaefer

quotes.quote: Don't play what's there, play what's not there.
quotes.author: Miles Davis

quotes.quote: Play, while it cannot change the external realities of children's lives, can be a vehicle for children to explore and enjoy their differences and similarities and to create, even for a brief time, a more just world where everyone is an equal and valued participant.
quotes.author: Patricia G. Ramsey

quotes.quote: Life is like a game of cards. The hand you are dealt is determinism; the way you play it is free will.
quotes.author: Jawaharlal Nehru

quotes.quote: Man's most serious activity is play.
quotes.author: George Santayana

quotes.quote: Life is more fun if you play games.
quotes.author: Roald Dahl

quotes.quote: Play is your route to mastery.
quotes.author: Sara Genn

quotes.quote: The quality of a play is the quality of its ideas.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: Children learn as they play. Most importantly, in play children learn how to learn.
quotes.author: O. Fred Donaldson

quotes.quote: Play is our brain's favourite way of learning.
quotes.author: Diane Ackerman

quotes.quote: When you work, work. When you play, play. Don't mix the two.
quotes.author: Jim Rohn

quotes.quote: Play is often talked about as if it were a relief from serious learning. But for children play is serious learning. Play is really the work of childhood.
quotes.author: Fred Rogers

quotes.quote: Play is the only way the highest intelligence of humankind can unfold.
quotes.author: Joseph Chilton Pearce

quotes.quote: Play keeps us vital and alive. It gives us an enthusiasm for life that is irreplaceable. Without it, life just doesn't taste good.
quotes.author: Lucia Capocchione

quotes.quote: I don't have any tricky plays, I'd rather have tricky players.
quotes.author: Abe Lemons

quotes.quote: No coach has ever won a game by what he knows; it's what his players know that counts.
quotes.author: Paul Bryant

quotes.quote: Every great player has learned the two Cs: how to concentrate and how to maintain composure.
quotes.author: Byron Nelson

quotes.quote: Mentally, the only players who survive in the pros are the ones able to manage all their responsibilities.
quotes.author: Tom Brady

quotes.quote: I think it's the mark of a great player to be confident in tough situations.
quotes.author: John McEnroe

quotes.quote: Some players you pat their butts, some players you kick their butts, some players you leave alone.
quotes.author: Pete Rose

quotes.quote: Although I wanted my players to work to win, I tried to convince them they had always won when they had done their best.
quotes.author: John Wooden

quotes.quote: Talent is secondary to whether players are confident.
quotes.author: Jack Gibson

quotes.quote: Great players are willing to give up their own personal achievement for the achievement of the group. It enhances everybody.
quotes.author: Kareem Abdul-Jabbar

quotes.quote: The players make the manager, it's never the other way.
quotes.author: Sparky Anderson

quotes.quote: The only thing I believe is this: A player does not have to like a manager and he does not have to respect a manager. All he has to do is obey the rules.
quotes.author: Sparky Anderson

quotes.quote: Players have two things to do. Play and keep their mouths shut.
quotes.author: Sparky Anderson

quotes.quote: The best players will play. That's the way it will always be.
quotes.author: Larry Bird

quotes.quote: He who gets the best players usually wins.
quotes.author: Bobby Bowden

quotes.quote: People have to understand how important it is for the players to let off steam, switch off and relax.
quotes.author: Will Carling

quotes.quote: Sometimes a player's greatest challenge is coming to grips with his role on the team.
quotes.author: Scottie Pippen

quotes.quote: I like my players to be married and in debt. That's the way you motivate them.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Banks

quotes.quote: So if the players trust the coach, it's not a problem. If the players don't trust the coach, it is a problem, and vice versa.
quotes.author: Bill Parcells

quotes.quote: Players are artists who create their own reality within the game.
quotes.author: Shigeru Miyamoto

quotes.quote: Players respond to coaches who really have their best interests at heart.
quotes.author: Mike Singletary

quotes.quote: Players must do what you want them to do in pressure situations.
quotes.author: Don Meyer

quotes.quote: The difference of great players is at a certain point in a match they raise their level of play and maintain it. Lesser players play great for a set, but then less.
quotes.author: Pete Sampras

quotes.quote: Finding good players is easy. Getting them to play as a team is another story.
quotes.author: Casey Stengel

quotes.quote: Players play, tough players win.
quotes.author: Tom Izzo

quotes.quote: Everyone knows the game is about the players.
quotes.author: Mike Quade

quotes.quote: It's not the name that makes the player. It's the player.
quotes.author: Barry Bonds

quotes.quote: Most players prepare for disaster. A good player prepares for success.
quotes.author: Tony Alfonso

quotes.quote: The one thing about players today is that they're very sensitive, and very fragile. They didn't grow up with tough coaches.
quotes.author: Doug Collins

quotes.quote: I think every player should think that he's a difference maker.
quotes.author: Brett Favre

quotes.quote: I don't believe a player is ever a finished product.
quotes.author: Anthony Rizzo

quotes.quote: The creative mind is the playful mind. Philosophy is the play and dance of ideas.
quotes.author: Eric Hoffer

quotes.quote: It is requisite for the relaxation of the mind that we make use, from time to time, of playful deeds and jokes
quotes.author: Thomas Aquinas

quotes.quote: What one wrote playfully, another reads with tension and passion; what one wrote with tension and passion, another reads playfully.
quotes.author: Paul Valery

quotes.quote: Playful arising is authorized by both risk and trust in the process and in oneself. To be truly playful and improvisational one must not look for results.
quotes.author: Josh Goldberg

quotes.quote: Accepting your playful side is actually inner power being released. Playfulness is poweful.
quotes.author: G.J Reynolds

quotes.quote: The very essence of playfulness is an openness to anything that may happen, the feeling that whatever happens, it's okay... you're either free to play, or you're not.
quotes.author: John Cleese

quotes.quote: The moment you start seeing life as non-serious, a playfulness, all the burden on your heart disappears. All the fear of death, of life, of love - everything disappears.
quotes.author: Rajneesh

quotes.quote: Why not make cheerfulness, outrageousness, playfulness a new priority for yourself? Make feeling good your expectation. You don't have to have a reason to feel good - you're alive; you can feel good for no reason at all!
quotes.author: Tony Robbins

quotes.quote: There often seems to be a playfulness to wise people, as if either their equanimity has as its source this playfulness or the playfulness flows from equanimity; and they can persuade other people who are in a state of agitation to calm down and smile.
quotes.author: Edward Hoagland

quotes.quote: The main difference between play and playfulness is that play is an activity, while playfulness is an attitude.
quotes.author: Miguel Sicart

quotes.quote: We all want to be a little glamorous, a little playful and a little mischievous at times.
quotes.author: Jason Wu

quotes.quote: To be comic is merely to be playful, but wit is a serious matter. To laugh at it is to confess that you do not understand.
quotes.author: Ambrose Bierce

quotes.quote: There might be some credit in being jolly.
quotes.author: Charles Dickens

quotes.quote: A good jolly is worth what you pay for it.
quotes.author: George Ade

quotes.quote: After all, if you have added some lively colours to the world, you will be remembered well by the world!
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.quote: Playfulness creates positive energy and smiles.
quotes.author: G.J Reynolds

quotes.quote: A playful mind is inquisitive, and learning is fun.
quotes.author: Bill Waterson

quotes.quote: Age doesn’t make a difference in terms of how playful or fun life can be.
quotes.author: Brit Morin

quotes.quote: There's a certain pleasure of the life of the mind that cannot be denied. There's a certain pleasure about being around people who enact a playfulness when it comes to the world of ideas.
quotes.author: Cornel West

quotes.quote: To be aware how fruitful the playful mood can be is to be immune to the propaganda of the alienated, which extols resentment as fuel of achievement.
quotes.author: Eric Hoffer

quotes.quote: Being playful is a key component in making us happier, healthier, more present and connected in all of our relationships.
quotes.author: Meridith Sinclair

quotes.quote: Being playful liberates the mind, opens the heart, and lifts the spirit. Take the time to play today.
quotes.author: Debra L. Rebie

quotes.quote: A playful path is the shortest road to happiness.
quotes.author: Bernie De Koven

quotes.quote: Life is playfulness. We need to play so that we can rediscover the magical around us.
quotes.author: Flora Colao

quotes.quote: A game is a problem-solving activity, approached with a playful attitude
quotes.author: Jesse Schell

quotes.quote: Playfulness brings out the fun in everyone.
quotes.author: G.J Reynolds

quotes.quote: It's sort of a mental attitude about critical thinking and curiosity. It's about mindset of looking at the world in a playful and curious and creative way.
quotes.author: Adam Savage

quotes.quote: The truth that survives is simply the lie that is pleasantest to believe.
quotes.author: H. L. Mencken

quotes.quote: Pleasant feeling is impermanent, conditioned, dependently-arisen, bound to decay, to vanish, to fade away, to ceaseâ€”and so too are painful feeling and neutral feeling. So anyone who, on experiencing a pleasant feeling, thinks: "This is my self", must, at the cessation of that pleasant feeling, think: "My self has gone!
quotes.author: Gautama Buddha

quotes.quote: The test of good manners is to be able to put up pleasantly with bad ones.
quotes.author: Wendell L. Willkie

quotes.quote: Be pleasant until ten o'clock in the morning and the rest of the day will take care of itself.
quotes.author: Elbert Hubbard

quotes.quote: The thing that goes farthest towards making life worth while, That costs the least, and does the most, is just a pleasant smile.
quotes.author: W. D. Nesbit

quotes.quote: It is pleasant, when the sea runs high, to view from land the great distress of another.
quotes.author: Lucretius

quotes.quote: Life is pleasant. Death is peaceful. It's the transition that's troublesome.
quotes.author: Isaac Asimov

quotes.quote: How pleasant it is for a father to sit at his child's board. It is like an aged man reclining under the shadow of an oak which he has planted.
quotes.author: Walter Scott

quotes.quote: There's nothing half so pleasant as coming home again.
quotes.author: Margaret Elizabeth Sangster

quotes.quote: It is impossible to live a pleasant life without living wisely and well and justly. And it is impossible to live wisely and well and justly without living a pleasant life.
quotes.author: Epicurus

quotes.quote: Do unto yourself as your Neighbours do unto Themselves and look Pleasant.
quotes.author: George Ade

quotes.quote: A man does not buy his wife a fur coat to keep her warm, but to keep her pleasant.
quotes.author: Seymour Hicks

quotes.quote: The pleasant life: a life that successfully pursues the positive emotions about the present, past, and future.
quotes.author: Martin E.P. Seligman

quotes.quote: It's difficult to think anything but pleasant thoughts while eating a homegrown tomato.
quotes.author: Lewis Grizzard

quotes.quote: Hope is a pleasant acquaintance, but an unsafe friend.
quotes.author: Thomas Chandler Haliburton

quotes.quote: It's even pleasant to be sick when you know that there are people who await your recovery as they might await a holiday.
quotes.author: Anton Chekhov

quotes.quote: Praise when merited is not a boon: yet to a generous nature, is it pleasant to utter it.
quotes.author: Herman Melville

quotes.quote: Pleasantest of all ties is the tie of host and guest.
quotes.author: Aeschylus

quotes.quote: A test of what is real is that it is hard and rough. Joys are found in it, not pleasure. What is pleasant belongs to dreams.
quotes.author: Simone Weil

quotes.quote: Have regular hours for work and play; make each day both useful and pleasant, and prove that you understand the worth of time by employing it well. Then youth will be delightful, old age will bring few regrets, and life will become a beautiful success.
quotes.author: Louisa May Alcott

quotes.quote: It is so pleasant to come across people more stupid than ourselves. We love them at once for being so.
quotes.author: Jerome K. Jerome

quotes.quote: We dare not trust our wit for making our house pleasant to our friend, so we buy ice cream.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Follow the best way of life you possibly can, and habit will make this way suitable and pleasant to you.
quotes.author: Leo Tolstoy

quotes.quote: All pleasantry should be short; and it might even be as well were the serious short also.
quotes.author: Voltaire

quotes.quote: It is most pleasant to commit a just action which is disagreeable to someone whom one does not like.
quotes.author: Victor Hugo

quotes.quote: Make yourselves nests of pleasant thoughts. None of us knows what fairy palaces we may build of beautiful thought-proof against all adversity. Bright fancies, satisfied memories, noble histories, faithful sayings, treasure houses of precious and restful thoughts, which care cannot disturb, nor pain make gloomy, nor poverty take away from us.
quotes.author: John Ruskin

quotes.quote: The pleasure we derive from doing favors is partly in the feeling it gives us that we are not altogether worthless. It is a pleasant surprise to ourselves.
quotes.author: Eric Hoffer

quotes.quote: Pleasant words are the food of love.
quotes.author: Ovid

quotes.quote: A kiss is just a pleasant reminder that two heads are better than one.
quotes.author: Author Unknown

quotes.quote: Take care that the face that looks out from the mirror in the morning is a pleasant face. You may not see it again during the day, but others will.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: The greatest pleasures are only narrowly separated from disgust.
quotes.author: Marcus Tullius Cicero

quotes.quote: Pleasure is labour too, and tires as much.
quotes.author: William Cowper

quotes.quote: Pleasure is none, if not diversified.
quotes.author: John Donne

quotes.quote: The pleasures of love are always in proportion to our fears.
quotes.author: Stendhal

quotes.quote: The highest pleasure is only consciousness of freedom from the deepest pain.
quotes.author: James Parton

quotes.quote: Pleasure is continually disappointed, reduced, deflated, in favor of strong, noble values: Truth, Death, Progress, Struggle, Joy, etc. Its victorious rival is Desire: we are always being told about Desire, never about Pleasure.
quotes.author: Roland Barthes

quotes.quote: Pleasure is the greatest incentive to evil.
quotes.author: Plato

quotes.quote: Enjoy present pleasures in such a way as not to injure future ones.
quotes.author: Seneca

quotes.quote: One half of the world cannot understand the pleasures of the other.
quotes.author: Jane Austen

quotes.quote: The chief part of a person's happiness consists of pleasure.
quotes.author: Thomas More

quotes.quote: Pleasure is the sun of the morning, the cloud of the meridian, and the storm of the evening.
quotes.author: William Scott Downey

quotes.quote: The choicest pleasures of life lie within the ring of moderation.
quotes.author: Martin Tupper

quotes.quote: We forget our pleasures, we remember our sufferings.
quotes.author: Marcus Tullius Cicero

quotes.quote: Pleasure is something you can easily lose the knack of, if you allow yourself to get out of practice.
quotes.author: Tom Holt

quotes.quote: We go on in our pleasures thinking they're going to last forever.
quotes.author: Billy Graham

quotes.quote: Draw your pleasure, paint your pleasure, and express your pleasure strongly.
quotes.author: Pierre Bonnard

quotes.quote: The greatest and noblest pleasure which men can have in this world is to discover new truths; and the next is to shake off old prejudices.
quotes.author: Frederick II of Prussia

quotes.quote: If one oversteps the bounds of moderation, the greatest pleasures cease to please.
quotes.author: Epictetus

quotes.quote: Our pleasures were simple - they included survival.
quotes.author: Dwight D. Eisenhower

quotes.quote: Pleasure can be supported by an illusion; but happiness rests upon truth.
quotes.author: Sébastien-Roch Nicolas

quotes.quote: Pleasures take to themselves wings and fly away; true knowledge remains forever.
quotes.author: Dorothea Dix

quotes.quote: The pleasures of the mighty are obtained by the tears of the poor.
quotes.author: Samuel Richardson

quotes.quote: If pleasures are greatest in anticipation, just remember that this is also true of trouble.
quotes.author: Elbert Hubbard

quotes.quote: Pleasure only starts once the worm has got into the fruit, to become delightful happiness must be tainted with poison.
quotes.author: Georges Bataille

quotes.quote: Pleasure's a sin, and sometimes sin's a pleasure.
quotes.author: Lord Byron

quotes.quote: A great pleasure in life is doing what people say you cannot do.
quotes.author: Walter Bagehot

quotes.quote: The pleasure we derive from the representation of the present is due, not only to the beauty it can be clothed in, but also to its essential quality of being the present.
quotes.author: Charles Baudelaire

quotes.quote: Pleasure is a sort of oblivion, a forgetfulness. Pain is remembrance, you cannot forget pain.
quotes.author: Bhagwan Shree Rajneesh

quotes.quote: Pleasure is a shadow, wealth is vanity, and power a pageant; but knowledge is ecstatic in enjoyment, perennial in frame, unlimited in space and indefinite in duration.
quotes.author: De Witt Clinton

quotes.quote: Poor is the man whose pleasures depend on the permission of another.
quotes.author: Madonna Ciccone

quotes.quote: On the battlefield, the military pledges to leave no soldier behind. As a nation, let it be our pledge that when they return home, we leave no veteran behind.
quotes.author: Dan Lipinski

quotes.quote: There is a pledge of the big and of the small in the infinite.
quotes.author: Dejan Stojanovic

quotes.quote: Not observation of a duty but liberty itself is the pledge that assures fidelity.
quotes.author: Ellen Key

quotes.quote: I make one pledge above all others - to seek and speak the truth with all the resources of mind and spirit I command.
quotes.author: George Mcgovern

quotes.quote: We cannot walk alone. And as we walk, we must make the pledge that we shall always march ahead. We cannot turn back.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King Jr.

quotes.quote: We pledge ourselves to liberate all our people from the continuing bondage of poverty, deprivation, suffering, gender and other discrimination.
quotes.author: Nelson Mandela

quotes.quote: Men should pledge themselves to nothing; for reflection makes a liar of their resolution.
quotes.author: Sophocles

quotes.quote: I make one pledge above all others - to seek and speak the truth with all the resources of mind and spirit I command.
quotes.author: George Mcgovern

quotes.quote: Loyalty is the pledge of truth to oneself and others.
quotes.author: Ada Velez

quotes.quote: Sometimes your pledges become your problems.
quotes.author: Amit Kalantri

quotes.quote: People who live up to their words shouldn't make blind promises.
quotes.author: Amit Kalantri

quotes.quote: A happy childhood is the pledge of a ripe manhood.
quotes.author: Amos Bronson Alcott

quotes.quote: The real promise in too many promises is a promise that I’m going to be disappointed.
quotes.author: Craig D. Lounsbrough

quotes.quote: Variety is the pledge that matter makes to living things.
quotes.author: Diane Ackerman

quotes.quote: Whenever you pledge your life, for your companion, you bind respect too. If you break it; you break with own hands your life, and respect.
quotes.author: Ehsan Sehgal

quotes.quote: A miracle that can never be: your face, your hands, pledged to me.
quotes.author: Julie Berry

quotes.quote: I pledge allegiance to the fair and balanced truth. Not the biased truth, Not the liest truth, But the highest truth.
quotes.author: Nas

quotes.quote: In our pledge every day, we pledge one Nation under God with liberty and justice for all.
quotes.author: Patrick J. Kennedy

quotes.quote: Before you pledge your undying love to someone, make them promise they won't die.
quotes.author: Robert Breault

quotes.quote: It is a pledge that senility has not the last say in everything.
quotes.author: Shane Leslie

quotes.quote: Don't fear to pledge. By winds the perjuries of love Are blown, null and void, across the land and farthest seas.
quotes.author: Tibullus

quotes.quote: No matter how explicit the pledge, people will turn and twist the text to suit their own purpose.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: The solemn pledge to abstain from telling the truth was called socialist realism.
quotes.author: Aleksandr Solzhenitsyn

quotes.quote: Pledge allegiance to the struggle.
quotes.author: Iggy Azalea

quotes.quote: The leader’s commandment is made up of pledges to solve local and global problems, and not to create more problems to add to the existing ones.
quotes.author: Israelmore Ayivor

quotes.quote: There is much more to being a patriot and a citizen than reciting the pledge or raising a flag.
quotes.author: Jesse Ventura

quotes.quote: It is now clear that faith is a singular pledge of paternal love, treasured up for the sons whom he has adopted.
quotes.author: John Calvin

quotes.quote: You only trust those who are absolutely like yourself, those who have signed a pledge of allegiance to this particular identity.
quotes.author: Judith Butler

quotes.quote: Moms, let's pledge to build each other up instead of tearing each other down.
quotes.author: Lysa Terkeurst

quotes.quote: Anyone who has ever taken out a mortgage will be unsurprised to learn that it is, literally, a death pledge.
quotes.author: Mark Forsyth

quotes.quote: A plumber is an adventurer who traces leaky pipes to their source.
quotes.author: Arthur Baer

quotes.quote: Anybody who has any doubt about the ingenuity or the resourcefulness of a plumber never got a bill from one.
quotes.author: George Meany

quotes.quote: Television is like the invention of indoor plumbing. It didn’t change people’s habits. It just kept them inside the house.
quotes.author: Alfred Hitchcock

quotes.quote: The society which scorns excellence in plumbing as a humble activity and tolerates shoddiness in philosophy because it is an exalted activity will have neither good plumbing nor good philosophy: neither its pipes nor its theories will hold water.
quotes.author: John W. Gardner

quotes.quote: Acting is not an important job in the scheme of things. Plumbing is.
quotes.author: Spencer Tracy

quotes.quote: As far as making a living, if plumbing earned more, I'd probably do it. At least you can leave the job at home once the tools are put away. A writer works in his mind 24/7.
quotes.author: James McBride

quotes.quote: One of my aims was to be paid as well as a plumber. Plumber was better-paid than any performance artist who was always doing this for free. It is so important to make a good living from art. You know, John Cage, until he was 60, he couldn't pay electricity.
quotes.author: Marina Abramovic

quotes.quote: I recommend my students not to be professional unless they really have to be. I tell them, 'If you love music, sell Hoovers or be a plumber. Do something useful with your life.'
quotes.author: Robert Fripp

quotes.quote: The practice of medicine is a thinker's art the practice of surgery a plumber's.
quotes.author: Martin H. Fischer

quotes.quote: A guy digging ditches or a plumber wiping joints - it solves problems, you know? You have to dig this hole so wide, so long, so deep. You dig it, and that's it.
quotes.author: Lee Marvin

quotes.quote: An American husband would never be at the office when the plumbing got clogged - he'd rush home to share it with his wife.
quotes.author: Stanley Shapiro

quotes.quote: There's a great career back on Earth for us in, eh.. plumbing.
quotes.author: Derek C.

quotes.quote: Everything I know about plumbing, I learned from playing Mario Brothers.
quotes.author: Jenji Kohan

quotes.quote: I mean, plumbing is just an extremely profitable hobby.
quotes.author: Howard Adler

quotes.quote: The more they overthink the plumbing, the easier it is to stop up the drain.
quotes.author: Gene Roddenberry

quotes.quote: I been fixing the plumbing in here for ten years. I ain't never had to wear no tie before.
quotes.author: Stephen King

quotes.quote: Looks like I'll never get away from plumbing. Working there by day and scrubbing here at night. My life goes by in bathrooms.
quotes.author: Frederick Hazlitt Brennan

quotes.quote: You take plumbing and woman's nature: they're both unpredictable and filled with hidden mysteries. All man can do is serve them properly so they flow the way they're designed to.
quotes.author: Alan Rudolph

quotes.quote: My creek in the rock set forth to install the plumbing / To some vessels He said 'supply', and 'drain' He said to others / And if there be a leakage / He commands the waters 'congeal!' / And they clot in obedience
quotes.author: Laulindah Shiku

quotes.quote: I'm so handy, you already know / I'll fix your plumbing when your toilets over flows / I'm so handy, I'll bring you up to code / When your dishwasher's about to explode
quotes.author: George Astasio

quotes.quote: They got new inventions coming / Stead of outdoor, indoor plumbing / I just blew in from the windy city / The windy city is mighty pretty
quotes.author: Paul Francis Webster

quotes.quote: Tired plumbing wakes me in the morning. / Shower runs hot, runs cold playing with me. / Well, I'm up for the down side
quotes.author: Ian Anderson

quotes.quote: Never done dream for a while, / The pipeline was blocked, / So I learnt and done a bit of plumbing. / They say tomorrow never dies, / But he forgot to tell you 'you can'.
quotes.author: Ed Sheeran

quotes.quote: The kind of girl who ain't afraid of nothing / She's independent she does her own plumbing
quotes.author: Bob Mcdill

quotes.quote: Plumbing often varies in the various different countries / I like to crouch down and turn on those bidets / I'll have a cocktail, pick at my fingernails / And then I'll squat down for a wash to end the day
quotes.author: Brad Roberts

quotes.quote: You'll see your mind expand and / Your perceptions grow more and more acute / And you can teach him plumbing and philosophy
quotes.author: Jerry Bock

quotes.quote: I'm just serving crack from house to house / I'm out here plumbing (yeah) / She swear she the real, but no deal (yeah)
quotes.author: Cody Osagie

quotes.quote: In the eyes of many lay people, plumber is simply someone who joins pipes together, running the water from one appliance to another.
quotes.author: R. D. Treloar

quotes.quote: Few people appear to give much consideration to the depth of knowledge required to carry out the basic plumbing skills, or the trained professional's need to have a full understanding of related activities.
quotes.author: R. D. Treloar

quotes.quote: In order to gain the respect you deserve as a professional in the field of plumbing, you have to show respect for the views of others.
quotes.author: R. D. Treloar

quotes.quote: I've never felt like I needed to change. I've always thought, If you want somebody different, pick somebody else.
quotes.author: Melissa McCarthy

quotes.quote: All I can say is that the only person that can stop you from achieving your goals is yourself. If you believe, then everyone else will too.
quotes.author: Denise Bidot

quotes.quote: I might have a little bit of cellulite. I might not be toned everywhere. I might struggle in this area or that. But accepting that just empowers me.
quotes.author: Kim Kardashian

quotes.quote: Plus-sized women shouldnt think of themselves as a size. They should think of themselves as women with rich goals in life. Size does'nt mean, really, anything. You can carry your size with pride and dress in a way that you like.
quotes.author: Donatella Versace

quotes.quote: Beauty is not defined by the size of you jeans.
quotes.author: Liv Tyler

quotes.quote: Beauty depends on size as well as symmetry. No very small animal can be beautiful, for looking at it takes so small a portion of time that the impression of it will be confused. Nor can any very large one, for a whole view of it cannot be had at once.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: Women always seemed to bring the size they wished they were to the fitting room, rather than the size that would actually fit.
quotes.author: Ann Brashares

quotes.quote: Growing up, I never accepted my curves, but when I got the opportunity to become a plus size model, I was able to appreciate my voluptuous body and love myself, not only on the outside, but on the inside.
quotes.author: Hayley Hasselhoff

quotes.quote: People think plus-size models don't exercise - we do! But it's about health, not forcing my body to be something it's not meant to be.
quotes.author: Robyn

quotes.quote: I was really tired of words like plus size, round and large. I thought, Come on, we're fat.
quotes.author: Kirstie Alley

quotes.quote: Pluto's orbit is so elongated that it crosses the orbit of another planet. Now that's... you've got no business doing that if you want to call yourself a planet. Come on, now! There's something especially transgressive about that.
quotes.author: Neil deGrasse Tyson

quotes.quote: Pluto is so unlike any planet we've ever visited. It's this strange little duck, sitting out there, this mixture of rock and ice but with an atmosphere. There is so much to learn about this planet.
quotes.author: Bill Gibson

quotes.quote: I’ve always liked Saturn. But I also have some sympathy for Pluto because I heard it’s been downgraded from a planet, and I think it should remain a planet. Once you’ve given something planetary status it’s kind of mean to take it away.
quotes.author: Jared Leto

quotes.quote: Pluto has always been a problem because it's less massive than the moon...and it's only about one 500th as massive as the Earth. So is it just a rock or is it a real planet?
quotes.author: Donald Schneider

quotes.quote: Of course Pluto is a planet: It's massive enough to have its shape controlled by gravity rather than material strength, which is the hallmark of planethood.
quotes.author: Alan Stern

quotes.quote: Pluto is still active four and a half billion years into its history. It was expected that small planets like Pluto would cool off long ago and not still be showing geological activity. Pluto is, in fact, showing numerous examples of geological activity on a massive scale across the planet.
quotes.author: Alan Stern

quotes.quote: If, as our new Hubble images indicate, Pluto has not one, but two or three moons, it will become the first body in the Kuiper Belt known to have more than one satellite.
quotes.author: Hal Weaver

quotes.quote: Pluto is showing us a diversity of landforms and complexity of processes that rival anything we've seen in the solar system.
quotes.author: Alan Stern

quotes.quote: The planets. Now footnote, I'm including Pluto in the planets, because I think it's terrible what they did to Pluto. And it's still a planet to me. I grew up with Pluto as a planet, it will always be a planet.
quotes.author: Demetri Martin

quotes.quote: What we know about Pluto today could fit on the back of a postage stamp. The textbooks will be rewritten after this mission is completed.
quotes.author: Colleen Hartman

quotes.quote: As my colleague, the physical chemist Peter Atkins, puts it, we must be equally agnostic about the theory that there is a teapot in orbrit around the planet Pluto. We can't disprove it. But that doesn't mean the theory that there is a teapot is on level terms with the theory that there isn't.
quotes.author: Richard Dawkins

quotes.quote: If you slid Pluto to where Earth is right now, heat from the sun would evaporate that ice, and it would grow a tail. Now that's no kind of behavior for a planet.
quotes.author: Neil deGrasse Tyson

quotes.quote: Pluto is a dynamic example of what we might call an anti-greenhouse effect.
quotes.author: Mark Gurwell

quotes.quote: Pluto's warm-up is a reminder that no matter where you are climate happens. It always has, it always will - with or without SUVs. And it should remind us to continue taking with an ever-increasing grain of salt these claims that your car acts as a weather machine.
quotes.author: Chris Horner

quotes.quote: It's strictly coincidental that Pluto of course was named for the god of the underworld and we're describing these Halloween moons
quotes.author: Alan Stern

quotes.quote: Pluto is a treasure trove of scientific information waiting to be discovered.
quotes.author: Andrew Dantzler

quotes.quote: Empty pockets make empty heads.
quotes.author: William Carlos Williams

quotes.quote: Build pockets of stillness into your life.
quotes.author: Maria Popova

quotes.quote: A little in one's own pocket is better than much in another man's purse.
quotes.author: Miguel de Cervantes

quotes.quote: The emptiness of your pocket is not a recipe for you to discount the value of your passion!
quotes.author: Israelmore Ayivor

quotes.quote: Empty pockets never held anyone back. Only empty heads and empty hearts can do that.
quotes.author: Norman Vincent Peale

quotes.quote: Reaching into someone else's pocket to assist one's fellow man hardly qualifies as charity.
quotes.author: Walter E. Williams

quotes.quote: He who fills His pockets with the Rocks of Misdeeds shall surely sink in the River of Good Fortune.
quotes.author: Jim Davis

quotes.quote: You can go with an empty pocket and come back heavily loaded if you allow your passion to escort you!
quotes.author: Israelmore Ayivor

quotes.quote: Money is always there but the pockets change; it is not in the same pockets after a change, and that is all there is to say about money.
quotes.author: Gertrude Stein

quotes.quote: The traveller with empty pockets will sing in the thief 's face.
quotes.author: Juvenal

quotes.quote: Poverty is not what’s in your pocket – its what you have in your head.
quotes.author: John Hope Bryant

quotes.quote: The true wealth of a man is not what's in his pocket, but what's in his heart.
quotes.author: Unarine Ramaru

quotes.quote: Don't plan with what is in your pocket; plan with what is in God's pocket.
quotes.author: Reinhard Bonnke

quotes.quote: An expansive life, one not constrained by four walls, requires as well an expansive pocket.
quotes.author: Anton Chekhov

quotes.quote: It's no use filling your pocket with money if you have got a hole in the corner.
quotes.author: George Eliot

quotes.quote: A rich person who has no love in his heart is poorer than a poor person who has no money in his pocket.
quotes.author: Debasish Mridha

quotes.quote: We need a coat with two pockets. In one pocket there is dust, and in the other pocket there is gold. We need a coat with two pockets to remind us who we are.
quotes.author: Parker Palmer

quotes.quote: May your pockets be heavy and your heart be light. May good luck pursue you each morning and night.
quotes.author: Irish Blessings

quotes.quote: Pockets have long been a male/female divide.
quotes.author: Christina Binkley

quotes.quote: The heart contracts as the pocket expands.
quotes.author: Christian Nestell Bovee

quotes.quote: A man's looks are measured by the depth of his pockets.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Aston

quotes.quote: Its easier to feel a little more spiritual with a couple of bucks in your pocket.
quotes.author: Craig Ferguson

quotes.quote: Take your hands out of your pocket, because life may push you hardly at any time!
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.quote: The appeal to the white man's pocket has ever been more effectual than all the appeals ever made to his conscience.
quotes.author: Ida B. Wells

quotes.quote: With some money in your pocket you walk confidently, you talk confidently and you work confidently.
quotes.author: Amit Kalantri

quotes.quote: Another is, if you take money out of your left pocket and put it in your right pocket, you're no richer.
quotes.author: Merton Miller

quotes.quote: Assets put money in your pocket, whether you work or not, and liabilities take money from your pocket.
quotes.author: Robert Kiyosaki

quotes.quote: When power leads man toward arrogance, poetry reminds him of his limitations. When power narrows the area of man's concern, poetry reminds him of the richness and diversity of existence. When power corrupts, poetry cleanses.
quotes.author: John F. Kennedy

quotes.quote: A poem begins as a lump in the throat, a sense of wrong, a homesickness, a lovesickness.
quotes.author: Robert Frost

quotes.quote: Poetry is the opening and closing of a door, leaving those who look through to guess about what is seen during the moment.
quotes.author: Carl Sandburg

quotes.quote: Poetry heals the wounds inflicted by reason.
quotes.author: Novalis

quotes.quote: Poetry is the language in which man explores his own amazement.
quotes.author: Christopher Fry

quotes.quote: Poetry is thoughts that breathe, and words that burn.
quotes.author: Thomas Gray

quotes.quote: Poetry can be dangerous, especially beautiful poetry, because it gives the illusion of having had the experience without actually going through it.
quotes.author: Rumi

quotes.quote: Poetry is what in a poem makes you laugh, cry, prickle, be silent, makes your toe nails twinkle, makes you want to do this or that or nothing, makes you know that you are alone in the unknown world, that your bliss and suffering is forever shared and forever all your own.
quotes.author: Dylan Thomas

quotes.quote: Poetry is ordinary language raised to the Nth power. Poetry is boned with ideas, nerved and blooded with emotions, all held together by the delicate, tough skin of words.
quotes.author: Paul Engle

quotes.quote: Poetry, whose material is language, is perhaps the most human and least worldly of the arts, the one in which the end product remains closest to the thought that inspired it.
quotes.author: Hannah Arendt

quotes.quote: Poetry is, above all, an approach to the truth of feeling . . .. A fine poem will seize your imagination intellectually - that is, when you reach it, you will reach it intellectually too, but the way is through emotion, through what we call feeling.
quotes.author: Muriel Rukeyser

quotes.quote: Poetry is not a turning loose of emotion, but an escape from emotion; it is not the expression of personality, but an escape from personality. But, of course, only those who have personality and emotions know what it means to want to escape from these things.
quotes.author: T.S. Eliot

quotes.quote: Poetry is the journal of a sea animal living on land, wanting to fly in the air.
quotes.author: Carl Sandburg

quotes.quote: Poetry is, at bottom, a criticism of life.
quotes.author: Matthew Arnold

quotes.quote: In this poor body, composed of one hundred bones and nine openings, is something called spirit, a flimsy curtain swept this way and that by the slightest breeze. It is spirit, such as it is, which led me to poetry, at first little more than a pastime, then the full business of my life. There have been times when my spirit, so dejected, almost gave up the quest, other times when it was proud, triumphant. So it has been from the very start, never finding peace with itself, always doubting the worth of what it makes.
quotes.author: Basho

quotes.quote: Poetry should be great and unobtrusive, a thing which enters into one's soul, and does not startle it or amaze it with itself, but with its subject
quotes.author: John Keats

quotes.quote: Poetry, like the moon, does not advertise anything.
quotes.author: William Blisset

quotes.quote: Poetry is perfect verbs hunting for elusive nouns.
quotes.author: J. Patrick Lewis

quotes.quote: Poetry is finer and more philosophical than history; for poetry expresses the universal, and history only the particular.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: Poetry is not an expression of the party line. It's that time of night, lying in bed, thinking what you really think, making the private world public, that's what the poet does.
quotes.author: Allen Ginsberg

quotes.quote: In science one tries to tell people, in such a way as to be understood by everyone, something that no one ever knew before. But in poetry, it's the exact opposite.
quotes.author: Franz Kafka

quotes.quote: Poetry is either something that lives like fire inside you --like music to the musician or Marxism to the Communist --or else it is nothing, an empty formalized bore around which pedants can endlessly drone their notes and explanations.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Poetry implies the whole truth, philosophy expresses only a particle of it.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: I don't see how poetry can ever be easy... Real poetry, the thick, dense, intense, complicated stuff that lives and endures, requires blood sweat; blood and sweat are essential elements in poetry as well as behind it.
quotes.author: Edward Abbey

quotes.quote: Poetry is the impish attempt to paint the color of the wind.
quotes.author: Maxwell Bodenheim

quotes.quote: An age which is incapable of poetry is incapable of any kind of literature except the cleverness of a decadence.
quotes.author: Raymond Chandler

quotes.quote: Poetry is indispensable --if I only knew what for.
quotes.author: Jean Cocteau

quotes.quote: Poetry must have something in it that is barbaric, vast and wild.
quotes.author: Denis Diderot

quotes.quote: Poetry is the universal language which the heart holds with nature and itself. He who has a contempt for poetry, cannot have much respect for himself, or for anything else.
quotes.author: William Hazlitt

quotes.quote: The object, Truth, or the satisfaction of the intellect, and the object, Passion, or the excitement of the heart, are, although attainable, to a certain extent, in poetry, far more readily attainable in prose.
quotes.author: Edgar Allan Poe

quotes.quote: Some old wounds never truly heal, and bleed again at the slightest word.
quotes.author: G.R.R. Martin

quotes.quote: It hurts when you have someone in your heart, but you can't have them in your arms.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Sadness grieves the spirit. But sorrow refines soul.
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: It's a time of sorrow and sadness when we lose a loss of life.
quotes.author: George W. Bush

quotes.quote: Sadness is always the legacy of the past; regrets are pains of the memory.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: The only real sadness, the only real failure, the only great tragedy in life, is not to become a saint.
quotes.author: Leon Bloy

quotes.quote: Sadness is the heart withdrawing to seek shelter from the pain.
quotes.author: Richelle E. Goodrich

quotes.quote: Tears shed for another person are not a sign of weakness. They are a sign of a pure heart.
quotes.author: Jose N Harris

quotes.quote: The sadness of the world has different ways of getting to people, but it seems to succeed almost every time.
quotes.author: Louis-Ferdinand Celine

quotes.quote: Sorrow is one of the vibrations that prove the fact of living.
quotes.author: Antoine de Saint-Exupéry

quotes.quote: To hurt is as human as to breathe.
quotes.author: J.K. Rowling

quotes.quote: In deep sadness there is no place for sentimentality.
quotes.author: William S. Burroughs

quotes.quote: All of our unhappiness comes from our inability to be alone.
quotes.author: Jean de la Bruyère

quotes.quote: Sadness does not inhere in things; it does not reach us from the world and through mere contemplation of the world. It is a product of our own thought. We create it out of whole cloth.
quotes.author: Emile Durkheim

quotes.quote: Sadness flies away on the wings of time.
quotes.author: Jean de la Fontaine

quotes.quote: Sadness flies on the wings of the morning and out of the heart of darkness comes the light.
quotes.author: Jean Giraudoux

quotes.quote: Every life has a measure of sorrow and sometimes that is what awakens us.
quotes.author: Steven Tyler

quotes.quote: Sadness gives depth. Happiness gives height. Sadness gives roots. Happiness gives branches. Happiness is like a tree going into the sky, and sadness is like the roots going down into the womb of the earth. Both are needed, and the higher a tree goes, the deeper it goes, simultaneously. The bigger the tree, the bigger will be its roots. In fact, it is always in proportion. That's its balance.
quotes.author: Osho

quotes.quote: Melancholy is the pleasure of being sad.
quotes.author: Victor Hugo

quotes.quote: The keenest sorrow is to recognize ourselves as the sole cause of all our adversities.
quotes.author: Sophocles

quotes.quote: This genuine heart of sadness can teach us great compassion. It can humble us when we're arrogant and soften us when we are unkind.
quotes.author: Pema Chodron

quotes.quote: There's no happiness in a situation where there's disparity.
quotes.author: Hermann J Steinherr

quotes.quote: So much sadness exists in the world that we are all under obligation to contribute as much joy as lies within our powers.
quotes.author: John Sutherland Bonnel

quotes.quote: Sadness usually results from one of the following causes either when a man does not succeed, or is ashamed of his success.
quotes.author: Seneca

quotes.quote: Life's missed opportunities, at the end, may seem more poignant to us than those we embraced because in our imagination they have a perfection that reality can never rival.
quotes.author: Roger Ebert

quotes.quote: To die is poignantly bitter, but the idea of having to die without having lived is unbearable.
quotes.author: Erich Fromm

quotes.quote: A feeling of sadness and longing, that is not akin to pain, and resembles sorrow only as the mist resembles the rain.
quotes.author: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow

quotes.quote: Some of us think that holding on makes us strong, but sometimes it's letting go.
quotes.author: Herman Hesse

quotes.quote: Sadness is almost never anything but a form of fatigue.
quotes.author: Andre Gide

quotes.quote: Nobody wants to be depressed everybody's trying to feel better; when they strive and fail, it's all the more poignant.
quotes.author: Joel Kinnaman

quotes.quote: If there is any one secret of success, it lies in the ability to get the other person's point of view and see things from that person's angle as well as from your own.
quotes.author: Henry Ford

quotes.quote: We cling to our own point of view, as though everything depended on it. Yet our opinions have no permanence; like autumn and winter, they gradually pass away.
quotes.author: Zhuangzi

quotes.quote: Style is the perfection of a point of view.
quotes.author: Richard Eberhart

quotes.quote: A point of view can be a dangerous luxury when substituted for insight and understanding.
quotes.author: Marshall McLuhan

quotes.quote: You cannot live your life looking at yourself from someone else's point of view.
quotes.author: Penelope Cruz

quotes.quote: The best teacher is experience and not through someone's distorted point of view.
quotes.author: Jack Kerouac

quotes.quote: It is a narrow mind which cannot look at a subject from various points of view.
quotes.author: George Eliot

quotes.quote: The most fatal illusion is the settled point of view. Since life is growth and motion, a fixed point of view kills anybody who has one.
quotes.author: Brooks Atkinson

quotes.quote: There is no absolute point of view from which real and ideal can be finally separated and labelled.
quotes.author: T. S. Eliot

quotes.quote: You can't see other people's point of view when you have only one language.
quotes.author: Frank Smith

quotes.quote: The worldly person is insane from the point of view of the spiritual person.
quotes.author: Robert Thurman

quotes.quote: Some people have got a mental horizon of radius zero and call it their point of view.
quotes.author: David Hilbert

quotes.quote: In his ignorance of the whole truth, each person maintains his own arrogant point of view.
quotes.author: Gautama Buddha

quotes.quote: Any point of view reflects some side of truth and must not claim that it is complete.
quotes.author: Anatoliy Obraztsov

quotes.quote: Your point of view sets you up well in advance for how you view the events as they unfold.
quotes.author: Mary Anne Radmacher

quotes.quote: I've always felt that a person's intelligence is directly reflected by the number of conflicting points of view he can entertain simultaneously on the same topic.
quotes.author: Abigail Adams

quotes.quote: Nothing's beautiful from every point of view.
quotes.author: Horace

quotes.quote: You never really understand a person until you consider things from his point of view.
quotes.author: Harper Lee

quotes.quote: Seeing things from a different point of view can help us understand why other people act the way they do. We too often judge people without having all the facts.
quotes.author: Sean Covey

quotes.quote: There is nothing insignificant in the world. It all depends on the point of view.
quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.quote: A simple rule in dealing with those who are hard to get along with is to remember that this person is striving to assert his superiority; and you must deal with him from that point of view.
quotes.author: Alfred Adler

quotes.quote: Representation of the world, like the world itself, is the work of men; they describe it from their own point of view, which they confuse with absolute truth.
quotes.author: Simone De Beauvoir

quotes.quote: Never underestimate how extraordinarily difficult it is to understand a situation from another person's point of view.
quotes.author: Eleanor Catton

quotes.quote: Sometimes inspiration just requires looking at things from a different point of view.
quotes.author: Aaron Hartzler

quotes.quote: Equality and development will not be achieved however if peace is not understood from women's' point of view.
quotes.author: Jenny Shipley

quotes.quote: As you change your point of view, your views bring about a change in you.
quotes.author: George Alexiou

quotes.quote: Once you've seen there is another perspective, you can never not see that there's another point of view.
quotes.author: Ellen Langer

quotes.quote: We begin to learn wisely when we're willing to see world from other people's perspective.
quotes.author: Toba Beta

quotes.quote: Changing your attitude from self-centerdness to understanding requires desire and commitment to always try to see things from the other persons point of view.
quotes.author: John C. Maxwell

quotes.quote: I detest the masculine point of view. I am bored by his heroism, virtue, and honour. I think the best these men can do is not talk about themselves anymore.
quotes.author: Virginia Woolf

quotes.quote: Of all the parts of your body, be most vigilant over your index finger, for it is blame-thirsty. A pointed finger is a victim’s logo.
quotes.author: Joseph Brodsky

quotes.quote: Some of us have become so addicted to pointing fingers at others for all the wrong that happens in our lives that self-assessment has become synonymous with blaming the victim.
quotes.author: LZ Granderson

quotes.quote: Never point a finger where you never lent a hand.
quotes.author: Robert Brault

quotes.quote: When a man points a finger at someone else, he should remember that four of his fingers are pointing at himself.
quotes.author: Louis Nizer

quotes.quote: All of us should be much more humble and contrite when we point the finger at somebody else, because four more fingers are pointing back at us.
quotes.author: Michael Eric Dyson

quotes.quote: When we assign blame we are pointing the finger to who or what is responsible for a fault or for a wrong doing. We are trying to make others accountable. Blaming does not solve a problem it usually only makes people defensive.
quotes.author: Catherine Pulsifer

quotes.quote: ‎When you point your finger at someone, anyone, it is often a moment of judgement. We point our fingers when we want to scold someone, point out what they have done wrong. But each time we point, we simultaneously point three fingers back at ourselves.
quotes.author: Christopher Pike

quotes.quote: No snowflake in an avalanche ever feels responsible.
quotes.author: Voltaire

quotes.quote: Most of us can read the writing on the wall; we just assume it's addressed to someone else.
quotes.author: Ivern Ball

quotes.quote: Blaming is pointing out there, rather than in here, into your own mind, when you find yourself in a painful or uncomfortable experience. Blame means shifting the responsibility for where you are onto someone or something else, rather than accepting responsibility for your role in the experience.
quotes.author: Iyanla Vanzant

quotes.quote: If you could kick the person in the pants responsible for most of your trouble, you wouldn't sit for a month.
quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.quote: We are taught you must blame your father, your sisters, your brothers, the school, the teachers - but never blame yourself. It's never your fault. But it's always your fault, because if you wanted to change you're the one who has got to change.
quotes.author: Katharine Hepburn

quotes.quote: One of the annoying things about believing in free will and individual responsibility is the difficulty of finding somebody to blame your problems on. And when you do find somebody, it's remarkable how often his picture turns up on your driver's license.
quotes.author: P.J. O'Rourke

quotes.quote: Blame is just a lazy person’s way of making sense of chaos.
quotes.author: Douglas Coupland

quotes.quote: Men are forever pointing at others, which is why I always follow the knuckle and not the nail.
quotes.author: R. Scott Bakker

quotes.quote: FOREFINGER, n. The finger commonly used in pointing out two malefactors.
quotes.author: Ambrose Bierce

quotes.quote: Stop pointing fingers and placing blame on others. Your life can only change to the degree that you accept responsibility for it.
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: Clean your finger before you point at my spots.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: I think that the most politically correct finger-pointing that anyone can ever do is to finger-point while standing in front of a really big mirror.
quotes.author: Craig D. Lounsbrough

quotes.quote: When you point your finger at someone, look where the other fingers point.
quotes.author: Jamaican Proverb

quotes.quote: Never point out the mistakes of another with a dirty finger.
quotes.author: Italian Proverb

quotes.quote: The one who points his fingers has three pointing back at him.
quotes.author: Native American Proverb

quotes.quote: Everybody wants to take responsibility when you win, but when you fail, all these fingers are pointing.
quotes.author: Mike Krzyzewski

quotes.quote: Wherever you find a problem, you will usually find the finger-pointing of blame. Society is addicted to playing the victim.
quotes.author: Stephen Covey

quotes.quote: It's always the ones with the dirty hands pointing the fingers.
quotes.author: Sonya Teclai

quotes.quote: You take your life in your own hands, and what happens? A terrible thing: no one to blame.
quotes.author: Erica Jong

quotes.quote: The man who smiles when things go wrong has thought of someone to blame it on.
quotes.author: Robert Bloch

quotes.quote: Responsibility: A detachable burden easily shifted to the shoulders of God, Fate, Fortune, Luck or one's neighbor. In the days of astrology it was customary to unload it upon a star.
quotes.author: Ambrose Bierce

quotes.quote: Don't focus on the speck in your brother's eye while ignoring the log in your own eye.
quotes.author: Jesus in Matthew 7:5

quotes.quote: Blame is for God and small children.
quotes.author: Dustin Hoffman

quotes.quote: Our diversity is our strength. What a dull and pointless life it would be if everyone was the same.
quotes.author: Angelina Jolie

quotes.quote: Quality without results is pointless. Results without quality is boring.
quotes.author: Johan Cruyff

quotes.quote: In social matters, pointless conventions are not merely the bee sting of etiquette, but the snake bite of moral order.
quotes.author: Florence King

quotes.quote: It's pointless to have a nice clean desk, because it means you're not doing anything.
quotes.author: Michio Kaku

quotes.quote: In sum, thought and reflection have been rendered thoroughly pointless by the circumstances in which modern men and women live and act.
quotes.author: Jacques Ellul

quotes.quote: Weekends don’t count unless you spend them doing something completely pointless.
quotes.author: Bill Watterson

quotes.quote: The Internet is so big, so powerful and pointless that for some people it is a complete substitute for life.
quotes.author: Andrew Brown

quotes.quote: Do something with what you learn.... Reading, listening and learning is pointless without doing, applying, sharing or implementing.
quotes.author: Maarten Albarda

quotes.quote: It is pointless to believe what you see, if you only see what you believe.
quotes.author: Marie Lu

quotes.quote: Don't pointless things have a place, too, in this far-from-perfect world?
quotes.author: Haruki Murakami

quotes.quote: There came a time when you realized that moving on was pointless. That you took yourself with you wherever you went.
quotes.author: Stephen King

quotes.quote: If you have no intention of loving or being loved, the whole journey is pointless.
quotes.author: Kate Dicamillo

quotes.quote: It's the pointless things that give your life meaning. Friendship, compassion, art, love. All of them pointless. But they're what keeps life from being meaningless.
quotes.author: Tim Winton

quotes.quote: Telling someone something he does not understand is pointless, even if you add that he will not be able to understand it.
quotes.author: Ludwig Wittgenstein

quotes.quote: The more the universe seems comprehensible, the more it also seems pointless.
quotes.author: Steven Weinberg

quotes.quote: Life and love are life and love, a bunch of violets is a bunch of violets, and to drag in the idea of a point is to ruin everything. Live and let live, love and let love, flower and fade, and follow the natural curve, which flows on, pointless.
quotes.author: D. H. Lawrence

quotes.quote: All pursuits are pointless and fruitless unless and until love and compassion are found and then are the foundation and destination of all you do
quotes.author: Rasheed Ogunlaru

quotes.quote: Change without learning is painful. Learning without change is pointless.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Small moments we find so pointless can become cherished memories with time and the perspective that wisdom brings.
quotes.author: Brandy Nacole

quotes.quote: If we are incapable of finding peace in ourselves, it is pointless to search elsewhere.
quotes.author: Francois de la Rochefoucauld

quotes.quote: Those pointless equations, to which no solution exists, are called absurdities.
quotes.author: Steig Larsson

quotes.quote: We cannot bear a pointless torment, but we can endure great pain if we believe that it's purposeful.
quotes.author: Andrew Solomon

quotes.quote: It is equally pointless to weep because we won't be alive a hundred years from now as that we were not here a hundred years ago.
quotes.author: Michel de Montaigne

quotes.quote: How pointless life could be, what a foolish business of inventing things to love, just so you could dread losing them.
quotes.author: Barbara Kingsolver

quotes.quote: A personality for the incredibly beautiful can be a pointless cargo…
quotes.author: Russell Brand

quotes.quote: It's pointless to be critical of your stuff once it's done. I don't spend a lot of time agonising over it. It's of no importance once it's finished.
quotes.author: Paul Simon

quotes.quote: To make a point, is to be blunt, which is pointless.
quotes.author: Bob McMahan

quotes.quote: Please remember, no matter what you go through in life, somebody else might have it harder. So just appreciate. I feel like in our world today, we focus on so many things that are completely pointless.
quotes.author: Jessica Simpson

quotes.quote: The inability of some critics to connect the dots doesn't make pointillism pointless.
quotes.author: Georges Seurat

quotes.quote: Kinda pointless to fight for what you want when what you want continues to break your heart.
quotes.author: Molly McAdams

quotes.quote: Holding onto anger is like drinking poison and expecting the other person to die.
quotes.author: Buddha

quotes.quote: Where the poison wind blows a deadly plague spreading negativity, viciously unto every city.
quotes.author: Louis Eric Barrier

quotes.quote: one pain is cured by another. catch some new infection in your eye and the poison of the old one would die
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: The poison came in liquid, she was naked all the time.
quotes.author: Tom Petty

quotes.quote: What is food to one man may be fierce poison to others.
quotes.author: Lucretius

quotes.quote: The poison of selfishness destroys the world.
quotes.author: Catherine Of Siena

quotes.quote: We poison our lives with fear of burglary and shipwreck, and, ask anyone, the house is never burgled, and the ship never goes down.
quotes.author: Jean Anouilh

quotes.quote: One of the most healing things you can do is recognize where in your life you are your own poison.
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: There are poisons that blind you, and poisons that open your eyes.
quotes.author: August Strindberg

quotes.quote: Illness is the result of improper removal of toxins from the body. Oxygen is the vital factor which assists the body in removing toxins.
quotes.author: Ed McCabe

quotes.quote: The poison dart hidden in the raisin tart.
quotes.author: Christopher Paolini

quotes.quote: The world could bring you poison in a jewelled cup, or surprising gifts. Sometimes you didn't know which of them it was.
quotes.author: Guy Gavriel Kay

quotes.quote: Don't show a friend your gift, or your bag of money if you still want to maintain your relationship, but if nay, go on, and all you'll see is hate and jealousy, and you'll fight with him in the street like a dog and all you'll feel is regret.
quotes.author: Michael Bassey Johnson

quotes.quote: All things are poisons, for there is nothing without poisonous qualities. It is only the dose which makes a thing poison.
quotes.author: Paracelsus

quotes.quote: There is poison in the fang of the serpent, in the mouth of the fly and in the sting of a scorpion; but the wicked man is saturated with it.
quotes.author: Chanakya

quotes.quote: The poison of skepticism becomes, like alcoholism, tuberculosis, and some other diseases, much more virulent in a hitherto virgin soil.
quotes.author: Simone Weil

quotes.quote: The poison leaves bit by bit, not all at once. Be patient. You are healing.
quotes.author: Yasmin Mogahed

quotes.quote: Snake's poison is life to the snake; it is in relation to man that it means death.
quotes.author: Rumi

quotes.quote: Revolutionary war is an antitoxin which not only eliminates the enemy's poison but also purges us of our own filth.
quotes.author: Mao Zedong

quotes.quote: Fear has the role we give it. We are able to empower or poison ourselves to whatever degree we want. This is the beauty of our design.
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: Everything is toxic. That's the point. You can't avoid toxins. Thinking you can is just another symptom of the toxic overload stage.
quotes.author: Jane Smiley

quotes.quote: Toxic people sell you short. When you listen to them, you give them power, that's when you sell yourself short.
quotes.author: Tony Curl

quotes.quote: Poison is in everything, and no thing is without poison. The dosage makes it either a poison or a remedy.
quotes.author: Paracelsus

quotes.quote: Poison. The perfect weapon for a snake.
quotes.author: Suzanne Collins

quotes.quote: Not all poison was bitter. Some of the deadliest poisons in the world tasted sweet; they were that much more dangerous because of it.
quotes.author: Nenia Campbell

quotes.quote: A little poison now and then: that makes for pleasant dreams. And a lot of poison at the end, for a pleasant death.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.quote: Toxic remnants of war represent a profound challenge for the protection of public health and the restoration of the environment in countries affected by conflict.
quotes.author: Widad Akrawi

quotes.quote: Poison cannot penetrate the hand that is free of wounds.
quotes.author: Thich Nhat Hanh

quotes.quote: When poison becomes a habit, it ceases to injure: make your soul gradually acquainted with death.
quotes.author: Saib Tabrizi

quotes.quote: Be careful what you say for you can never take back the poison you threw.
quotes.author: Joyce Guo

quotes.quote: Poking fun at other people's beliefs, while it may seem frivolous and offensive, is a non-negotiable right. It is a principle that underpins free speech, the basis for progress.
quotes.author: Maajid Nawaz

quotes.quote: Good humor pokes fun at the powerful â€” not the weak.
quotes.author: Mitali Perkins

quotes.quote: The biggest fool is one who minds the business of others rather than minding his very own.
quotes.author: Amit Abraham

quotes.quote: If you've got dots before your eyes, it's time to stop poking your eyes with a pencil.
quotes.author: Anthony T. Hincks

quotes.quote: There are two kinds of teachers: the kind that fill you with so much quail shot that you can't move, and the kind that just gives you a little prod behind and you jump to the skies.
quotes.author: Robert Frost

quotes.quote: Contempt is a dangerous emotion, luring us into believing that we understand more than we do. Contempt causes us to jeer rather than speak, to poke at rather than touch.
quotes.author: Scott Spencer

quotes.quote: Pride and curiosity are the two scourges of our souls. The latter prompts us to poke our noses into everything, and the former forbids us to leave anything unresolved and undecided.
quotes.author: Michel de Montaigne

quotes.quote: It's easy to poke fun at the world and think yourself clever, but it's much harder to stand silent and endure.
quotes.author: Jessica Cluess

quotes.quote: You may poke a man's fire after you've known him for seven years.
quotes.author: English Proverb

quotes.quote: The future belongs to the curious. The ones who are not afraid to try it, explore it, poke at it, question it and turn it inside out.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Sometimes you have to poke holes in the darkness until it bleeds light.
quotes.author: Margaret Feinberg

quotes.quote: When you're really close to someone, they can make fun of you a lot and get away with it. But they sort of poke you in all of the right places.
quotes.author: Ian Somerhalder

quotes.quote: It's easier to poke holes in an idea than think of ways to fill them. And it's easier to focus on the 100 reasons you shouldn't do something rather than the one reason you should.
quotes.author: Wendy Kopp

quotes.quote: It would be ugly to watch people poking sticks at a caged rat. It is uglier still to watch rats poking sticks at a caged person.
quotes.author: Jean Harris

quotes.quote: Smile, it's better than a poke in the eye.
quotes.author: Douglas Horton

quotes.quote: Life is a buzzer box. Poke it.
quotes.author: Seth Godin

quotes.quote: The dream begins, most of the time, with a teacher who believes in you, who tugs and pushes and leads you on to the next plateau, sometimes poking you with a sharp stick called truth.
quotes.author: Dan Rather

quotes.quote: To poke a wood fire is more solid enjoyment than almost anything else in the world.
quotes.author: Charles Dudley Warner

quotes.quote: There's something that doesn't make sense. Let's go and poke it with a stick.
quotes.author: Steven Moffat

quotes.quote: The pen is mightier than the sword, if you know where to poke it.
quotes.author: Jeremy C. Shipp

quotes.quote: We can never be a nation of snobs so long as we are willing to poke fun at ourselves.
quotes.author: Edgar Wilson Nye

quotes.quote: When moral superiority combines with billowing ignorance, they fill up a hot-air balloon that's awfully hard not to poke.
quotes.author: Barbara Kingsolver

quotes.quote: The only good imitations are those that poke fun at bad originals.
quotes.author: Francois de la Rochefoucauld

quotes.quote: Research is formalized curiosity. It is poking and prying with a purpose.
quotes.author: Zora Neale Hurston

quotes.quote: In the land of the blind, the one-eyed man will poke out his eye to fit in.
quotes.author: Caitlin Kiernan

quotes.quote: Remember, people who peek through keyholes have to expect an occasional poke in the eye.
quotes.author: Gary K. Wolf

quotes.quote: A stranger stabs you in the front. A friend stabs you in the back. A boyfriend stabs you in the heart. Best friends poke each other with straws.
quotes.author: Author Unknown

quotes.quote: In life there will always be people out the to judge you and poke fingers at you. Show them that we are all human and that the other three fingers are poking back at them.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Fold or Make them fold. Don't show all your cards in each game.
quotes.author: Pooja Garg

quotes.quote: Poker is a skill game pretending to be a chance game.
quotes.author: James Altucher

quotes.quote: Poker is not a game in which the meek inherit the earth.
quotes.author: David Hayano

quotes.quote: Both poker and investing are games of incomplete information. You have a certain set of facts and you are looking for situations where you have an edge, whether the edge is psychological or statistical.
quotes.author: David Einhorn

quotes.quote: Every poker player, like every fisherman, needs to have a story in a box, and most poker stories are completely uninteresting.
quotes.author: Jason Alexander

quotes.quote: Poker is the game closest to the western conception of life, where life and thought are recognized as intimately combined, where free will prevails over philosophies of fate or of chance, where men are considered moral agents and where at least in the short run - the important thing is not what happens but what people think happens."
quotes.author: John Luckacs

quotes.quote: Serious poker is no more about gambling than rock climbing is about taking risks.
quotes.author: Alfred Alvarez

quotes.quote: Life, like poker has an element of risk. It shouldn't be avoided. It should be faced.
quotes.author: Edward Norton

quotes.quote: Poker is not simply a game of odds, moves and calculations. It is a game of controlled and exploited emotions including greed, fear, over-confidence and anger.
quotes.author: Steven Lubet

quotes.quote: Poker has the feeling of a sport, but you don't have to do push-ups.
quotes.author: Penn Jillette

quotes.quote: It's not the cards that you have all the time that makes you a winner or a loser.
quotes.author: Doyle Brunson

quotes.quote: Poker's the only game fit for a grown man. Then, your hand is against every man's, and every man's is against yours.
quotes.author: W. Somerset Maugham

quotes.quote: If you're playing a poker game and you look around the table and and can't tell who the sucker is, it's you.
quotes.author: Paul Newman

quotes.quote: Poker is such a great game. It's you and your brain against everybody else. The deck doesn't know who you are.
quotes.author: Lyle Berman

quotes.quote: Everyone gets lucky once in a while, but no one is consistently lucky.
quotes.author: Doyle Brunson

quotes.quote: Poker may be a branch of psychological warfare, an art form or indeed a way of life but it is also merely a game, in which money is simply the means of keeping score.
quotes.author: Anthony Holden

quotes.quote: Poker is a combination of luck and skill. People think mastering the skill part is hard, but they're wrong. The trick to poker is mastering the luck.
quotes.author: Jesse May

quotes.quote: Life may deal you a bad hand or take away a good hand you were already dealt. The way you play the hand is how your life is defined. Just like in poker you can end up winning no matter how bad the cards are you have.
quotes.author: Benjamin Bayani

quotes.quote: Bad beats will, from time to time, still rob you like a crack addict with an empty pipe.
quotes.author: Rick Dacey

quotes.quote: The key in the poker is never to lose the head. If you lose it, assurance that you will lose all your chips.
quotes.author: William J. Florence

quotes.quote: Poker reveals to the frank observer something else of import it will teach him about his own nature. Many bad players do not improve because the cannot bear self-knowledge.
quotes.author: David Mamet

quotes.quote: Poker is a game where you don't have to have the best hand to win. Poker is really reading other people and reading human emotion, which certainly comes into play in business.
quotes.author: Charlie Ergen

quotes.quote: Poker is a fascinating, wonderful, intricate adventure on the high seas of human nature.
quotes.author: David A. Daniel

quotes.quote: It's not whether you won or lost, but how many bad beat stories you were able to tell.
quotes.author: Grantland Rice

quotes.quote: Aces are larger than life and greater than mountains.
quotes.author: Mike Caro

quotes.quote: The beautiful thing about poker is that everybody thinks they can play.
quotes.author: Chris Moneymaker

quotes.quote: To master poker and make it profitable, you must first master patience and discipline, as a lack of either is a sure disaster regardless of all other talents, or lucky streaks.
quotes.author: Freddie Gasperian

quotes.quote: The poker chip is like a conjuror's sleight of hand that turns an egg into a billiard ball, a necessity of life into a plaything, reality into illusion.
quotes.author: Al Alvarez

quotes.quote: The strong point in poker is never to lose your temper, either with those you are playing with or, more particularly, with the cards. There is no sympathy in poker. Always keep cool. If you lose your head you will lose all your chips.
quotes.author: William J. Florence

quotes.quote: They're holding flushes of face cards, and I think we're the pot.
quotes.author: Howard Tayler

quotes.quote: Polaroid by its nature makes you frugal. You walk around with maybe two packs of film in your pocket. You have 20 shots, so each shot is a world.
quotes.author: Patti Smith

quotes.quote: Nobody should touch a Polaroid [camera] until he's over sixty
quotes.author: Walker Evans

quotes.quote: I'm definitely a Polaroid camera girl. For me, what I'm really excited about is bringing back the artistry and the nature of Polaroid.
quotes.author: Lady Gaga

quotes.quote: I still love taking pictures with Polaroid film. For me, it offers the most beautiful way of capturing reality and transferring it onto a flat piece of paper.
quotes.author: Helena Christensen

quotes.quote: Polaroid, you know, goes against everything that photography is now. You can't make multiples. Only one exists. I love that. By the way, while we've been talking I've now seen a total of three people I know walking on 8th street.
quotes.author: Laurel Nakadate

quotes.quote: Once I started working with the Polaroid, I would take a shot and if that shot was good, then I'd move the model and change the lighting or whatever... slowly sneaking up on what I wanted rather than having to predetermine what it was.
quotes.author: Chuck Close

quotes.quote: I'm a Polaroid developing in reverse.
quotes.author: Tyler Knight

quotes.quote: Artists freeze themselves into these weird postures that are meant to be impressive and involving, then they fling them out into the world like Polaroids, and then they move on. And I'm stuck in this intense relationship to the Polaroid.
quotes.author: Jonathan Lethem

quotes.quote: At the beginning, Edo was a photographer, and I was more of a talent scout and doing styling and modelling. Then all of a sudden, in 1977, he gave me a Polaroid camera, and I discovered that instead of having to go to a lab and develop the film, I could just take a click and get a picture! It was genius, and I was very good at manipulating it.
quotes.author: Maripol

quotes.quote: [A Polaroid camera] places before you a thing that is more of the thing than the thing was.
quotes.author: Edwin Land

quotes.quote: Do kisses fade like Polaroid pictures if you don't pay attention to them?
quotes.author: Ali Harris

quotes.quote: It's a camera that loves the light — things can get a little blurry if shooting indoors, so shoot by a window with the light streaming in.
quotes.author: Polaroid

quotes.quote: It's a polaroid life I've been tasked with. A duality of the ecstacy and the agony: conflicting opposites fighting for dominance.
quotes.author: D.d

quotes.quote: Just a s a Polaroid film is made of a highly sensitive material and as such is able to hold an image with absolute ease, so is my bipolar mind also acutely sensitive and with poignant clarity — it feels more joy and ultimately more pain, both acute and overwhelming.
quotes.author: D.d

quotes.quote: Somehow, though, digital pictures do not draw people together the way Polaroid photos did.
quotes.author: Christopher Bonanos
