quotes.quote: The older polaroid materials, those that develop in a little paper sandwich that is peeled apart after a few moment's development, encourage a different and warm human exchange.
quotes.author: Christopher Bonanos

quotes.quote: Polaroid had no successful competitor, no real challenge to its primacy, until almost it's very end,
quotes.author: Christopher Bonanos

quotes.quote: Polaroids occupy a special place in photography, all the more since the development of digital techniques. The instant print and absence of editing tools allows this one-of-a kind images a beguiling realness.
quotes.author: Helmut Newton

quotes.quote: In no other photographic medium does the moment find its material form with such sincerity and such speed.
quotes.author: Helmut Newton

quotes.quote: Every Polaroid snap seemed like an event in itself, but for me, as for most, the Polaroid was an occasional camera.
quotes.author: Peter Buse

quotes.quote: The click and whirr of the motor, the image sliding out of those familiar jaws, still milky and minutes from completion; the wide white border for pulling it away, an inviting place to write.
quotes.author: Peter Buse

quotes.quote: Life as a Polaroid photographer isn't only about the images,: we're in love with the cameras, too.
quotes.author: Susannah Conway

quotes.quote: Polaroids are those instant self-developing photographs, and usually have an appearance distinct from the other photos.
quotes.author: David Cycleback

quotes.quote: To a large degree, Polaroids are self-authenticating. This is due to their one-of-one , on the spot development.
quotes.author: David Cycleback

quotes.quote: Though there are methods to make Polaroid copies, most Polaroids are vintage, original, and unique.
quotes.author: David Cycleback

quotes.quote: I'm glad I get to do characters. It's just like a Polaroid shot of whoever the person is, and to me, anyway, that's kind of what life is like. You get a general sense of somebody, and then we're all good, we get it. We understand each other.
quotes.author: Fred Armisen

quotes.quote: The days, months, and years eventually reveal, like a Polaroid, a clear picture of how significant events and decisions ultimately shape our lives.
quotes.author: Hoda Kotb

quotes.quote: I didn't invent the word 'selfie,' but I took tons of Polaroids of myself.
quotes.author: Brigid Berlin

quotes.quote: The Polaroid camera is a system that will be a partner in perception, enabling us to see the objects in the world around us more vividly than we can see them without it, a system to be an aid to memory and a tool for exploration.
quotes.author: Edwin Land

quotes.quote: Police officers may drive black and white cars, however what goes on in their job is a lot of gray.
quotes.author: Arik Matson

quotes.quote: In America, the policeman is a working-class hero. In England, the policeman is a working-class traitor.
quotes.author: Martin Amis

quotes.quote: Law enforcement officers are never 'off duty.' They are dedicated public servants who are sworn to protect public safety at any time and place that the peace is threatened. They need all the help that they can get.
quotes.author: Barbara Boxer

quotes.quote: The duties of an officer are the safety, honor, and welfare of your country first; the honor, welfare, and comfort of the men in your command second; and the officer's own ease, comfort, and safety last.
quotes.author: George S. Patton

quotes.quote: The police are not here to create disorder, they're here to preserve disorder.
quotes.author: Richard J. Daley

quotes.quote: Policemen so cherish their status as keepers of the peace and protectors of the public that they have occasionally been known to beat to death those citizens or groups who question that status.
quotes.author: David Mamet

quotes.quote: We must always remember that the police are recruited from the criminal classes.
quotes.author: Gore Vidal

quotes.quote: When you have police officers who abuse citizens, you erode public confidence in law enforcement. That makes the job of good police officers unsafe.
quotes.author: Mary Frances Berry

quotes.quote: I think our police are excellent, probably because I have not done anything that has occasioned being beaten up by these good men.
quotes.author: Clement Freud

quotes.quote: In almost all cases now the police are as much an enemy as the others.
quotes.author: Tom Metzger

quotes.quote: There is nothing more unaesthetic than a policeman.
quotes.author: Arthur Conan Doyle

quotes.quote: When a police officer tells you to stay in the car, you stay in the car.
quotes.author: Reese Witherspoon

quotes.quote: It is a lot harder now to be a police officer than what it used to be.
quotes.author: Steven Seagal

quotes.quote: If only the authorities could be made to realize that the forces leading them on in the armament race are just insane.
quotes.author: Alva Myrdal

quotes.quote: The policemen or soldiers are only a gun in the establishments hand. They make the racist secure in his racism.
quotes.author: Huey Newton

quotes.quote: It is the duty of every good officer to obey any orders given him by his commander-in-chief.
quotes.author: Nathan Hale

quotes.quote: A really good detective never gets married.
quotes.author: Raymond Chandler

quotes.quote: The police must obey the law while enforcing the law.
quotes.author: Earl Warren

quotes.quote: A police force, wherever they are, is made up of amazing people, and I respect them a great deal.
quotes.author: Nancy Mckeon

quotes.quote: Police do not belong in war zones.
quotes.author: Daniel Keys Moran

quotes.quote: The police feel that most of the public are against them and that there is a lot of bad feeling.
quotes.author: Peter James

quotes.quote: To call the police is a really big deal because you don't snitch - that's the culture you grow up in.
quotes.author: Sonja Sohn

quotes.quote: If police officers routinely issue tickets for the most serious traffic offenses, they'll be treating drivers of all races, sexes, and ages equally.
quotes.author: Bill Dedman

quotes.quote: The police force cannot be completely independent of the executive government.
quotes.author: P. Chidambaram

quotes.quote: Surely the fact that a uniformed police officer is wearing his hair below his collar will make him no less identifiable as a policeman.
quotes.author: Thurgood Marshall

quotes.quote: Federal authorities do not have the manpower or the resources to protect America's international borders.
quotes.author: John Culberson

quotes.quote: It's a lot of crooked cops out there. They manipulate the system.
quotes.author: Ludacris

quotes.quote: In keeping people straight, principle is not as powerful as a policeman.
quotes.author: Abel Hermant

quotes.quote: Every kind of peaceful cooperation among men is primarily based on mutual trust and only secondarily on institutions such as courts of justice and police.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: I'm not against the police; I'm just afraid of them.
quotes.author: Alfred Hitchcock

quotes.quote: One could laugh at the world better if it didn't mix tender kindliness with its brutality.
quotes.author: D. H. Lawrence

quotes.quote: When you ask people to name victims of police brutality, for the most part, nobody will give you a woman's name.
quotes.author: Kimberle Williams Crenshaw

quotes.quote: There's a lot of things that need to change. One specifically? Police brutality.
quotes.author: Colin Kaepernick

quotes.quote: We have a lot of people that are oppressed. We have a lot of people that aren't treated equally, aren't given equal opportunities. Police brutality is a huge thing that needs to be addressed.
quotes.author: Colin Kaepernick

quotes.quote: I have always appreciated the honest brutality of the international film world. One need never doubt one's worth in the market.
quotes.author: Ingmar Bergman

quotes.quote: There is no police brutality.
quotes.author: David A. Clarke Jr.

quotes.quote: No one's pro-police brutality.
quotes.author: Kenya Barris

quotes.quote: There's no book to figure out how not to become a victim of police brutality.
quotes.author: Mike Colter

quotes.quote: No one wants police brutality. No one wants inequality. But what I worry about it is when a protest becomes so large and the noise takes over that the original motivation for the protest and the conversation that should go with that protest gets lost.
quotes.author: Mike Leach

quotes.quote: I think police brutality has been going on since - I don't know - ever since I can remember and, you know, hearing about it in my childhood.
quotes.author: Goapele

quotes.quote: Police brutality is definitely still very alive and active.
quotes.author: Algee Smith

quotes.quote: I think the brutality is important to convey as part of the story, to see how brutal it is to have these kids in battle with one another.
quotes.author: Josh Hutcherson

quotes.quote: Some issues just need to be dealt with - that we're still dealing with in the world, with police brutality.
quotes.author: Big Freedia

quotes.quote: I am depressed rather at the wave of brutality sweeping over the country.
quotes.author: John Burns

quotes.quote: I see myself capable of brutality... That's a fierce thing, to discover within yourself that which you despise the most in others.
quotes.author: George Stevens

quotes.quote: Never mind a world that can't see past brutality.
quotes.author: Ric Ocasek

quotes.quote: Police brutality is systemic, not anecdotal.
quotes.author: Seph Lawless

quotes.quote: On aggression and brutality humanity is crying.
quotes.author: Ehsan Sehgal

quotes.quote: Filth from my character, brutality from my tongue expectations from my life indeed it mirros a unique persona.
quotes.author: Ehsan Sehgal

quotes.quote: Brutality of brutal people reached to personal attacks it was the result of my tolerance.
quotes.author: Ehsan Sehgal

quotes.quote: Brutality jumps on me please dont jump so hard beastly fellow flower of tall stature.
quotes.author: Jean Cocteau

quotes.quote: A divider of brutality separated, the devil from sacpronet God assassinating blissful traces of benevolence; rendering the world a disaster to live in.
quotes.author: Nikhil Parekh

quotes.quote: The footsteps of brutality were as feeble as miserly soot crumbling and deplorably squandering into an infinite bits.
quotes.author: Nikhil Parekh

quotes.quote: That gold refines not, sweetens not a life of conjugal brutality and strife, that vice is vulgar though it gilded shine.
quotes.author: Ambrose Bierce

quotes.quote: Brutality leads to strangulation.
quotes.author: Nikhil Parekh

quotes.quote: Mothers overrules crippling brutality.
quotes.author: Nikhil Parekh

quotes.quote: The highways of sadistically unending brutality were gustily inundated with an infinite dividers of limited indiscriminate and tyrannically lambasting hatred.
quotes.author: Nikhil Parekh

quotes.quote: With the prolific winds of change taking an optimistic stranglehold on the brutality of the previous day.
quotes.author: Nikhil Parekh

quotes.quote: The spirit of ruthless brutality will enter into every fiber of our national life.
quotes.author: Woodrow Wilson

quotes.quote: We're not anti-police, we're anti-police brutality.
quotes.author: Al Sharpton

quotes.quote: Ceremonies are different in every country, but true politeness is everywhere the same.
quotes.author: Oliver Goldsmith

quotes.quote: Politeness is not always a sign of wisdom; but the want of it always leaves room for a suspicion of folly, if folly and imprudence are the same.
quotes.author: Walter Savage Landor

quotes.quote: There is no policy like politeness; and a good manner is the best thing in the world either to get a good name, or to supply the want of it.
quotes.author: Edward Bulwer-Lytton

quotes.quote: Politeness goes far, yet costs nothing.
quotes.author: Samuel Smiles

quotes.quote: In truth, politeness is artificial good humor, it covers the natural want of it, and ends by rendering habitual a substitute nearly equivalent to the real virtue.
quotes.author: Thomas Jefferson

quotes.quote: Good and strong will. Mechanism must precede science (learning). Also in morals and religion? Too much discipline makes one narrow and kills proficiency. Politeness belongs, not to discipline, but to polish, and thus comes last.
quotes.author: Immanuel Kant

quotes.quote: (Politeness is) a tacit agreement that people's miserable defects, whether moral or intellectual, shall on either side be ignored and not be made the subject of reproach.
quotes.author: Arthur Schopenhauer

quotes.quote: [Politeness costs nothing.]. . . . Nothing, that is to him that shows it; but it often costs the world very dear.
quotes.author: William Allingham

quotes.quote: Virtue, perhaps, is nothing more than politeness of soul.
quotes.author: Honoré de Balzac

quotes.quote: Politeness is an inexpensive way of making friends.
quotes.author: William Feather

quotes.quote: There is a politeness of the heart; this is closely allied to love.
quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.quote: Politeness is sometimes a great tax upon sincerity.
quotes.author: Charlotte Lennox

quotes.quote: Life is short, but there is always time enough for courtesy.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Politeness -- The most acceptable hypocrisy.Â
quotes.author: Ambrose Bierce

quotes.quote: Treat everyone with politeness, even those who are rude to you â€” not because they are nice, but because you are.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: E-mail has some magical ability to turn off the politeness gene in the human being.
quotes.author: Jeff Bezos

quotes.quote: Politeness of the mind is to have delicate thoughts.
quotes.author: Francois de la Rochefoucauld

quotes.quote: The care that we bestow on our person is a species of politeness towards others.
quotes.author: Charles Blanc

quotes.quote: One of the greatest victories you can gain over someone is to beat him at politeness.
quotes.author: Josh Billings

quotes.quote: Politeness is the chief sign of culture.
quotes.author: Baltasar Gracian

quotes.quote: Politeness is one of those advantages which we never estimate rightly but by the inconvenience of its loss.
quotes.author: Samuel Johnson

quotes.quote: True politeness consists in being easy one's self, and in making every one about one as easy as one can.
quotes.author: Alexander Pope

quotes.quote: True politeness is to social life what oil is to machinery, a thing to oil the ruts and grooves of existence. False politeness can shine without warming and glitter without vivifying.
quotes.author: Frances Harper

quotes.quote: Politeness has been well defined as benevolence in small things.
quotes.author: Thomas B. Macaulay

quotes.quote: A polite enemy is just as difficult to discredit, as a rude friend is to protect.
quotes.author: Bryant McGill

quotes.quote: All Politeness is owing to Liberty. We polish one another, and rub off our Corners and rough Sides by a sort of amicable Collision. To restrain this, is inevitably to bring a Rust upon Mens Understandings.
quotes.author: Anthony Ashley-Cooper

quotes.quote: Home is the place where true politeness tells.
quotes.author: Julia McNair Wright

quotes.quote: It is wise to apply the oil of refined politeness to the mechanisms of friendship.
quotes.author: Colette

quotes.quote: Politeness can at once be the indifferent affliction of the â€˜civilized' as well as a subterfuge for the designed offence.
quotes.author: Vinod Pande

quotes.quote: Politeness is the poison of collaboration.
quotes.author: Edwin Land

quotes.quote: Political correctness has changed everything. People forget that political correctness used to be called spastic gay talk.
quotes.author: Frankie Boyle

quotes.quote: When people talk about political correctness, the only element of any value is good manners.
quotes.author: Paul Johnson

quotes.quote: Political correctness is a label the privileged often use to distract from their privilege and hate.
quotes.author: DaShanne Stokes

quotes.quote: Political correctness is as exploitable as any other progressive ideal, but its aim is to stifle the incessant noise of those who flap their careless lips without a thought about those they might offend and why that might be important.
quotes.author: Marcus Brigstocke

quotes.quote: Political correctness is the the inability to state certain truths because they may offend certain people.
quotes.author: Dennis Prager

quotes.quote: Political correctness is euphemism for fear to speak truth to authority.
quotes.author: Bangambiki Habyarimana

quotes.quote: Political correctness represents the fossilized institutionalization of once-vital revolutionary ideas, which have become mere rote formulas. It is repressively Stalinist, dependent on a labyrinthine, parasitic bureaucracy to enforce its empty dictates.
quotes.author: Camille Paglia

quotes.quote: Political correctness does not legislate tolerance; it only organizes hatred.
quotes.author: Jacques Barzun

quotes.quote: Political correctness sometimes does great work when it helps equalize the playing field when it comes to language, but it does a great disservice when it tries to silence a person of color.
quotes.author: Margaret Cho

quotes.quote: The cornerstone of the political correctness that dominates campus culture is radical feminism.
quotes.author: Phyllis Schlafly

quotes.quote: Political correctness is tyranny with manners.
quotes.author: Charlton Heston

quotes.quote: Political correctness is the natural continuum from the party line. What we are seeing once again is a self-appointed group of vigilantes imposing their views on others. It is a heritage of communism, but they don't seem to see this.
quotes.author: Doris Lessing

quotes.quote: Political correctness is a war on noticing.
quotes.author: Steve Sailer

quotes.quote: To learn who rules over you, simply find out who you are not allowed to criticize.
quotes.author: Voltaire

quotes.quote: Transcend political correctness and strive for human righteousness.
quotes.author: Anthony J. D'Angelo

quotes.quote: Political correctness the rigging of politics using different rules for different groups, and buttressed by the media ensures that Democrats always have the upper hand.
quotes.author: Andrew Breitbart

quotes.quote: In this era of political correctness, some people seem unaware that being squeamish about words can mean being blind to realities.
quotes.author: Thomas Sowell

quotes.quote: The method of political science is the interpretation of life; its instrument is insight, a nice understanding of subtle, unformulated conditions.
quotes.author: Woodrow Wilson

quotes.quote: My father was a professor of political science and also a young politician fighting for democracy in Kenya, and when things got ugly, he went into political exile in Mexico.
quotes.author: Lupita Nyong'o

quotes.quote: In political science, public support doesn't have a reverse gear. It always goes forward.
quotes.author: Amit Shah

quotes.quote: In contemporary art culture, where good looks and clever strategic planning of art careers have become a feature, professional practice may be taught in art schools like a branch of public relations or political science.
quotes.author: Michael Leunig

quotes.quote: I wasn't a major in political science for nothing, so I understood the politics of beauty and the politics of race when it comes to the fashion industry.
quotes.author: Iman

quotes.quote: This is the starting point of political science and political philosophy. That the State is not absolute, as Plato taught, that there is no ideal State, but that our knowledge of political organization is to be acquired by studying and comparing different constitutions of States, that the best form of government is that which best suits the character of the people.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: A political philosophy (often called "political science" by practitioners who are not averse from verbal trickery) must deal with contemporary realities. If it does not, if it is charged with "ideals," it is merely a variety of romantic fiction, although it may not be recognized as such.
quotes.author: Revilo P. Oliver

quotes.quote: From the standpoint of modern political science the slave holders were right in declaring that liberty can be given only to those who have political capacity enough to use it, and they were also right in maintaining that two greatly unequal races cannot exist side by side on terms of perfect equality.
quotes.author: Charles Edward Merriam

quotes.quote: Political Science carries inseparably with it the study of piety, and that he who is not pious cannot be truly wise.
quotes.author: Giambattista Vico

quotes.quote: If you take an economics or a political science course, you're taught that humans are supposed to be rational wealth accumulators, each acting as an individual to maximize his own wealth in the market.
quotes.author: Noam Chomsky

quotes.quote: Political science, by which I mean nothing more abstruse or academic than consideration of a foreign country as a country in its own right, seems to have been almost completely supplanted by a preoccupation with international relations. What is thought irrelevant to that side of things (often wrongly) is considered beneath notice. This can be seen by the reflexiveness with which journalists now contact I.R. professors or nuclear specialists for comment...
quotes.author: Brian Reynolds Myers

quotes.quote: Political science is governed by five myths: (1) that it studies politics; (2) that it is scientific; (3) that it is possible to study politics separated off from economics, sociology, psychology and history; (4) that the state in our democratic capitalist society is politically neutral, i.e. available as a set of institutions and mechanisms to whatever group wins the election; and (5) that political science, as a discipline, advances the cause of democracy.
quotes.author: Bertell Ollman

quotes.quote: The political scientist, in so far as he wishes to remain a scientist, is limited to the study of techniques. A good deal of what is called political science, I must confess, seems, to me a device, invented by academic persons, avoiding that dangerous subject politics, without achieving science.
quotes.author: Alfred A.Cobban

quotes.quote: Political science is the study of the authoritative allocation of values for a society.
quotes.author: David Easton

quotes.quote: So my degree was in political science, which I think was - the closest I could come to marketing is politics.
quotes.author: Steve Case

quotes.quote: There is no such thing as political science, but there are tenancies so strong that they might as well be called laws of nature.
quotes.author: Jeff Greenfield

quotes.quote: There’s simply no reason to believe that political science in particular, and the social sciences in general, are bad buys for the federal government.
quotes.author: Jonathan Bernstein

quotes.quote: Political science is not only the study of government and state but also it is the application of empirical theory and scientific methods to the analysis of political matters.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Political science or politics is an academic and in this sense it can be defined as a study of political affairs, relevant governmental matters and lively issues influencing the functions and decision making process of government or persons at the helm of power.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: We, therefore, conclude that political science as a study of cooperation, negotiation and conflict holds good for any liberal or pluralist society.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Political science without biography is a form of taxidermy.
quotes.author: Harold D. Lasswell

quotes.quote: Politicians were mostly people who'd had too little morals and ethics to stay lawyers.
quotes.author: George R.R. Martin

quotes.quote: It only takes a politician believing in what he says for the others to stop believing him.
quotes.author: Jean Baudrillard

quotes.quote: A good politician is quite as unthinkable as an honest burglar.
quotes.author: Henry Louis Mencken

quotes.quote: A politician is an animal which can sit on a fence and yet keep both ears to the ground.
quotes.author: Henry Louis Mencken

quotes.quote: The poet and the politician have this in common: their greatness depends on the courage with which they face the challenges of life.
quotes.author: John Fitzgerald Kennedy

quotes.quote: Ninety percent of the politicians give the other ten percent a bad reputation.
quotes.author: Henry Kissinger

quotes.quote: A politician thinks of the next election. A statesman, of the next generation.
quotes.author: James Freeman Clarke

quotes.quote: Every politician has a promising career. Unfortunately, most of them do not keep those promises.
quotes.author: Jarod Kintz

quotes.quote: There's just one rule for politicians all over the world: Don't say in Power what you say in Opposition; if you do, you only have to carry out what the other fellows have found impossible.
quotes.author: John Galsworthy

quotes.quote: Politicians are the same all over. They promise to build bridges even when there are no rivers.
quotes.author: Nikita Khrushchev

quotes.quote: A politician is a man who will double cross that bridge when he comes to it.
quotes.author: Oscar Levant

quotes.quote: A politician is a man in his natural state.
quotes.author: Bangambiki Habyarimana

quotes.quote: A politician is a politician whether he's wearing a suit or a funny hat.
quotes.author: Reza Aslan

quotes.quote: A politician is an arse upon which everyone has sat except a man.
quotes.author: E. E. Cummings

quotes.quote: Politicians should never put themselves first: governments should put people first and all of us should put our country first.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Politicians are the same all over. They promise to build a bridge even where there is no river.
quotes.author: Nikita Khrushchev

quotes.quote: A politician is a fellow who will lay down your life for his country.
quotes.author: Texas Guinan

quotes.quote: Politicians are a set of men who have interests aside from the interests of the people and who, to say the most of them, are, taken as a mass, at least one long step removed from honest men.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.quote: A politician's words reveal less about what he thinks about his subject than what he thinks about his audience.
quotes.author: George Will

quotes.quote: A politician should have three hats. One for throwing into the ring, one for talking through, and one for pulling rabbits out of if elected.
quotes.author: Carl Sandburg

quotes.quote: The most successful politician is he who says what the people are thinking most often in the loudest voice.
quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.quote: If a politician found he had cannibals among his constituents, he would promise them missionaries for dinner.
quotes.author: H. L. Mencken

quotes.quote: Politicians will always send others off to fight their wars.
quotes.author: Anthony T.Hincks

quotes.quote: A politician will do anything to keep his job - even become a patriot.
quotes.author: William Randolph Hearst

quotes.quote: No politician should ever let himself be photographed in a bathing suit.
quotes.author: Adolf Hitler

quotes.quote: Among politicians the esteem of religion is profitable; the principles of it are troublesome.
quotes.author: Benjamin Whichcote

quotes.quote: If politicians stopped meddling with things they don't understand, there would be a more drastic reduction in the size of government than anyone in either party advocates.
quotes.author: Thomas Sowell

quotes.quote: Politics is the art of looking for trouble, finding it everywhere, diagnosing it incorrectly and applying the wrong remedies.
quotes.author: Groucho Marx

quotes.quote: The politicians say â€œweâ€ can't afford a tax cut. Maybe we can't afford the politicians.
quotes.author: Steve Forbes

quotes.quote: Politicians have the ability to foretell what is going to happen tomorrow, next week, next month, and next year. And to have the ability afterward to explain why it didn't happen.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: Politics is the gentle art of getting votes from the poor and campaign funds from the rich, by promising to protect each from the other.
quotes.author: Oscar Ameringer

quotes.quote: Under democracy one party always devotes its chief energies to trying to prove that the other party is unfit to rule - and both commonly succeed, and are right.
quotes.author: H.L. Mencken

quotes.quote: A politician is a person who can make waves and then make you think he's the only one who can save the ship.
quotes.author: Ivern Ball

quotes.quote: We live in a world in which politics has replaced philosophy.
quotes.author: Martin L. Gross

quotes.quote: There are many men of principle in both parties in America, but there is no party of principle.
quotes.author: Alexis de Tocqueville

quotes.quote: All of us who are concerned for peace and triumph of reason and justice must be keenly aware how small an influence reason and honest good will exert upon events in the political field.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: Under democracy one party always devotes its chief energies to trying to prove that the other party is unfit to rule and both commonly succeed, and are right.
quotes.author: H.L. Mencken

quotes.quote: Politics is the art of looking for trouble, finding it whether it exists or not, diagnosing it incorrectly, and applying the wrong remedy.
quotes.author: Ernest Benn

quotes.quote: Let us not seek the Republican answer or the Democratic answer, but the right answer. Let us not seek to fix the blame for the past. Let us accept our own responsibility for the future.
quotes.author: John F. Kennedy

quotes.quote: We hang the petty thieves and appoint the great ones to public office.
quotes.author: Aesop

quotes.quote: Politics is war without bloodshed while war is politics with bloodshed.
quotes.author: Mao Zedong

quotes.quote: Politics have no relation to morals.
quotes.author: Niccolo Machiavelli

quotes.quote: The whole aim of practical politics is to keep the populace alarmed (and hence clamorous to be led to safety) by menacing it with an endless series of hobgoblins, all of them imaginary.
quotes.author: H. L. Mencken

quotes.quote: I predict future happiness for Americans, if they can prevent the government from wasting the labors of the people under the pretense of taking care of them.
quotes.author: Thomas Jefferson

quotes.quote: The rights of every man are diminished when the rights of one man are threatened.
quotes.author: John F. Kennedy

quotes.quote: Politics is the art of postponing decisions until they are no longer relevant.
quotes.author: Henri Queuille

quotes.quote: Politics is for the present, but an equation is for eternity.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: You may fool all the people some of the time, you can even fool some of the people all of the time, but you cannot fool all of the people all the time.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.quote: Politics is a pendulum whose swings between anarchy and tyranny are fueled by perpetually rejuvenated illusions.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: In war, you can only be killed once, but in politics, many times.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: Politics, noun. A strife of interests masquerading as a contest of principles. The conduct of public affairs for private advantage.
quotes.author: Ambrose Bierce

quotes.quote: Republicans are the party that says government doesn't work, and then get elected and prove it.
quotes.author: P.J. O'Rourke

quotes.quote: Vote: the instrument and symbol of a freeman's power to make a fool of himself and a wreck of his country.
quotes.author: Ambrose Bierce

quotes.quote: Politics is supposed to be the second-oldest profession. I have come to realize that it bears a very close resemblance to the first.
quotes.author: Ronald Reagan

quotes.quote: In politics you must always keep running with the pack. The moment that you falter and they sense that you are injured, the rest will turn on you like wolves.
quotes.author: R. A. Butler

quotes.quote: Politics ought to be the part-time profession of every citizen who would protect the rights and privileges of free people and who would preserve what is good and fruitful in our national heritage.
quotes.author: Dwight D. Eisenhower

quotes.quote: Politics has less to do with where you live than where your heart is.
quotes.author: Margaret Cho

quotes.quote: The whole art of politics consists in directing rationally the irrationalities of men.
quotes.author: Reinhold Niebuhr

quotes.quote: Politics is the art of preventing people from taking part in affairs which properly concern them.
quotes.author: Paul Valery

quotes.quote: Politics is more difficult than physics.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: Air pollution is terrible for our children. Every single scientist, every single doctor will tell you the same thing: Air pollution damages our children's brains, their hearts, and their lungs.
quotes.author: Julianne Moore

quotes.quote: The only solution to pollution is a people's humane revolution!
quotes.author: Bobby Seale

quotes.quote: The problem is that everywhere the gas drilling industry goes, a trail of water contamination, air pollution, health concerns and betrayal of basic American civic and community values follows.
quotes.author: Josh Fox

quotes.quote: Visual pollution is more poisonous than any other pollution because it kills the soul.
quotes.author: Friedensreich Hundertwasser

quotes.quote: The impact of pollution on these clouds is sufficiently strong to completely shut off precipitation from them.
quotes.author: Daniel Rosenfeld

quotes.quote: If a whole lot gets out there will be very serious pollution, if it comes ashore it will kill a lot of things that it contacts.
quotes.author: Paul Johnston

quotes.quote: Pollution is nothing but the resources we are not harvesting. We allow them to disperse because we've been ignorant of their value.
quotes.author: R. Buckminster Fuller

quotes.quote: Pollution should never be the price of prosperity.
quotes.author: Al Gore

quotes.quote: The pollution (that) resulted from human activity may have created a haze which absorbs and deflects the sun's rays.
quotes.author: Yun Qian

quotes.quote: Pollution is the forerunner of perdition.
quotes.author: John Trapp

quotes.quote: If ever we had proof that our nation's pollution laws aren't working, it's reading the list of industrial chemicals in the bodies of babies who have not yet lived outside the womb.
quotes.author: Louise Slaughter

quotes.quote: Waste equals food.
quotes.author: William McDonough

quotes.quote: After all, the same steps that reduce carbon pollution also clean the air we breathe, which saves lives and reduces disease.
quotes.author: Michael Bloomberg

quotes.quote: The idea is to return these sites to the status they were before they were polluted. That's what a cleanup is.
quotes.author: Ryan Karben

quotes.quote: Our pollution out of carbon emissions is still very, very low compared to the world.
quotes.author: Piyush Goyal

quotes.quote: Because cap and trade is enforced through the selling and trading of permits, it actually perpetuates the pollution it is supposed to eliminate.
quotes.author: James Hansen

quotes.quote: Pollution from human activities is changing the Earth's climate. We see the damage that a disrupted climate can do: on our coasts, our farms, forests, mountains, and cities. Those impacts will grow more severe unless we start reducing global warming pollution now.
quotes.author: Frances Beinecke

quotes.quote: Pollution is a necessary result of the inability of man to reform and transform waste.
quotes.author: Patti Smith

quotes.quote: The issue of pollution has become a blasting fuse for social instability.
quotes.author: Zhou Shengxian

quotes.quote: There's so much pollution in the air now that if it weren't for our lungs there'd be no place to put it all.
quotes.author: Robert Orben

quotes.quote: The environment will continue to deteriorate until pollution practices are abandoned.
quotes.author: B. F. Skinner

quotes.quote: The important thing to understand is that the case for pollution control isn't based on some kind of aesthetic distaste for industrial society. Pollution does real, measurable damage, especially to human health.
quotes.author: Paul Krugman

quotes.quote: Pollution is a problem, and there's the whole problem of the spoiling of the commons, but we've addressed the pollution problem on a variety of different levels in a variety of ways, and it's worked pretty well.
quotes.author: P. J. O'Rourke

quotes.quote: Particulate matter pollution kills people. We're a long way from cleaning up this problem.
quotes.author: Brent Newell

quotes.quote: Air pollution is turning Mother Nature prematurely gray.
quotes.author: Irv Kupcinet

quotes.quote: The pollution is ventilated out by wind almost every day, but then it gets re-polluted each day.
quotes.author: Sasha Madronich

quotes.quote: Environmental pollution is an incurable disease. It can only be prevented.
quotes.author: Barry Commoner

quotes.quote: Pollution from oil and gas development, toxic runoff, and miles and miles of plastic trash foul the waters and threaten marine life
quotes.author: Frances Beinecke

quotes.quote: Now our biggest environmental problems come from our own actions, our own choices, rather than pollution produced by big business.
quotes.author: Jesse Ventura

quotes.quote: Water and air, the two essential fluids on which all life depends, have become global garbage cans.
quotes.author: Jacques Cousteau

quotes.quote: A horse is like a violin, first it must be tuned, and when tuned it must be accurately played.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Playing polo is like trying to play golf during an earthquake.
quotes.author: Sylvester Stallone

quotes.quote: Every child senses, with all the horse sense that's in him, that any parent is angry inside when children misbehave and they dread more the anger that is rarely or never expressed openly, wondering how awful it might be.
quotes.author: Benjamin Spock

quotes.quote: Polo, racing and horse shows all are doing great work to help the farmer and rancher to raise better horses.
quotes.author: Will Rogers

quotes.quote: Polo continued to exhibit tremendous momentum. The strength in the business was broad, with wholesale and retail both outperforming our sales and margin expectations.
quotes.author: Lizabeth Dunn

quotes.quote: A polo pony is like a motorbike with a mind of its own weighing half a ton.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: The horse will leap over trenches, will jump out of them, will do anything else, provided one grants him praise and respite after his accomplishment.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: A lovely horse is always an experience. It is an emotional experience of the kind that is spoiled by words.
quotes.author: Beryl Markham

quotes.quote: When you are on the great horse, you have the best seat you will ever have.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Polo is like playing golf with a saddle, and there are a lot of moving parts.
quotes.author: Joel Edgerton

quotes.quote: Polo drifts gently in and out of fashion.
quotes.author: Kate Reardon

quotes.quote: A difference of opinion is what makes horse racing and missionaries.
quotes.author: Will Rogers

quotes.quote: There is something about the outside of a horse that is good for the inside of a man.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: A polo handicap is a persons ticket to the world.
quotes.author: Sir Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: Polo is not just an sport, it is a way of living.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Water polo would be much more interesting if they hadn't gotten rid of the horses.
quotes.author: Dov Davidoff

quotes.quote: Your mind is like the most powerful horse on the planet. If you can control it, you are sure to win every race in life.
quotes.author: Malika E Nura

quotes.quote: Polo is like tennis you literally have to live it.
quotes.author: Sylvester Stallone

quotes.quote: When you’re riding, only the race in which you’re riding is important.
quotes.author: Bill Shoemaker

quotes.quote: The only way to prove that you’re a good sport is to lose.
quotes.author: Ernie Banks

quotes.quote: They had spent a year in France for no particular reason and then drifted here and there unresentfully wherever people played polo and were rich together.
quotes.author: F. Scott Fitzgerald

quotes.quote: Whether it's his beloved game of polo or his magical success in business, Norman Brinker simply does not know how to lose.
quotes.author: Newt Gingrich

quotes.quote: Emotions were like wild horses and it required wisdom to be able to control them
quotes.author: Paulo Coelho

quotes.quote: Riding a horse is not a gentle hobby, to be picked up and laid down like a game of solitaire. It is a grand passion. It seizes a person whole and once it has done so, he/she will have to accept that his life will be radically changed.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Everyone turns toward someone. Look for one scarred by the King's polo stick.
quotes.author: Rumi

quotes.quote: It feels good when it helps to get a good seat for a football game. But it never helped me make a good film or a good shot in a polo game, or command the obedience of my daughter. It does
quotes.author: Walt Disney

quotes.quote: No hour of life is wasted that is spent in the saddle.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: There's nothing wrong with you that a little Prozac and a polo mallet can't cure.
quotes.author: Woody Allen

quotes.quote: You can't hurry creativity, so take time to ponder your ideas. Sit back and take time to think things over. That's usually how the best ideas bloom.
quotes.author: Harvey Mackay

quotes.quote: It is possibly not very helpful to our inner life to ponder a great deal on how the external world is reflected in our soul. By doing so, we do not get beyond a shadowy picture of the world of mental images in ourselves.
quotes.author: Rudolf Steiner

quotes.quote: To ponder is not to brood or grieve or even meditate. It is to wonder at a deep level.
quotes.author: Robert Fulghum

quotes.quote: Everyone needs a place where they can go to just ponder for a while. Silence is important; it's the only time you can hear the whispering of truth.
quotes.author: Glenn Beck

quotes.quote: You can keep pondering on which thing to do first or which path to take or by simply taking action now of most any kind, you may just find yourself on the way to where you most needed to go.
quotes.author: April Bryan

quotes.quote: If you desire information on some point of law, you are not likely to ponder over the ponderous tomes of legal writers in order to obtain the knowledge you seek, by your own unaided efforts.
quotes.author: Felix Adler

quotes.quote: We would do well to ponder the realization that love is the most potent source of power.
quotes.author: Margaret J. Wheatley

quotes.quote: Ponder and deliberate before you make your move. He will conquer who has learned the artifice of deviation. Such is the art of maneuvering.
quotes.author: Sun Tzu

quotes.quote: Ponder and deliberate before you make a move.
quotes.author: Sun Tzu

quotes.quote: Never ponder to give today all that you have, if you hope for tomorrow to give you all that you need.
quotes.author: Edmond Mbiaka

quotes.quote: It is a truth of human nature that we can ponder life's mysteries for only so long before we lose interest and move on to something else.
quotes.author: Sue Grafton

quotes.quote: Pondering over your actions is a practical way of helping yourself in the battle against sin.
quotes.author: Sunday Adelaja

quotes.quote: Ponder the fact that God has made you a gardener, to root out vice and plant virtue.
quotes.author: Catherine Of Siena

quotes.quote: Ponder the depth and the power of loyalty-the ability to serve and support a cause greater than yourself.
quotes.author: Gary Zukav

quotes.quote: Pondering is a little like considering and a little like thinking, but looser. To ponder, one must let the facts roll around the rim of the mind's roulette wheel, coming to settle in whichever slot they feed pulled to.
quotes.author: Christopher Moore

quotes.quote: Pondering must turn out to be your cash asset, regardless of whichever ups and downs you occur throughout in the everyday living.
quotes.author: Abdul Kalam

quotes.quote: Young people should ponder over problems that might confront them and be prepared to cope with them in a way that their parents, their leaders, and their Heavenly Father would have them cope, that they might keep themselves clean and pure.
quotes.author: Joseph B. Wirthlin

quotes.quote: Ponder for a long time whether you shall admit a given person to your friendship; but when you have decided to admit him, welcome him with all your heart and soul. Speak as boldly with him as with yourself.
quotes.author: Seneca The Younger

quotes.quote: It's easier to ponder the future than it is to do something about the present.
quotes.author: Curious George Brigade

quotes.quote: If you give people nothingness, they can ponder what can be achieved from that nothingness.
quotes.author: Tadao Ando

quotes.quote: It is man's destiny to ponder on the riddle of existence and, as a byproduct of his wonderment, to create a new life on this earth.
quotes.author: Charles Kettering

quotes.quote: The real question is whether all your pondering and analyses will convince you that life is worth living. That's what it all comes down to.
quotes.author: Brian Greene

quotes.quote: People who ponder too much about the subject of enlightenment don't progress very fast. It is interesting to know it's there, but you can't know what it's like until you get there.
quotes.author: Frederick Lenz

quotes.quote: If there wasn't mystery, people wouldn't have anything to ponder. If you already knew everything, you wouldn't have anything to think about and life would just be really boring.
quotes.author: Emma Roberts

quotes.quote: When walking, you see things that you miss in a motor car or on the train. You give your mind space to ponder.
quotes.author: Tom Hodgkinson

quotes.quote: While we ponder when to begin, it becomes too late to do.
quotes.author: Quintilian

quotes.quote: Contemplation of life after retirement and life after death can help you deal with contemporary challenges.
quotes.author: Russell Marion Nelson

quotes.quote: In order to improve the mind, we ought less to learn, than to contemplate.
quotes.author: Rene Descartes

quotes.quote: Through mediation and by giving full attention to one thing at a time, we can learn to direct attention where we choose.
quotes.author: Steven Mason

quotes.quote: Few people even scratch the surface, much less exhaust the contemplation of their own experience.
quotes.author: Randolph Bourne

quotes.quote: In my world, everyone's a pony and they all eat rainbows and poop butterflies!
quotes.author: Dr. Seuss

quotes.quote: A child who is happy on his pony's back has something which will be to him a glorious memory that the years cannot dim.
quotes.author: Muriel Wace

quotes.quote: Adventures are not all pony-rides in May-sunshine.
quotes.author: J.R.R. Tolkien

quotes.quote: A pony is a childhood dream. A horse is an adulthood treasure.
quotes.author: Rebecca Carroll

quotes.quote: Small children are convinced that ponies deserve to see the inside of the house.
quotes.author: Maya Patel

quotes.quote: When the storm clouds in the west / Are quickly gathering / The ponies they run wild there / Before it rains / You'll see their sleek dark bodies / Brightly gleaming / You know the fire is flying through / Their brains.
quotes.author: Jeffrey Bullock

quotes.quote: The officer who never looks after his ponies, after a game, to see that they are properly put away, or who at the end of a long march or hard drill says, "Sergeant, fix up the horses..." is without pride and lazy, and the men know it and despise him.
quotes.author: George S. Patton Jr.

quotes.quote: The older I get the more I enjoy watching my daughter riding around the ring with no hands, jumping her pony and having fun.
quotes.author: Jan Westmark

quotes.quote: A cowboy's best friend is his pony.
quotes.author: Wilf Carter

quotes.quote: A good horse knows just when to to turn a cow, just how to cut a steer from the bunch. A good cow pony knows, as if by instinct, when to walk slowly through the brush, how to miss the gopher hole at a high canter... The cowpoke and the cow pony become not just a team working in unison, they become as one.
quotes.author: Royal B. Hassrick

quotes.quote: Even an E-type Jaguar looks merely flash beside a really smart pony and trap.
quotes.author: Marion C. Garretty

quotes.quote: Horses do change, you know; a lot of the... ponies really give the able-bodied grooms a hard time, but if you put a disabled child or adult on their back they're as gentle as lambs.
quotes.author: Jackie Croome

quotes.quote: Watching a seasoned pony carry its young rider, one senses the pony is doing the teaching. With an uncanny sense of the rider's limitations and often genuine kindness, ponies seem to possess an intelligence you don't always see in horses.
quotes.author: Nina Duran

quotes.quote: Betting the ponies is done in various methodical ways by professionals, haphazardly by some enthusiasts, and often in a rather bizarre fashion by others just out for a day's lark.
quotes.author: Cooky McClung

quotes.quote: Never a pony couldn't be rode, never a cowboy couldn't be throwed.
quotes.author: Paul Zarzyski

quotes.quote: When the spring round-up begins the horses should be as fat and sleek as possible. After running all winter free, even the most sober pony is apt to betray an inclination to buck; and, if possible, we like to ride every animal once or twice before we begin to do real work with him.
quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.quote: Life's like Sanskrit read to a pony.
quotes.author: Lou Reed

quotes.quote: Yankee Doodle came to town / Riding on a pony, / He stuck a feather in his hat / And called it macaroni.
quotes.author: Dr. Richard Shuckburgh

quotes.quote: And the seasons they go round and round, / And the painted ponies go up and down, / We're captive on the carousel of time / We can't return, we can only look behind / From where we came / And go round and round and round / In the circle game.
quotes.author: Joni Mitchell

quotes.quote: Five and twenty ponies, / Trotting through the dark— / Brandy for the Parson, / 'Baccy for the Clerk; / Laces for a lady, letters for a spy, / Watch the wall, my darling, while the / Gentlemen go by!
quotes.author: Rudyard Kipling

quotes.quote: Trottin' to the fair, / Me and Moll Maloney, / Seated, I declare / On a single pony.
quotes.author: Arthur Percival Graves

quotes.quote: Mistakes ain't haystacks or there'd be more fat ponies than there is.
quotes.author: North American Proverb

quotes.quote: When walkin' down a city street, / Two thousand miles from home, / The pavestone hurtin' of the feet / That never ought to roam, / A pony just reached to one side / And grabbed me by the clothes; / He smelled the sagebrush, durn his hide! / You bet a pony knows!
quotes.author: Arthur Chapman

quotes.quote: I'm not a one trick pony, I'm a field of ponies!
quotes.author: Stuart Baggs

quotes.quote: Ponies don't become horses (They are ponies).
quotes.author: Ranal Currie

quotes.quote: He's a one-trick pony / One trick is all that horse can do / He does, one trick only / It's the principal source of his revenue / But when he steps into the spotlight / You can feel the heat of his heart / Come rising through / See how he dances / See how he loops from side to side / See how he prances / The way his hooves just seem to glide / He's just a one-trick pony, that's all he is, / But he turn that trick with pride.
quotes.author: Paul Simon

quotes.quote: When I was a very young man / I was a cowboy / The best in the land / But then she settled me down / With a touch of her hand / Now I'm begging you mister / Tell me if you can / Which way does that old pony run / Which way does that old pony run / And how much is that saddle / And a straight shooting gun / Which way does that old pony run / Now a young girl / She don't know when she's lying / But a woman / Great God she knows how its done / So mama before I go / There's just one thing on my mind / Which way does that old pony run.
quotes.author: Lyle Pearce Lovett

quotes.quote: I went down to the races to watch my pony run / Down to the races to watch my pony run / Lookin' at the faces, lookin' for the fastest one / I took my money, money I'd saved for rent / I took my money, money I'd saved for rent / Forgive me honey, I'll give it up for lent / Run little pony, run like you're runnin' from sin / Run little pony, run like the crazy wind / Play your bugle, boy, play it fast and hard / Play your bugle, boy, play it fast and hard / Here come the ponies, come trottin' out in the yard / The odds against me, they laid 'em seven to one / Odds were against me, they laid 'em at seven to one / Cold sweat like to drench me, when the starter man fired his gun / Run little pony, run like you're runnin' from sin / Run little pony, run like the crazy wind / I yelled and I cheered and praised the lord above / I yelled and I cheered and praised the lord above / My Little Pony come in, one head out in front.
quotes.author: Joe Ely

quotes.quote: The new chum's polo pony was the smartest pony yet -- / The owner backed it for the Cup for all that he could get. / The books were laying fives to one, in tenners; and you bet / He was on it. / The bell was rung, the nags came out their quality to try, / The band played, "What Ho! Robbo!" as our hero cantered by, / The people in the Leger Stand cried out, "Hi, mister, hi! / Are you on it?" / They watched him as the flag went down; his fate is quickly told -- / The pony gave a sudden spring, and off the rider rolled. / The pony finished first all right, but then our hero bold / Was not on it.
quotes.author: Andrew Barton Paterson

quotes.quote: The young foal arose for / The first time, yesterday, / And is now enjoying its / Little runs around the fields. / A Connemara pony of a beautiful / Colour and, of course, the breed / Has entered the minds of many / Within recent years… / When I recall the first time / That I encountered the breed / It was when I visited a travellers / Site on the outskirts of Limavady. / At that time the travellers shared / Various breeds and it was one / Of my reasons for visiting for / I loved ponies as they did.
quotes.author: Liam Ó Comain

quotes.quote: I never wanted to wear skirts or shoes, makeup, nails, dresses, or even wear my hair a certain way. I always wanted to wear sneakers, stud earrings, hair in a ponytail, and play with the boys.
quotes.author: Young M.A

quotes.quote: At 62, I remain clean and sober and my ponytail remains erect.
quotes.author: Ted Nugent

quotes.quote: I don't really like dressing up. Some people probably think actresses dress up everywhere they go. I'm in sweatpants half the time with my hair in a ponytail.
quotes.author: Selena Gomez

quotes.quote: I feel the most confident when I'm comfortable in workout clothes with my hair up in a ponytail.
quotes.author: Alex Morgan

quotes.quote: I usually do my hair and makeup in 30 to 45 minutes, and if my hair is dirty, I'll just put it in a bun or a ponytail. If it's in a bun, I'll part it down the middle and do a low bun with a couple pieces in the front coming down.
quotes.author: Gigi Hadid

quotes.quote: When I'm not working, I spend a lot of time on my hair. When it's time for my hair to get some rest, I either wear it in a ponytail, bun or my favorite 'milkmaid' braid.
quotes.author: Tracee Ellis Ross

quotes.quote: It takes a good 35-40 minutes to do my iconic ponytail every day.
quotes.author: Lili Reinhart

quotes.quote: I can't live without knowing I have my extensions and ponytail. So I can run out the door at the drop of a hat.
quotes.author: Christie Brinkley

quotes.quote: I won't usually make plans with people I don't know on Fridays because all I want to do is stick my hair in a ponytail and put on a big sweater, some tights and a pair of sneakers after a week working in the city.
quotes.author: Bobbi Brown

quotes.quote: I used to have long hair and get it done every two weeks, and it was never worth it to me. I would just walk out of the salon and put it in a ponytail anyway.
quotes.author: Syd

quotes.quote: The blonde playing hopscotch / had a tattoo / In a collision of eras / her ponytail flew
quotes.author: Kurt Philip Behm

quotes.quote: If at first you don't succeed, fix your ponytail and try again.
quotes.author: Source Unknown

quotes.quote: A slick ponytail is a great way to add a modern, minimal look to your outfit.
quotes.author: Brad Goreski

quotes.quote: You rarely get a convincing lecture on playing to your strength from a bald guy with a ponytail.
quotes.author: Dana Gould

quotes.quote: A chignon is an elegant twist on the ponytail and perfect for formal occasions. But it's also an easy and practical choice that works anytime you want to keep hair off your face.
quotes.author: Dante Pronio

quotes.quote: Suddenly a demon came and scarfed them / a demon with a ponytail and handlebar mustache / And I remained, silly bugger / an old bachelor ever after.
quotes.author: Hayyim Nahman Bialik

quotes.quote: Girls and young dancers in ancient Egypt and young girls in ancient Rome also wore their hair in the style that we now call a ponytail.
quotes.author: Victoria Sherrow

quotes.quote: The hairstyle known as ponytail can be seen on frescoes painted thousands of years ago in Crete, so it may have emerged in Greece during ancient times.
quotes.author: Victoria Sherrow

quotes.quote: Today, state fairs continue to sponsor hair contests of various kinds. For example, the Michigan State Fair has traditionally held a Longest Ponytail contest.
quotes.author: Victoria Sherrow

quotes.quote: Men in Europe and the American colonies wore short ponytails during the 1700s, or they wore wigs with a type of ponytail that was called queue.
quotes.author: Victoria Sherrow

quotes.quote: A ponytail can be neat, simple, and practical, since it keeps the hair off the face during certain jobs, sports, or other activities, and can be more comfortable in hot weather.
quotes.author: Victoria Sherrow

quotes.quote: The high ponytail is flattering for most face shapes and it's easy to do. When the ponytail is in place on the high crown area. It helps lift the face. This hairstyle is ideal for girls with naturally straight, thick hair and a silky texture.
quotes.author: Jenny Strebe

quotes.quote: The half pony is a very casual style and works well for mid-length hair. It's great if your hair is extremely thick because it allows you to wear your hair down but you have most of it pulled back and out of your face.
quotes.author: Jenny Strebe

quotes.quote:
The low pony is one of those simple classic styles that can be worn in a number of ways from sporty to chic.
This look is a great option for girls who have extremely thick hair.
quotes.author: Jenny Strebe

quotes.quote: French back pony. This style is perfect for anyone with heavy, limp hair that just won't hold in a ponytail.
quotes.author: Jenny Strebe

quotes.quote: Jingle bells, toy balloons / Lollipops and roller coaster rides / Love is made of jellybeans, butterflies / Ponytails and moonlit mountain sides.
quotes.author: Eddie Snyder

quotes.quote:
She's my kind of ponytail pretty / Sounds like the country / /Looks like the city / I march along to whatever / Out of town drum she plays me
She's my kind of crazy
quotes.author: Emerson Drive

quotes.quote: A rubberband hold me trousers up / A rubberband ponytails / If I could learn to twang like a rubberband / I'd be a rubberband girl
quotes.author: Bush Kate

quotes.quote:
Chantilly Lace had a pretty face and a ponytail hangin' down / A wiggle in her walk and a giggle in her talk
Make the world go 'round / Ain't nothing in the world like a big eyed girl
quotes.author: J.P. Richardson

quotes.quote: The conscious mind may be compared to a fountain playing in the sun and falling back into the great subterranean pool of subconscious from which it rises.
quotes.author: Sigmund Freud

quotes.quote: Pool side is my best side.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Pool Time.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: It’s just you and the pool.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Hanging by the pool.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: When I dip, you dip, we dip!
quotes.author: Freak Nasty

quotes.quote: When you have the whole pool to yourself.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Pool hair, don’t care
quotes.author: Glenda Evans

quotes.quote: And we’ll all float on okay
quotes.author: Modest Mouse

quotes.quote: Sun’s out, buns out.
quotes.author: Goody

quotes.quote: Life is cool by the pool.
quotes.author: Wendy Bronner

quotes.quote: Too pool for school
quotes.author: Karen Pickard-Four

quotes.quote: “Quit pool-ing my leg”
quotes.author: Robert M. Quackenbush

quotes.quote: “We’re pool for the summer”
quotes.author: RACHEL CHAPMAN

quotes.quote: Seas the day.
quotes.author: Stephanie April

quotes.quote: "Water you doing?"
quotes.author: Maren Johnson

quotes.quote: To infinity pool, and beyond.
quotes.author: Lana Jarnagan

quotes.quote: I'm really past in the pool.
quotes.author: George Sand

quotes.quote: Happiness is a day at the pool.
quotes.author: LaVonne Long

quotes.quote: Memories made at the pool last a lifetime.
quotes.author: Melinda Mahabir

quotes.quote: Prove to me that you're no fool Walk across my swimming pool.
quotes.author: Tim Rice

quotes.quote: The pool glitters, the fishes leap in the sun With joyous fins, and dive in the pool again.
quotes.author: Soun

quotes.quote:
"A still green Pool, where with soft sound and stir The shadows of o’erhanging branches sleep, Save where they leave one dreamy space of blue,
O’er whose soft stillness ever and anon."
quotes.author: William Cosmo Monkhouse

quotes.quote:
Kind hearts can tell, 'Tis that the pool is deep,, And the pool closes:
She dwelt here by the pool with its landing-stairs in ruins. Many an evening she had watched the moon made dizzy by the shaking of bamboo leaves.
quotes.author: Sydney Thompson Dobell

quotes.quote: By the pool that I see in my dreams, dear love, I have sat with you time and again and listened beneath the dank leaves, dear love, to the sibilant sound of the rain.
quotes.author: Mathilde Blind

quotes.quote: A pool is, for many of us in the West, a symbol not of affluence but of order, of control over the uncontrollable. A pool is water, made available and useful, and is, as such, infinitely soothing to the western eye.
quotes.author: Joan Didion

quotes.quote: Safe is good for sidewalks and swimming pools, but life requires risk if we are to get anywhere.
quotes.author: Simon Sinek

quotes.quote: If someone throws you in a pool and you can't swim, you're going to struggle.
quotes.author: Bernard Sumner

quotes.quote: Somedays you're the cue ball, somedays you are the eight ball
quotes.author: Pablo

quotes.quote: Swimming Pool was a very important moment for me because the character was written for me.
quotes.author: Ludivine Sagnier

quotes.quote: By desiring little, a poor man makes himself rich.
quotes.author: Democritus

quotes.quote: A poor man is like a foreigner in his own country.
quotes.author: Ali Ibn Abi Talib

quotes.quote: The poor man wants many things; the covetous man, all.
quotes.author: Herman Melville

quotes.quote: The poor man commands respect; the beggar must always excite anger.
quotes.author: French Proverb

quotes.quote: The poor man with industry is happier than the rich man in idleness.
quotes.author: Henry Ward Beecher

quotes.quote: A poor man is not the one without a cent. A poor man is the one without a dream.
quotes.author: Henry Ford

quotes.quote: The really poor man is not the one who lacks money, but the one who lacks the joy of the heart.
quotes.author: Chinmayananda Saraswati

quotes.quote: Be grateful that the poor man is there, so that by making a gift to him you are able to help yourself.
quotes.author: Swami Vivekananda

quotes.quote: When a poor man gives something, that is a sacrifice indeed. When a rich man gives something, it hardly rises to the same level.
quotes.author: David Baldacci

quotes.quote: A poor man knows the true value of money and will not dare waste it, but a rich man is extravagant and always looking for an opportunity to empty his pockets.
quotes.author: Michael Bassey Johnson

quotes.quote: A poor man's fear for money works against him.
quotes.author: Matthew Ashimolowo

quotes.quote: Live and think like a poor man and you'll always be OK.
quotes.author: Gene Simmons

quotes.quote: The poor man is poor because he will not heed instruction.
quotes.author: Fred C. White

quotes.quote: Almost every desire a poor man has is a punishable offence.
quotes.author: Louis-Ferdinand Celine

quotes.quote: The poor man is ruined as soon as he begins to ape the rich.
quotes.author: Publilius Syrus

quotes.quote: He is a poor man who can only measure his wealth in dollars.
quotes.author: Woodrow M. Kroll

quotes.quote: A poor man with nothing in his belly needs hope, illusion, more than bread.
quotes.author: Georges Bernanos

quotes.quote: The poor man's price of admittance to the favor of the rich is his self-respect.
quotes.author: Ambrose Bierce

quotes.quote: The poor man really has a stake in the country. The rich man hasn't; he can go away to New Guinea in a yacht.
quotes.author: G.K. Chesterton

quotes.quote: Poverty with joy isn't poverty at all. The poor man is not one who has little, but one who hankers after more.
quotes.author: Seneca The Younger

quotes.quote: In all conditions of life a poor man is a near neighbor to an honest one, and a rich man is as little removed from a knave.
quotes.author: Jean De La Bruyere

quotes.quote: I believe that honor and money nearly always go together... Seldom or never is a poor man honored by the world; however worthy of honor he may be, he is apt rather to be despised by it.
quotes.author: Teresa of Ávila

quotes.quote: To give aid to every poor man is far beyond the reach and power of every man. Care of the poor is incumbent on society as a whole.
quotes.author: Baruch Spinoza

quotes.quote: Ability is a poor man's wealth.
quotes.author: John Wooden

quotes.quote: Even a poor man can receive honors.
quotes.author: Sophocles

quotes.quote: Give, but, if possible, spare the poor man the shame of begging.
quotes.author: Denis Diderot

quotes.quote: It is harder for a poor man to be successful than it is for a rich man.
quotes.author: Gregory Nunn

quotes.quote: Pop music is created by repression - and then the system takes it and makes even more money with it!
quotes.author: Michel Gondry

quotes.quote: Pop music is always great for keeping the energy up, but it can get really old, especially after eight hours, just because there aren't that many great pop songs.
quotes.author: Emily Ratajkowski

quotes.quote: Pop music, across its countless iterations, is a vast, amazing, thrilling art form. All life is in it. It stands for itself. The same is true of literature, but nobody feels compelled to toss Philip Roth a grammy just to prove it.
quotes.author: David Bennun

quotes.quote: Pop music is a fashion, and fashions come and go. The public retires you as their tastes change.
quotes.author: Cliff Martinez

quotes.quote: Pop culture is a reflection of social change, not a cause of social change.
quotes.author: John Podhoretz

quotes.quote: Pop doesn't really look back. It can't. What makes pop work is simplicity.
quotes.author: Branford Marsalis

quotes.quote: Pop culture is great, but it can be bad, at times.
quotes.author: Aisha Tyler

quotes.quote: Pop music can somehow survive being inhibited and mangled by its harsh and stupid commercial chains, and there is surely irreducible potential because of the 'star system' and the volatile attention pop receives for multiples of wickedness, ridicule, discontent, eccentricity, desire to thrive importantly in a genuinely popular context.
quotes.author: Paul Morley

quotes.quote: Pop music can get inside us and enter our memory bubbles. It provides those true Proustian moments, unlocking sensations, unlocking our imaginations. Music inspired me as a filmmaker.
quotes.author: Todd Haynes

quotes.quote: Pop music has always adopted the style of marrying upbeat melodies to dour lyrics.
quotes.author: Colin Meloy

quotes.quote: Pop music provides not just the soundtrack to our lives, as the cliche goes; it releases our emotions and helps us to articulate them. This is why music is so important to adolescents, who are struggling with questions of identity and self-expression.
quotes.author: Sarah Churchwell

quotes.quote: Pop music has greater power to change people and to affect people because it's a universal language. You don't have to understand music to understand the power of a pop song.
quotes.author: Paul Epworth

quotes.quote: Pop music should be about young people.
quotes.author: Gary Kemp

quotes.quote: Pop music can play a large part in the way numerous young people determine their right to desire and their need to question.
quotes.author: Paul Morley

quotes.quote: Pop music really is a love and a joy and a science [of songwriting].
quotes.author: Halsey

quotes.quote: Pop changes week to week month to month. But great music is like literature.
quotes.author: Ravi Shankar

quotes.quote: Pop music - what used to be known as rock music, a loud novelty - can be something more than a pointless, artificial diversion.
quotes.author: Paul Morley

quotes.quote: Popular culture is a place where pity is called compassion, flattery is called love, propaganda is called knowledge, tension is called peace, gossip is called news, and auto-tune is called singing.
quotes.author: Criss Jami

quotes.quote: Pop culture shapes our ideas of what is normal and what our dreams can be and what our roles are. Politics, of course, decides how the power and the money in the country is distributed. Both are equally important, and each affects the other.
quotes.author: Gloria Steinem

quotes.quote: If pop culture is a pool, it never hurts to dive into the deep end once in a while.
quotes.author: Greg Gutfeld

quotes.quote: Pop culture and entertainment can be dismissed as surface, but it's not. It's the language we all speak, and it's the connection point between people all over the world.
quotes.author: Bozoma Saint John

quotes.quote: Pop culture has none of the vibrancy that you find in the folk culture, where people speak directly to their own experience in the human condition.
quotes.author: Harry Belafonte

quotes.quote: I love how pop culture shapes a generation. The trends, fashion and events all play a key part in how we live our present lives, and will mark how we will be remembered in the future.
quotes.author: Connor Franta

quotes.quote: Pop is about speaking everybody's language. The imagery and iconography we instantly recognize. When you can rely on things that the public already knows, you're dealing with Pop.
quotes.author: Nuno Roque

quotes.quote: My hunch is that pop culture began to stagnate the moment Americans started to love the past more than they did the future.
quotes.author: Graydon Carter

quotes.quote: People constantly make pop-culture references. That's why it's called popular culture, because people are aware of it and reference it constantly.
quotes.author: Seth Rogen

quotes.quote: Pop culture, it's crazy. There's all this violence in video games. In 'Call of Duty,' people are literally just blowing other people up. Hey, let's protect your country from your couch while eating your sandwich.
quotes.author: Natasha Leggero

quotes.quote: Urban pop culture is its own phenomena that is for some reason is left out of Hollywood. It's the most mainstream thing there is.
quotes.author: Russell Simmons

quotes.quote: Guided by nothing but pop culture values, many children no longer learn how to think about morality and virtue, or to think of them at all. They grow up with no shared moral framework, believing that the highest values are diversity, tolerance and non-judgmentalism.
quotes.author: Gary Bauer

quotes.quote: Pop culture is not about depth. It's about marketing, supply and demand, consumerism.
quotes.author: Trevor Dunn

quotes.quote: Pop culture is a reflection of social change, not a cause of social change.
quotes.author: John Podhoretz

quotes.quote: If you keep up with pop culture, everybody knows the joke.
quotes.author: Shawn Wayans

quotes.quote: It's part of our pop culture to give animals human personalities and talents.
quotes.author: Neil deGrasse Tyson

quotes.quote: It really is true that when an issue becomes pop culture, it changes faster, and it's really great for the issue.
quotes.author: Jack Antonoff

quotes.quote: I think pop culture underestimates people. The message is, 'Being yourself is the worst thing you could possibly be.' But people are still attracted to it.
quotes.author: Lykke Li

quotes.quote: More students have a better knowledge of pop culture than of the Constitution.
quotes.author: Charles Bowen

quotes.quote: It really is a measure of the brands that are important in pop culture. These are the brands that have for whatever reason created relevance that really resonates in pop culture. It's the brands people are using to define themselves right now.
quotes.author: Lucian James

quotes.quote: I don't like popcorn, and I think it's so annoying when people have popcorn in the theaters. That is the loudest food.
quotes.author: Tyler Perry

quotes.quote: For me, a snack is supposed to be unhealthy! I like having chips or popcorn when I'm on set.
quotes.author: Sara Sampaio

quotes.quote: Popcorn is one of the only situations in which you eat the result of an explosion.
quotes.author: Demitri Martin

quotes.quote: Popcorn is one of the only situations in which you eat the result of an explosion.
quotes.author: Demitri Martin

quotes.quote: Popcorn for breakfast! Why not? It's a grain. It's like grits, but with high self-esteem.
quotes.author: James Patterson

quotes.quote: Im a popcorn fanatic. No matter how full I am, I can eat popcorn.
quotes.author: Julianne Phillips

quotes.quote: People that say I have a 'fear of commitment' don't understand my relationship with popcorn.
quotes.author: Dov Davidoff

quotes.quote: I am a big popcorn fanatic. I love popcorn. In fact one year for my birthday, my husband bought me one of those big popcorn machines like they have in movie theaters.
quotes.author: Debbie Macomber

quotes.quote: I've never met a popcorn ball I didn't like.
quotes.author: Deb Caletti

quotes.quote: I'm pretty great at eating. Mostly popcorn. I'm serious: I can finish a whole bag of popcorn in under 5 minutes, give or take.
quotes.author: Olivia Holt

quotes.quote: Love is sharing your popcorn.
quotes.author: Charles M. Schulz

quotes.quote: When you get old, everything is hurting. When I get up in the morning, it sounds like I'm making popcorn.
quotes.author: Lawrence Taylor

quotes.quote: Hearing nuns' confessions is like being stoned to death with popcorn.
quotes.author: Fulton J. Sheen

quotes.quote: Fresh popcorn is near impossible to resist, second only to fresh doughnuts.
quotes.author: Shannon Wiersbitzky

quotes.quote: Popcorn is the sentimental good time Charlie of American foods.
quotes.author: Patricia Linden

quotes.quote: Of course life is bizarre, the more bizarre it gets, the more interesting it is. The only way to approach it is to make yourself some popcorn and enjoy the show.
quotes.author: David Gerrold

quotes.quote: So I'm not going to drink anymore. I'm going to freeze it now and eat it like a Popsicle.
quotes.author: Dean Martin

quotes.quote: People can do great things. However, there are some things they just can't do. I, for instance, have not been able to transform myself into a Popsicle, despite years of effort.
quotes.author: Brandon Sanderson

quotes.quote: Her hair was strawberry blond, and she had the shape of a Popsicle stick: turn her sideways and she practically disappeared.
quotes.author: Becca Fitzpatrick

quotes.quote: I've had so many bikini waxes, I cry every time I see a Popsicle stick.
quotes.author: Libba Bray

quotes.quote: Well, we better be quick and not become human Popsicle. I’m going to be really upset at you if I freeze to death.
quotes.author: Sherrilyn Kenyon

quotes.quote: There's blood, a taste I remember. It tastes of orange Popsicle, penny gumballs, red licorice, gnawed hair, dirty ice.
quotes.author: Margaret Atwood

quotes.quote: Okay, well, let's do a little reenactment. I'm the gay-looking DiCaprio and you're Rose. You have to keep your eyes open and on my face, or you'll have let me go and I'll turn into a huge gay Popsicle.
quotes.author: P. C. Cast

quotes.quote: Sisters - they share the agony and the exhilaration. As youngsters they may share Popsicle, chewing gum, hair dryers and bedrooms. When they grow up, they share confidences, careers and children, and some even chat for hours every day.
quotes.author: Roxanne Brown

quotes.quote: This is fun. Playing with Popsicle sticks, exploring ways to store kinetic energy. It's like preschool all over again.
quotes.author: Chuck Lorre

quotes.quote: You're my Popsicle / From the very first time / I met you / I knew you captured me / You're my Popsicle
quotes.author: Larry Johnson

quotes.quote: Fudge, tutti-frutti and a grape that's fine / Buy one for me and one for my chick / A lot of good eating on a Popsicle stick
quotes.author: Bryan Charles Hollon

quotes.quote: Some people buy Popsicles just for kicks / But me and my baby we save the sticks / To keep brother and sister quiet as a mouse / We give them Popsicle sticks to build a Popsicle house
quotes.author: Bryan Charles Hollon

quotes.quote: So when you hear the bell go ding a ling / That's the Popsicle man and he's the goody king / Save Popsicle wrappers and before long / You'll win a phonograph to play this record on
quotes.author: Bryan Charles Hollon

quotes.quote: Popsicle of love / Gimme gimme gimme one of those / (It's summertime, boy!) / coconut delight / Honey honey honey don't let go / (It's summertime, love)
quotes.author: Chris Frantz

quotes.quote: Downtown / Waiting for that very special / Comes in to see what I got / Orange Popsicles and lemonade
quotes.author: Cindy Wilson

quotes.quote: I remember my summer with you / Cherry Popsicles sand in my toes / Rolled down windows, hold my hand, hold me close
quotes.author: Bridgit Claire Mendler

quotes.quote: Popsicle loving, pie crusts, / Promises, ice cream kisses / That I'm really gonna miss you.
quotes.author: Maloy

quotes.quote: Like carnivals and carousels / Popsicles and wishing wells / And I am so in love with you
quotes.author: Teddy Randazzo

quotes.quote: I need a Popsicle / Do you want lemon or lime / I've got a special today / If you've got the time
quotes.author: Michael Bruce

quotes.quote: When it's hot, eat a root beer, a Popsicle / Shut off the AC and roll the windows down / Let that summer sun shine
quotes.author: Lori Mckenna
