quotes.quote: As my love affair with the Popsicle mold blossomed, so did the world's love of Popsicles.
quotes.author: Sarah Bond

quotes.quote: In a rainbow of colors, ice pops are the quintessential treat.
quotes.author: Shelly Kaldunski

quotes.quote: Many of us associate ice pops with childhood: a frosty snack on a hot day, or the trophy for chasing down the neighborhood truck after school.
quotes.author: Shelly Kaldunski

quotes.quote: The truth is, few adults are immune to ice pops' charms, though some may have learned more refined eating habits.
quotes.author: Shelly Kaldunski

quotes.quote: Homemade Popsicles are so much better, and lots of fun to make with kids.
quotes.author: Tammy Gangloff

quotes.quote: Colored Popsicles on a hot day / Cool ice in late May / Artificial color and flavor / Tastes one needs to savor
quotes.author: Steven Paalz

quotes.quote: On a hot day feels nice / Colored Popsicles on a hot day / What else could you say?
quotes.author: Steven Paalz

quotes.quote: Summer is the time to hit the freezer and grab Popsicle. Frozen sugar ices on a stick are easy to eat and help beat the heat.
quotes.author: Richard W Hartel

quotes.quote: A Popsicle may be a simple treat, but there is still a lot of science involved.
quotes.author: Richard W Hartel

quotes.quote: Many people enjoy eating frozen Popsicles and ice cream cones in hot summer days.
quotes.author: Molly Aloian

quotes.quote: True popularity is not the popularity which is followed after, but the popularity which follows after.
quotes.author: Lord Mansfield

quotes.quote: Being known by everyone is not the same as being loved.
quotes.author: Dean Koontz

quotes.quote: Popularity - a piece of faded tinsel, that is out of date.
quotes.author: Victor Hugo

quotes.quote: There is a price for popularity. Critics look for your weaknesses, your flaws, anything that makes the work seem like a fluke and not seem worthy of all the attention it's getting.
quotes.author: Terry McMillan

quotes.quote: Love of popularity may create an artificial goodness, and stir up hypocrisy to adorn a whited sepulcher.
quotes.author: Lydia Howard Sigourney

quotes.quote: Popularity has become its own justification.
quotes.author: Jonathan Franzen

quotes.quote: Popular feeling is very often sentimental, muddle-headed, and eminently unsound, but it cannot be disregarded for all that.
quotes.author: Agatha Christie

quotes.quote: True popularity comes from acts of kindness rather than acts of stupidity.
quotes.author: Bo Bennett

quotes.quote: Popularity is bound in issues of finding a public for oneself, an audience for which one might perform.
quotes.author: Jeffrey Steven Doty

quotes.quote: Anyone who is popular is bound to be disliked.
quotes.author: Yogi Berra

quotes.quote: Popularity makes no sense If your fame is a shame.
quotes.author: Michael Bassey Johnson

quotes.quote: Popularity comes from allowing yourself to be bored by people while pretending to enjoy it.
quotes.author: Karol Newlin

quotes.quote: Popularity is not an accurate measurement of a man's worth in his community, nor of his estimation by Jehovah God.
quotes.author: Henry T. Scholl

quotes.quote: Popularity is a form of collaborative filtering, which is a technology that uses the preferences of a community of users to recommend items to individual users.
quotes.author: Mark Levene

quotes.quote: Popularity is generally an appeal to the people from the sentence given by men of sense against them.
quotes.author: George Savile

quotes.quote: Feeling harder to be oneself might be a curse of popularity.
quotes.author: Toba Beta

quotes.quote: Popularity is not a guarantee of quality.
quotes.author: Indira Gandhi

quotes.quote: The consequences of seeking popularity is not only the chronic feeling of lonliness, but a desire to hide your face from the eyes of the universe.
quotes.author: Michael Bassey Johnson

quotes.quote: People think being famous is so glamorous, but half the time you're in a strange hotel room living out of a suitcase.
quotes.author: Ja Rule

quotes.quote: Popularity is the easiest thing in the world to gain and it is the hardest thing to hold
quotes.author: Will Rogers

quotes.quote: Popular opinion is the greatest lie in the world.
quotes.author: Thomas Carlyle

quotes.quote: That's the definition of popularity. Something that literally resonates with many, many people.
quotes.author: Tod Machover

quotes.quote: Whatever is popular deserves attention.
quotes.author: James Mackintosh

quotes.quote: False has many wings. Do not judge anything by its popularity.
quotes.author: Amit Ray

quotes.quote: Popularity is glory's small change.
quotes.author: Victor Hugo

quotes.quote: Popularity is like the brightness of a falling star, the fleeting splendor of a rainbow, the bubble that is sure to burst by its very inflation.
quotes.author: Horace Smith

quotes.quote: Avoid popularity if you would have peace.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.quote: Popularity is neither fame nor greatness.
quotes.author: William Hazlitt

quotes.quote: When a hypocrite or a wicked leader is in power, anyone that becomes popular or stands out easily becomes a prey.
quotes.author: Sunday Adelaja

quotes.quote: Do not yearn to be popular; be exquisite. Do not desire to be famous; be loved. Do not take pride in being expected; be palpable, unmistakable.
quotes.author: C. JoyBell C

quotes.quote: The increase in the world's population represents our victory against death.
quotes.author: Julian Lincoln Simon

quotes.quote: In a saturated population life is always cheap.
quotes.author: Jack London

quotes.quote: Population pressure is the ultimate cause of every war.
quotes.author: Alexei Panshin

quotes.quote: Real problem is not population explosion, but what the population is doing.
quotes.author: Radhanath Swami

quotes.quote: The superior power of population cannot be checked without producing misery or vice.
quotes.author: Thomas Malthus

quotes.quote: In a region with a growing population, if you're doing nothing, you're losing ground.
quotes.author: Stewart Udall

quotes.quote: It is the population which decides when it's time for a leader to leave, not foreign powers.
quotes.author: Paul Kagame

quotes.quote: You cannot control your own population by force, but it can be distracted by consumption.
quotes.author: Noam Chomsky

quotes.quote: We all worry about the population explosion, but we don't worry about it at the right time.
quotes.author: Art Hoppe

quotes.quote: Given continued high rates of population increase, all environmental victories are temporary.
quotes.author: Thomas W. Horton

quotes.quote: Nature's standard operating procedure, pairing a population explosion with a population crash.
quotes.author: Alfred W. Crosby

quotes.quote: Technology made large populations possible; large populations now make technology indispensable.
quotes.author: Joseph Wood Krutch

quotes.quote: The population problem has no technical solution; it requires a fundamental extension in morality.
quotes.author: Garrett Hardin

quotes.quote: The general population doesn't know what's happening, and it doesn't even know that it doesn't know.
quotes.author: Noam Chomsky

quotes.quote: Population, when unchecked, goes on doubling itself every 25 years or increases in a geometrical ratio.
quotes.author: Thomas Malthus

quotes.quote: The negative impact of population growth on all of our planetary ecosystems is becoming appallingly evident.
quotes.author: David Rockefeller

quotes.quote: Population growth is exceeding farmers' ability to keep up...Our oldest enemy, hunger, is again at the door.
quotes.author: Lester R. Brown

quotes.quote: A finite world can support only a finite population; therefore, population growth must eventually equal zero.
quotes.author: Garrett Hardin

quotes.quote: Every segment of our population, and every individual, has a right to expect from his government a fair deal.
quotes.author: Harry S. Truman

quotes.quote: Population control is not an issue involving contraceptives for third world women. It is an issue of ecological justice.
quotes.author: Vandana Shiva

quotes.quote: Population growth and the proliferation of mega-cities around the world redefines the entire global security agenda.
quotes.author: Helmut Schmidt

quotes.quote: There is a hugely underserved population out there... those who are the least capable of paying pay the highest.
quotes.author: James Cameron

quotes.quote: When the population is filled with peace and harmony it ripens like fruit that turns to rot in a jiff if not preserved by change.
quotes.author: John Lindberg

quotes.quote: It's not about keeping up the population, it's about passing on who we are and what we've learned, so things keep going. So we don't just end.
quotes.author: Isaac Marion

quotes.quote: A population that does not take care of the elderly and of children and the young has no future, because it abuses both its memory and its promise.
quotes.author: Pope Francis

quotes.quote: There would be no population explosion if people who are trying to keep the wolf from the door wouldn't let the stork fly in through the window.
quotes.author: Evan Esar

quotes.quote: Our population is headed for a stable plateau, which means an aging population.
quotes.author: Emanuel Celler

quotes.quote: A refugee population is hungry for language and aware that anything can happen.
quotes.author: Anne Carson

quotes.quote: The key thing you can do to reduce population growth is actually improve health.
quotes.author: Bill Gates

quotes.quote: The world's population will multiply more rapidly than the available food supply.
quotes.author: Thomas Malthus

quotes.quote: Friends are the pillars on your porch. Sometimes they hold you up, sometimes they lean on you, and sometimes it's just enough to know that they are standing by.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: If you can't run with the big dogs, stay up on the porch.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: The swing on your porch is a better liver of life than the chair in front of your desk.
quotes.author: Terri Guillemets

quotes.quote: Maybe marriages were made in heaven, but we believe in giving the old-fashioned porch-swing some credit.
quotes.author: ROBERT ELLIOTT GONZALES

quotes.quote: The people in your life are like the pillars on your porch. Sometimes they hold you up, and sometimes they lean on you. Sometimes it's enough to know they are standing by.
quotes.author: Merle Shain

quotes.quote: A person born to be a flower pot will not go beyond the porch.
quotes.author: Mexican Proverb

quotes.quote: A British porch is a musty, forbidding non-room in which to fling a sodden umbrella or a muddy pair of boots; a guard against the elements and strangers. By contrast the good ol' American front porch seems to stand for positivity and openness; a platform from which to welcome or wave farewell; a place where things of significance could happen.
quotes.author: Dan Stevens

quotes.quote: The best kind of friend is the one you could sit on a porch with, never saying a word, and walk away feeling like that was the best conversation you've had.
quotes.author: Author Unknown

quotes.quote: We cannot resist the conviction that this world is for us only the porch of another and more magnificent temple of the Creator's majesty.
quotes.author: Frederick William Faber

quotes.quote: There is a child in every one of us who is still a trick-or-treater looking for a brightly-lit front porch.
quotes.author: Robert Brault

quotes.quote: The ego is like a tired old dog. We can never kill it, so put it out on the back porch, let it rest there, and step around it.
quotes.author: Carlos Castaneda

quotes.quote: Ever the words of the gods resound; But the porches of man's ear seldom in this low life's round are unsealed, that he may hear.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Make your front porch a part of your home, and it will make you a part of the world.
quotes.author: John Sarris

quotes.quote: Money can't buy happiness but it'll sure keep a mess of grief off your front porch
quotes.author: James Lee Burke

quotes.quote: Marriage is like a well-built porch. If one of the two posts leans too much, the porch collapses. So each must be strong enough to stand on its own.
quotes.author: Deb Caletti

quotes.quote: Porsche....there is no substitute
quotes.author: Ferdinand Porsche

quotes.quote: Fast cars like Porsches and Ferraris - they are things of beauty.
quotes.author: Rod Stewart

quotes.quote: A Porsche will always look like a Porsche. My grandfather took these shapes from nature, so the head lamps of the 911 maybe look a little like the eyes of a frog, but it comes from nature, and the best shapes are from nature, so why change?
quotes.author: Ferdinand Alexander Porsche

quotes.quote: I'm starting to think about things that I want to do, things that are fun. One of them is driving a car like a Porsche. I've driven a lot of cars - sedans, trucks and big family vehicles all year long. But there's nothing like a four-wheel-drive Porsche.
quotes.author: Kevin O'Leary

quotes.quote: I do enjoy wearing Japanese and Italian clothing. I also enjoy my blue jeans or tennis shorts and running shoes. I like driving a Porsche because it is an elegant machine and it is a very beautiful experience to drive it. It's magnificently made.
quotes.author: Frederick Lenz

quotes.quote: I'll be okay. I'm gonna calm down and go downstairs and I'm gonna take a nice, leisurely drive in my Porsche.
quotes.author: Mitchell Kapner

quotes.quote: Taking away my Porsche! Making me get a job!
quotes.author: Steve Franks

quotes.quote: No offense, Clark, but I don't think you could outrun my Porsche.
quotes.author: Alfred Gough

quotes.quote: You understand this isn't a Porsche, right? This is a quantum-drive engine that makes a thousand trillion calculations every millisecond.
quotes.author: Seth MacFarlane

quotes.quote: Used to have two cars, traded them in. Now we're down to one. Good economic sense, although the new car's a Porsche, for her
quotes.author: Greg Daniels

quotes.quote: Welcome back to Whose Line Is It Anyway, where everything's made up and the points don't matter. That's right, the points are just like everything else when you own a Porsche.
quotes.author: Mark Leveson

quotes.quote: Every time I put out something new I get an endorsement / I'm trying to go to the lot, buy his and hers new Porsche's / Marry her for one year then I'm gonna get divorced quick
quotes.author: Bryan Williams

quotes.quote: I went from old school Chevys to drop top Porsches / You couldn't walk a mile off in my air forces / And you ain't did what I did / Where you from, you gotta get how you live
quotes.author: Demetrius Stewart

quotes.quote: I heard it's money on my head, can't let them take my life / I keep a Glock up in the Porsche 'cause I ain't living right
quotes.author: Nick Simmons

quotes.quote: All I want to do is ride around shining while I can afford it / Plenty ice on my neck so I don't get nauseous / Float around in the greatest of Porsche's / Feel like a chuck wagon 'cause I'm on twelve horses
quotes.author: Gene Elliot Jr Thornton

quotes.quote: Me on the horse, we ran out of the place (the place) / Then we took my Porsche back to my place / Stupid horse, I just fell out of the Porsche / Lost the money in my bank account, oh no
quotes.author: Dylan Brady

quotes.quote: I remember picking watermelons / Now the Porsche cost me a quarter million! / If I die tonight I know I'm coming back nigga / Reincarnated: big black fat nigga!
quotes.author: Roshun Walker

quotes.quote: Is it just a deception tactic, the way it stands so firmly on its broad wheels and tires? If so, it's a fascinating one - a Porsche specially elegantly interpreted on yet another fine new model. It seems to say: I'm perfect, want me!
quotes.author: Jutta Deiss

quotes.quote: Porsche was capable of some very high speeds for such a small engine car.
quotes.author: Brian Long

quotes.quote: Porsche creates different kinds of cars for different kinds of car racing.
quotes.author: Simon Mulligan

quotes.quote: If people can't tell the difference between a Porsche and a Buick they won't see why the're paying more for the Porsche.
quotes.author: Alante' Adams

quotes.quote: Don't go into the middle where everyone else is be that Porsche. Know that your brand is destined for greatness and people will hope that can rub off on them also.
quotes.author: Alante' Adams

quotes.quote: An Oldsmobile can't compete with a Porsche. A luxury brand gives the customer high quality service.
quotes.author: Alante' Adams

quotes.quote: Driving a Porsche in London is like bringing a Ming vase to a football game.
quotes.author: Douglas Adams

quotes.quote: There are a lot of impractical things about owning a Porsche. But they're all offset by the driving experience. It really is unique. Lamborghinis and Ferraris come close. And they are more powerful, but they don't handle like a Porsche.
quotes.author: Kevin O'Leary

quotes.quote: A car should not only be functional, but should also have a beautiful appearance.
quotes.author: Ferry Porsche

quotes.quote: You may always modify a Porsche, but its character and inimitable quality must be maintained.
quotes.author: Ferry Porsche

quotes.quote: To sit on a ranch horse that's been broken in, it's like getting in a Porsche.
quotes.author: Sam Shepard

quotes.quote: Design must be functional and functionality must be translated into visual aesthetics, without any reliance on gimmicks that have to be explained.
quotes.author: Ferdinand Porsche

quotes.quote: The perfect racing car crosses the finish line first and subsequently falls into its component parts.
quotes.author: Ferdinand Porsche

quotes.quote: Every portrait that is painted with feeling is a portrait of the artist, not of the sitter.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: In a portrait, you have room to have a point of view and to be conceptual with a picture. The image may not be literally what's going on, but it's representative.
quotes.author: Annie Leibovitz

quotes.quote: There are only two styles of portrait painting; the serious and the smirk.
quotes.author: Charles Dickens

quotes.quote: To sit for one's portrait is like being present at one's own creation.
quotes.author: Alexander Smith

quotes.quote: A true portrait should, today and a hundred years from today, the Testimony of how this person looked and what kind of human being he was.
quotes.author: Philippe Halsman

quotes.quote: The severe portrait that is not the greatest joy in the world to the subject may be enormously interesting to the reader.
quotes.author: Irving Penn

quotes.quote: A portrait is a painting with something wrong with the mouth.
quotes.author: John Singer Sargent

quotes.quote: When having my portrait painted I don't want justice, I want mercy.
quotes.author: Billy Hughes

quotes.quote: The reason some portraits don't look true to life is that some people make no effort to resemble their pictures.
quotes.author: Salvador Dali

quotes.quote: A portrait is like an ornamental headstone. It is not for the subject, but for those who look upon it. For those you want to remember.
quotes.author: Julie Klassen

quotes.quote: A portrait is not made in the camera but on either side of it.
quotes.author: Edward Steichen

quotes.quote: A portrait isn't a fact but an opinion - an occasion rather than a truth.
quotes.author: Richard Avedon

quotes.quote: Portraits are the most intimate photographs. The image will survive the subject.
quotes.author: Victor Skrebneski

quotes.quote: A study of family portraits is enough to convert a man to the theory of reincarnation.
quotes.author: Arthur Conan Doyle

quotes.quote: A portrait, to be a work of art, neither must nor may resemble the sitter... one must paint its atmosphere.
quotes.author: Umberto Boccioni

quotes.quote: When you start with a portrait and try to find pure form by abstracting more and more, you must end up with an egg.
quotes.author: Pablo Picasso

quotes.quote: For me, a good portrait shows the fragility and humility of the person, and at the same time a strength, a resting in themselves.
quotes.author: Wolfgang Tillmans

quotes.quote: Nothing in a portrait is a matter of indifference. Gesture, grimace, clothing, decor even - all must combine to realize a character.
quotes.author: Charles Baudelaire

quotes.quote: To demand the portrait that will be a complete portrait of a person is as futile as to demand that a motion picture be condensed into a single still.
quotes.author: Alfred Stieglitz

quotes.quote: When you are doing portraits, you have that intimacy with someone for a few minutes. For a really good portrait, you don't take the portrait - it's given.
quotes.author: Giles Duley

quotes.quote: Painting someone's portrait is, of course, an impossible task. What an absurd idea to try and distil a human being, the most complex organism on the planet, into flicks, washes, and blobs of paint on a two-dimensional surface.
quotes.author: David Cobley

quotes.quote: A portrait is not a likeness. The moment an emotion or fact is transformed into a photograph it is no longer a fact but an opinion. There is no such thing as inaccuracy in a photograph. All photographs are accurate. None of them is the truth.
quotes.author: Richard Avedon

quotes.quote: And painted portraits have a life of their own that comes from deep in the soul of the painter and where the machine can't go.
quotes.author: Vincent Van Gogh

quotes.quote: Portraits are supposed to "look within," but in my opinion very few people have an interior significantly different from the outside portrait.
quotes.author: Jon Witcomb

quotes.quote: A Portrait of the artist as a young man is in fact the gestation of a soul.
quotes.author: Richard Ellmann

quotes.quote: The portrait I do best is of the person I know best.
quotes.author: Nadar

quotes.quote: Portraits are about revealing aspects of an individual.
quotes.author: Kehinde Wiley

quotes.quote: In a portrait, you always leave part of yourself behind.
quotes.author: Mary Ellen Mark

quotes.quote: A family portrait is only complete with love to fill it's frame.
quotes.author: Wes Fesler

quotes.quote: The portrait of my parents is a complicated one, but lovingly drawn.
quotes.author: Joyce Maynard

quotes.quote: If there is one portion of Europe which was made by the sea more than another, Portugal is that slice, that portion, that belt. Portugal was made by the atlantic.
quotes.author: Hilaire Belloc

quotes.quote: By day Lisbon has a naive theatrical quality that enchants and captivates, but by night it is a fairy-tale city, descending over lighted terraces to the sea, like a woman in festive garments going down to meet her dark lover.
quotes.author: Erich Maria Remarque

quotes.quote: Any Portugese town looks like bride's finery - something old, something new, something borrowed, and something blue.
quotes.author: Mary Mccarthy

quotes.quote: Wet or fine, the air of Portugal has a natural happiness in it, and the people of the country should be as happy and prosperous as any people in the world.
quotes.author: HG Wells

quotes.quote: People of my generation in Portugal fell into the magic potion of political ideas. What was very funny about this revolution was that it did not bring wealth to the Portuguese. But it brought language, ideas. You'd go to the fish market, and all the women who were selling fish would call each other fascist, communist.
quotes.author: Maria De Medeiros

quotes.quote: Portugal was born in the shadow of the Catholic Church and religion, from the beginning it was the formative element of the soul of the nation and the dominant trait of character of the Portuguese people.
quotes.author: Antonio de Oliveira Salazar

quotes.quote: But Portugal has a peaceful feel about it. I sit on the terrace overlooking the vineyard there and I feel cut off from the world. You need that sort of thing.
quotes.author: Cliff Richard

quotes.quote: Portugal is a high hill with a white watch tower on it flying signal flags. It is apparently inhabited by one man who lives in a long row of yellow houses with red roofs, and populated by sheep who do grand acts of balancing on the side of the hill.
quotes.author: Richard H. Davis

quotes.quote: In Portugal, my sculpture 'She Changes' refers to the town's fishing history, to the era of seafaring trade and discovery. The contemporary site is industrial, surrounded by red and white striped smokestacks, which is mirrored in the pattern of the sculpture.
quotes.author: Janet Echelman

quotes.quote: Portugal is still one of those places, ... where you can have a really great dinner out, which might cost $18 to $23 in Manhattan, only costs about $9 to $11 in Portugal.
quotes.author: Melisse Gelula

quotes.quote: The whole of Portugal has made a huge effort to be ready. The passion and enthusiasm of the Portuguese people show for football has also been brought to these preparations and I am convinced that they will make an enthralling and exciting tournament. The preparations in Portugal are going extremely well and we can look forward to a wonderful festival of football.
quotes.author: Senes Erzik

quotes.quote: Portugal have a national team called Cristiano Ronaldo and a group of players who run after him.
quotes.author: Carlos Queiroz

quotes.quote: The Lisbon hub is important to Portugal, the country. That's not going to go away. It needs to be there. The country depends on tourism.
quotes.author: David Neeleman

quotes.quote: I suppose I have become a sort of living monument in Portugal. But I come from a family with roots all over the world, so the idea of patriotism is not very strong in me. My country is the country of Chekhov, Beethoven, Velasquez - writers I like, painters and artists I admire.
quotes.author: Antonio Lobo Antunes

quotes.quote: It's a gorgeous country with all sorts of history, ... A lot of Europeans vacation in Portugal, but it hasn't really caught on with North Americans.
quotes.author: Melisse Gelula

quotes.quote: Produced a race of heroes, so not less surely did the growth of luxury and absolutism, assisted by the narrow-mindedness of a dynasty of bigots, lose for Portugal the lofty place which her heroes had won for her. These are things well worth pondering upon and lessons well worth learning, for the great value of the study of history is in teaching such truths as these - truths which are eternal, while nations wax and wane. The
quotes.author: H. Morse Stephens

quotes.quote: I've had to spend an awful lot of my life trying to pretend I'm not posh. Although once I open my mouth, I rather let things out the bag.
quotes.author: Celia Imrie

quotes.quote: I'm not actually posh; I'm really rough and from the wrong side of the tracks. I grew up in Putney, which is pretty rough.
quotes.author: Jack Whitehall

quotes.quote: I worry I look posh and fat. I can't do anything about posh - I'm accentless - but I've spent 20 years battling my weight.
quotes.author: Karren Brady

quotes.quote: No matter how irrelevant social class now is, even the most eager egalitarian must be quietly proud that the posh English rose is still an industry standard for peerlessly sophisticated beauty.
quotes.author: Kate Reardon

quotes.quote: Posh people blow my mind. Apart from empathy, they're good at everything - true survivalists.
quotes.author: Katherine Ryan

quotes.quote: I don't live a very posh life. There are no drivers waiting or people doing everything for me. I pretty much live like a normal person... It's not good to have a life without responsibilities, you know?
quotes.author: Liv Tyler

quotes.quote: If someone thinks I'm posh, it just shows how lowly they are. Some people think I went to Eton. I'm far too stupid to get into Eton.
quotes.author: Sebastian Horsley

quotes.quote: Posh does not equal style. Really, God, that's just ridiculous. Posh equals tradition. Anyone can achieve style. It doesn't matter who you are or where you're from.
quotes.author: Susannah Constantine

quotes.quote: They were so posh that even their Dutch sounded French.
quotes.author: Stefan Hertmans

quotes.quote: All true, of course. I can’t deny my posh accent or my privileged background. But there are things they don’t know about me, too. Things long-buried and forgotten about.
quotes.author: Jane Holland

quotes.quote: I understand that people want to see just the posh side of fashion, but fashion is a lot of work.
quotes.author: Alessandro Michele

quotes.quote: I don't like posh hotels. I like small, eclectic hotels, and luxury for me would mean really good company with good food in a really funky, beautiful house in the middle of a field where someone came and serviced the place for us.
quotes.author: Amanda Donohoe

quotes.quote: I don't think you can get any more working class than me. Everyone seems posh to me.
quotes.author: Danny Dyer

quotes.quote: When posh boys get into trouble they sack the servants.
quotes.author: Dennis Skinner

quotes.quote: There's a difference between being posh and being rich.
quotes.author: Kate Reardon

quotes.quote: It's quite confusing being one of the less wealthy people at a posh place.
quotes.author: Sally Phillips

quotes.quote: We want everybody to have the best facilities in which to work, but we do not believe in posh and impressive private offices.
quotes.author: Akio Morita

quotes.quote: I've never been aware of the difference between so-called posh actors and working-class actors.
quotes.author: Douglas Booth

quotes.quote: I was obsessed with the Spice Girls! I always wanted to be Sporty. Or Posh, but I wasn't pretty enough.
quotes.author: Jessie J

quotes.quote: I'm a terrible sort of non-fussy eater, really. I don't like posh food very much, and the more ingredients something's got in it, the less I tend to like it.
quotes.author: Jo Brand

quotes.quote: Posh is a way of living that can often be quite miserly and not about money.
quotes.author: Kate Reardon

quotes.quote: I certainly never saw myself as posh.
quotes.author: Laura Carmichael

quotes.quote: I'm not posh or common, I'm in between.
quotes.author: Martin Freeman

quotes.quote: I don't think it's the case that 'posh actors' get more work than others.
quotes.author: Richard E. Grant

quotes.quote: He just showed up like a posh vampire I accidentally invited in, then couldn't make leave.
quotes.author: Rachel Hawkins

quotes.quote: Career is just posh slavery.
quotes.author: Tom Hodgkinson

quotes.quote: If you want light to come into your life, you need to stand where it is shining.
quotes.author: Guy Finley

quotes.quote: Believe in yourself! Have faith in your abilities! Without a humble but reasonable confidence in your own powers you cannot be successful or happy.
quotes.author: Norman Vincent Peale

quotes.quote: Cultivate an optimistic mind, use your imagination, always consider alternatives, and dare to believe that you can make possible what others think is impossible.
quotes.author: Rodolfo Costa

quotes.quote: If you have a positive attitude and constantly strive to give your best effort, eventually you will overcome your immediate problems and find you are ready for greater challenges.
quotes.author: Pat Riley

quotes.quote: When your attitude is positive, you will naturally have more courage to take the next best step toward your goal.
quotes.author: William DeFoore

quotes.quote: A positive attitude causes a chain reaction of positive thoughts, events and outcomes. It is a catalyst and it sparks extraordinary results.
quotes.author: Wade Boggs

quotes.quote: A positive attitude may not solve all our problems but that is the only option we have if we want to get out of problems.
quotes.author: Subodh Gupta

quotes.quote: Having a positive attitude isn't wishy washy, it's a concrete and intelligent way to view problems, challenges and obstacles.
quotes.author: Jeff Moore

quotes.quote: In order to carry a positive action we must develop here a positive vision.
quotes.author: Dalai Lama

quotes.quote: If you look the right way, you can see that the whole world is a garden.
quotes.author: Frances Hodgson Burnett

quotes.quote: Hope is a waking dream.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: All of your dreams and desires are within your reach when you have a positive attitude in your toolkit.
quotes.author: William DeFoore

quotes.quote: Keep your face to the sunshine and you cannot see a shadow.
quotes.author: Helen Keller

quotes.quote: The best way to gain self-confidence is to do what you are afraid to do.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: If you can dream it, then you can achieve it. You will get all you want in life if you help enough other people get what they want.
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.quote: A positive attitude turns I can't & I won't, into I have & I will!
quotes.author: Mandy Hale

quotes.quote: When you are joyful, when you say yes to life and have fun and project positivity all around you, you become a sun in the center of every constellation, and people want to be near you.
quotes.author: Shannon L. Alder

quotes.quote: Decision decides destiny. What God wants you to become is the positive person you decide to become when led by God's spirit.
quotes.author: Israelmore Ayivor

quotes.quote: A positive attitude awakens inner strength, energy, motivation and initiative.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Once you replace negative thoughts with positive ones, you'll start having positive results.
quotes.author: Willie Nelson

quotes.quote: First steps are always the hardest but until they are taken the notion of progress remains only a notion and not an achievement.
quotes.author: Aberjhani

quotes.quote: Adopting a really positive attitude can work wonders to adding years to your life, a spring to your step, a sparkle to your eye, and all of that.
quotes.author: Christie Brinkley

quotes.quote: A positive attitude may not solve all your problems, but it will annoy enough people to make it worth the effort.
quotes.author: Herm Albright

quotes.quote: It does not matter how long you are spending on the earth, how much money you have gathered or how much attention you have received. It is the amount of positive vibration you have radiated in life that matters.
quotes.author: Amit Ray

quotes.quote: The will to win, the desire to succeed, the urge to reach your full potentialâ€¦ these are the keys that will unlock the door to personal excellence.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: You can do everything you can to try to stop bad things from happening to you, but eventually things will happen, so the best prevention is a positive attitude.
quotes.author: Marie Osmond

quotes.quote: An attitude of positive expectation is the mark of the superior personality.
quotes.author: Brian Tracy

quotes.quote: Our greatest weakness lies in giving up. The most certain way to succeed is always to try just one more time.
quotes.author: Thomas Edison

quotes.quote: A positive attitude points you toward the best and brightest in the world around you, expanding your potential for growth and development in all areas of life.
quotes.author: William DeFoore

quotes.quote: Chaotic people often have chaotic lives, and I think they create that. But if you try and have an inner peace and a positive attitude, I think you attract that.
quotes.author: Imelda Staunton

quotes.quote: Watching you walk out of my life does not make me bitter or cynical about love. But rather makes me realize that if I wanted so much to be with the wrong person how beautiful it will be when the right one comes along.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Just because a relationship ends, it doesn't mean it's not worth having.
quotes.author: Sarah Mlynowski

quotes.quote: Sometimes it takes a heartbreak to shake us awake & help us see we are worth so much more than we're settling for.
quotes.author: Mandy Hale

quotes.quote: You are telling the story of your life. You have the power to tell a different one. You choose, every day, how you interpret others’ actions, events, and the world around you. You and only you have the power to change this. Change the script!
quotes.author: Laura Elliott

quotes.quote: You never lose by loving. You always lose by holding back.
quotes.author: Barbara De Angelis

quotes.quote: You have to love. You have to feel. It is the reason you are here on earth. You are here to risk your heart. You are here to be swallowed up. And when it happens that you are broken, or betrayed, or left, or hurt, or death brushes near, let yourself sit by an apple tree and listen to the apples falling all around you in heaps, wasting their sweetness. Tell yourself you tasted as many as you could.
quotes.author: Louise Erdrich

quotes.quote: Just because a relationship ends, it doesn’t mean it’s not worth having.
quotes.author: Sarah Mlynowski

quotes.quote: We must be willing to let go of the life we’ve planned, so as to have the life that is waiting for us.
quotes.author: Joseph Campbell

quotes.quote: It’s much more interesting to try and understand what binds two people together. Why we stay with each other is much more of a mystery than why we don’t.
quotes.author: Jane Stanton Hitchcock

quotes.quote: Letting go doesn’t mean that you don’t care about someone anymore. It’s just realizing that the only person you really have control over is yourself.
quotes.author: Deborah Reber

quotes.quote: When one door closes, another opens; but we often look so long and so regretfully upon the closed door that we do not see the one which has opened for us
quotes.author: Alexander Graham Bell

quotes.quote: We must be willing to let go of the life we have planned, so as to have the life that is waiting for us.
quotes.author: E.M. Forster

quotes.quote: Letting go has never been easy, but holding on can be as difficult. Yet strength is measured not by holding on, but by letting go.
quotes.author: Len Santos

quotes.quote: Sometimes it takes a heartbreak to shake us awake & help us see we are worth so much more than we're settling for.
quotes.author: Mandy Hale

quotes.quote: If you feel lighter without them, more alive, healthier, take it as a win.
quotes.author: Maranda Pleasant

quotes.quote: There is no such thing as failure in love. Relationships end, but they don’t fail. Love is only a failure when you don’t learn and you don’t try.
quotes.author: Amy Chan

quotes.quote: Breaking up isn't something that gets done to you; it's something that happens with you.
quotes.author: John Green

quotes.quote: Sometimes good things fall apart so better things can fall together.
quotes.author: Marilyn Monroe

quotes.quote: Nothing in the universe can stop you from letting go and starting over.
quotes.author: Guy Finley

quotes.quote: One day they'll realize they lost a diamond while playing with worthless stones.
quotes.author: Turcois Ominek

quotes.quote: When one door closes, another opens; but we often look so long and so regretfully upon the closed door that we do not see the one which has opened for us.
quotes.author: Alexander Graham Bell

quotes.quote: It hurts to say goodbye to someone you love but it's the best for both of us to move on.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: The hardest part about breaking up is letting go of the last piece of your heart.
quotes.author: Heather Nichols

quotes.quote: Give sorrow words. The grief that does not speak, whispers the o'er fraught heart and bids it break.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: Patience is key for getting over a breakup. That, and trailing off your interaction after the breakup.
quotes.author: Drake

quotes.quote: Injuries, illnesses, and other painful experiences can be a huge wake-up call: a golden opportunity to start living the way you've always intended.
quotes.author: Alexandra Franzen

quotes.quote: By and large, getting dumped is the best thing that could possibly happen to somebody in a relationship. Just think of all the wonderful things you can start doing again. You can stay out late or drink beer in the shower. You can even leave the toilet seat up like nature intended! At the end of the day, you're always better off alone.
quotes.author: Satcha Guitry

quotes.quote: This journey yo call your breakup is a corner you are turning. It is happening because it is supposed to happen. If it didn't, you would not want to improve yourself, your life, and your circumstances.
quotes.author: Nancy Wylde

quotes.quote: Romantic love is an illusion. Most of us discover this truth at the end of a love affair or else when the sweet emotions of love lead us into marriage and then turn down their flames.
quotes.author: Thomas Moore

quotes.quote: Women fall in love when they get to know you. Men are just the opposite. When they finally know you they're ready to leave.
quotes.author: James Salter

quotes.quote: Change not only was inevitable, but usually brought its own rewards.
quotes.author: Nicholas Sparks

quotes.quote: Once your mindset changes, everything on the outside will change along with it.
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: Every positive change in your life begins with a clear, unequivocal decision that you are going to either do something or stop doing something.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: We are restless because of incessant change, but we would be frightened if change were stopped.
quotes.author: Lyman Lloyd Bryson

quotes.quote: You never change your life until you step out of your comfort zone; change begins at the end of your comfort zone.
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: Change is inevitable, The great question of our time is whether the change will be by consent or coercion.
quotes.author: Bromley Oxman

quotes.quote: When we realize that the beliefs holding us back are frauds, we realize we can change those beliefs and make different choices.
quotes.author: Paula Renaye

quotes.quote: If we don't change, we don't grow. If we don't grow, we aren't really living.
quotes.author: Anatole France

quotes.quote: Don't be afraid of change. You may lose something good, but you may gain something better.
quotes.author: Anonymmous

quotes.quote: Everything is in a process of change, nothing endures; we do not seek permanence.
quotes.author: Masatoshi Naito

quotes.quote: The world as we have created it is a process of our thinking. It cannot be changed without changing our thinking.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: There isn't anything in your life that cannot be changed.
quotes.author: Caroline Myss

quotes.quote: Change your thoughts and you change your world.
quotes.author: Norman Vincent Peale

quotes.quote: You have to change the set, stay ahead of the curve.
quotes.author: Carson Daly

quotes.quote: Change your life today. Don't gamble on the future, act now, without delay.
quotes.author: Simone De Beauvoir

quotes.quote: They must often change, who would be constant in happiness or wisdom.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: Change the changeable, accept the unchangeable, and remove yourself from the unacceptable.
quotes.author: Denis Waitley

quotes.quote: You cannot change your future, but you can change your habits, and surely your habits will change your future.
quotes.author: Abdul Kalam

quotes.quote: Don't confuse poor decision-making with destiny. Own your mistakes. It's ok; we all make them. Learn from them so they can empower you!
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: If you don't like something, change it. If you can't change it, change your attitude.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.quote: Your mind is a powerful thing. When you fill it with positive thoughts, your life will start to change.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Don't waste your energy trying to change opinions. Do your thing, and don't care if they like it.
quotes.author: Tina Fey

quotes.quote: If you can't do anything about it then let it go. Don't be a prisoner to things you can't change.
quotes.author: Tony Gaskins

quotes.quote: For every positive change you make in your life, something else also changes for the better it creates a chain reaction.
quotes.author: Leon Brown

quotes.quote: To improve is to change; to be perfect is to change often.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: If you change the way you look at things, the things you look at change.
quotes.author: Wayne Dyer

quotes.quote: Progress is impossible without change, and those who cannot change their minds cannot change anything.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: Sometimes you hit a point where you either change or self destruct.
quotes.author: Sam Stevens

quotes.quote: Don't let the concept of change scare you as much as the prospect of remaining unhappy.
quotes.author: Timber Hawkeye

quotes.quote: Nothing is so painful to the human mind as a great and sudden change.
quotes.author: Mary Wollstonecraft Shelley

quotes.quote: Remember who you are. Don't compromise for anyone, for any reason. You are a child of the Almighty God. Live that truth.
quotes.author: Lysa Terkeurst

quotes.quote: If you obey God with your whole heart, you'll usually scare off the folks who want you to obey them.
quotes.author: Meg Moseley

quotes.quote: If God is your partner, make your plans big!
quotes.author: D.L. Moody

quotes.quote: We have a God who delights in impossibilities.
quotes.author: Billy Sunday

quotes.quote: Be not forgetful to entertain strangers; for thereby some have entertained angels unawares.
quotes.author: Serena B. Miller

quotes.quote: Worry does not empty tomorrow of its sorrows; it empties today of its strength.
quotes.author: Corrie ten Boom

quotes.quote: He is no fool who gives what he cannot keep, to gain what he cannot lose.
quotes.author: Jim Elliot

quotes.quote: We must show our Christian colors if we are to be true to Jesus Christ.
quotes.author: C. S. Lewis

quotes.quote: I do believe in sending positive messages. I am a Christian, so I do believe in a lot of positive messages.
quotes.author: Quinton Aaron

quotes.quote: To be a Christian without prayer is no more possible than to be alive without breathing.
quotes.author: Martin Luther

quotes.quote: The glory of Christianity is to conquer by forgiveness.
quotes.author: William Blake

quotes.quote: We may have done what the devil said we did, but we are not who the devil says we are!
quotes.author: April Cofield Essix

quotes.quote: At the centre of Christianity is community; we are gathered by the Lord around the altar.
quotes.author: Timothy Radcliffe

quotes.quote: Christ literally walked in our shoes.
quotes.author: Tim Keller

quotes.quote: Then, certainly, to be a Christian is to love God above all, and our neighbour as ourselves.
quotes.author: Elias Hicks

quotes.quote: I want to see christian fiction speak to the hard and real issues that tear people's lives apart.
quotes.author: Francine Rivers

quotes.quote: I'm not afraid of the devil. The devil can handle me â€“ he's got judo I never heard of. But he can't handle the One to whom I'm joined, he can't handle the One to whom I'm united, he can't handle the One whose nature dwells in my nature.
quotes.author: A.W. Tozer

quotes.quote: God loves each of us as if there were only one of us.
quotes.author: Augustine

quotes.quote: Always, everywhere God is present, and always He seeks to discover himself to each one.
quotes.author: A.W.Tozer

quotes.quote: God is most glorified in us when we are most satisfied in Him.
quotes.author: John Piper

quotes.quote: We fail in the work of grace and love when there is too much of us and not enough of God.
quotes.author: Suzanne Woods Fisher

quotes.quote: If you can't fly, then run, If you can't run, then walk, If you can't walk, then crawl, but whatever you do, you have to keep moving forward.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King Jr.

quotes.quote: Our greatest fear should not be of failure but of succeeding at things in life that don't really matter.
quotes.author: Francis Chan

quotes.quote: God will meet you where you are in order to take you where he wants you to go.
quotes.author: Tony Evans

quotes.quote: It is always the case that when the Christian looks back, he is looking at the forgiveness of sins.
quotes.author: Karl Barth

quotes.quote: I have never met the man I could despair of after discerning what lies in me apart from the grace of God.
quotes.author: Oswald Chambers

quotes.quote: Faith does not eliminate questions. But faith knows where to take them.
quotes.author: Elisabeth Elliot

quotes.quote: Employ whatever God has entrusted you with, in doing good, all possible good, in every possible kind and degree
quotes.author: John Wesley

quotes.quote: To be a Christian is to believe we are commanded and authorised to say certain things to the world; to say things that will make disciples of all nations.
quotes.author: Rowan Williams

quotes.quote: One touch of Christ is worth a lifetime of struggling.
quotes.author: A.B. Simpson

quotes.quote: Be a positive energy trampoline â€“ absorb what you need and rebound more back.
quotes.author: Dave Carolan

quotes.quote: The energy of the mind is the essence of life.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: Instead of hating, I have chosen to forgive and spend all of my positive energy on changing the world.
quotes.author: Camryn Manheim

quotes.quote: Life gets easier if you choose only to think, act and speak positive energy. Choose to be the light in somebody else's darkness.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Positive energy knows no boundaries. If everyone were to spread positive energy on the Internet, the world would be a much better place.
quotes.author: Lu Wei

quotes.quote: I believe that positive energy and optimism help us to take up any challenge in life and to succeed in even the most difficult tasks. I also believe that positive energy is contagious: we can transmit it to others.
quotes.author: Mohammed bin Rashid Al Maktoum

quotes.quote: Today, I will focus on the positive energy I possess, and let the power of love and light illuminate my soul.
quotes.author: Melanie Moushigian Koulouris

quotes.quote: If you're not positive energy, you're negative energy.
quotes.author: Mark Cuban

quotes.quote: The positive energy you bring here, makes the world a better place, you know it.
quotes.author: Vin Diesel

quotes.quote: I have a positive energy except when I'm depressed mad or hungry.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: People like to be around those who give off positive energy.
quotes.author: Erin Heatherton

quotes.quote: There's a direct correlation between positive energy and positive results.
quotes.author: Joe Rogan

quotes.quote: Positive energy is attracted to positive energy.
quotes.author: Deborah

quotes.quote: The positive energy and love we give to others, heals our own wounds.
quotes.author: Angie karan

quotes.quote: Human beings, by changing the inner attitudes of their minds, can change the outer aspects of their lives.
quotes.author: William James

quotes.quote: Positive thinking is expecting, talking and visualizing with certainty what you want to achieve, as an accomplished fact.
quotes.author: Remez Sasson

quotes.quote: Once you replace negative thoughts with positive ones, you'll start having positive results.
quotes.author: Willie Nelson

quotes.quote: To succeed, you need to find something to hold on to, something to motivate you, something to inspire you.
quotes.author: Tony Dorsett

quotes.quote: The best thing to do when you find yourself in a hurting or vulnerable place is to surround yourself with the strongest, finest, most positive people you know.
quotes.author: Kristin Armstrong

quotes.quote: Positive thinking is more than just a tagline. It changes the way we behave. And I firmly believe that when I am positive, it not only makes me better, but it also makes those around me better.
quotes.author: Harvey Mackay

quotes.quote: I believe in Karma. If the good is sown, the good is collected. When positive things are made, that returns well.
quotes.author: Yannick Noah

quotes.quote: There is a sense that things, if you keep positive and optimistic about what can be done, do work out.
quotes.author: Hillary Clinton

quotes.quote: A positive attitude causes a chain reaction of positive thoughts, events and outcomes. It is a catalyst and it sparks extraordinary results.
quotes.author: Wade Boggs

quotes.quote: Optimism is the faith that leads to achievement. Nothing can be done without hope or confidence.
quotes.author: Helen Keller

quotes.quote: It's been my experience that you can nearly always enjoy things if you make up your mind firmly that you will.
quotes.author: L.M. Montgomery

quotes.quote: Very little is needed to make a happy life; it is all within yourself, in your way of thinking.
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius Antoninus

quotes.quote: Optimism is a happiness magnet. If you stay positive, good things and good people will be drawn to you.
quotes.author: Mary Lou Retton

quotes.quote: A positive attitude may not solve all your problems, but it will annoy enough people to make it worth the effort.
quotes.author: Herm Albright

quotes.quote: If you don't like something change it; if you can't change it, change the way you think about it.
quotes.author: Mary Engelbreit

quotes.quote: Whoever possessed knowledge not only had power over the changeable passions of people, but also power over their thinking, over their minds, hearts and souls.
quotes.author: Peter Prange

quotes.quote: He who possesses most must be most afraid of loss.
quotes.author: Leonardo da Vinci

quotes.quote: The possession of anything begins in the mind.
quotes.author: Bruce Lee

quotes.quote: The most luxurious possession, the richest treasure anybody has, is his personal dignity.
quotes.author: Jackie Robinson

quotes.quote: The desire for possession is insatiable, to such a point that it can survive even love itself. To love, therefore, is to sterelize the person one loves.
quotes.author: Albert Camus

quotes.quote: Possession isn't nine-tenths of the law. It's nine-tenths of the problem.
quotes.author: John Lennon

quotes.quote: Possessions are mere transient effects that come when they are required, and after their purpose has been served, pass away.
quotes.author: James Allen

quotes.quote: Some men are born to own; can animate all their possessions. Others cannot; Their owning is not graceful; seems to be a compromise of their character; they seem to steal their own dividends.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: The greatest treasure in life is the possession of time.
quotes.author: Sunday Adelaja

quotes.quote: The things you own end up owning you.
quotes.author: Chuck Palahniuk

quotes.quote: Nothing can be so perfect while we possess it as it will seem when remembered.
quotes.author: Oliver Wendell Holmes

quotes.quote: Possession hinders enjoyment. It merely gives you the right to keep things for or from others, and thus you gain more enemies than friends.
quotes.author: Baltasar Gracian

quotes.quote: The possession of land seems to be a greater gratification to the pride and independence of men.
quotes.author: George Minot

quotes.quote: There is, of course, a difference between what a man seizes and what he really possesses.
quotes.author: Pearl Buck

quotes.quote: Gentleness, self-sacrifice and generosity are the exclusive possession of no one race or religion.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: He that sets not his heart on what he possesses, forsaketh all things, though he keep his possessions.
quotes.author: Francis Quarles

quotes.quote: Fifty percent of something is better than one hundred percent of nothing.
quotes.author: Chuck Barris

quotes.quote: Each possession I own is but a stone around my neck.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: What is it about possessing things? Why do we feel the need to own what we love? And why do we become such jerks when we do? We've all been there. You want something, you possess it - and by possessing it, you lose it.
quotes.author: Louis Chunovic

quotes.quote: People who have few possessions cling tightly to those they have. That is one of the facts that make life so discouraging.
quotes.author: Sherwood Anderson

quotes.quote: Possession without obligation to the object possessed approaches felicity.
quotes.author: Gerge Meredith

quotes.quote: We do not attach ourselves permanently to any possessions, excepting in proportion to the trouble, toil and longing which they have cost us.
quotes.author: Honoré de Balzac

quotes.quote: It is not the possession of truth, but the success which attends the seeking after it, that enriches the seeker and brings happiness to him.
quotes.author: Max Planck

quotes.quote: Much of human history has consisted of unequal conflicts between the haves and the have-nots.
quotes.author: Jared Diamond

quotes.quote: The possession of knowledge does not kill the sense of wonder and mystery. There is always more mystery.
quotes.author: Anais Nin

quotes.quote: Why grab possessions like thieves, or divide them like socialists, when you can ignore them like wise men?
quotes.author: Natalie Clifford Barney

quotes.quote: Possessions are usually diminished by possession.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.quote: The wavering mind is but a base possession.
quotes.author: Euripides

quotes.quote: Complete possession is proved only by giving. All you are unable to give possesses you.
quotes.author: Andre Gide

quotes.quote: There is one possession that can never be taken away as long as you will not allow it to be taken, and that is your word.
quotes.author: Bill Courtney

quotes.quote: Thoughts of possessiveness come when there is fear of losing the loved one! It's not because they don't believe you, it's because they don't believe you, it's because they don't have on others who might take advantage of your sweetness.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Do not become possessive. The purpose of a relationship is to complement each other, grow together, and achieve your common goals as a couple. At the same time, you must each maintain your individual identity as a human being.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Jealousy in romance is like salt in food. A little can enhance the savor, but too much can spoil the pleasure and, under certain circumstances, can be life-threatening.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.quote: Possessiveness reflects the fear of losing.
quotes.author: Abhi

quotes.quote: To be mature is, we're told, to move beyond possessiveness. Jealousy is for babies. The mature person knows that no one owns anyone.
quotes.author: Alain De Botton

quotes.quote: In the beginning, everything is mixed â€” as if mud is mixed in gold. Then one has to put the gold into fire: all that is not gold is burned, drops out of it. Only pure gold comes out of the fire. Awareness is the fire; love is the gold; jealousy, possessiveness, hatred, anger, lust, are the impurities.
quotes.author: Osho

quotes.quote: So what you are doing, be aware, observe it, and then go on meditating. Soon you will begin to feel the change. Now there is no possessiveness in relationship. By and by, possessiveness disappears. And when possessiveness is not there, relationship has a beauty of its own. When possessiveness is there, everything becomes dirty, ugly, inhuman.
quotes.author: Rajneesh

quotes.quote: Never be possessive about anything or anyone. You are born alone and you will die alone. Everything else will leave you sooner or later. Nothing stays with anyone forever except your soul and your beliefs.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Jealousy is a disease, love is a healthy condition. The immature mind often mistakes one for the other, or assumes that the greater the love, the greater the jealousy â€“ in fact, they are almost incompatible; one emotion hardly leaves room for the other.
quotes.author: Robert A. Heinlein

quotes.quote: Love gives naught but itself and takes naught but from itself, Love possesses not nor would it be possessed: For love is sufficient unto love.
quotes.author: Kahlil Gibran

quotes.quote: Love is not possessiveness; many people think that's what love is you possess somebody totally. To possess somebody is to destroy all possibility of love.
quotes.author: Osho

quotes.quote: Life is so beautiful that death has fallen in love with it, a jealous, possessive love that grabs at what it can get.
quotes.author: Yann Martel

quotes.quote: It is an irony that the more possessive you are, the more love you demand, the less you receive, while the more freedom you give, the less you demand, the more love you will receive.
quotes.author: Harold H Bloomfield

quotes.quote: Possessiveness destroys love. And they should not be possessed, because that again destroys your love.
quotes.author: Rajneesh

quotes.quote: Don't waste time on jealousy. Sometimes you're ahead, sometimes you're behind.
quotes.author: Mary Schmich

quotes.quote: It is not love that is blind, but jealousy.
quotes.author: Lawrence Durrell

quotes.quote: Love looks through a telescope; envy, through a microscope.
quotes.author: Josh Billings

quotes.quote: Jealousy is bred in doubts. When those doubts change into certainties, then the passion either ceases or turns absolute madness.
quotes.author: Francois de la Rochefoucauld

quotes.quote: When theres no sense of possessiveness or ownership in the artistic process, great things happen.
quotes.author: Paul Budnitz

quotes.quote: Possessiveness cannot accept; it cannot even strike a fair bargain; it has to confer.
quotes.author: Sylvia Townsend Warner

quotes.quote: Sometimes we get too possessive with someone we don' even own. It's a side effect of loving too much, and receiving too little.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: The best life is the one in which the creative impulses play the largest part and the possessive impulses the smallest.
quotes.author: Bertrand Russell

quotes.quote: Possessiveness' with 'love' is dangerous as 'match' with 'stick'. It can burn all whatever you have.
quotes.author: Manish Bansal

quotes.quote: The most painful thing is losing yourself in the process of loving someone too much, and forgetting that you are special too.
quotes.author: Ernest Hemingway

quotes.quote: Possessiveness is the outcome of true love. Anger is the outcome of true care. So accept both from your loved ones.
quotes.author: Simi Ngr

quotes.quote: If you go on condemning, your condemnation shows that somewhere there is a wound, and you are feeling jealous - because without jealousy there can be no condemnation. You condemn people because somehow, somewhere, unconsciously you feel they are enjoying themselves and you have missed.
quotes.author: Osho

quotes.quote: A competent and self-confident person is incapable of jealousy in anything. Jealousy is invariably a symptom of neurotic insecurity.
quotes.author: Robert A. Heinlein

quotes.quote: Attachment is the root cause of all misery. Possessiveness is nourishment for the ego.
quotes.author: Rajneesh

quotes.quote: The creative impulses of man are always at war with the possessive impulses.
quotes.author: Van Wyck Brooks

quotes.quote: Chains do not hold a marriage together. It is thread, hundreds of tiny threads which sew people together through the years.
quotes.author: Simone Signoret

quotes.quote: The possibilities are numerous once we decide to act and not react.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: The only limits to the possibilities in your life tomorrow are the buts you use today.
quotes.author: Les Brown

quotes.quote: I see possibilities in everything. For everything that's taken away, something of greater value has been given.
quotes.author: Michael J. Fox

quotes.quote: I'm open for possibilities. I'm open for choices. I always welcome new ideas. I'm always eager to learn. I'm never going to close my mind from learning.
quotes.author: Cesar Millan

quotes.quote: Try to keep your mind open to possibilities and your mouth closed on matters that you don't know about. Limit your 'always' and your 'nevers.'
quotes.author: Amy Poehler

quotes.quote: It isn't necessary to imagine the world ending in fire or ice. There are two other possibilities: one is paperwork, and the other is nostalgia.
quotes.author: Frank Zappa

quotes.quote: Keep your feet on the ground and your thoughts at lofty heights.
quotes.author: Peace Pilgrim

quotes.quote: We all have possibilities we don't know about. We can do things we don't even dream we can do.
quotes.author: Dale Carnegie

quotes.quote: We have more possibilities available in each moment than we realize.
quotes.author: Thich Nhat Hanh

quotes.quote: Take your mind off the problems for a moment, and focus on the positive possibilities. Consider how very much you are able to do.
quotes.author: Ralph Marston

quotes.quote: There are many spokes on the wheel of life. First, we're here to explore new possibilities.
quotes.author: Ray Charles

quotes.quote: The vast possibilities of our great future will become realities only if we make ourselves responsible for that future.
quotes.author: Gifford Pinchot

quotes.quote: No matter how good you get, there's always something further out there.
quotes.author: Bill Walton

quotes.quote: In the beginner's mind there are many possibilities, in the expert's mind there are few.
quotes.author: Shunryu Suzuki

quotes.quote: We must dare to think 'unthinkable' thoughts. We must learn to explore all the options and possibilities that confront us in a complex and rapidly changing world.
quotes.author: J. William Fulbright

quotes.quote: I am where I am because I believe in all possibilities.
quotes.author: Whoopi Goldberg

quotes.quote: Stop thinking in terms of limitations and start thinking in terms of possibilities.
quotes.author: Terry Josephson

quotes.quote: No matter what the level of your ability, you have more potential than you can ever develop in a lifetime.
quotes.author: James T. Mccay

quotes.quote: Balancing hopes, desires and an appreciating of the possibilities with a clear-eyed assessment of the limitations: that is the art of choosing.
quotes.author: Sheena Iyengar

quotes.quote: Hope is the magic carpet that transports us from the present moment into the realm of infinite possibilities.
quotes.author: H. Jackson Brown, Jr.

quotes.quote: It takes someone with a vision of the possibilities to attain new levels of experience. Someone with the courage to live his dreams.
quotes.author: Les Brown

quotes.quote: The possibilities are infinite with new writing; every time you open a new script, there's no limit to what it might contain.
quotes.author: Tom Stoppard

quotes.quote: The only way to discover the limits of the possible is to go beyond them into the impossible.
quotes.author: Arthur C. Clarke

quotes.quote: An intense anticipation itself transforms possibility into reality; our desires being often but precursors of the things which we are capable of performing.
quotes.author: Samuel Smiles

quotes.quote: I feel like there's a world of possibilities out there.
quotes.author: Liza Minnelli

quotes.quote: I am never wrong when it comes to my possibilities.
quotes.author: Placido Domingo

quotes.quote: I'm somebody who explores extraordinary possibilities, not ordinary ones.
quotes.author: Graham Hancock

quotes.quote: To believe only possibilities is not faith, but mere philosophy.
quotes.author: Thomas Browne

quotes.quote: I don't think of myself predicting things. I'm expressing possibilities. Things that could happen. To a large extent it's a question of how badly people want them to.
quotes.author: Freeman Dyson

quotes.quote: I want to show people what the possibilities are if you take care of yourself and do the right thing.
quotes.author: Ben Vereen

quotes.quote: Consider possibilities; if desirable, act on them.
quotes.author: Gideon Lee

quotes.quote: Attempt the impossible in order to improve your work.
quotes.author: Bette Davis

quotes.quote: If there is a sense of reality, there must also be a sense of possibility.
quotes.author: Robert Musil

quotes.quote: God created a number of possibilities in case some of his prototypes failed. That is the meaning of evolution.
quotes.author: Graham Greene

quotes.quote: Do a little more each day than you think you possibly can.
quotes.author: Lowell Thomas

quotes.quote: The possibilities are numerous once we decide to act and not react.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: It may have happened, it may not have happened but it could have happened.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: As long as nothing happens anything is possible.
quotes.author: Graham Greene

quotes.quote: We have more possibilities, more freedom, more options than any people who have ever lived. Yet there is more junk, more mediocrity, more garbage to sort through than ever, too.
quotes.author: Michael J. Gelb

quotes.quote: If it exists, it's possible.
quotes.author: John P. Grier

quotes.quote: All things are possible until they are proven impossible.
quotes.author: Pearl S. Buck

quotes.quote: We are not interested in the possibilities of defeat. They do not exist.
quotes.author: Queen Victoria

quotes.quote: So many things are possible as long as you don't know they are impossible.
quotes.author: Mildred D. Taylor

quotes.quote: Let your imagination release your imprisoned possibilities.
quotes.author: Robert H. Schuller

quotes.quote: Believe in the power of possibilities. Believe you can accomplish anything you put your mind to.
quotes.author: Shadonna Richards

quotes.quote: The world is full of hopeful analogies and handsome dubious eggs called possibilities.
quotes.author: George Eliot

quotes.quote: Even if you are not looking at things the wrong way, simply looking at things a different way can bring new possibilities to your attention.
quotes.author: David A. Hunter

quotes.quote: You have powers you never dreamed of. You can do things you never thought you could do. there are no limitations in what you can do except the limitations of your own mind.
quotes.author: Darwin P. Kingsley

quotes.quote: When nothing is sure, everything is possible.
quotes.author: Margaret Drabble

quotes.quote: We all have possibilities we don't know about. We can do things we don't even dream we can do.
quotes.author: Dale Carnegie

quotes.quote: Never lose hope, there are always possibilities if you just look for them.
quotes.author: Catherine Pulsifer

quotes.quote: The future is simply infinite possibility waiting to happen. What it waits on is human imagination to crystallize its possibility.
quotes.author: Leland Kaiser

quotes.quote: You begin with the possibilities of the material.
quotes.author: Robert Rauschenberg

quotes.quote: A bare possibility that a thing may be or not be, is no just cause of doubting whether a thing be or not.
quotes.author: John Tillotson

quotes.quote: The limits of the possible can only be defined by going beyond them into the impossible.
quotes.author: Arthur C. Clarke

quotes.quote: The only limits to the possibilities in your life tomorrow are the buts you use today.
quotes.author: Les Brown

quotes.quote: The world is a possibility if only you'll discover it.
quotes.author: Ralph Ellison

quotes.quote: Do not become so attached to any one belief that you cannot see past it to another possibility.
quotes.author: Christopher Paolini

quotes.quote: When you throw everything up in the air anything becomes possible.
quotes.author: Salman Rushdie

quotes.quote: The future belongs to those who see possibilities before they become obvious.
quotes.author: John Sculley

quotes.quote: Just remember when you post something, the computers remember forever.
quotes.author: Eric Schmidt

quotes.quote: The best way to get the right answer on the Internet is not to ask a question, it's to post the wrong answer.
quotes.author: Ward Cunningham

quotes.quote: You are responsible for everything you post and everything you post will be a reflection of you.
quotes.author: Germany Kent

quotes.quote: Every social media post should have a beautiful graphic. If there are two identical stories, the one with the beautiful graphic will always win.
quotes.author: Guy Kawasaki

quotes.quote: Posts of honor are evermore posts of danger and of care.
quotes.author: J. G. Holland

quotes.quote: The post of honour is a private station.
quotes.author: Joseph Addison

quotes.quote: Posting a brag, humble or otherwise, and then waiting for people to respond is the equivalent of having a conversation in which all you do is wait for your turn to speak.
quotes.author: Meghan Dau

quotes.quote: The post is the grand connecting link of all transactions, of all negotiations. Those who are absent, by its means become present; it is the consolation of life.
quotes.author: Voltaire

quotes.quote: The only way you can be successful on a post or win at it is to be at cause over it.
quotes.author: L. Ron Hubbard

quotes.quote: Anyone can post messages to the net. Practically everyone does. The resulting cacophony drowns out serious discussion.
quotes.author: Clifford Stoll

quotes.quote: Lofty posts make great men greater still, and small men much smaller.
quotes.author: Jean De La Bruyere

quotes.quote: Every post is honorable in which a man can serve his country.
quotes.author: George Washington

quotes.quote: Make it simple. Make it memorable. Make it inviting to look at. Make it fun to read.
quotes.author: Leo Burnett

quotes.quote: The man who has nothing to boast of but his ancestors is like a potato - the only good belonging to him is under ground.
quotes.author: Sir Thomas Overbury

quotes.quote: I bought a big bag of potatoes and it's growing eyes like crazy. Other foods rot. Potatoes want to see.
quotes.author: Bill Callahan

quotes.quote: Every single diet I ever fell off of was because of potatoes and gravy of some sort.
quotes.author: Dolly Parton

quotes.quote: Nothing like mashed potatoes when you're feeling blue. Nothing like getting into bed with a bowl of hot mashed potatoes already loaded with butter, and methodically adding a thin, cold slice of butter to every forkful.
quotes.author: Nora Ephron

quotes.quote: For me, a plain baked potato is the most delicious one....It is soothing and enough.
quotes.author: M.F.K. Fisher

quotes.quote: What I say is that, if a man really likes potatoes, he must be a pretty decent sort of fellow.
quotes.author: A.A. Milne

quotes.quote: There's a science to ordering potatoes. Are they skinny shoestring or big, fat steak fries? You just have to let your taste buds guide you when deciding what to eat.
quotes.author: Gayle King

quotes.quote: Not everyone can be a truffle. Most of us are potatoes. And a potato is a very good thing to be.
quotes.author: Massimo Bottura

quotes.quote: The road to hell is paved with leeks and potatoes.
quotes.author: Richard P. Feynman

quotes.quote: Potatoes are to food what sensible shoes are to fashion.
quotes.author: Linda Wells

quotes.quote: Never judge a potato by its skin. One day, it will be french fries.
quotes.author: Ian Wilson

quotes.quote: My idea of heaven is a great big baked potato and someone to share it with.
quotes.author: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.quote: It is a mistake to think you can solve any major problems just with potatoes.
quotes.author: Douglas Adams

quotes.quote: Only two things in this world are too serious to be jested on, potatoes and matrimony.
quotes.author: Irish Sayings

quotes.quote: The potato, like man, was not meant to dwell alone.
quotes.author: Shila Hibben

quotes.quote: There is all the pleasure that one can have in gold digging in finding one’s hopes satisfied in the riches of a good hill of potatoes.
quotes.author: Sarah Orne Jewett

quotes.quote: You're like a potato, in a minefield!
quotes.author: Brandon Sanderson

quotes.quote: It is easy to think of potatoes, and fortunately for men who have not much money it is easy to think of them with a certain safety. Potatoes are one of the last things to disappear, in times of war, which is probably why they should not be forgotten in times of peace.
quotes.author: M.F.K. Fisher

quotes.quote: Potato salad is very personal: everyone makes theirs differently.
quotes.author: Trisha Yearwood

quotes.quote: The potato was probably carried to Spain by returning explorers in the sixteenth century.
quotes.author: Eugene Grubb

quotes.quote: Potatoes were the waiters, potatoes were the band, and potatoes were the dancers.
quotes.author: Vachel Lindsay

quotes.quote: The potato gatherers, or whatever life bestows.
quotes.author: Liam Ó Comain

quotes.quote: The summer squash promoted. Harvested the sweet potato.
quotes.author: Ambrose Bierce

quotes.quote: A smiling little orchard and a big potato patch.
quotes.author: Robert William Service

quotes.quote: The greatest crime in the world is not developing your potential. When you do what you do best, you are helping not only yourself, but the world.
quotes.author: Roger Williams

quotes.quote: Potential is not an endpoint but a capacity to grow and learn.
quotes.author: Eileen Kennedy-Moore

quotes.quote: It's not what you've got, it's what you use that makes a difference.
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.quote: It's not about what it is, it's about what it can become.
quotes.author: Dr. Seuss

quotes.quote: Many of us are like Clark Kent, walking around but rarely showing anyone our red capes.
quotes.author: Manifest

quotes.quote: I am putting pressure on myself to do my best and perform to my potential.
quotes.author: Sidney Crosby

quotes.quote: There are very few good examples of effective, nurturing leadership that unlocks people's potential or even enthusiasm.
quotes.author: Deepak Chopra

quotes.quote: I always knew I wanted to become somebody when I grew up. Now I realize I should have been more specific.
quotes.author: Lily Tomlin

quotes.quote: Joy comes from using your potential.
quotes.author: Will Schultz

quotes.quote: Don't assume you know how much potential you have. Sometimes the only way to know what you can do is to test yourself.
quotes.author: Scott Adams

quotes.quote: Rise up and become the person you were meant to be.
quotes.author: Dieter F. Uchtdorf

quotes.quote: If you could see the potential within you it would amaze you to see all that you are capable of being.
quotes.author: Catherine Pulsifer

quotes.quote: Who you are tomorrow begins with what you do today.
quotes.author: Tim Fargo

quotes.quote: The will to win, the desire to succeed, the urge to reach your full potential these are the keys that will unlock the door to personal excellence.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: The greatest waste in the world is the difference between what we are and what we could become.
quotes.author: Ben Herbster

quotes.quote: It is a denial of the divinity within us to doubt our potential and our possibilities.
quotes.author: James E. Faust

quotes.quote: It isn't where you came from; it's where you're going that counts.
quotes.author: Ella Fitzgerald

quotes.quote: The only limits to the possibilities in your life tomorrow are the buts you use today.
quotes.author: Les Brown

quotes.quote: It's only when you hitch your wagon to something larger than yourself that you will realize your true potential.
quotes.author: Barack Obama

quotes.quote: First, say to yourself what you would be; and then do what you have to do.
quotes.author: Epictetus

quotes.quote: There is inside you all of the potential to be whatever you want to be all of the energy to do whatever you want to do.
quotes.author: Donna Levine

quotes.quote: Potential has a shelf life.
quotes.author: Margaret Atwood

quotes.quote: Potential just means you ain't done it yet.
