quotes.author: Darrell Royal

quotes.quote: I don't want to represent man as he is, but only as he might be.
quotes.author: Albert Camus

quotes.quote: Leadership is all about unlocking the potential in others.
quotes.author: Carly Fiorina

quotes.quote: Value people on their potential, not on their history.
quotes.author: Bo Bennett

quotes.quote: There is no man living who isn't capable of doing more than he thinks he can do.
quotes.author: Henry Ford

quotes.quote: Free the child's potential, and you will transform him into the world.
quotes.author: Maria Montessori

quotes.quote: Believing in people before they have proved themselves is the key to motivating people to reach their potential.
quotes.author: John C. Maxwell

quotes.quote: Believe in your infinite potential. Your only limitations are those you set upon yourself.
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: I thought clay must feel happy in the good potter's hand.
quotes.author: Janet Fitch

quotes.quote: She loved the smell of wet dirt the way others might love the smell of roses.
quotes.author: Dana Hewitt

quotes.quote: Having a little fun at my work does not make me any less of an artist and people who appreciate truly beautiful and original creations in pottery are not frightened by innocent tomfoolery!
quotes.author: Clarice Cliff

quotes.quote: Thou spring'st a leak already in thy crown, / A flaw is in thy ill-bak'd vessel found; / 'Tis hollow, and returns a jarring sound, / Yet thy moist clay is pliant to command, / Unwrought, and easy to the potter's hand: / Now take the mould; / now bend thy mind to feel / The first sharp motions of the forming wheel.
quotes.author: John Dryden

quotes.quote: Turn, turn, my wheel! Turn round and round / Without a pause, without a sound: / So spins the flying world away! / This clay, well mixed with marl and sand, / Follows the motion of my hand; / For some must follow, and some command, / Though all are made of clay!
quotes.author: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow

quotes.quote: All this of Pot and Potter—Tell me then, / Who is the Potter, pray, and who the Pot?
quotes.author: Omar Khayyam

quotes.quote: Do you think Patrick Swayze now goes up behind people in pottery classes and hugs them just to crack up other ghosts?
quotes.author: Chris Hardwick

quotes.quote: Pottery... is a practical and lasting form of art. Not everyone can afford original paintings, but most people can afford pottery.
quotes.author: Susie Cooper

quotes.quote: African men don't understand professional women; they're not used to women in the arts... as long as the pottery's done by hand, it remains a women's craft. As soon as machinery takes over, so do the men. This happens to most crafts and technologies, including the making of china in the Potteries in England.
quotes.author: Magdalene Odundo

quotes.quote: I saw some designs on your vases done by someone who, I should say, had only five minutes to catch a train... the institution of pottery should not be a refuge for people who cannot draw nor asylum for the artistically afflicted.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: Pottery and fine porcelain must not quarrel.
quotes.author: Chinese Proverb

quotes.quote: When I see a shard of pottery, I often think to myself, “Who ate off that?” Before I know it, I am transported to a wealthy Victorian family’s dining room, sharing dinner with them on the plate that I just found on the river foreshore. Another shard, and I am whisked away to the table of a Roman family living alongside the river, missing home.
quotes.author: Gary Phillips

quotes.quote: You can’t rush it. Things will crack and break and fall off. This is the opposite of an instant gratification activity.
quotes.author: Amanda Moffat

quotes.quote: Hours can pass without thinking or caring about anything else—that’s what is known as the ‘potter’s nod. It’s a feeling that’s very similar to being at the mercy of a wonderful drug, except in this case, it’s a holistic antidepressant.
quotes.author: Jennie Jieun Lee

quotes.quote: You have to be in tune with the clay and react to what state it’s in to work with it.
quotes.author: John Sheppard

quotes.quote: It’s very meditative. It turns off a higher level of thinking. You have to let go and give in to the unpredictability of it. You can go in with an idea of what you want to make, and the clay doesn’t want to do that.
quotes.author: John Sheppard

quotes.quote: It’s always been popular, it’s just become more so with the farm-to-table movement.
quotes.author: Helen Levi

quotes.quote: A potter is one of the few people left who uses his natural faculties of heart, head and hand in balance – the whole man.
quotes.author: Bernard Leach

quotes.quote: Good pots require the ardour of vocation and the devotion of a lifetime.
quotes.author: Bernard Leach

quotes.quote: Pottery is something small and manageable that connects to that idea of home.
quotes.author: Tallie Maughan

quotes.quote: There were about 100 people on the project I was working on. I had no idea what I was even supposed to be doing. But, with pottery, you are solely responsible for how it turns out. That’s so inviting when you’re disaffected by your job.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Macneal

quotes.quote: Ceramics is the oldest form of technology we have. After cooking meat, baking clay was the first thing that humans did to chemically alter our environment on purpose. You can’t make rice without cooking it in some kind of vessel, so clay pots go hand in hand with agriculture – our whole evolution is connected to it. There’s only a short period of history in which people haven’t been connected with pottery. There’s something incredibly grounding about an experience that connects you with the past like that.
quotes.author: Tallie Maughan

quotes.quote: If you need warming, you should come down to the pottery. In a couple of the big ones I went into, the heat was unbearable!
quotes.author: Catherine Gale

quotes.quote: Staring out onto the earthly, pottery of / Pottery of existence, climbing light / Climbing light vines to heaven / Clay ribbons descend / Swirl downward against.
quotes.author: Kerry Dylan McCoy and George Lesage Clarke

quotes.quote: Here in the jealous hollow of the mould, / Faint, light-eluding, as templed in the breast / Of some rose-vaulted lotus, see the best / The artist had - the vision that unrolled / Its flying sequence till completion's hold / Caught the wild round and bade the dancers rest - / The mortal lip on the immortal pressed / One instant, ere the blindness and the cold. / And there the vase: immobile, exiled, tame, / The captives of fulfillment link their round, / Foot-heavy on the inelastic ground, / How different, yet how enviously the same! / Dishonoring the kinship that they claim, / As here the written word the inner sound.
quotes.author: Edith Wharton

quotes.quote: Clay is molded to form a cup, But it is on its non-being that the utility of the cup depends. Doors and windows are cut out to make a room, But it is on its non-being that the utility of the room depends. Therefore turn being into advantage, and turn non-being into utility.
quotes.author: Laozi

quotes.quote: Clay is used to make vases, but it is the emptiness they contain that makes them useful.
quotes.author: Laozi

quotes.quote: Shape clay into a vessel; It is the space within that makes it useful. Cut doors and windows for a room; It is the holes which make it useful. Therefore benefit comes from what is there; Usefulness from what is not there.
quotes.author: Laozi

quotes.quote: A field of clay touched by the genius of man becomes a castle.
quotes.author: Og Mandino

quotes.quote: A clay pot sitting in the sun will always be a clay pot. It has to go though the white heat of the furnace to become porcelain.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: You might be poor, your shoes might be broken, but your mind is a palace.
quotes.author: Frank McCourt

quotes.quote: We are not rich by what we possess but by what we can do without.
quotes.author: Immanuel Kant

quotes.quote: Poverty is the worst form of violence.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: An empty stomach is not a good political adviser.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: Poverty won’t allow him to lift up his head dignity won’t allow him to bow it down.
quotes.author: Madagasy Proverb

quotes.quote: It is not the man who has too little, but the man who craves more, that is poor.
quotes.author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

quotes.quote: Poverty wants much but avarice, everything.
quotes.author: Publilius Syrus

quotes.quote: One must be poor to know the luxury of giving.
quotes.author: George Eliot

quotes.quote: In a country well governed, poverty is something to be ashamed of. In a country badly governed, wealth is something to be ashamed of.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: Having been poor is no shame, but being ashamed of it, is.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: Poor is the man who is not content with what he has.
quotes.author: Rita Gonzalez

quotes.quote: Beggars can't be choosers.
quotes.author: John Heywood

quotes.quote: Hunger drives the wolf out of the wood.
quotes.author: 14th Century French Proverb

quotes.quote: Hunger is the best sauce.
quotes.author: French Proverb

quotes.quote: Let your head be more than a funnel to your stomach.
quotes.author: German (on food and hunger)

quotes.quote: No clock is more regular than the belly.
quotes.author: French (on food and hunger)

quotes.quote: Plenty sits still, hunger is a wanderer.
quotes.author: Zulu (South African)

quotes.quote: Poverty breeds discontent.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: What good is honor when you are starving.
quotes.author: Yiddish (on food and hunger)

quotes.quote: An imbalance between rich and poor is the oldest and most fatal ailment of all republics.
quotes.author: Plutarch

quotes.quote: Laws grind the poor, and rich men rule the law.
quotes.author: Oliver Goldsmith

quotes.quote: Poverty is the parent of revolution and crime.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: I believe that, as long as there is plenty, poverty is evil.
quotes.author: Robert F. Kennedy

quotes.quote: There’s no scandal like rags, nor any crime so shameful as poverty.
quotes.author: George Farquhar

quotes.quote: Money has been the most serious handicap that we have ever met. There are times when poverty is fortunate.
quotes.author: Clarence Darrow

quotes.quote: Where people are really attached, poverty itself is wealth.
quotes.author: Jane Austen

quotes.quote: We fought a war on poverty, and poverty won.
quotes.author: Ronald Reagan

quotes.quote: A decent provision for the poor is the true test of civilization.
quotes.author: Samuel Johnson

quotes.quote: You can’t get rid of poverty by giving people money.
quotes.author: P.J. O’Rourke

quotes.quote: Poverty is no disgrace to a man, but it is confoundedly inconvenient.
quotes.author: Sydney Smith

quotes.quote: Knowing others is intelligence; knowing yourself is true wisdom. Mastering others is strength, mastering yourself is true power.
quotes.author: Lao-Tzu

quotes.quote: Our power is in our ability to decide.
quotes.author: Buckminster Fuller

quotes.quote: Power doesn't corrupt people, people corrupt power.
quotes.author: William Gaddis

quotes.quote: Power intoxicates men. When a man is intoxicated by alcohol, he can recover, but when intoxicated by power, he seldom recovers.
quotes.author: James F. Byrnes

quotes.quote: The measure of a man is what he does with power.
quotes.author: Pittacus

quotes.quote: Character is power.
quotes.author: Booker T. Washington

quotes.quote: Power is of two kinds. One is obtained by the fear of punishment and the other by acts of love. Power based on love is a thousand times more effective and permanent then the one derived from fear of punishment.
quotes.author: Mohandas Gandhi

quotes.quote: Power will intoxicate the best hearts, as wine the strongest heads. No man is wise enough, nor good enough to be trusted with unlimited power.
quotes.author: Colton

quotes.quote: The less power a man has, the more he likes to use it.
quotes.author: J. Petit-Senn

quotes.quote: The desire of power in excess caused the angels to fall.
quotes.author: Bacon

quotes.quote: The greater the power,the more dangerous the abuse.
quotes.author: Edmund Burke

quotes.quote: Nearly all men can stand adversity, but if you want to test a man's character, give him power.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.quote: It is said that power corrupts, but actually it's more true that power attracts the corruptible. The sane are usually attracted by other things than power.
quotes.author: David Brin

quotes.quote: Power is not alluring to pure minds.
quotes.author: Thomas Jefferson

quotes.quote: All the power that we exercise over others depends on the power we exercise over ourselves.
quotes.author: Cotvos

quotes.quote: Power does not corrupt men; fools, however, if they get into a position of power, corrupt power.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: Power always thinks it has a great soul and vast views beyond the comprehension of the weak.
quotes.author: John Adams

quotes.quote: Most powerful is he who has himself in his own power.
quotes.author: Seneca

quotes.quote: Power can be taken, but not given. The process of the taking is empowerment in itself.
quotes.author: Gloria Steinem

quotes.quote: If power is for sale, sell your mother to buy it. You can always buy her back again.
quotes.author: Arabic Proverbs

quotes.quote: Power is the by-product of understanding.
quotes.author: Jacob Bronowski

quotes.quote: Power? It's like a Dead Sea fruit. When you achieve it, there is nothing there.
quotes.author: Harold MacMillan

quotes.quote: The greatest power is often simple patience.
quotes.author: E. Joseph Cossman

quotes.quote: Power is neither good nor evil, but its user makes it so.
quotes.author: Author Erin Hunter

quotes.quote: Power doesn't always roar...The art of exerting power is an art used in doses - the more hidden it is the more effective.
quotes.author: Ziad K. Abdelnour

quotes.quote: The best people to have power are the ones who don't want it.
quotes.author: Kit Harington

quotes.quote: Power is not revealed by striking hard or often, but by striking true.
quotes.author: Honoré de Balzac

quotes.quote: Power is not sufficient evidence of truth.
quotes.author: Samuel Johnson

quotes.quote: The sole advantage of power is that you can do more good.
quotes.author: Baltasar Gracian

quotes.quote: Power never takes a back step - only in the face of more power.
quotes.author: Malcolm X

quotes.quote: Prayer breaks all bars, dissolves all chains, opens all prisons, and widens all straits by which God's saints have been held.
quotes.author: Edward Mckendree Bounds

quotes.quote: Helplessness becomes prayer the moment that you go to Jesus and speak candidly and confidently with him about your needs. This is to believe.
quotes.author: Ole Hallesby

quotes.quote: The Lord longs to hear all of our concerns any concern too small to be turned into a prayer is too small to be made into a burden.
quotes.author: Corrie ten Boom

quotes.quote: No matter what never underestimate the power of prayer, love and faith.
quotes.author: Anurag Prakash Ray

quotes.quote: Prayer turns ordinary mortals into men of power. It brings power. It brings fire. It brings rain. It brings life. It brings God.
quotes.author: Samuel Chadwick

quotes.quote: I do believe we're all connected. I do believe in positive energy. I do believe in the power of prayer. I do believe in putting good out into the world. And I believe in taking care of each other.
quotes.author: Harvey Fierstein

quotes.quote: Prayer is less about changing the world than it is about changing ourselves.
quotes.author: David Wolpe

quotes.quote: Prayer indeed is good, but while calling on the gods a man should himself lend a hand.
quotes.author: Hippocrates

quotes.quote: God's purposes and plans will not fail. Before you spend all your prayer time telling him about yours, ask about his.
quotes.author: Louie Giglio

quotes.quote: Today we thank God for all the blessings He has bestowed upon this great country and ask him to continue to heal our land and meet our needs and we do so through the power of prayer.
quotes.author: Nick Rahall

quotes.quote: Prayer as it comes from the saint is weak and languid; but when the arrow of a saint's prayer is put into the bow of Christ's intercession it pierces the throne of grace.
quotes.author: Thomas Watson

quotes.quote: I think of prayer as a spiritual life-line back to where I most want to be.
quotes.author: Marianne Williamson

quotes.quote: Prayer is the key that unlocks all the storehouses of God's infinite grace and power.
quotes.author: R.A. Torrey

quotes.quote: The best way to obtain truth and wisdom is not to ask from books, but to go to God in prayer, and obtain divine teaching.
quotes.author: Joseph Smith Jr.

quotes.quote: Prayer doesn't just change things it changes us. If we are diligent in seeking God, slowly and surely we become better people.
quotes.author: Joyce Meyer

quotes.quote: Those who pray from the heart do not think about the prayer they are saying, but about the God to whom they pray.
quotes.author: Saint Francis De Sales

quotes.quote: As you read or listen to God's word and spend time talking to him in prayer, your spirit will eventually become stronger than your flesh.
quotes.author: Joyce Meyer

quotes.quote: The greatest answer to prayer is that I am brought into a perfect understanding with God, and that alters my view of actual things.
quotes.author: Oswald Chambers

quotes.quote: Prayer does not change God, but it changes him who prays.
quotes.author: Soren Kierkegaard

quotes.quote: Do not pray for easy lives. Pray to be stronger men! Do not pray for tasks equal to your powers. Pray for powers equal to your tasks.
quotes.author: Phillips Brooks

quotes.quote: I believe in prayer. It's the best way we have to draw strength from heaven.
quotes.author: Josephine Baker

quotes.quote: Prayer is nothing but the breathing that out before the Lord, that was first breathed into us by the spirit of the Lord.
quotes.author: Thomas Brooks

quotes.quote: Prayer is the way you defeat the devil, reach the lost, restore a backslider, strengthen the saints, send missionaries out, cure the sick, accomplish the impossible, and know the will of God.
quotes.author: David Jeremiah

quotes.quote: Change can be accomplished most of all through the power of prayer, because with God all things are possible.
quotes.author: Wilferd Peterson

quotes.quote: Our prayers are heard, not because we are in earnest, not because we suffer, but because Jesus suffered.
quotes.author: Oswald Chambers

quotes.quote: Prayer can solve more problems, alleviate more suffering, prevent more transgression, and bring about greater peace and contentment in the human soul than can be obtained in any other way.
quotes.author: Thomas S. Monson

quotes.quote: The power of prayer can never be overrated. They who cannot serve God by preaching need not regret. If a man can but pray he can do anything. He who knows how to overcome with God in prayer has Heaven and earth at his disposal.
quotes.author: Charles Spurgeon

quotes.quote: Prayer gives a man the opportunity of getting to know a gentleman he hardly ever meets. I do not mean his maker, but himself.
quotes.author: William Inge

quotes.quote: Every positive thought is a silent prayer which will change your life.
quotes.author: Bryant McGill

quotes.quote: Never underestimate the power of prayer! Constant prayer, with full conviction, without loss of hope, really does create miracles.
quotes.author: Ritu Ghatourey

quotes.quote: A mind that is stretched by a new experience can never go back to its old dimensions.
quotes.author: Oliver Wendell Holmes

quotes.quote: A ship is safe in harbor, but that's not what ships are for.
quotes.author: G.T. Shedd

quotes.quote: If you are not taking responsibility for your state of consciousness, you are not taking responsibility for life.
quotes.author: Eckhart Tolle

quotes.quote: If you are living out of a sense of obligation you are a slave.
quotes.author: Dr Wayne Dyer

quotes.quote: Great thoughts speak only to the thoughtful mind, but great actions speak to all mankind.
quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.quote: Pay attention to your enemies, for they are the first to discover your mistakes.
quotes.author: Antisthenes

quotes.quote: Everything can be taken from a man but one thing: the last of the human freedomsâ€”to choose one's attitude in any given set of circumstances, to choose one's own way.
quotes.author: Viktor Frankl

quotes.quote: If an egg is broken by an outside force, life ends. If broken by an inside force, life begins. Great things always begin from the inside.
quotes.author: Jim Kwik

quotes.quote: Do not go where the path may lead, go instead where there is no path and leave a trail.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Desire, burning desire, is basic to achieving anything beyond the ordinary.
quotes.author: Joseph B. Wirthlin

quotes.quote: Greatness is not measured by what a man or woman accomplishes, but by the opposition he or she has overcome to reach his goals.
quotes.author: Dorothy Height

quotes.quote: Too many people buy things they don't need with money they don't have to impress people they don't like.
quotes.author: Dave Ramsey

quotes.quote: Yesterday is history, tomorrow is a mystery, today is a gift of God, which is why we call it the present.
quotes.author: Bil Keane

quotes.quote: No matter how many mistakes you make or how slow you progress, you are still way ahead of everyone who isn't trying.
quotes.author: Tony Robbins

quotes.quote: Have I not destroyed my enemy when I have made him into my friend?
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.quote: No snowflake in an avalanche ever feels responsible.
quotes.author: Voltaire

quotes.quote: You don't drown by falling in the water. You drown by staying there.
quotes.author: Edwin Louis Cole

quotes.quote: No man is truly great who is great only in his lifetime. The test of greatness is the page of history.
quotes.author: William Hazlitt

quotes.quote: Many are stubborn in pursuit of the path they have chosen, few in pursuit of the goal.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.quote: It has been said that a person may have ten years of experience, or one year of experience repeated ten times.
quotes.author: Yukiso Yamamoto

quotes.quote: Life is not a problem to be solved, but a reality to be experienced.
quotes.author: Soren Kierkegaard

quotes.quote: Learn from Yesterday, live for Today, hope for Tomorrow.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: Life is never made unbearable by circumstances, but only by lack of meaning and purpose.
quotes.author: Viktor Frankl

quotes.quote: Be like the flower that gives fragrance even to the hand that crushes it.
quotes.author: Ali Ibn Abi Talib

quotes.quote: Education is not the filling of a pail, but the lighting of a fire.
quotes.author: W.B. Yeats

quotes.quote: And the only way to do great work is to love what you do. If you haven't found it yet, keep looking. Don't settle. As with all matters of the heart, you'll know when you find it.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.quote: People do not decide to become extraordinary. They decide to accomplish extraordinary things.
quotes.author: Dmund Hillary

quotes.quote: When one door of happiness closes, another opens, but often we look so long at the closed door that we do not see the one that has been opened for us.
quotes.author: Helen Keller

quotes.quote: To achieve greatness one should live as if they will never die.
quotes.author: rancois de La Rochefoucauld

quotes.quote: What lies behind us and what lies before us are tiny matters compared to what lies within us.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Don't wait for a perfect person to love. Love a person and make him or her perfect with your power of love.
quotes.author: Debasish Mridha

quotes.quote: One day you will kiss a man you can't breathe without and find that breath is of little consequence.
quotes.author: Karen Marie Moning

quotes.quote: When we touch, our Gods lay down their weapons and I can forgive every trespass.
quotes.author: Katie Waitman

quotes.quote: Love looks not with the eyes, but with the mind, and therefore is winged Cupid painted blind.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: I loved you like a man loves a woman he never touches, only writes to, keeps little photographs of.
quotes.author: Charles Bukowski

quotes.quote: Love is not the opposite of power. Love is power. Love is the strongest power there is.
quotes.author: Vironika Tugaleva

quotes.quote: The only way love can last a lifetime is if it's unconditional. The truth is this: love is not determined by the one being loved, but rather by the one choosing to love.
quotes.author: Stephen Kendrick

quotes.quote: Love is like a friendship caught on fire. In the beginning a flame, very pretty, often hot and fierce, but still only light and flickering. As love grows older, our hearts mature and our love becomes as coals, deep-burning and unquenchable.
quotes.author: Bruce Lee

quotes.quote: Love has nothing to do with what you are expecting to get, only with what you are expecting to give, which is everything.
quotes.author: Katharine Hepburn

quotes.quote: Every heart sings a song, incomplete, until another heart whispers back. Those who wish to sing always find a song. At the touch of a lover, everyone becomes a poet.
quotes.author: Plato

quotes.quote: As he read, I fell in love the way you fall asleep: slowly, and then all at once.
quotes.author: John Green

quotes.quote: To love oneself is the beginning of a life long romance.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: There is never a time or place for true love. It happens accidentally, in a heartbeat, in a single flashing, throbbing moment.
quotes.author: Sarah Dessen

quotes.quote: Love is like the wind, you can't see it but you can feel it.
quotes.author: Nicholas Sparks

quotes.quote: We loved with a love that was more than love.
quotes.author: Edgar Allan Poe

quotes.quote: We come to love not by finding a perfect person, but by learning to see an imperfect person perfectly.
quotes.author: Sam Keen

quotes.quote: To have been loved so deeply, even though the person who loved us is gone, will give us some protection forever.
quotes.author: J.K. Rowling

quotes.quote: Take away love and our earth is a tomb.
quotes.author: Robert Browning

quotes.quote: Love is an exploding cigar we willingly smoke.
quotes.author: Lynda Barry

quotes.quote: We accept the love we think we deserve.
quotes.author: Stephen Chbosky

quotes.quote: One word frees us of all the weight and pain of life: That word is love.
quotes.author: Sophocles

quotes.quote: Love is a dramatic driving force, the most powerful potion that we drink willingly.
quotes.author: Balroop Singh

quotes.quote: With the power of love; our two hearts can enlighten the whole world.
quotes.author: Sir Kristian Goldmund Aumann

quotes.quote: Let the power of your love change the world, but never let the problems of this world change the beauty of your love.
quotes.author: Debasish Mridha

quotes.quote: You don't love someone for their looks, or their clothes, or for their fancy car, but because they sing a song only you can hear.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: Love is an involuntary gift that manifests unplanned.
quotes.author: Riaz Ahmed Gohar Shahi

quotes.quote: If I had a flower for every time I thought of you. I could walk through my garden forever.
quotes.author: Alfred Tennyson

quotes.quote: So, I love you because the entire universe conspired to help me find you.
quotes.author: Paulo Coehlo

quotes.quote: There and then, sitting beside her and within the strength of my adoration, I felt invincible.
quotes.author: Hisham Matar

quotes.quote: The heart becomes warmer when the mild heat of love is coming from two persons. one is in eternal cold and desolation without feeling the friction of love.
quotes.author: Michael Bassey Johnson

quotes.quote: Powerless rage can work miracles.
quotes.author: Stanisław Jerzy Lec

quotes.quote: The powerless worship Luck and Fate.
quotes.author: Mason Cooley

quotes.quote: Excessive fear is always powerless.
quotes.author: Aeschylus

quotes.quote: If you think you are powerless, then you are.
quotes.author: Monica Ali

quotes.quote: If your mind is scattered, it is quite powerless.
quotes.author: Dalai Lama

quotes.quote: People who are powerless make an open theater of violence.
quotes.author: Don DeLillo

quotes.quote: A powerless church has nothing for the devil to counterfeit.
quotes.author: Bill Johnson

quotes.quote: Feeling powerless is the result of yielding to fearful thinking.
quotes.author: T.F. Hodge

quotes.quote: The more powerless people are, the longer they are kept waiting.
quotes.author: Mason Cooley

quotes.quote: Only the powerless live in a money culture and know nothing about money.
quotes.author: Phyllis Chesler

quotes.quote: Powerless religion may put a man through many surface changes and leave him exactly what he was before.
quotes.author: Aiden Wilson Tozer

quotes.quote: When we are powerless to do a thing, it is a great joy that we can come and step inside the ability of Jesus.
quotes.author: Corrie ten Boom

quotes.quote: You ever want to feel powerless? Watch the people you care about being hurt and know there is nothing you can do about it.
quotes.author: Corey Taylor

quotes.quote: Sure you're powerless, sure you're just one person, sure you can't change anything but you don't have to be miserable about it as well.
quotes.author: Lydia Lunch

quotes.quote: You may feel powerless as a child, but the world will one day be yours. And you're responsible for it. So, seize the day and take charge of it.
quotes.author: Harvey Fierstein

quotes.quote: Without money, you are powerless in this world. You are totally subject to whatever happens. To be without money in the physical world is to be powerless.
quotes.author: Frederick Lenz

quotes.quote: When a person feels powerless in regard to controlling his life, he can defend against the discomfort of such an experience by asserting control over someone else.
quotes.author: A. Nicholas Groth

quotes.quote: The acknowledgment of powerlessness does empower. We humans are powerless over a whole host of factors and conditions in the world, and mostly we're not bothered by these.
quotes.author: Peg O'Connor

quotes.quote: These powerless people at the bottom are the ones with whom we must begin. They must have the insight and the knowledge to work together and recognise that they are on the right track.
quotes.author: Dorothy Day

quotes.quote: The more you care about the powerless, the more power you have. The more you serve those with no influence, the more influence God gives you. The more you humble yourself, the more you're honored by others.
quotes.author: Rick Warren

quotes.quote: It is necessary that the weakness of the powerless is transformed into a force capable of announcing justice. For this to happen, a total denouncement of fatalism is necessary. We are transformative beings and not beings for accommodation.
quotes.author: Paulo Freire

quotes.quote: When you do nothing you feel overwhelmed and powerless. But when you get involved you feel the sense of hope and accomplishment that comes from knowing you are working to make things better.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.quote: When you are totally defenseless, that's when you'll be strong.
quotes.author: Sri Sri Ravi Shankar

quotes.quote: We are never so defenseless against suffering as when we love, never so forlornly unhappy as when we have lost our love object or its love.
quotes.author: Sigmund Freud

quotes.quote: The most helpless person is the one who is helpless in reforming himself.
quotes.author: Ali Ibn Abi Talib

quotes.quote: We are born helpless. As soon as we are fully conscious we discover loneliness...
quotes.author: C. S. Lewis

quotes.quote: You are not a helpless victim of your own thoughts, but rather a master of your own mind.
quotes.author: Louise Hay

quotes.quote: How you treat the helpless is the real test of morality. Lots of people are flunking that test big time.
quotes.author: Thomas Sowell

quotes.quote: The more helpless you are, the better you are fitted to pray, and the more answers to prayer you will experience.
quotes.author: Ole Hallesby

quotes.quote: Never feel too small or powerless to make a difference.
quotes.author: Anita Roddick

quotes.quote: What you are today the shape shifting, weightlifting and hope the presentation will catch his eye.
quotes.author: Bob Mould

quotes.quote: From javelin to boxing ring from weightlifting to skating rink.
quotes.author: Golden Earring

quotes.quote: Powerlifting is how I can witness to people all over the world; and even people on my own backyard.
quotes.author: Devan Doan

quotes.quote: My powerlifting life and lessons I've learned can be passed on to other people. I can make a difference.
quotes.author: Devan Doan

quotes.quote: Powerlifting has given me the opportunities of a lifetime, and I am forever grateful.
quotes.author: Devan Doan

quotes.quote: Powerlifting has broadened my horizons.
quotes.author: Devan Doan

quotes.quote: Powerlifting helped me through my darkest days; depression, injuries, frustration, loss, and heartbreak.
quotes.author: Devan Doan

quotes.quote: Enriching the lives of young people is a dream fulfilled and an opportunity I have because of powerlifting.
quotes.author: Devan Doan

quotes.quote: Powerlifting has facilitated so many wonderful things for me.
quotes.author: Devan Doan

quotes.quote: Powerlifting has paved a way for me to accomplish all my goals and dreams.
quotes.author: Devan Doan

quotes.quote: Not just powerlifting, but everything in life.
quotes.author: Devan Doan

quotes.quote: Regardless of all the changes going on in my life, powerlifting remained a constant.
quotes.author: Devan Doan

quotes.quote: Remember this: your body is your slave; it works for you.
quotes.author: Jack Lalanne

quotes.quote: Weight lifting is about lifting the impossible, overcoming the unachievable.
quotes.author: Chasers Holmes

quotes.quote: I hated every minute of training, but I said, ‘Don’t quit. Suffer now and live the rest of your life as a champion.
quotes.author: Muhammad Ali

quotes.quote: Training gives us an outlet for suppressed energies created by stress and thus tones the spirit just as exercise conditions the body.
quotes.author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

quotes.quote: Most power lifters share some common defects, as a whole for whatever reason, LOVE to punish, beat and torture ourselves beyond the limits of mind and body. It is our spirit that prevails. This defect of intelligence and sensibility pushes us onto the next level, makes us better and stronger. We all have lifted sick and badly hurt.
quotes.author: Captain Kirk Karwoski

quotes.quote: Us powerlifters like to pump real iron.
quotes.author: Death Spa

quotes.quote: It is an activity that takes a day to learn and a lifetime to master.
quotes.author: Tim Henriques

quotes.quote: The deadlift also serves as a way to train the mind to do things that are hard.
quotes.author: Mark Rippetoe

quotes.quote: The full range of motion exercise known as the squat is the single most useful exercise in the weight room, and our most valuable tool for building strength, power, and size
quotes.author: Mark Rippetoe

quotes.quote: People can say whatever they want about the sport of bodybuilding, but to get prepared to do a contest or even think about doing a contest, or even to get into decent shape, it requires a certain amount of discipline, and it comes from taking a new year's resolution to a lifestyle.
quotes.author: John Cena

quotes.quote: To feel strong, to walk amongst humans with a tremendous feeling of confidence and superiority is not at all wrong. The sense of superiority in bodily strength is borne out by the long history of mankind paying homage in folklore, song and poetry to strong men.
quotes.author: Fred Hatfield

quotes.quote: The whole aim of practical politics is to keep the populace alarmed (and hence clamorous to be led to safety) by menacing it with an endless series of hobgoblins, all of them imaginary.
quotes.author: H. L. Mencken

quotes.quote: It is of practical value to learn to like yourself. Since you must spend so much time with yourself you might as well get some satisfaction out of the relationship.
quotes.author: Norman Vincent Peale

quotes.quote: The practical importance of the preservation of our forests is augmented by their relations to climate, soil and streams.
quotes.author: John Muir

quotes.quote: So never lose an opportunity of urging a practical beginning, however small, for it is wonderful how often in such matters the mustard-seed germinates and roots itself.
quotes.author: Florence Nightingale

quotes.quote: In the practical art of war, the best thing of all is to take the enemy's country whole and intact; to shatter and destroy it is not so good.
quotes.author: Sun Tzu

quotes.quote: Don't always be so reasonable and practical and sensible that you refuse to seize glorious opportunities when they show up and push the envelope as to what's possible for you.
quotes.author: Robin S. Sharma

quotes.quote: In real life, the most practical advice for leaders is not to treat pawns like pawns, nor princes like princes, but all persons like persons.
quotes.author: James Macgregor Burns

quotes.quote: The only objects of practical reason are therefore those of good and evil. For by the former is meant an object necessarily desired according to a principle of reason; by the latter one necessarily shunned, also according to a principle of reason.
quotes.author: Immanuel Kant

quotes.quote: You need to learn a practical lesson. Grit alone is not going to save you from sinking.
quotes.author: David Robinson

quotes.quote: A practical botanist will distinguish at the first glance the plant of the different quarters of the globe and yet will be at a loss to tell by what marks he detects them.
quotes.author: Carolus Linnaeus

quotes.quote: There is the greatest practical benefit in making a few failures early in life.
quotes.author: Thomas Huxley

quotes.quote: Practical prayer is harder on the soles of your shoes than on the knees of your trousers.
quotes.author: Austin O'Malley

quotes.quote: Practical knowledge of what works and what doesn't work is much better. Theoretical knowledge is important, but I think practical knowledge works better.
quotes.author: Sushant Singh Rajput

quotes.quote: The practical effect of a belief is the real test of its soundness.
quotes.author: James Anthony Froude

quotes.quote: The practical core of democracy, defined functionally, is the peaceful exchange of power between different groups of powerful political players arranged in parties.
quotes.author: Noah Feldman

quotes.quote: Sometimes it is the simplest, seemingly most inane, most practical stuff that matters the most to someone.
quotes.author: Patty Duke

quotes.quote: Practical wisdom is what's called for in situations that have a moral dimension to them.
quotes.author: Barry Schwartz

quotes.quote: To be practical, any plan must take account of the enemy's power to frustrate it.
quotes.author: Carl von Clausewitz

quotes.quote: To be practical in life means to take everything seriously and nothing tragically.
quotes.author: Arthur Schnitzler

quotes.quote: Be practical as well as generous in your ideals. Keep your eyes on the stars, but remember to keep your feet on the ground.
quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.quote: Practical dreamers do not quit.
quotes.author: Napoleon Hill

quotes.quote: A practical girl never pines; she takes action.
quotes.author: Adriana Trigiani

quotes.quote: Practical life teaches us that people may differ and that both may be wrong: it also teaches us that people may differ and both be right. Anchor yourself fast in the latter faith, or the former will sweep your heart away.
quotes.author: Augustus William Hare

quotes.quote: In practical life the wisest and soundest people avoid speculation.
quotes.author: George Earle Buckle

quotes.quote: In practical life we are compelled to follow what is most probable ; in speculative thought we are compelled to follow truth.
quotes.author: Baruch Spinoza

quotes.quote: A practical man is a man who practices the errors of his forefathers.
quotes.author: Benjamin Disraeli

quotes.quote: The most practical thing in the world is common sense and common humanity.
quotes.author: Nancy Astor

quotes.quote: The most practical information about life is sneered at by social planners.
quotes.author: James Cook

quotes.quote: In the practical use of our intellect, forgetting is as important as remembering.
quotes.author: William James

quotes.quote: The chief practical use of history is to deliver us from plausible historical analogies.
quotes.author: James Bryce

quotes.quote: Any water in the desert will do.
quotes.author: Arabic (on practicality)

quotes.quote: Better to ask twice than to lose your way.
quotes.author: Danish (on practicality)

quotes.quote: Beware of little expenses: a small leak will sink a great ship.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: Buying on credit is robbing next year's crop.
quotes.author: African American (on buying and selling)

quotes.quote: By going and coming, a bird weaves its nest.
quotes.author: Ashanti (West African) (on persistence)

quotes.quote: Do not squander time for that is the stuff that life is made of.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: Dogs bark but the caravan moves on.
quotes.author: Arab Proverb

quotes.quote: Don't burn your bridges behind you.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Don't find fault, find a remedy.
quotes.author: Henry Ford

quotes.quote: Don't look where you fell but where you slipped.
quotes.author: Liberian (on practicality)

quotes.quote: Don't plant a seed in the sea.
quotes.author: Swahili (East African) (on appropriateness)

quotes.quote: Don't put all your eggs in one basket.
quotes.author: Miguel de Cervantes

quotes.quote: Don't throw the baby out with the bath water.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Don't wish your life away.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Easy come, easy go.
quotes.author: Chaucer

quotes.quote: Even in Mecca, people make money.
quotes.author: Hausa (West African (on balance and moderation)

quotes.quote: Every dog is allowed one bite.
quotes.author: V.S. Lean

quotes.quote: First food, then religion.
quotes.author: Afghan (on practicality)

quotes.quote: First things first.
quotes.author: G. Jackson

quotes.quote: Gather the breadfruit from the farthest branches first.
quotes.author: Samoan (on practicality)

quotes.quote: He that pays for work before it's done, has but a pennyworth for two pence.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: He who hesitates is lost.
quotes.author: Joseph Addison

quotes.quote: If you don't have a plan for yourself, you'll be part of someone else's.
quotes.author: American (on planning)

quotes.quote: Light gains make heavy purses.
quotes.author: George Chapman

quotes.quote: Many hands make light work.
quotes.author: John Heywood

quotes.quote: Necessity is the mother of invention.
quotes.author: Irish Proverb

quotes.quote: One generation plants the trees, another gets the shade.
quotes.author: Chinese Proverb

quotes.quote: One should learn to sail in all waters.
quotes.author: Italian (on the conduct of life)

quotes.quote: One today is worth two tomorrows.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: Pick your battles.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Practice rather than preach. Make of your life an affirmation, defined by your ideals, not the negation of others. Dare to the level of your capability then go beyond to a higher level.
quotes.author: Alexander Haig

quotes.quote: The practice of leadership is not the same as the exercise of power.
quotes.author: James Macgregor Burns

quotes.quote: Only through practice and more practice, until you can do something without conscious effort.
quotes.author: Joe Hyams

quotes.quote: Through practice, gently and gradually we can collect ourselves and learn how to be more fully with what we do.
quotes.author: Jack Kornfield

quotes.quote: Everything we do is practice for something greater than where we currently are.
quotes.author: Adam Kirk Smith

quotes.quote: We learn by practice. Whether it means to learn to dance by practicing dancing or to learn to live by practicing living, the principles are the same. One becomes in some area an athlete of God.
quotes.author: Martha Graham

quotes.quote: You can practice to attain knowledge, but you can't practice to attain wisdom.
quotes.author: Herbie Hancock

quotes.quote: Practice only makes for improvement.
quotes.author: Les Brown

quotes.quote: Practice puts brains in your muscles.
quotes.author: Sam Snead

quotes.quote: Only by practice and non-attachment can we conquer mind.
quotes.author: Swami Vivekananda

quotes.quote: Practice makes better and prayer makes perfect. The more we do, the easier it gets, and all the while praying perfects us in the art.
quotes.author: TemitOpe Ibrahim

quotes.quote: We need to learn how to honor and use a practice for as long as it serves us.
quotes.author: Jack Kornfield

quotes.quote: Practice the art of patience for nature never acts in haste.
quotes.author: Og Mandino

quotes.quote: The practice of forgiveness is our most important contribution to the healing of the world.
quotes.author: Marianne Williamson

quotes.quote: Preaching is to much avail, but practice is far more effective. A godly life is the strongest argument you can offer the skeptic.
quotes.author: Hosea Ballou

quotes.quote: What you practice, is what you'll do.
quotes.author: Benny Urquidez

quotes.quote: Practice is everything. This is often misquoted as Practice makes perfect.
quotes.author: Periander

quotes.quote: Take chances, make mistakes. That's how you grow. Pain nourishes your courage. You have to fail in order to practice being brave.
quotes.author: Mary Tyler Moore

quotes.quote: To practice the process of conflict resolution, we must completely abandon the goal of getting people to do what we want.
quotes.author: Marshall B. Rosenberg

quotes.quote: Practice means to perform, over and over again in the face of all obstacles, some act of vision, of faith, of desire. Practice is a means of inviting the perfection desired.
quotes.author: Martha Graham

quotes.quote: The more you practice the better you'll be, the harder you train the great in you they'll see.
quotes.author: Alcurtis Turner

quotes.quote: Good ideas are not adopted automatically. They must be driven into practice with courageous patience.
quotes.author: Hyman Rickover

quotes.quote: When you practice gratefulness, there is a sense of respect toward others.
quotes.author: Dalai Lama

quotes.quote: Practice like it's a game; play the game like it's practice.
quotes.author: Mike Candrea

quotes.quote: Practice has a logic which is not that of the logician.
quotes.author: Pierre Bourdieu

quotes.quote: We must patiently practice every day.
quotes.author: Swami Vivekananda

quotes.quote:
Practice makes comfort. Expand your experiences regularly
so every stretch won't feel like your first.
quotes.author: Gina Greenlee

quotes.quote: They say that nobody is perfect. Then they tell you practice makes perfect. I wish they'd make up their minds.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: We are practicing what we preach so that we may preach what we practice.
quotes.author: Ralph Nader

quotes.quote: Practice without improvement is meaningless.
quotes.author: Chuck Knox

quotes.quote: Man is by nature a pragmatic materialist, a mechanic, a lover of gadgets and gadgetry; and these are the qualities that characterize the "establishment" which regulates modern society: pragmatism, materialism, mechanization, and gadgetry.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Gould Davis

quotes.quote: No particular results then, so far, but only an attitude of orientation, is what the pragmatic method means. The attitude of looking away from first things, principles, 'categories,' supposed necessities; and of looking towards last things, fruits, consequences, facts.
quotes.author: William James

quotes.quote: Even the most pragmatic person fell victim at times to a longing for something other.
quotes.author: Kate Morton

quotes.quote: An idealistic lover is a blind lover, and therefore a true lover; a pragmatic lover is a sighted lover, and therefore a false lover.
quotes.author: Kedar Joshi

quotes.quote: I'm generally a very pragmatic person: that which works, works.
quotes.author: Linus Torvalds

quotes.quote: If at the beginning and end of our lives we depend upon the kindness of others, why in the middle of our lives should we not act kindly toward them? It is the pragmatic choice.
quotes.author: Dalai Lama

quotes.quote: The theory of the method of knowing which is advanced in these pages may be termed pragmatic... Only that which has been organized into our disposition so as to enable us to adapt the environment to our needs and adapt our aims and desires to the situation in which we live is really knowledge.
quotes.author: John Dewey

quotes.quote: It's a shame that pragmatic reality doesn't always live up to our philosophical ideals. There is right and wrong, even if we aren't always gifted with the knowledge of which is which. One can too easily get lost in a world of greys, and so guarded commitment to some absolutes (while acknowledging one's own fallibility) can be essential to avoid sliding down that old slippery slope.
quotes.author: David C. Hill

quotes.quote: You will need to be mature and pragmatic. You must use your heart to decide the destination, but use your head to plot the journey.
quotes.author: Amish Tripathi

quotes.quote: A pragmatic person sees the dark and the light side of life, while an idealist sees a life filled with colors.
quotes.author: Eraldo Banovac

quotes.quote: It was wrong to be too pragmatic, to judge people solely by results; it was more humane to judge by intentions.
quotes.author: Aleksandr Solzhenitsyn

quotes.quote: Knowing yourself, knowing where you want to get, combining those things gives you the pragmatic steps.
quotes.author: John Amaechi

quotes.quote: Who succeeds in forming and leading a Great Group? He or she is almost always a pragmatic dreamer. They are people who get things done, but they are people with immortal longings. Often, they are scientifically minded people with poetry in their souls.
quotes.author: Warren G. Bennis

quotes.quote: The whole quality of your life depends on your state of mind. There are very high states of mind that very few people experience. They are also quite pragmatic and practical and they make you more efficient at living and working in the world.
quotes.author: Frederick Lenz

quotes.quote: Idealism without pragmatism is impotent. Pragmatism without idealism is meaningless. The key to effective leadership is pragmatic idealism. -
quotes.author: Richard M. Nixon

quotes.quote: No, no, you're not thinking; you're just being logical.
quotes.author: Niels Bohr

quotes.quote: Baptize yourself with the flow of rational thinking and the world is bound to become rational.
quotes.author: Abhijit Naskar

quotes.quote: The real ground for supposing free-will is indeed pragmatic, but it has nothing to do with this contemptible right to punish.
quotes.author: William James

quotes.quote: Somewhere between the intellectual idea of why we're attracted to certain things and the pragmatic reality is some form of ever-evolving truth.
quotes.author: Billy Corgan

quotes.quote: From a pragmatic point of view, the difference between living against a background of foreigness (an indifferent Universe) and one of intimacy (a benevolent Universe) means the difference between a general habit of wariness and one of trust.
quotes.author: William James

quotes.quote: I think you have to be pragmatic to the approach of life and brutally honest with yourself. We all are here to do something, and it is important to understand our potential first.
quotes.author: Twinkle Khanna

quotes.quote: Happiness is equilibrium. Shift your weight. Equilibrium is pragmatic. You have to get everything into proportion. You compensate, rebalance yourself so that you maintain your angle to your world. When the world shifts, you shift.
quotes.author: Tom Stoppard

quotes.quote: I think you are born, and I think you die. I have a pragmatic nature, but I yearn to believe.
quotes.author: Sebastian Horsley

quotes.quote: What can everyone do? Praise and blame. This is human virtue, this is human madness.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.quote: The trouble with most of us is that we would rather be ruined by praise than saved by criticism.
quotes.author: Norman Vincent Peale

quotes.quote: Praise, like gold and diamonds, owes its value only to its scarcity.
quotes.author: Samuel Johnson

quotes.quote: Praise undeserved, is satire in disguise.
quotes.author: Alexander Pope

quotes.quote: Praise us as we are tasted, allow us as we prove.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: There are two things people want more than sex and money - recognition and praise.
quotes.author: Mary Kay Ash

quotes.quote: The work praises the man.
quotes.author: Charles L. Allen

quotes.quote: A person places themselves on a level with the ones they praise.
quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.quote: One of the highest of human duties is the duty of encouragement...It is easy to laugh at men's ideals; it is easy to pour cold water on their enthusiasm; it is easy to discourage others. The world is full of discouragers. We have a Christian duty to encourage one another. Many a time a word of praise or thanks or appreciation or cheer has kept a man on his feet. Blessed is the man who speaks such a word.
quotes.author: William Barclay

quotes.quote: Praise little, dispraise less.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: All our actions, as well as our thoughts and words, should praise Him who always blesses us.
quotes.author: Charles Spurgeon

quotes.quote: I will praise any man that will praise me.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: I pay no attention whatever to anybody's praise or blame. I simply follow my own feelings.
quotes.author: Wolfgang Amadeus Mozart

quotes.quote: I prefer to praise people and the world rather than criticize them and it.
quotes.author: Alice Walker

quotes.quote: We seldom praise anyone in good earnest, except such as admire us.
quotes.author: Francois de la Rochefoucauld

quotes.quote: Gratitude is infinite praise.
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: Prayer is not a device for getting our wills done through heaven, but a desire that God's will may be done on earth through us.
quotes.author: Croft M. Pentz

quotes.quote: Pray for my soul. More things are wrought by prayer Than this world dreams of: Wherefore, let they voice, Rise like a fountain for me night and day.
quotes.author: Alfred Lord Tennyson

quotes.quote: Prayer is a strong wall and fortress of the church; it is a goodly Christian weapon.
quotes.author: Martin Luther

quotes.quote: Prayer has mighty power to move mountains because the Holy Spirit is ready both to encourage our praying and to remove the mountains hindering us.
quotes.author: Wesley L Duewel

quotes.quote: Prayer is simply talking to God like a friend and should be the easiest thing we do each day.
quotes.author: Joyce Meyer

quotes.quote: In prayer it is better to have a heart without words than words without a heart.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: Heavenly citizenship and heavenly homesickness are in prayer. Prayer is an appeal from the lowness, from the emptiness, from the need of earth, to the highness, the fullness and to the all-sufficiency of heaven.
quotes.author: E.M. Bounds

quotes.quote: We can be tired, weary, and emotionally distraught, but after spending time alone with God, we find that He injects into our bodies energy, power and strength.
quotes.author: Charles Stanley

quotes.quote: Thank you' is the best prayer that anyone could say. I say that one a lot. Thank you expresses extreme gratitude, humility, understanding.
quotes.author: Alice Walker

quotes.quote: Prayer is powerful. It can heal, prayer can give, and it can change lives.
quotes.author: Shane DeCreshio

quotes.quote: For prayer is nothing else than being on terms of friendship with God.
quotes.author: Teresa of Avila

quotes.quote: The prayer of the feeblest saint who lives in the Spirit and keeps right with God is a terror to Satan. The very powers of darkness are paralyzed by prayer; no spiritualistic seance can succeed in the presence of a humble praying saint. No wonder Satan tries to keep our minds fussy in active work till we cannot think in prayer.
quotes.author: Oswald Chambers

quotes.quote: Prayer is one of the greatest assets that a Christian could possess, but sometimes it seems to be a real challenge to make it a full part of our devotional life.
quotes.author: Brian Johnston

quotes.quote: Heavenly Father has given a simple pattern for us to receive the Holy Ghost not once but continually in the tumult of our daily lives. The pattern is repeated in the sacramental prayer: We promise that we will always remember the savior. We promise to take his name upon us. We promise to keep his commandments.
quotes.author: Henry B. Eyring

quotes.quote: Prayer is the spirit speaking truth to Truth.
quotes.author: Philip James Bailey

quotes.quote: Prayer is nothing but the breathing that out before the Lord, that was first breathed into us by the Spirit of the Lord.
quotes.author: Thomas Brooks

quotes.quote: Prayer is to our relationship with our divine source what conversation is to our most intimate human relationships. Like water for a plant, it's a condition for growth.
quotes.author: Daniel Murphy

quotes.quote: Prayer is the easiest and hardest of all things; the simplest and the sublimest; the weakest and the most powerful; its results lie outside the range of human possibilities they are limited only by the omnipotence of God.
quotes.author: Edward Mckendree Bounds

quotes.quote: To pray rightly, you must make God your hope, stay, and all. Right prayer sees nothing substantial or worth being concerned about except God.
quotes.author: John Bunyan

quotes.quote: Prayer is a confession of one's own unworthiness and weakness.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: Prayer is not a discourse. It is a form of life, the life with God. That is why it is not confined to the moment of verbal statement.
quotes.author: Jacques Ellul

quotes.quote: Daily prayers to God should never be seen as a task. It should be a necessity in our life just as air is a necessity for us in order to breathe and live.
quotes.author: Oliver Powell

quotes.quote: Prayer requires more of the heart than of the tongue.
quotes.author: Adam Clarke

quotes.quote: Prayer does not change God, but it changes him who prays.
quotes.author: Soren Kierkegaard

quotes.quote: To give thanks in solitude is enough. Thanksgiving has wings and goes where it must go. Your prayer knows much more about it than you do.
quotes.author: Victor Hugo

quotes.quote: We can take our questions, doubts, needs, dreams, and circumstances to the Lord in prayer, asking him to reveal the answers in Scripture.
quotes.author: Joel Patchen

quotes.quote: Each time, before you intercede, be quiet first, and worship God in His glory. Think of what He can do, and how He delights to hear the prayers of His redeemed people. Think of your place and privilege in Christ, and expect great things!
quotes.author: Andrew Murray

quotes.quote: Rather than set aside daily time for prayer, I pray constantly and spontaneously about everything I encounter on a daily basis. When someone shares something with me, I'll often simply say, 'let's pray about this right now.
quotes.author: Thomas Kinkade

quotes.quote: Pray absolutely for those things you may pray for absolutely. Pray conditionally for those things you may pray for conditionally. For those things you can't pray for don't.
quotes.author: Paul Gerhardt

quotes.quote: And from the prayer of Want, and plaint of Woe, O never, never turn away thine ear! Forlorn, in this bleak wilderness below, Ah! what were man, should Heaven refuse to hear!
quotes.author: James Beattie

quotes.quote: You can preach a better sermon with your life than with your lips.
quotes.author: Oliver Goldsmith

quotes.quote: I wish to preach, not the doctrine of ignoble ease, but the doctrine of the strenuous life.
quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.quote: The best sermon is preached by the minister who has a sermon to preach and not by the man who has to preach a sermon.
quotes.author: William Feather

quotes.quote: I don't like to hear cut and dried sermons. No—when I hear a man preach, I like to see him act as if he were fighting bees.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.quote: If I wish to compose or write or pray or preach well, I must be angry. Then all the blood in my veins is stirred, and my understanding is sharpened.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King, Jr.

quotes.quote: Nothing preaches better than the act.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: America preaches integration and practices segregation.
quotes.author: Malcolm X

quotes.quote: Preaching is fire in the pulpit that melts the ice in the pew.
quotes.author: Jack Hyles

quotes.quote: Hypocrisy is the audacity to preach integrity from a den of corruption.
quotes.author: Wes Fesler

quotes.quote: It is curious how people take it for granted that they have a right to preach at you and pray over you as soon as your income falls below a certain level.
quotes.author: George Orwell

quotes.quote: An ounce of practice is worth more than tons of preaching.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: We have in fact, two kinds of morality, side by side: one which we preach, but do not practice, and another which we practice, but seldom preach.
quotes.author: Bertrand Russell

quotes.quote: Preaching is to much avail, but practice is far more effective. A godly life is the strongest argument you can offer the skeptic.
quotes.author: Hosea Ballou

quotes.quote: If the truth were known, many sermons are prepared and preached with more regard for the sermon than the souls of the hearers.
quotes.author: George F. Pentecost

quotes.quote: If Jesus preached the same message ministers preach today, He would have never been crucified.
quotes.author: Leonard Ravenhill

quotes.quote: When a person is down in the world, an ounce of help is better than a pound of preaching.
quotes.author: Edward Bulwer-Lytton

quotes.quote: Humility is a virtue all preach, none practice; and yet everybody is content to hear
quotes.author: John Selden

quotes.quote: There is no such thing as preaching patience into people, unless the sermon is so long that they have to practise it while they hear.
quotes.author: Henry Ward Beecher

quotes.quote: Only the sinner has the right to preach.
quotes.author: Christopher Moley

quotes.quote: Can one preach at home inequality of races and nations and advocate abroad good-will towards all men?
quotes.author: Dorothy Thompson

quotes.quote: To preach more than half an hour, a man should be an angel himself or have angels for hearers.
quotes.author: George Whitefield

quotes.quote: He charged nothing for his preaching and it was worth it too.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: It is no use walking anywhere to preach unless our walking is our preaching.
quotes.author: St. Francis of Assisi

quotes.quote: You should be a living practicing example of what you are preaching.
quotes.author: Frances Hesselbein

quotes.quote: Preach not to others what they should eat, but eat as becomes you and be silent.
quotes.author: Epictetus

quotes.quote: If you think practicing what you preach is rough, just try preaching what you practice.
quotes.author: Bowen Baxter

quotes.quote: Beauty vanishes like a vapor, preach the men of musty morals.
quotes.author: Harriet Elizabeth Prescott Spofford

quotes.quote: Do not let your deeds belie your words, lest when you speak in church someone may say to himself, "Why do you not practice what you preach?
quotes.author: St. Jerome

quotes.quote: Preach not calmly and quietly as though you were asleep, but preach with fire and pathos and passion.
quotes.author: Charles Spurgeon

quotes.quote: A true preacher is best measured not by how many bouquets have been pinned on him but by how many brickbats have been pitched at him.
quotes.author: Vance Havner

quotes.quote: A preacher who is too big for a little crowd would be too little for a big crowd.
quotes.author: Vance Havner

quotes.quote: Positiveness is a good quality for preachers and speakers because, whoever shares his thoughts with the public will convince them as he himself appears convinced.
quotes.author: Jonathan Swift

quotes.quote: To be effective the preacher's message must be alive; it must alarm, arouse, challenge; it must be God's present voice to a particular people.
quotes.author: Aiden Wilson Tozer

quotes.quote: Because we are continually growing in the Lord, preachers and lay people alike must be open to the Lord's correction.
quotes.author: Benny Hinn

quotes.quote: As preachers of the gospel of Jesus, do not expect worldly honors: these Jesus Christ neither took to himself, nor gave to his disciples.
quotes.author: Adam Clarke

quotes.quote: If you're a preacher, you talk for a living, so even if you don't make sense, you learn to make nonsense eloquently.
quotes.author: Andrew Young

quotes.quote: Preachers in pulpits talked about what a great message is in the book. No matter what you do, somebody always imputes meaning into your books.
quotes.author: Dr. Seuss

quotes.quote: Preaching is effective as long as the preacher expects something to happen-not because of the sermon, not even because of the preacher, but because of God.
quotes.author: John Hines

quotes.quote: The preacher's task is to declare what God has said, explain the meaning, and establish the implications so that no one will mistake its relevance.
quotes.author: Alistair Begg

quotes.quote: To be a preacher requires two apparently contradictory qualities: confidence and humility.
quotes.author: Timothy Radcliffe

quotes.quote: The character as well as the fortunes of the gospel is committed to the preacher. He makes or mars the message from God to man. The preacher is the golden pipe through which the divine oil flows.
quotes.author: Edward Mckendree Bounds

quotes.quote: Preachers are not called to be politicians but soul winners.
quotes.author: Jerry Falwell

quotes.quote: People are drawn to preaching that is passionate and offered with conviction. Passion comes when the preacher has spent significant time with the text, and when God has spoken through the text in a way that addresses the preacher's life first.
quotes.author: Adam Hamilton

quotes.quote: The preacher's garment is cut according to the pattern of that of the hearers, for the most part.
quotes.author: Oliver Wendell Holmes, Jr.

quotes.quote: Preachers are always pleasant company when they are off duty.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: A preacher should have the skill to teach the unlearned simply roundly, and plainly; for teaching is of more importance than exhorting.
quotes.author: Martin Luther

quotes.quote: The first duty of the gospel preacher is to declare God's law and to show the nature of sin.
quotes.author: Martin Luther

quotes.quote: The best of all the preachers are the men who live their creeds, for to see good put in action is what everybody needs.
quotes.author: Edgar A. Guest

quotes.quote: If any man be in Christ, he's a new preacher. The old things are passed away and all things become new.
quotes.author: Russell Johnson

quotes.quote: Becoming a great preacher, like becoming a great artist, requires a life commitment.
quotes.author: Calvin Miller

quotes.quote: The best of all the preachers are the men who live their creeds.
quotes.author: Edgar Guest

quotes.quote: The preachers who gain mighty results for God are the men who have prevailed in their pleadings with God ere venturing to plead with men.
quotes.author: Edward Mckendree Bounds

quotes.quote: Preacher is an instrument of compassion, not an instrument of wrath.
quotes.author: Radhanath Swami

quotes.quote: It is a poor sermon that gives no offense; that neither makes the hearer displeased with himself nor with the preacher.
quotes.author: George Whitefield

quotes.quote: Preaching is the expression of moral sentiments applied to the duties of life.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: The clergyman is expected to be a kind of human Sunday.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: A preacher must be both soldier and shepherd. He must nourish, defend, and teach he must have teeth in his mouth, and be able to bite and fight.
quotes.author: Martin Luther

quotes.quote: A preacher should have the mind of a scholar, the heart of a child, and the hide of a rhinoceros. His problem is how to toughen his hide without hardening his heart.
quotes.author: Curtis C. Thomas

quotes.quote: We as preachers/teachers/pastors have to figure out things to do in order to garner the attention of individuals and also keep them at our churches by making sure that we reinvent ourselves on a consistent basis.
quotes.author: Marvin Sapp

quotes.quote: When you arise in the morning, think of what a precious privilege it is to be alive - to breathe, to think, to enjoy, to love.
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.quote: Time and health are two precious assets that we don't recognize and appreciate until they have been depleted.
quotes.author: Denis Waitley

quotes.quote: Of all possessions a friend is the most precious.
quotes.author: Herodotus

quotes.quote: Ordinary riches can be stolen; real riches cannot. In your soul are infinitely precious things that cannot be taken from you.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: If time be of all things the most precious, wasting time must be the greatest prodigality.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: The charity that is a trifle to us can be precious to others.
quotes.author: Homer

quotes.quote: My share of the work may be limited, but the fact that it is work makes it precious.
quotes.author: Helen Keller

quotes.quote: I know that inner wisdom is more precious than wealth. The more you spend it, the more you gain.
quotes.author: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.quote: Happiness always looks small while you hold it in your hands, but let it go, and you learn at once how big and precious it is.
quotes.author: Maxim Gorky

quotes.quote: Truth is life's most precious commodity.
quotes.author: Edwin Louis Cole

quotes.quote: More precious is want with honesty than wealth with infamy.
quotes.author: Thomas Wentworth

quotes.quote: The most precious of all possessions is power over ourselves.
quotes.author: John Locke

quotes.quote: There is precious instruction to be got by finding we were wrong.
quotes.author: Thomas Carlyle

quotes.quote: An enemy is indeed a precious teacher.
quotes.author: Dalai Lama

quotes.quote: Sometimes when you sacrifice something precious, you're not really losing it. You're just passing it on to someone else.
quotes.author: Mitch Albom

quotes.quote: Some things are more precious because they don't last long.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: Genius, like gold and precious stones, is chiefly prized because of its rarity.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: A man that seeks truth and loves it must be reckoned precious to any human society.
quotes.author: Epictetus

quotes.quote: Life is too short, too precious, too painful to waste on worldly bubbles that burst.
quotes.author: John Piper

quotes.quote: The things that are most precious to us are sometimes the most secret.
quotes.author: Ally Carter

quotes.quote: Life every man holds dear but the dear man holds honor far more precious dear than life.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: We spend precious hours fearing the inevitable. It would be wise to use that time adoring our families, cherishing our friends, and living our lives.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.quote: The most precious gift we can offer others is our presence. When mindfulness embraces those we love, they will bloom like flowers.
quotes.author: Thich Nhat Hanh

quotes.quote: The search for truth is more precious than its possession.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: Any relic of the dead is precious, if they were valued living.
quotes.author: Emily Bronte

quotes.quote: My favorite things in life don't cost any money. It's really clear that the most precious resource we all have is time.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.quote: The gift of life is so precious that we should feel an obligation to pay back the universe for the gift of being alive.
quotes.author: Ray Bradbury

quotes.quote: Your wealth can be stolen, but the precious riches buried deep in your soul cannot.
quotes.author: Minnie Riperton

quotes.quote: The words that enlighten the soul are more precious than jewels.
quotes.author: Hazrat Inayat Khan

quotes.quote: The left-handed are precious; they take places which are inconvenient for the rest.
quotes.author: Victor Hugo

quotes.quote: You are responsible for the predictable consequences of your actions.
quotes.author: Noam Chomsky

quotes.quote: To live in a fully predictable world is not to be a man.
quotes.author: C S Lewis

quotes.quote: Once you become predictable, no one's interested anymore.
quotes.author: Chet Atkins

quotes.quote: The few people who earned my respect are those who are predictable in their character but totally unpredictable the way they think!
quotes.author: Assegid Habtewold

quotes.quote: If life were predictable it would cease to be life, and be without flavor.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.quote: Luck is predictable; the harder you work, the luckier you get.
quotes.author: Brian Tracy

quotes.quote: As soon as things become predictable, they become boring.
quotes.author: Hunter Parrish

quotes.quote: An artist should paint from the heart, and not always what people expect. Predictability often leads to the dullest work, in my opinion, and we have been bored stiff long enough I think.
quotes.author: E.A. Bucchianeri

quotes.quote: Human emotion isn't neatly ordered and rational and easily predictable.
quotes.author: Hannah Fry

quotes.quote: I don't really like groups that make the same statement over and over again. It's good, but kind of predictable.
quotes.author: Martin Fry

quotes.quote: A prediction is a prediction because it's predictable.
quotes.author: Robert Kiyosaki

quotes.quote: Neurotic behavior is quite predictable. Healthy behavior is unpredictable.
quotes.author: Carl Rogers

quotes.quote: When the world is predictable you need smart people. When the world is unpredictable you need adaptable people.
quotes.author: Henry Mintzberg

quotes.quote: In my experience, boys are predictable. As soon as they think of something, they do it. Girls are smarter—they plan ahead. They think about not getting caught.
quotes.author: Eoin Colfer

quotes.quote: If innovations were predictable, they wouldn't be discoveries.
quotes.author: Lawrence M. Krauss

quotes.quote: Some people like very predictable melodies, and others prefer the less likely notes.
quotes.author: Daniel Levitin

quotes.quote: A good story will keep you wondering about what's happening, what's going on, where does this go? Now it's going to go that way, now it's going to go that way. It has to do that. If it's predictable, it's just boring.
quotes.author: Fede Alvarez

quotes.quote: Animals are reliable, many full of love, true in their affections, predictable in their actions, grateful and loyal. Difficult standards for people to live up to.
quotes.author: Alfred A. Montapert

quotes.quote: Scripts are corny and predictable. Real life is always better.
quotes.author: Lauren Conrad

quotes.quote: Aging and its evidence remain life's most predictable events, yet they also remain matters we prefer to leave unmentioned, unexplored.
quotes.author: Joan Didion

quotes.quote: He was born early. But he was born within a safe range of premature
quotes.author: Paul Reiser

quotes.quote: Part of the bargain of being alive is that one takes a chance at dying a premature or painful death, be it from violence, accident, or disease.
quotes.author: Steven Pinker

quotes.quote: Two premature babies was not a genetic thing; we were just unlucky.
quotes.author: Sophie Ellis Bextor

quotes.quote: A superstition is a premature explanation that overstays its time.
quotes.author: George Iles

quotes.quote: To realize the value of one month, ask a mother who had a premature baby.
quotes.author: Karen Moy

quotes.quote: Premature burial works just fine as a cure for adolescence.
quotes.author: George Alec Effinger

quotes.quote: Many premature babies are never given a chance to make it out of the hospital.
quotes.author: Jane Chen

quotes.quote: Premature success gives one an almost mystical conception of destiny as opposed to will power-at its worst the Napoleonic delusion.
quotes.author: F Scott Fitzgerald

quotes.quote: The superman is a premature ideal, one that presupposes man.
quotes.author: Karl Kraus

quotes.quote: Premature optimization is the root of all evil in programming.
quotes.author: Tony Hoare

quotes.quote: To be premature is to be perfect
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: A baby is born with a need to be loved - and never outgrows it.
quotes.author: Frank A Clark

quotes.quote: A babe in the house is a well-spring of pleasure, a messenger of peace and love, a resting place for innocence on earth, a link between angels and men.
quotes.author: Martin Farquhar Tupper

quotes.quote: Premature development of the powers of both mind and body leads to an early grave.
quotes.author: John Quinton

quotes.quote: Nothing leads the scientist so astray as a premature truth.
quotes.author: Jean Rostand

quotes.quote: Premature rate cuts could trigger inflationary expectations that could reduce, if not reverse, the capital inflows.
quotes.author: Fauzi Ichsan

quotes.quote: It's way too premature to talk about a recovery.
quotes.author: Kathleen Camilli

quotes.quote: More strategies fail because they are overripe than because they are premature
quotes.author: Kenichi Ohmae

quotes.quote: Irritable Judges suffer from a bad case of premature adjudication.
quotes.author: John Mortimer

quotes.quote: Prejudice is a great time saver. You can form opinions without having to get the facts.
quotes.author: E. B. White

quotes.quote: Prejudice is a burden that confuses the past, threatens the future and renders the present inaccessible.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.quote: Prejudice is a learned trait. You're not born prejudiced; you're taught it.
quotes.author: Charles R. Swindoll

quotes.quote: Prejudice is a chain, it can hold you. If you prejudice, you can't move, you keep prejudice for years. Never get nowhere with that.
quotes.author: Bob Marley

quotes.quote: Prejudice is like a hair across your cheek. You can't see it, you can't find it with your fingers, but you keep brushing at it because the feel of it is irritating.
