quotes.author: Marian Anderson

quotes.quote: Bias and prejudice are attitudes to be kept in hand, not attitudes to be avoided.
quotes.author: Charles Curtis

quotes.quote: Prejudice is a raft onto which the shipwrecked mind clambers and paddles to safety.
quotes.author: Ben Hecht

quotes.quote: Prejudice is the child of ignorance.
quotes.author: William Hazlitt

quotes.quote: Prejudice - a vagrant opinion without visible means of support.
quotes.author: Ambrose Bierce

quotes.quote: Bigotry or prejudice in any form is more than a problem; it is a deep-seated evil within our society.
quotes.author: Judith Light

quotes.quote: Preconceived notions are the locks on the door to wisdom.
quotes.author: Merry Browne

quotes.quote: Judgments prevent us from seeing the good that lies beyond appearances.
quotes.author: Wayne W. Dyer

quotes.quote: Our thoughts are unseen hands shaping the people we meet. Whatever we truly think them to be, that's what they'll become for us.
quotes.author: Richard Cowper

quotes.quote: Prejudices subsist in people's imagination long after they have been destroyed by their experience.
quotes.author: Ernest Dimnet

quotes.quote: If you judge people you have no time to love them.
quotes.author: Mother Teresa

quotes.quote: Prejudices, it is well known, are most difficult to eradicate from the heart whose soil has never been loosened or fertilised by education: they grow there, firm as weeds among stones.
quotes.author: Charlotte Bronte

quotes.quote: Prejudice is the glass through which most things are seen and judged.
quotes.author: Edward Counsel

quotes.quote: All prejudices are obstinate, like diseases of chronic tenacity, and require radical cures.
quotes.author: Norman Macdonald

quotes.quote: Prejudice is the sole author of infamies: how many acts are so qualified by an opinion forged out of naught but prejudice!
quotes.author: Marquis De Sade

quotes.quote: Prejudice squints when it looks and lies when it talks.
quotes.author: Duchess d'Abrantes

quotes.quote: Prejudices are what fools use for reason.
quotes.author: Voltaire

quotes.quote: Two things reduce prejudice: education and laughter.
quotes.author: Laurence J. Peter

quotes.quote: Race prejudice can't be talked down, it must be lived down.
quotes.author: Francis J. Grimke

quotes.quote: Prejudice not being funded on reason cannot be removed by argument.
quotes.author: Samuel Johnson

quotes.quote: Sometimes we feel the loss of a prejudice as a loss of vigor.
quotes.author: Eric Hoffer

quotes.quote: Prejudice cannot see the things that are because it is always looking for things that aren't.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: Prejudices are the chains forged by ignorance to keep men apart.
quotes.author: Marguerite Gardiner

quotes.quote: Prejudice is opinion without judgement.
quotes.author: Voltaire

quotes.quote: Our prejudices are our robbers, they rob us valuable things in life.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: There is no prejudice so strong as that which arises from a fancied exemption from all prejudice.
quotes.author: William Hazlitt

quotes.quote: The best preparation for tomorrow is doing your best today.
quotes.author: H. Jackson Brown, Jr.

quotes.quote: Before anything else, preparation is the key to success.
quotes.author: Alexander Graham Bell

quotes.quote: Preparation for war is a constant stimulus to suspicion and ill will.
quotes.author: James Monroe

quotes.quote: The meeting of preparation with opportunity generates the offspring we call luck.
quotes.author: Tony Robbins

quotes.quote: The best preparation for the future is the present well seen to, and the last duty done.
quotes.author: George Macdonald

quotes.quote: Thorough preparation makes its own luck.
quotes.author: Joe Poyer

quotes.quote: Today's preparation determines tomorrow's achievement.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: My preparation is always mediation and deep breathing. And the rubbing of my hands together just gets my energy going.
quotes.author: John Edward

quotes.quote: By failing to prepare, you are preparing to fail.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: Preparation eradicates cowardice, which we define as the failure to act in the midst of fear.
quotes.author: Veronica Roth

quotes.quote: Over-preparation is the foe of inspiration.
quotes.author: Napoleon Bonaparte

quotes.quote: The best possible preparation for the future is a well lived present.
quotes.author: George H. Brimhall

quotes.quote: Meticulous planning will enable everything a man does to appear spontaneous.
quotes.author: Mark Caine

quotes.quote: Planning is bringing the future into the present so that you can do something about it now.
quotes.author: Alan Lakein

quotes.quote: Planning ahead is a measure of class. The rich and even the middle class plan for future generations, but the poor can plan ahead only a few weeks or days.
quotes.author: Gloria Steinem

quotes.quote: Long-range planning does not deal with future decisions, but with the future of present decisions.
quotes.author: Peter Drucker

quotes.quote: Be over prepared so that you wont under perform.
quotes.author: Gary Mack

quotes.quote: Proper preparation prevents poor performance.
quotes.author: Charlie Batch

quotes.quote: Prepare yourself in every way you can by increasing your knowledge and adding to your experience, so that you can make the most of opportunity when it occurs.
quotes.author: Mario Andretti

quotes.quote: Preparation for old age should begin not later than one's teens. A life which is empty of purpose until 65 will not suddenly become filled on retirement.
quotes.author: Dwight L. Moody

quotes.quote: Some people are making such thorough preparation for rainy days that they aren't enjoying today's sunshine.
quotes.author: William Feather

quotes.quote: Imperfect preparation gives rise to the thousand-fold forms that express physical and mental inferiority and insecurity.
quotes.author: Alfred Adler

quotes.quote: Preparation is the be-all of good trial work. Everything else-felicity of expression, improvisational brilliance-is a satellite around the sun. Thorough preparation is that sun.
quotes.author: Louis Nizer

quotes.quote: The best possible preparation of success is empower yourself with trust in self capabilities.
quotes.author: Anil Sinha

quotes.quote: A good preparation takes longer than the delivery.
quotes.author: E. Kim Nebeuts

quotes.quote: He who is best prepared can best serve his moment of inspiration.
quotes.author: Samuel Taylor Coleridge

quotes.quote: Preparation is the key to leadership success. The more prepared you are the less your struggle to make it happen and the more your effectiveness!
quotes.author: Israelmore Ayivor

quotes.quote: Preparation doesn't assures victory, it assures confidence.
quotes.author: Amit Kalantri

quotes.quote: You cannot move forward in any project, or task, career, relationship or changing a habit unless you plan. And, preparation is not the end but only the beginning.
quotes.author: Byron Pulsifer

quotes.quote: Prepare while others are daydreaming.
quotes.author: William Arthur Ward

quotes.quote: The best way to find the opportunity in the future is to prepare yourself for it today.
quotes.author: Debasish Mridha

quotes.quote: The best way to prepare for life is to begin to live.
quotes.author: Elbert Hubbard

quotes.quote: If you do not prepare yourself physically to succeed, you must prepare yourself mentally for the humiliation of failure.
quotes.author: Len Smith

quotes.quote: We shouldn't just live for today; we should prepare for tomorrow.
quotes.author: Kent Conrad

quotes.quote: It is better to look ahead and prepare than to look back and regret.
quotes.author: Jackie Joyner-Kersee

quotes.quote: You prepare yourself by concentrating on what you have to do out on the field.
quotes.author: Brian Mcbride

quotes.quote: Prepare for the unknown by studying how others in the past have coped with the unforeseeable and the unpredictable.
quotes.author: George S. Patton

quotes.quote: The challenge of education is not to prepare a person for success, but to prepare him for failure.
quotes.author: James Stockdale

quotes.quote: You should prepare for your future, you cant stop it from coming.
quotes.author: Amiel Basaganda Bagadiong

quotes.quote: Our tears prepare the ground for our future growth.
quotes.author: Julia Cameron

quotes.quote: You cannot prepare for war and peace at the same time.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: We can not prepare for defeat and expect to live a life in Victory.
quotes.author: Joel Osteen

quotes.quote: Expect the best, plan for the worst, and prepare to be surprised.
quotes.author: Denis Waitley

quotes.quote: It's better to prepare than to repair.
quotes.author: John C. Maxwell

quotes.quote: Prepare to win, or lose to someone who is.
quotes.author: Jeffrey Gitomer

quotes.quote: You must mentally prepare to conquer any situation.
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: Prepare your mind to receive the best that life has to offer.
quotes.author: Ernest Holmes

quotes.quote: All we can do to prepare rightly for tomorrow is to do the right thing today.
quotes.author: Wendell Berry

quotes.quote: No one prepares to lose ... we prepare to win.
quotes.author: Andrew Luck

quotes.quote: Prepare yourself so that you can be a rainbow in somebody else's cloud.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.quote: Don't let your fear paralyze you. Prepare yourself not only technically, but also emotionally.
quotes.author: Bob Weinstein

quotes.quote: It is thrifty to prepare today for the wants of tomorrow.
quotes.author: Aesop

quotes.quote: Prepare for every game like you just lost your last game
quotes.author: Lon Kruger

quotes.quote: We prepare for success by acquiring virtues.
quotes.author: Ted Malloch

quotes.quote: You prepare. You study. You've got to be ready for anything.
quotes.author: Philip Rivers

quotes.quote: If you don't prepare, you could lose everything. If you prepare for the worst and nothing happens, you've lost nothing.
quotes.author: Gerald Celente

quotes.quote: We may not be able to prepare the future for our children, but we can at least prepare our children for the future.
quotes.author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quotes.quote: Anything you pray for, you need to prepare for.
quotes.author: Devon Franklin

quotes.quote: Prepare for the worst so the best will happen.
quotes.author: Tito Ortiz

quotes.quote: To not prepare is the greatest of crimes; to be prepared beforehand for any contingency is the greatest of virtues.
quotes.author: Sun Tzu

quotes.quote: A prepared person will always have his opportunity.
quotes.author: Jack Hyles

quotes.quote: We must be prepared to face our responsibilities and be willing to use force if necessary.
quotes.author: Dick Cheney

quotes.quote: Because if you're prepared and you know what it takes, it's not a risk. You just have to figure out how to get there. There is always a way to get there.
quotes.author: Mark Cuban

quotes.quote: Make preparations in advance ... you never have trouble if you are prepared for it.
quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.quote: If you are prepared, you will be confident, and will do the job.
quotes.author: Tom Landry

quotes.quote: To be prepared is half the victory.
quotes.author: Miguel de Cervantes

quotes.quote: Be Prepared... the meaning of the motto is that a scout must prepare himself by previous thinking out and practicing how to act on any accident or emergency so that he is never taken by surprise.
quotes.author: Robert Baden-Powell

quotes.quote: Prior preparation is Success divided by half. Once you have fully prepared, every hand glove that obstacles wear to pull you away from reaching your destination will become slippery!
quotes.author: Israelmore Ayivor

quotes.quote: We must prepare all learners for their future, not our past.
quotes.author: Dr. Anne Davies

quotes.quote: Only by being prepared for your death can you ever truly live.
quotes.author: Christopher Moore

quotes.quote: If somebody's not prepared to answer the question, you can keep asking.
quotes.author: Martin Bashir

quotes.quote: Some things are so unexpected that no one is prepared for them.
quotes.author: Leo Rosten

quotes.quote: Be prepared and be honest.
quotes.author: John Wooden

quotes.quote: A message prepared in the mind reaches a mind; a message prepared in a life reaches a life.
quotes.author: Bill Gothard

quotes.quote: Where observation is concerned, chance favors only the prepared mind.
quotes.author: Louis Pasteur

quotes.quote: If you are prepared, then you are able to feel confident.
quotes.author: Robert Ringer

quotes.quote: The better you're prepared, the better chance you'll have at staying on top of everything that is coming your way.
quotes.author: Colin Adams

quotes.quote: There is always a prepared place for a prepared person.
quotes.author: Jack Hyles

quotes.quote: Only someone who is well prepared has the opportunity to improvise.
quotes.author: Ingmar Bergman

quotes.quote: You are always being prepared for something better or protected from something worse.
quotes.author: Iyanla Vanzant

quotes.quote: You must prepare for success even if there is no indication of it. You must prepare for success even if you have become accustomed to failure. You must prepare for success even if nobody in your life ever achieved anything. Take time to prepare hard.
quotes.author: John Ndeere

quotes.quote: Confidence comes from being prepared.
quotes.author: John Wooden

quotes.quote: If you fail to prepare, you're prepared to fail.
quotes.author: Mark Spitz

quotes.quote: Be prepared for trouble. Don't fall apart when trouble strikes.
quotes.author: Carl Sommer

quotes.quote: You always gotta be on time, an hour ahead of everything. You always gotta be prepared.
quotes.author: Beanie Sigel

quotes.quote: Be prepared to scramble right from the start.
quotes.author: Jack Burke, Jr.

quotes.quote: We are prepared for some things, and we receive just as fast as we prepare ourselves.
quotes.author: Brigham Young

quotes.quote: Being prepared to die is one of the great secrets of living
quotes.author: George Lincoln Rockwell

quotes.quote: Being prepared for loss is never the same as being ready for it.
quotes.author: Randy K. Milholland

quotes.quote: Prepare while others are daydreaming.
quotes.author: William Arthur Ward

quotes.quote: The preparation is what allows the success to happen naturally.
quotes.author: Jake Arrieta

quotes.quote: By failing to prepare, you are preparing to fail.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: The best preparation for tomorrow is to do today's work extremely well.
quotes.author: William Osler

quotes.quote: You must prepare for success even if there is no indication of it. You must prepare for success even if you have become accustomed to failure. You must prepare for success even if nobody in your life ever achieved anything. Take time to prepare hard.
quotes.author: John Ndeere

quotes.quote: Most people fail in life because they were not prepared for the opportunities when they appeared.
quotes.author: Orrin Woodward

quotes.quote: Preparedness is the ultimate confidence builder.
quotes.author: Vince Lombardi

quotes.quote: Preparedness and punctuality are two of the most important qualities of a leader.
quotes.author: John Andreas Widtsoe

quotes.quote: You can't prepare for the details of every single possible thing that might come your way in the future, because the future is uncertain.
quotes.author: Auliq Ice

quotes.quote: Peace is our goal but preparedness is the price we must pay.
quotes.author: Omar N. Bradley

quotes.quote: Preparation doesn't assures victory, it assures confidence.
quotes.author: Amit Kalantri

quotes.quote: The best preparation for the future is the present well seen to, and the last duty done.
quotes.author: George Macdonald

quotes.quote: What you are prepared to do in order to achieve what you want is the only cost involved in achieving that goal.
quotes.author: Steven Redhead

quotes.quote: Success is where preparation and opportunity meet.
quotes.author: Bobby Unser

quotes.quote: With adequate planning, passion and perseverance, you can achieve the God-given goals.
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: Doing your preparation in advance and then letting your brain process the information while you sleep helps to cement this information in your memory making it easier to access the next day.
quotes.author: Tricia Alach

quotes.quote: The best preparation for good work tomorrow is to do good work today.
quotes.author: Elbert Hubbard

quotes.quote: Preparedness never caused a war and unpreparedness never prevented one.
quotes.author: Florence Prag Kahn

quotes.quote: Prepare for the unknown by studying how others in the past have coped with the unforeseeable and the unpredictable.
quotes.author: George S. Patton

quotes.quote: The better you're prepared, the better chance you'll have at staying on top of everything that is coming your way.
quotes.author: Colin Adams

quotes.quote: Be prepared for trouble. Don't fall apart when trouble strikes.
quotes.author: Carl Sommer

quotes.quote: The fear of losing anything is the inability to prepare for the best.
quotes.author: Michael Bassey Johnson

quotes.quote: Preparation through education is less costly than learning through tragedy.
quotes.author: Max Mayfield

quotes.quote: Preparedness, when properly pursued, is a way of life, not a sudden, spectacular program.
quotes.author: Spencer W. Kimball

quotes.quote: Despair is most often the offspring of ill-preparedness.
quotes.author: Don Williams, Jr

quotes.quote: He who is best prepared can best serve his moment of inspiration.
quotes.author: Samuel Taylor Coleridge

quotes.quote: The best preparation for tomorrow is to do today's work superbly well.
quotes.author: William Osler

quotes.quote: The best preparation for tomorrow is doing your best today.
quotes.author: H. Jackson Brown, Jr.

quotes.quote: Expect the best. Prepare for the worst. Capitalize on what comes.
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.quote: There's only one way to assure consistently good work. That is consistently thorough preparation.
quotes.author: Andrew Loomis

quotes.quote: Preparation is what allows the teacher to truly inspire. Preparation is in knowing exactly how the lesson plan will flow. It's in knowing what questions to ask and what answers to give.
quotes.author: Shawn L. Anderson

quotes.quote: Absence sharpens love, presence strengthens it.
quotes.author: Thomas Fuller

quotes.quote: The key is to keep company only with people who uplift you, whose presence calls forth your best.
quotes.author: Epictetus

quotes.quote: Being solitary is being alone well: being alone luxuriously immersed in doings of your own choice, aware of the fullness of your won presence rather than of the absence of others. Because solitude is an achievement.
quotes.author: Alice Koller

quotes.quote: The presence of passion within you is the greatest gift you can receive. Treat it as a miracle.
quotes.author: Wayne Dyer

quotes.quote: Forgiveness isn't just the absence of anger. I think it's also the presence of self-love, when you actually begin to value yourself.
quotes.author: Tara Westover

quotes.quote: Kids are born curious about the world. What adults primarily do in the presence of kids is unwittingly thwart the curiosity of children.
quotes.author: Neil deGrasse Tyson

quotes.quote: My presence speaks volumes before I say a word.
quotes.author: Mos Def

quotes.quote: Solitude is strength; to depend on the presence of the crowd is weakness. The man who needs a mob to nerve him is much more alone than he imagines.
quotes.author: Paul Brunton

quotes.quote: If I'm remembered for having done a few good things, and if my presence here has sparked some good energies, that's plenty.
quotes.author: Sidney Poitier

quotes.quote: Luck is not something you can mention in the presence of self-made men.
quotes.author: E.B. White

quotes.quote: Happiness is rarely absent; it is we that know not of its presence.
quotes.author: Maurice Maeterlinck

quotes.quote: A great leader also has the ability to make people an inch taller in his presence.
quotes.author: N. R. Narayana Murthy

quotes.quote: The best effort of a fine person is felt after we have left their presence.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Often the presence of mind and energy of a person remote from the spotlight decide the course of history for centuries to come.
quotes.author: Stefan Zweig

quotes.quote: We convince by our presence.
quotes.author: Walt Whitman

quotes.quote: How empty is theory in the presence of fact!
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: Success often emerges in the presence of failure.
quotes.author: Ken Poirot

quotes.quote: As men, we are all equal in the presence of death.
quotes.author: Publilius Syrus

quotes.quote: If your presence doesn't work, neither will your word.
quotes.author: Harbajhan Singh Yogi

quotes.quote: Well, I must endure the presence of a few caterpillars if I wish to become acquainted with the butterflies.
quotes.author: Antoine de Saint-Exupéry

quotes.quote: The presence of those seeking the truth is infinitely to be preferred to the presence of those who think they've found it.
quotes.author: Terry Pratchett

quotes.quote: I think all of us are always five years old in the presence and absence of our parents.
quotes.author: Sherman Alexie

quotes.quote: Like a missing tooth, sometimes an absence is more noticeable than a presence.
quotes.author: Jodi Picoult

quotes.quote: As we let our light shine, we unconsciously give other people permission to do the same. As we are liberated from our own fear, our presence actually liberates others.
quotes.author: Marianne Williamson

quotes.quote: Life is either a daring adventure or nothing. To keep our faces toward change and behave like free spirits in the presence of fate is strength undefeatable.
quotes.author: Helen Keller

quotes.quote: The presence of many does not and cannot replace the absence of one. That is love.
quotes.author: Rita Zahara

quotes.quote: True peace is not merely the absence of tension: it is the presence of justice.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King Jr.

quotes.quote: A friend is someone who protects you in your absence and appreciates you in your presence.
quotes.author: Luthando Daniels

quotes.quote: We must watch over our modesty in the presence of those who cannot understand its grounds.
quotes.author: Jean Rostand

quotes.quote: The presence of even a single poor child on the street means a million defeats for mankind.
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.quote: You must live in the present, launch yourself on every wave, find your eternity in each moment.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: Real generosity towards the future lies in giving all to the present.
quotes.author: Albert Camus

quotes.quote: The future is no more uncertain than the present.
quotes.author: Walt Whitman

quotes.quote: The present is a great treasure, live in the present.
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: Nothing is worth more than this day.
quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.quote: Stay present, stay conscious.
quotes.author: Eckhart Tolle

quotes.quote: Begin at once to live, and count each separate day as a separate life.
quotes.author: Seneca

quotes.quote: We know nothing of tomorrow; our business is to be good and happy today.
quotes.author: Sydney Smith

quotes.quote: The present is the ever moving shadow that divides yesterday from tomorrow. In that lies hope.
quotes.author: Frank Lloyd Wright

quotes.quote: In order for the light to shine so brightly, the darkness must be present.
quotes.author: Francis Bacon

quotes.quote: Few of us ever live in the present. We are forever anticipating what is to come or remembering what has gone.
quotes.author: Louis L'Amour

quotes.quote: There is no distance on this earth as far away as yesterday.
quotes.author: Robert Nathan

quotes.quote: Present opportunities are not to be neglected; they rarely visit us twice.
quotes.author: Voltaire

quotes.quote: Realize deeply that the present moment is all you ever have. Make the Now the primary focus of your life.
quotes.author: Eckhart Tolle

quotes.quote: It is said that the present is pregnant with the future.
quotes.author: Voltaire

quotes.quote: Do not let your shadow walk you. You are not a slave of the past.
quotes.author: Dodinsky

quotes.quote: The present eye praises the present object.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: Future indifferences is no consolation for present pain.
quotes.author: Mary Balogh

quotes.quote: Your present circumstances don't determine where you can go; they merely determine where you start.
quotes.author: Nido Qubein

quotes.quote: Be present and in the moment.
quotes.author: Alyssa Milano

quotes.quote: The present is an eternal now.
quotes.author: Abraham Cowley

quotes.quote: The present changes the past. Looking back you do not find what you left behind.
quotes.author: Kiran Desai

quotes.quote: The future influences the present just as much as the past.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.quote: The present grows within the boundaries of the past.
quotes.author: Simon Van Booy

quotes.quote: If you want the present to be different from the past, study the past.
quotes.author: Baruch Spinoza

quotes.quote: There was only present, and it was infinite. The past and the future were just blinders we wore so that infinity wouldn't drive us mad.
quotes.author: Laini Taylor

quotes.quote: The ability to be in the present moment is a major component of mental wellness.
quotes.author: Abraham Maslow

quotes.quote: Being fully present is the best guarantee for a bright future.
quotes.author: Guy Finley

quotes.quote: There's no present. There's only the immediate future and the recent past.
quotes.author: George Carlin

quotes.quote: Nothing is more precious than being in the present moment. Fully alive, fully aware.
quotes.author: ThÃ­ch Nháº¥t Háº¡nh

quotes.quote: The pressures were wrong. There was just enough money and not enough time.
quotes.author: Renata Adler

quotes.quote: Pressure is a word that is misused in our vocabulary. When you start thinking of pressure, it's because you've started to think of failure.
quotes.author: Tommy Lasorda

quotes.quote: No pressure, no diamonds.
quotes.author: Thomas Carlyle

quotes.quote: Pressure is something you feel when you don't know what the hell you're doing.
quotes.author: Peyton Manning

quotes.quote: Let pressure pass over and through you. That way you can't be harmed by it.
quotes.author: Brian Herbert

quotes.quote: Pressure is a privilege it's what you do with it that matters.
quotes.author: Billie Jean King

quotes.quote: Pressure is only what you make of it and what you put on yourself.
quotes.author: Marcus Giles

quotes.quote: Don't ever let the pressure exceed the pleasure.
quotes.author: Joe Maddon

quotes.quote: Pressure is a privilege - it only comes to those who earn it.
quotes.author: Billie Jean King

quotes.quote: Pressure has the power to create a diamond, but it has to be the "right" pressure.
quotes.author: Shannon L. Alder

quotes.quote: How we handle pressure will determine whether we stand or break.
quotes.author: Ed Hindson

quotes.quote: When we long for life without difficulties, remind us that oaks grow strong in contrary winds and diamonds are made under pressure.
quotes.author: Peter Marshall

quotes.quote: Pressure comes from a lack of preparation.
quotes.author: Colin Kaepernick

quotes.quote: Higher learning undergoes emotional pressure.
quotes.author: Toba Beta

quotes.quote: The more pressure you place on yourself, in search of increase the more you will likely get of it
quotes.author: Sunday Adelaja

quotes.quote: Pressure is nothing more than the shadow of great opportunity.
quotes.author: Michael Johnson

quotes.quote: All pressure is self-inflicted. It's what you make of it or how you let it rub off on you.
quotes.author: Sebastian Coe

quotes.quote: Life's pressure is equal to your resistance.
quotes.author: Bryant McGill

quotes.quote: External pressure seems to produce internal unity.
quotes.author: Kenneth Waltz

quotes.quote: Only the unprepared are overcome by pressure.
quotes.author: Lou Holtz

quotes.quote: Nothing counts but pressure, pressure, more pressure, and still more pressure through broad organized aggressive mass action.
quotes.author: A. Philip Randolph

quotes.quote: Pressure comes from within and so must be mastered from within.
quotes.author: Ed Jacoby

quotes.quote: Pressure can either burst a pipe or make a diamond.
quotes.author: Robert Horry

quotes.quote: Pressure is playing for ten dollars when you don't have a dime in your pocket.
quotes.author: Lee Trevino

quotes.quote: I'm sick of all the pressure. I'm sick of feeling like I'll ruin all their happiness if I don't do what they want me to do.
quotes.author: Holly Bourne

quotes.quote: Remember diamonds are created under pressure so hold on, it be your time to shine soon.
quotes.author: Sope Agbelusi

quotes.quote: Pressure is not necessarily bad. Pressure can make you produce. The challenge of pressure is learning how to handle it--which requires developing internal confidence and inner strength.
quotes.author: Paula White

quotes.quote: When the pressure comes, preferences give way while convictions hold firm.
quotes.author: Edwin Louis Cole

quotes.quote: Pressure doesn't exist. We create it for ourselves.
quotes.author: Derek Hough

quotes.quote: Pressure squeezes effort out of winners and excuses out of losers.
quotes.author: Orrin Woodward

quotes.quote: TheÂ prestigeÂ you acquire by being able to tell your friends that you know famous men proves only that you are yourself of small account.
quotes.author: W. Somerset Maugham

quotes.quote: ChronologicalÂ prestigeÂ is tenacious: once attained, it can't be shed; it increased moment by moment, day by day, pressing its honours on you until you are lavishly, overly endowed with them. Until you literally sink under them.
quotes.author: Shirley Hazzard

quotes.quote: Often times, the more power and prestige a person achieves, the more arrogant a person can become.
quotes.author: John Ensign

quotes.quote: HisÂ renownÂ has been purchased, not by deeds of violence and blood, but by the diligent dispensation of pleasure.
quotes.author: Washington Irving

quotes.quote: Prestige is the shadow of money and power.
quotes.author: C. Wright Mills

quotes.quote: All the money, all the prestige in the world will never make up for the loss of your freedom.Â
quotes.author: George Monbiot

quotes.quote: A man'sÂ renownÂ is like the hue of grass, Which comes and goes.
quotes.author: Dante Alighieri

quotes.quote: In a dying civilization, politicalÂ prestigeÂ is the reward not of the shrewdest diagnostician, but of the man with the best bedside manner.
quotes.author: Eric Ambler

quotes.quote: TheÂ renownÂ of great men should always be measured by the means which they have used to acquire it.
quotes.author: Francois de la Rochefoucauld

quotes.quote: There can be no prestige without mystery, for familiarity breeds contempt.
quotes.author: Charles De Gaulle

quotes.quote: PrestigeÂ and premium will also play an important role in the future. But some people define these values differently today.
quotes.author: Norbert Reithofer

quotes.quote: TheÂ renownÂ which riches or beauty confer is fleeting and frail mental excellence is a splendid and lasting possession.
quotes.author: Sallust

quotes.quote: Measuring nationalÂ prestigeÂ by gold medals is like using viagra to judge the potency of a man.
quotes.author: Ai Weiwei

quotes.quote: RenownÂ awaits the commander who first restores artillery to its prime importance on the battlefield.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: Renown is something people have always wanted, but maybe what's modern is that it's considered a virtue, this desire, rather than a vice. I might be wrong about this.
quotes.author: Sheila Heti

quotes.quote: To feminine eyes a man'sÂ prestige, or his fame, envelops him in a luminous haze which obscures his faults. The triumphs of an aviator, an actor, a football player, an orator are often responsible for the beginning of a love affair.
quotes.author: Andre Maurois

quotes.quote: Hypocrisy is not a way of getting back to the moral high ground. Pretending you're moral, saying you're moral is not the same as acting morally.
quotes.author: Alan Dershowitz

quotes.quote: Pretending that we live doesn't make us alive.
quotes.author: Serj Tankian

quotes.quote: Pretending to know everything closes the door to finding out what's really there.
quotes.author: Neil deGrasse Tyson

quotes.quote: I hope you have not been leading a double life, pretending to be wicked and being good all the time. That would be hypocrisy.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: The best way to not get your heart broken, is pretending you don't have one.
quotes.author: Charlie Sheen

quotes.quote: Duty largely consists of pretending that the trivial is critical.
quotes.author: John Fowles

quotes.quote: You can't wake a person who is pretending to be asleep.
quotes.author: American Indian Proverb, Navajo

quotes.quote: Pretending is not just play. Pretending is imagined possibility. Pretending, or acting, is a very valuable life skill and we do it all the time.
quotes.author: Meryl Streep

quotes.quote: When one is pretending the entire body revolts.
quotes.author: Anais Nin

quotes.quote: Wearing a mask wears you out. Faking it is fatiguing. The most exhausting activity is pretending to be what you know you aren't.
quotes.author: Rick Warren

quotes.quote: The only good in pretending is the fun we get out of fooling ourselves that we fool somebody.
quotes.author: Booth Tarkington

quotes.quote: Wisdom consists partly in not pretending anymore, in discarding artifice.
quotes.author: Julian Barnes

quotes.quote: It's much more interesting to embrace who you really are rather than waste energy pretending to be someone else.
quotes.author: Adam Levine

quotes.quote: The terrible immoralities are the cunning ones hiding behind masks of morality, such as exploiting people while pretending to help them.
quotes.author: Vernon Howard

quotes.quote: You're pretending this isn't your life. You think it's going to happen some other time. When you're dead you'll realise you were alive now.
quotes.author: Caryl Churchill

quotes.quote: Everybody wants to lie to himself, pretending that there's something else besides only the normal life you're living in.
quotes.author: Gaspar Noe

quotes.quote: There’s no use of pretending to be good in front of people who are also doing same to us.. Mutual deceptions don’t lead anywhere.
quotes.author: Rajneesh Sharma

quotes.quote: Everyone in a position of authority is hysterical, and everyone else is pretending to be asleep.
quotes.author: Samuel R. Delany

quotes.quote: Nobody really knows what they're doing. Some are just better at pretending like they do.
quotes.author: Kumail Najiani

quotes.quote: Half the trouble in life is caused by pretending there isn't any.
quotes.author: Edith Warthon

quotes.quote: There is weakness in pretending to know more than you know or in stating less than you know.
quotes.author: Robert Henri

quotes.quote: You don't get anything worth getting by pretending to know things you don't know.
quotes.author: Sam Harris

quotes.quote: Pretending that there are no choices to be made - reading only books, for example, which are cheery and safe and nice - is a prescription for disaster for the young.
quotes.author: Louis Lowry

quotes.quote: You gain power by pretending to be weak.
quotes.author: Chuck Palahniuk

quotes.quote: Confidence is very important - even pretending to be confident. If you make a mistake but do not let your opponent see what you are thinking then he may overlook the mistake.
quotes.author: Viswanathan Anand

quotes.quote: We are born knowing how to be just. And we die knowing we spent a lifetime pretending we didn't.
quotes.author: Susan Meissner

quotes.quote: Good people protect people they love even if that means that pretending that everything is okay.
quotes.author: Ron McLarty

quotes.quote: I think any hardship is better than pretending to do what one is paid for, and never really doing it.
quotes.author: George Eliot

quotes.quote: Never pretend to a love which you do not actually feel, for love is not ours to command.
quotes.author: Alan Watts

quotes.quote: You wear a mask for so long, you forget who you were beneath it.
quotes.author: Alan Moore

quotes.quote: When you aren't sincere you need to pretend, and by pretending you end up believing yourself; that's the basic principle of every faith.
quotes.author: Alberto Moravia

quotes.quote: The pious pretense that evil does not exist only makes it vague, enormous and menacing.
quotes.author: Aleister Crowley

quotes.quote: It would be futile to attempt to fit women into a masculine pattern of attitudes, skills and abilities.
quotes.author: Arianna Huffington

quotes.quote: To copy beauty forfeits all pretense to fame; to copy faults is want of sense.
quotes.author: Charles Churchill

quotes.quote: Good food is good food. It doesn't have to come with pretense.
quotes.author: Christina Tosi

quotes.quote: Pretense cannot sustain blind power.
quotes.author: Dejan Stojanovic

quotes.quote: The real loneliness is living among all these kind people who only ask one to pretend!
quotes.author: Edith Wharton

quotes.quote: You must not under any pretense allow your mind to dwell on any thought that is not positive, constructive, optimistic, kind.
quotes.author: Emmet Fox

quotes.quote: Style equals pretense.
quotes.author: Enrico Colantoni

quotes.quote: Our greatest pretenses are built up not to hide the evil and the ugly in us, but our emptiness. The hardest thing to hide is something that is not there.
quotes.author: Eric Hoffer

quotes.quote: The name and pretense of virtue is as serviceable to self-interest as are real vices.
quotes.author: Francois de la Rochefoucauld

quotes.quote: I've never been a fan of pretense or procrastination. After all, our state is defined by its independent, outspoken spirit.
quotes.author: Gavin Newsom

quotes.quote: The world is full of people who are very clever at seeming much smarter than they really are.
quotes.author: Kurt Vonnegut

quotes.quote: When wisdom and knowledge appear, great pretense arises.
quotes.author: Laozi

quotes.quote: I look for a girl without pretense who is sweet and intelligent - preferably brunette, but that's not completely important.
quotes.author: Lucas Till

quotes.quote: You can't cure someone who's pretending to be sick.
quotes.author: Marty Rubin

quotes.quote: Fiction: a game of pretend.
quotes.author: Marty Rubin

quotes.quote: Political Freedom without economic equality is a pretense, a fraud, a lie; and the workers want no lying.
quotes.author: Mikhail Bakunin

quotes.quote: Genuine happiness is not nearly as common as a fake smile.
quotes.author: Mokokoma Mokhonoana

quotes.quote: In some cases, it is not the person that has changed, but their decision not to be themselves.
quotes.author: Mokokoma Mokhonoana

quotes.quote: We understand how dangerous a mask can be. We all become what we pretend to be.
quotes.author: Patrick Rothfuss

quotes.quote: He who has a mind to do mischief will always find a pretense.
quotes.author: Publilius Syrus

quotes.quote: There is no worse sickness for the soul, o you who are proud, than this pretense of perfection.
quotes.author: Rumi

quotes.quote: No one can long hide behind a mask; the pretense soon lapses into the true character.
quotes.author: Seneca The Younger

quotes.quote: People pretend to be other people because they have never thought of their true selves.
quotes.author: Sunday Adelaja

quotes.quote: Most of the confidence which I appear to feel, especially when influenced by noon wine, is only a pretense.
quotes.author: Tennessee Williams

quotes.quote: I don't impressed if you're a religious person. I just wanna know about soul behind that mask.
quotes.author: Toba Beta

quotes.quote: There's a difference between playing and playing games. The former is an act of joy, the latter — an act.
quotes.author: Vera Nazarian

quotes.quote: It is not poverty so much as pretense that harasses a ruined man - the struggle between a proud mind and an empty purse - the keeping up of a hollow show that must soon come to an end.
quotes.author: Washington Irving

quotes.quote: Not being beautiful was the true blessing. Not being beautiful forced me to develop my inner resources. The pretty girl has a handicap to overcome.
quotes.author: Golda Meir

quotes.quote: Put your hand on a hot stove for a minute and it seems like an hour. Sit with a pretty girl for an hour, and it seems like a minute.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: A great social success is a pretty girl who plays her cards as carefully as if she were plain.
quotes.author: F. Scott Fitzgerald

quotes.quote: No matter how plain a woman may be, if truth and honesty are written across her face, she will be beautiful.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.quote: Beauty is power; a smile is its sword.
quotes.author: Charles Reade

quotes.quote: Judge nothing by the appearance. The more beautiful the serpent, the more fatal its sting.
quotes.author: William Scott Downey

quotes.quote: She was pretty, fresh, she came from the hands of nature full of that sorcery, uncertain and eternal, that an individual passes to another individual for the secret ends of creation.
quotes.author: Joaquim Maria Machado de Assis

quotes.quote: A beautiful girl can make you dizzy, like you been drinkin jack and coke all morning. she can make you feel high, for the single greatest comodity known to man - promise.
quotes.author: J. D. Salinger

quotes.quote: The prettiest girl could have low self-esteem because self-esteem is based on what SHE thinks of herself and not what others think.
quotes.author: Sonya Parker

quotes.quote: It has been said that a pretty face is a passport. But it's not, it's a visa, and it runs out fast.
quotes.author: Julie Burchill

quotes.quote: The faces that have charmed us the most escape us the soonest.
quotes.author: Sir Walter Scott

quotes.quote: There is a garden in her face, Where roses and white lilies blow; A heavenly paradise is that place, Wherein all pleasant fruits do grow. There cherries grow that none may buy, Till cherry ripe themselves do cry.
quotes.author: Thomas Campion

quotes.quote: A pretty girl is like a melody that haunts you night and day.
quotes.author: Irving Berlin

quotes.quote: I never met such a pretty girl, and I guess I’m just sensitive because real—real beauty makes me want to gag.
quotes.author: Woody Allen

quotes.quote: I'm at the age now that when a pretty girl smiles at me I automatically check to see what's unzipped.
quotes.author: Dick Enberg

quotes.quote: She's a girl that can’t be beat, born and raised on ghetto streets. She's a devastating beauty, a pretty girl with ebony eyes.
quotes.author: Rick James

quotes.quote: Anybody can see a pretty girl. An artist can look at a pretty girl and see the old woman she will become. A better artist can look at an old woman and see the pretty girl she used to be.
quotes.author: Robert A. Heinlein

quotes.quote: He looked at a pretty girl as he would have listened to a piece of music.
quotes.author: Henry James

quotes.quote: He didn't know if he was looking at a pretty girl, or a lovely fairy.
quotes.author: Victor Hugo

quotes.quote: It seemed to her almost that she was pretty. This threw her in a singularly troubled state of mind. Up to that moment she had never thought of her face.
quotes.author: Victor Hugo

quotes.quote: Yes, she was pretty, distinctly pretty; and to-night her face seemed really vivacious. She had that look that no woman, however histrionically proficient, can successfully counterfeit—she looked as if she were having a good time.
quotes.author: F. Scott Fitzgerald

quotes.quote: She was pretty and she was loving, and most frightfully good when you were ill, and always kind, and almost always just. That is, she was just when she understood things.
quotes.author: E. Nesbit

quotes.quote: When a child, she was pretty, and, as she grew up, became still more and more beautiful, until, at the age of sixteen, she was beauty itself.
quotes.author: Miguel de Cervantes

quotes.quote: Beauty is not in the face; beauty is a light in the heart.
quotes.author: Kahlil Gibran

quotes.quote: Just because something is beautiful doesn't mean it's good.
quotes.author: Alex Flinn

quotes.quote: Pretty girls who are unaware of their looks are more attractive than gorgeous girls who flaunt it.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Beauty is only skin deep. I think what's really important is finding a balance of mind, body and spirit.
quotes.author: Jennifer Lopez

quotes.quote: How I feel about myself is more important than how I look. Feeling confident, being comfortable in your skin that's what really makes you beautiful.
quotes.author: Bobbi Brown

quotes.quote: True beauty in a woman is reflected in her soul. It is the caring that she lovingly gives, the passion that she knows.
quotes.author: Audrey Hepburn

quotes.quote: A woman's greatest asset is her beauty.
quotes.author: Alex Comfort

quotes.quote: Behind every argument lies someone's ignorance.
quotes.author: Louis D. Brandeis

quotes.quote: Once you reach the top, take care as the only way left to go is down.
quotes.author: Darren Bateman

quotes.quote: One man may be more cunning than another, but not more cunning than everybody else.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: Pride is as loud a beggar as want, and a great deal more saucy. When you have bought one fine thing, you must buy ten more, that your appearance may be all of a piece; but it is easier to suppress the first desire than to satisfy all that follow it.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: The devil wipes his breech with poor folks' pride.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: The higher you climb, the heavier you fall.
quotes.author: Vietnamese (on pride)

quotes.quote: A proud man is always looking down on things and people; and, of course, as long as you are looking down, you cannot see something that is above you
quotes.author: C.S. Lewis

quotes.quote: Pride gets no pleasure out of having something, only out of having more of it than the next man... It is the comparison that makes you proud: the pleasure of being above the rest. Once the element of competition is gone, pride is gone.
quotes.author: C.S. Lewis

quotes.quote: We are rarely proud when we are alone.
quotes.author: Voltaire

quotes.quote: The proud person always wants to do the right thing, the great thing. But because he wants to do it in his own strength, he is fighting not with man, but with God.
quotes.author: Soren Kierkegaard

quotes.quote: Proud people breed sad sorrows for themselves.
quotes.author: Emily Bronte

quotes.quote: God opposes the proud, but gives grace to the humble.
quotes.author: Holy Bible, James 4:6

quotes.quote: Pride is pleasure arising from a man's thinking too highly of himself.
quotes.author: Baruch Spinoza

quotes.quote: Through pride we are ever deceiving ourselves. But deep down below the surface of the average conscience a still, small voice says to us, something is out of tune.
quotes.author: Carl Jung

quotes.quote: Never look down on anybody unless you are helping them up.
quotes.author: Jesse Jackson

quotes.quote: Most of the trouble in the world is caused by people wanting to be important.
quotes.author: T. S. Eliot

quotes.quote: Pride is a personal commitment. It is an attitude which separates excellence from mediocrity.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Airs of importance are the credentials of impotence.
quotes.author: Johann Kaspar Lavater

quotes.quote: Pride is the mask of one's own faults.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: In general, pride is at the bottom of all great mistakes.
quotes.author: John Ruskin

quotes.quote: Pride helps us; and pride is not a bad thing when it only urges us to hide our own hurts, not to hurt others.
quotes.author: George Eliot

quotes.quote: Pride must die in you, or nothing of heaven can live in you.
quotes.author: Andrew Murray

quotes.quote: Pride makes us long for a solution to things - a solution, a purpose, a final cause; but the better telescopes become, the more stars appear.
quotes.author: Julian Barnes,Flaubert's Parrot

quotes.quote: The proud wish God would agree with them. They are not interested in changing their opinions to agree with God's.
quotes.author: Ezra Taft Benson

quotes.quote: Pride is the mother of arrogance.
quotes.author: Toba Beta

quotes.quote: He who imagines he can do without the world deceives himself much; but he who fancies the world cannot do without him is still more mistaken.
quotes.author: Francois de la Rochefoucauld

quotes.quote: Pride gets no pleasure out of having something, only out of having more of it than the next man.
quotes.author: C.S. Lewis quotes

quotes.quote: It is more often from 'pride' than from ignorance that we are so obstinately opposed to current opinions; we find the first places taken, and we do not want to be the last.
quotes.author: Franois de la Rochefoucauld

quotes.quote: There is nothing that will kill a man so soon as having nobody to find fault with but himself.
quotes.author: George Eliot

quotes.quote: To know a man, observe how he wins his object, rather than how he loses it; for when we fail our pride supports us; when we succeed, it betrays us.
quotes.author: Charles Caleb Coltoz

quotes.quote: The end for which God has instituted the priesthood has been to appoint on earth public persons to watch over the honor of his divine majesty, and to procure the salvation of souls.
quotes.author: St. Alphonsus Liguori

quotes.quote: The priesthood is the love of the heart of Jesus. When you see a priest, think of our Lord Jesus Christ.
quotes.author: St. John Vianney

quotes.quote: People who say that we priests are lonely are either lying or have got it all wrong. We are far less lonely than anyone else, for we can count on the constant company of the Lord, with whom we should be conversing without interruption. We are in love with Love, with the Author of Love!
quotes.author: St. Josemaria Escriva

quotes.quote: The priesthood is a call, not a career; a redefinition of self, not just a new ministry; a way of life, not a job; a state of being; not just a function; a permanent, lifelong commitment, not a temporary style of service; an identity, not just a role.
quotes.author: Timothy Cardinal Dolan

quotes.quote: As the shepherd, so the sheep; as the priest, so the people. Priest-victim leadership begets a holy Church. Every worldly priest hinders the growth of the Church; every saintly priest promotes it. If only all priests realized how their holiness makes the Church holy and how the Church begins to decline when the level of holiness among priests falls below that of the people!
quotes.author: Ven. Fulton Sheen

quotes.quote: The power of the priest, is the power of the divine person; for the transubstantiation of the bread requires as much power as the creation of the world.
quotes.author: St. Bernardine of Siena

quotes.quote: How great is the dignity of the priesthood! What a dignity, what a dignity!… To be a priest! What does that mean? O God, my God, I do not understand it! What does it mean to present the holy, bloodless sacrifice and to administer the sacraments!
quotes.author: St Gaspar del Bufalo

quotes.quote: All the children of the Church are priests. At Baptism, they received the anointing that gives them a share in the priesthood. The sacrifice that they must offer to God is completely spiritual – it is themselves.
quotes.author: Anastpaul17

quotes.quote: The priesthood of Christ is 'not according to the law of a fleshy commandment, but according to the power of an indestructible life' (Heb. 7:16). Aaron was constituted high priest according to the powerless letter of the law, but Christ according to the powerful element of an indestructible life. Our High Priest is constituted of a life which nothing can conquer, but which rather conquers everything! It is a life which cannot be destroyed. A life which saves to the uttermost. The endless, eternal, divine, uncreated life. The resurrection life which has passed the test of death and Hades.
quotes.author: Witness Lee

quotes.quote: God calls those who believe as: the chosen, the elect, daughters, heirs, a royal priesthood, His treasured possession. - Hidden Treasures.
quotes.author: Robin Bertram

quotes.quote: Any of several church denominations denying the universal authority of the Pope and affirming the Reformation principles of justification by faith in Jesus alone, the priesthood of all believers, and the primacy of the Bible as the only source of revealed truth' and, more broadly, to mean Christianity outside 'of an Orthodox or Catholic church.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Jesus.. is the final priest who makes all priesthood obsolete – not merely the performance of ritual sacrifice, but the office, pomp and circumstance of priestly authority and hierarchy itself. Instead of deferring to any caste of religious hierarchs, followers of the Way are thus now summoned to collectively be a 'royal priesthood,' a 'chosen race' or 'holy nation' built not upon offices of any kind but upon transferred allegiance to God's in-breaking 'kingdom'.
quotes.author: Ronald E. Osborn

quotes.quote: Pride is a switch that turns off priesthood power. Humility is a switch that turns it on.
quotes.author: Dieter E Uchtdorf

quotes.quote: Every person is different and has a different contribution to make. No one is destined to fail. As you seek revelation to see gifts God sees in those you lead in the priesthood—particularly the young—you will be blessed to lift their sights to the service they can perform.
quotes.author: Henry B Eyring

quotes.quote: We need to bear in mind that people can change. They can put behind them bad habits. They can repent from transgressions. They can bear the priesthood worthily. And they can serve the Lord diligently… We can help them to overcome their shortcomings. We must develop the capacity to see men not as they are at present but as they may become when they receive testimonies of the gospel of Christ.
quotes.author: Thomas S Monson

quotes.quote: Priesthood holders carry with them the antidote to remove the terrible images of pornography and to wash away guilt. The priesthood has the power to unlock the influence of our habits, even to unchain from addiction, however tight the grip. It can heal over the scars of past mistakes.
quotes.author: Boyd K Packer

quotes.quote: God has revealed through his prophets that men are to receive the priesthood, become fathers, and with gentleness and pure, unfeigned love they are to lead and nurture their families in righteousness as the Savior leads the Church (see Eph. 5:23).
quotes.author: M. Russel Ballard

quotes.quote: Every high priest chosen from among mortals is put in charge of things pertaining to God on their behalf, to offer gifts and sacrifices for sins. He is able to deal gently with the ignorant and wayward, since he himself is subject to weakness; and because of this he must offer sacrifice for his own sins as well as for those of the people. And one does not presume to take this honour, but takes it only when called by God, just as Aaron was.
quotes.author: (Letter to the) Hebrews 5: 1-4

quotes.quote: Let us pray for all good and faithful priests who dedicate themselves to their people with generosity and unknown sacrifices.
quotes.author: Pope Francis

quotes.quote: Miracles are everywhere to be found when priesthood callings are magnified. When faith replaces doubt, when selfless service eliminates selfish striving, the power of God brings to pass His purposes. The priesthood is not really so much a gift as it is a commission to serve, a privilege to lift, and an opportunity to bless the lives of others.
quotes.author: Thomas S. Monson

quotes.quote: Nothing about the priesthood is self-centered. The priesthood always is used to serve, to bless, and to strengthen other people.
quotes.author: David A. Bednar

quotes.quote: The priestly vocation is essentially a call to sanctity, in the form that derives from the Sacrament of Holy Orders. Sanctity is intimacy with God; it is the imitation of Christ, poor, chaste and humble; it is unreserved love for souls and self-giving to their true good; it is love for the church which is holy and wants us to be holy, because such is the mission that Christ has entrusted to it.
quotes.author: Pope John Paul II

quotes.quote: Your wish to become a priest, or at least your wish to discover if you are being called to be one. And so the question is a serious one, because you have to prepare thoroughly, with clear intentions and an austere formation.
quotes.author: Pope John Paul II

quotes.quote: The world looks to the priest, because it looks to Jesus! No one can see Christ; but everyone sees the priest, and through him they wish to catch a glimpse of the Lord! Immense is the grandeur of the Lord! Immense is the grandeur and dignity of the priest!
quotes.author: Pope John Paul II

quotes.quote: Each priest is a man with a body of soft clay. To keep that treasure pure, he has to be stretched out on a cross of fire. Our fall can be greater than the fall of anyone else because of the height from which we tumble. Of all the bad men, bad religious men are the worst, because they were called to be closer to Christ.
quotes.author: Ven. Fulton J. Sheen

quotes.quote: A priest is one who makes Christ visible. The people see Christ in the saintly priests and they seek even to touch his robes as they did the robes of Christ. Children come to him without fear; non-Catholics give to them a reverence which they rarely give to others. The sure measure by which a priest draws souls to Christ is also the means by which he can drive souls from Christ.
quotes.author: Ven. Fulton J. Sheen

quotes.quote: The worthy priest is an angel of purity in mind and body, a cherub of light and knowledge, a seraph of love and Charity, an apostle of zeal in work and sanctity, a little god on earth in power and authority, in patience and benignity. He is the living image of Christ in this world, of Christ watching, praying, preaching, catechizing, working, weeping, going from town to town, from village to village, suffering, agonizing, sacrificing Himself and dying for the souls created to His image and likeness.
quotes.author: St. Jean Eudes

quotes.quote: But you are a chosen race, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people for his own possession, that you may proclaim the excellencies of him who called you out of darkness into his marvelous light.
quotes.author: 1 Peter 2:9

quotes.quote: You yourselves like living stones are being built up as a spiritual house, to be a holy priesthood, to offer spiritual sacrifices acceptable to God through Jesus Christ.
quotes.author: 1 Peter 2:5

quotes.quote: The priest is not made. He must be born a priest; must inherit his office. I refer to the new birth—the birth of water and the Spirit. Thus all Christians must became priests, children of God and co-heirs with Christ the Most High Priest.
quotes.author: Martin Luther

quotes.quote: To theÂ primitiveÂ mind, everything is either friendly or hostile; but experience has shown that friendliness and hostility are not the conceptions by which the world is to be understood.
quotes.author: Bertrand Russell

quotes.quote: Primitive societies without religion have never been found.
quotes.author: William Dean Howells

quotes.quote: Stories are the most primitive and purest form of communication.
quotes.author: Blake Mycoskie

quotes.quote: The genius of the primitive mind is that it can render human helplessness in noble and beautiful ways.
quotes.author: Don DeLillo

quotes.quote: We are primitive men; we taboo what we desire and need. How did the denying of love come to be associated with the idea of morality.
quotes.author: Christina Stead

quotes.quote: TheÂ primitiveÂ simplicity of their minds renders them a more easy prey to a big lie than a small one.
quotes.author: Adolf Hitler

quotes.quote: As civilization advances, man grows unconscious of the primitive elements of life; he is separated from them by his perfection of material techniques.
quotes.author: Charles Lindbergh

quotes.quote: It is a common rule with primitive people not to waken a sleeper, because his soul is away and might not have time to get back.
quotes.author: James George Frazer

quotes.quote: The primitive simplicity of their minds renders them a more easy prey to a big lie than a small one.
quotes.author: Adolf Hitler

quotes.quote: The prehistorical andÂ primitiveÂ period represents the true infancy of the mind.
quotes.author: James Mark Baldwin

quotes.quote: The most primitive places left with us are the swamps, where the spruce still grows shaggy with usnea.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: At our mostÂ primitiveÂ we are storytellers and dancers.
quotes.author: Anne Lamott

quotes.quote: Religion is a primitive form of philosophy, the attempt to offer a comprehensive view of reality.
quotes.author: Ayn Rand

quotes.quote: InÂ primitiveÂ society, where uniformity of occupation is the rule, and the distribution of the community into various classes of workers has hardly begun, every man is more or less his own magician; he practices charms and incantations for his own good and the injury of his enemies.
quotes.author: James Frazer

quotes.quote: In ancient times they had no statistics so they had to fall back on lies.
quotes.author: Stephen Leacock

quotes.quote: Ritual is the most primitive reflection of serious thought, a slow deposit, as it were, of people's imaginative insight into life.
quotes.author: Susanne Katherina Langer

quotes.quote: To the primitive mind, everything is either friendly or hostile; but experience has shown that friendliness and hostility are not the conceptions by which the world is to be understood.
quotes.author: Bertrand Russell

quotes.quote: PrimitiveÂ does not mean stupid.
quotes.author: Albie Sachs

quotes.quote: You cannot control theÂ primitiveÂ urges and hormones that drive your eating behavior.
quotes.author: Mark E. Hyman

quotes.quote: A primitive artist is an amateur whose work sells.
quotes.author: Grandma Moses

quotes.quote: Despite the theories traditionally taught in high school social studies, the truth is: The more primitive the society, the more leisured its way of life.
quotes.author: Peter Farb

quotes.quote: It is the mark of aÂ primitiveÂ society to view regression as progress.
quotes.author: Neale Donald Walsch

quotes.quote: Creation of something out of nothing is the mostÂ primitiveÂ of human passions and the most optimistic.
quotes.author: Christina Stead

quotes.quote: TheÂ primitiveÂ in each of us climbs closer to the surface during the night, for the moon sings to it, and the cold void between the stars speaks its language. To that savage self, evil can look lovely in too little light.
quotes.author: Dean Koontz

quotes.quote: TheÂ primitiveÂ stages can always be re-established; theÂ primitiveÂ mind is, in the fullest meaning of the word, imperishable.
quotes.author: Sigmund Freud

quotes.quote: Like it or not, we're still aÂ primitiveÂ tribe ruled by fears, superstition and misinformation.
quotes.author: Bill Maher

quotes.quote: PrimitiveÂ superstition lies just below the surface of even the most tough-minded individuals, and it is precisely those who most fight against it who are the first to succumb to its suggestive effects.
quotes.author: Carl Jung

quotes.quote: The most common trait of all primitive peoples is a reverence for the life-giving earth.
quotes.author: Stewart Udall

quotes.quote: It is aÂ primitiveÂ form of thought that things exist or do not exist.
quotes.author: Sir Arthur Eddington

quotes.quote: TheÂ primitiveÂ style makes nature look like stage scenery.
quotes.author: E. J. Hughes

quotes.quote: I'm the girl who still believes prince charming exists somewhere out there.
quotes.author: Taylor Swift

quotes.quote: Prince Charming can go suck rocks. I've met my true love and he's a contractor.
quotes.author: Yasmin Galenorn

quotes.quote: I don't need the Prince Charming to have my own happy ending.
quotes.author: Katy Perry

quotes.quote: I used to be a real prince charming if I went on a date with a girl. But then I'd get to where I was likely to have a stroke from the stress of keeping up my act. I've since learned the key to a good date is to pay attention on her.
quotes.author: Matthew Perry

quotes.quote: What would Prince Charming have for occupation if he had not to awaken the Sleeping beauty?
quotes.author: Simone De Beauvoir

quotes.quote: To me, Steve was my Prince Charming. He was my happily ever after, and we got that. We got 14 years of marriage; we had the best, most fantastic, adventurous, wonderful life that you could imagine. And I was very happy with that.
quotes.author: Terri Irwin

quotes.quote: We all have to let go of the Prince Charming complex and realize he doesn't necessarily exist in the package we assume he'll come in.
quotes.author: Gabrielle Union

quotes.quote: My advice for girls who are waiting for their Prince Charming is to be open for anything. Be open to new experiences, be open to the idea that it may take longer than you want, but if you're open to meeting new people and new adventures, then love will come along.
quotes.author: Lily Collins

quotes.quote: I'm a hopeless romantic. It's disgusting. It really is. I've seen 'While You Were Sleeping', like, twenty times, and I still believe in the whole Prince Charming thing.
quotes.author: Jennifer Love Hewitt

quotes.quote: I always looked for a man to rescue me and bring me happiness. I bought into that myth, of course, and looked for my own Prince Charming.
quotes.author: Linda Evans

quotes.quote: Men get to be a mixture of the charming mannerisms of the women they have known.
quotes.author: F. Scott Fitzgerald

quotes.quote: Let us be grateful to people who make us happy, they are the charming gardeners who make our souls blossom.
quotes.author: Marcel Proust

quotes.quote: He's not your prince charming if he doesn't make sure that you're his princess.
quotes.author: Demi Lovato

quotes.quote: To understand the nature of the people one must be a prince, to understand the nature of the prince, one must be of the people.
quotes.author: Niccolo Machiavelli

quotes.quote: Kindness is really important to me in finding my own prince - so are patience and a sense of humor. Without those qualities he's no Prince Charming
quotes.author: Anne Hathaway

quotes.quote: The prince isn't always charming and the princess isn't always a virgin.
quotes.author: Alison Bliss

quotes.quote: A memory is only a Prince Charming who stays just long enough to awaken the Sleeping Beauties of our wordless stories.
quotes.author: Michel de Certeau

quotes.quote: Deep in every heart slumbers a dream, and the couturier knows it: every woman is a princess.
quotes.author: Christian Dior

quotes.quote: Every girl pretends she is a princess at one point, no matter how little her life is like that.
quotes.author: Alex Flinn

quotes.quote: I do not want to be treated like a princess, I just want to be loved.
quotes.author: Pushpa Rana

quotes.quote: All nations are like a fairytale princess. Waiting for their prince charming to save them.
quotes.author: Arzum Uzun

quotes.quote: Every girl dreams of waking up one day, a princess. Until that day kicks you in the face, wearing steel toed boots.
quotes.author: L.A. Kennedy

quotes.quote: I am a princess. All girls are. Even if they live in tiny old attics. Even if they dress in rags, even if they aren't pretty, or smart, or young. They're still princesses.
quotes.author: Frances Hodgson Burnett

quotes.quote: A princess always takes care that her words are honeyed, for she may have to eat them.
quotes.author: Christina Dodd

quotes.quote: You may be a princess or the richest woman in the world, but you cannot be more than a lady.
quotes.author: Jennie Jerome Churchill

quotes.quote: You are a princess, destined to become a queen. Your own wondrous story has already begun. Your 'once upon a time' is now.
quotes.author: Dieter F. Uchtdorf

quotes.quote: He's not your prince charming if he doesn't make sure you know that you're his princess.
quotes.author: Demi Lovato

quotes.quote: A man who treats his woman like a princess is proof that he has been raised by a queen.
quotes.author: Wiz Khalifa

quotes.quote: There's nothing deeper than love. In fairy tales, the princesses kiss the frogs, and the frogs become princes. In real life, the princesses kiss princes, and the princes turn into frogs.
quotes.author: Paulo Coelho

quotes.quote: Young girls think they are princesses. Hermione also teaches that we have to also be warriors.
quotes.author: Emma Watson

quotes.quote: Perhaps all the dragons of our lives are princesses who are only waiting to see us once beautiful and brave.
quotes.author: Rainer Maria Rilke

quotes.quote: All women are princesses, it is our right.
quotes.author: Frances Hodgson Burnett

quotes.quote: Being a princess isn't all it's cracked up to be.
quotes.author: Princess Diana

quotes.quote: I pretend I am a princess,so that I can try and behave like one.
quotes.author: Frances Hodgson Burnett

quotes.quote: Sometimes being a sister is way better than being a princess.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Always know that in every girl, there is a princess with a strength of a warrior.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Girls like to see girls dressed up like princesses occasionally.
quotes.author: Nelly Furtado

quotes.quote: Whether or not you believe in fairy tales; every girl is a princess to somebody.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Lift up your head princess, if not the crown falls.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Always wear your invisible crown.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: I am a princess not because I have a prince. But because my Father is a King and He is God.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Treat her like a princess if she behaves like royalty.
quotes.author: Habeeb Akande

quotes.quote: Every girl deserves to be treated like a princess.
quotes.author: Heidi Montag

quotes.quote: Every girl deserves to be treated like a princess
quotes.author: Tyga

quotes.quote: Even in the middle of a large ocean,it seemed, there was no privacy to be had for the world's most famous ptincess.
quotes.author: John King,John Beveridge

quotes.quote: Fathers do not affect your Princess Quotient because every girl is her daddy's little princess.
quotes.author: Franesca Castagnolli

quotes.quote: She quickly realizes that princesses are more than just frilly dresses and tiaras.
quotes.author: Mark Loewen

quotes.quote: The principal sources of human misery may fairly be said to lie in the over-possession, under-possession, and the unwise use of economic goods.
quotes.author: Georgia Harkness

quotes.quote: A principal fruit of friendship, is the ease and discharge of the fullness and swellings of the heart, which passions of all kinds do cause and induce.
quotes.author: Francis Bacon

quotes.quote: The principal art of the teacher is to awaken the joy in creation and knowledge.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: Is there some principal of nature which states that we never know the quality of what we have until it is gone?
quotes.author: Herman Melville

quotes.quote: The principal fact of life is the free mind.
quotes.author: Joyce Cary

quotes.quote: The principal object of your reading should be for the acquisition of useful knowledge , and the strengthening, refining, and ennobling of your character.
quotes.author: Grenville Kleiser

quotes.quote: The principal cause of war is war itself.
quotes.author: C. Wright Mills

quotes.quote: The principal mark of genius is not perfection, but originality.
quotes.author: Robert Schumann

quotes.quote: The principal thing in the world is to keep the soul aloft.
quotes.author: Gustave Flaubert

quotes.quote: One of the principal occupations of man is to divine woman.
quotes.author: Jacques de Lacretelle

quotes.quote: The principal task of friendship is to foster one`s friends` illusions.
quotes.author: Arthur Schnitzler

quotes.quote: The principal point of cleverness is to know how to value things just as they deserve.
quotes.author: Francois de la Rochefoucauld

quotes.quote: The principal of unity and indivisibility of the republic are the essential reference points.
quotes.author: Giorgio Napolitano

quotes.quote: The basic principal of recursive design is to make the parts have the same power as the whole.
quotes.author: Bob Barton

quotes.quote: The first and principal duty of a pastor is to feed the flock by diligent preaching of the word.
quotes.author: John Owen

quotes.quote: The principal act of courage is to endure and withstand dangers doggedly rather than to attack them.
quotes.author: Thomas Aquinas

quotes.quote: The principal rule of art is to please and to move. All the other rules were created to achieve this first one.
quotes.author: Jean Racine

quotes.quote: The principal person in a picture is light.
quotes.author: Edouard Manet

quotes.quote: The principal means of acquiring an ardent love of Christ are mental prayer, Communion, mortification, retirement.
quotes.author: Alphonsus Maria de' Liguori

quotes.quote: The principal mechanism for convergence at the international as well as the domestic level is the diffusion of knowledge.
quotes.author: Thomas Piketty

quotes.quote: The first principal of nonviolent action is that of noncooperation with everything humiliating.
quotes.author: Cesar Chavez

quotes.quote: It is indeed one of the principal drawbacks of every kind of interventionism that it is so difficult to reverse the process.
quotes.author: Ludwig Von Mises

quotes.quote: The principal contributor to loneliness in this country is television. What happens is that the family 'gets together' alone.
quotes.author: Ashley Montagu

quotes.quote: The principal effect of the passions is that they incite and persuade the mind to will the events for which they prepared the body.
quotes.author: Rene Descartes

quotes.quote: The principal instances of mass violence in the world today are those committed by governments within their own legally recognized borders.
quotes.author: Susan Sontag

quotes.quote: Everyone thinks that the principal thing to the tree is the fruit, but in point of fact the principal thing to it is the seed.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.quote: One principal object of good-breeding is to suit our behaviour to the three several degrees of men, our superiors, our equals, and those below us.
quotes.author: Jonathan Swift

quotes.quote: The principal form that the work of love takes is attention. When we love another person we give him or her our attention; we attend to that person's growth.
quotes.author: M. Scott Peck

quotes.quote: The principal function of form is to advance our understanding. It is the organization of a piece which helps the listener to keep the idea in mind, to follow its development, its growth, its elaboration, its fate.
quotes.author: Arnold Schoenberg

quotes.quote: The principal use of prudence, of self-control, is that it teaches us to be masters of our passions, and to so control and guide them that the evils which they cause are quite bearable, and that we even derive joy from them all.
quotes.author: Rene Descartes

quotes.quote: Principles without programs are platitudes.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: Principles are the territory. Values are maps.
quotes.author: Stephen Covey

quotes.quote: Most principles are limp until they are tested.
quotes.author: Richard Brookhiser

quotes.quote: Obey the principles without being bound by them.
quotes.author: Bruce Lee

quotes.quote: A principle isn't a principle until it costs you something.
quotes.author: William Bernbach

quotes.quote: Principles are the simplicity on the far side of complexity.
quotes.author: Stephen R. Covey

quotes.quote: There is no principle worth the name if it is not wholly good.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: A good principle not rightly understood may prove as hurtful as a bad.
quotes.author: John Milton

quotes.quote: Let principles make decisions.
quotes.author: Jack Hyles

quotes.quote: Teach principles not formulas.
quotes.author: Richard P. Feynman

quotes.quote: Principle is a passion for truth.
quotes.author: William Hazlitt

quotes.quote: The principle part of faith is patience.
quotes.author: George Macdonald

quotes.quote: Principle comes first; action thereafter.
quotes.author: Todd Stocker

quotes.quote: Rise above principle and do what's right.
quotes.author: Joseph Heller

quotes.quote: Principles have a way of yielding to power.
quotes.author: Bette Lord

quotes.quote: The first principle of all action is leisure.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: Principles are what people have instead of God.
quotes.author: Alexander Schmemann

quotes.quote: Important principles may and must be inflexible.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.quote: The principle of realism means denial of the ideal.
quotes.author: Gustave Courbet

quotes.quote: Principles and their consequences are always constant.
quotes.author: Sunday Adelaja

quotes.quote: Love is the only principle which makes life tolerable.
quotes.author: Aleister Crowley

quotes.quote: The principles always work if you work the principles.
quotes.author: Jack Canfield

quotes.quote: The deepest principle in human nature is the craving to be appreciated.
quotes.author: William James

quotes.quote: A new principle is an inexhaustible source of new views.
quotes.author: Luc De Clapiers

quotes.quote: Alter strategies and tactics, but never your principles.
quotes.author: John Kessel

quotes.quote: Never compromise a principle or relinquish a vital truth.
quotes.author: Alfred Armand Montapert

quotes.quote: The strongest principle of growth lies in human choice.
quotes.author: George Eliot

quotes.quote: The principles of true art is not to portray, but to evoke.
quotes.author: Jerzy Kosinski

quotes.quote: Fixed principles of truth are the only safeguard for youth.
quotes.author: Ellen G. White

quotes.quote: If principle is good for anything, it is worth living up to.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: Your life is a print-out of your thoughts.
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: The power is to set the agenda. What we print and what we don't print matter a lot.
quotes.author: Katharine Graham

quotes.quote: The digital print is becoming the look of our time, and it makes the C-print start to look like a tintype.
quotes.author: Joel Sternfeld

quotes.quote: The flood of print has turned reading into a process of gulping rather than savoring.
quotes.author: Raymond Chandler

quotes.quote: Nothing in fine print is ever good news.
quotes.author: Andy Rooney

quotes.quote: History is simply a piece of paper covered with print: the main thing is to make history, not to write it.
quotes.author: Otto von Bismarck

quotes.quote: You can't stop people printing what they want to print.
quotes.author: Alan Sugar
