quotes.quote: Print encourages a sense of closure, a sense that what is found in a text has been finalized, has reached a state of completion.
quotes.author: Walter J. Ong

quotes.quote: You can print money to bail out a bank, but you can't print life to bail out a planet.
quotes.author: Paul Hawken

quotes.quote: The large print giveth and the small print taketh away.
quotes.author: Tom Waits

quotes.quote: Don't follow in any footprints, make your own prints. Because, you are the future of tomorrow.
quotes.author: Jackie Joyner-Kersee

quotes.quote: If you do big things they print your face, and if you do little things they print only your thumbs.
quotes.author: Arthur Baer

quotes.quote: The plainest print cannot be read through a gold eagle.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.quote: You are putting on paper, in print, what you sense and feel in your mind.
quotes.author: Anthony Barboza

quotes.quote: There's nobody between you and the print. Nobody. It's you and the subject and the final print. And if you get it published that way, you've said it.
quotes.author: David Douglas Duncan

quotes.quote: If print was invented tomorrow, it would be the death of digital.
quotes.author: Vaughan Oliver

quotes.quote: Print-based libraries developed in an age of scarce printed resources.
quotes.author: Tom Peters

quotes.quote: Print is predictable and impersonal, conveying information in a mechanical transaction with the reader's eye. Handwriting, by contrast, resists the eye, reveals its meaning slowly, and is as intimate as skin.
quotes.author: Ruth Ozeki

quotes.quote: In print, people can do anything to you. Everything you do is picked apart. People love it; they're waiting for you to make a mistake.
quotes.author: Brian May

quotes.quote: Print is predictable and impersonal, conveying information in a mechanical transaction with the reader's eye. Handwriting, by contrast, resists the eye, reveals its meaning slowly, and is as intimate as skin.
quotes.author: Ruth Ozeki

quotes.quote: Nothing prints more lively in our minds than something we wish to forget.
quotes.author: Michel de Montaigne

quotes.quote: When you print out your manuscript and read it, marking up with a pen, it sometimes feels like a criminal returning to the scene of a crime.
quotes.author: Don Roff

quotes.quote: Fairly large print is a real antidote to stiff reading.
quotes.author: Ronald Fisher

quotes.quote: Lovers of print are simply confusing the plate for the food.
quotes.author: Douglas Adams

quotes.quote: Print is the sharpest and the strongest weapon of our party.
quotes.author: Joseph Stalin

quotes.quote: If you take away print and embroidery, you have to challenge yourself a bit more on the cut.
quotes.author: Joseph Altuzarra

quotes.quote: A print is a work of art that us made by transferring an image from an inked surface to a sheet of paper and that exists as one of multiple impressions, which together constitute an edition.
quotes.author: Sarah J. S. Suzuki

quotes.quote: Making prints and the enthusiasm for printmaking are what ensures that printmaking is a vital, positive and energetic creative medium, which will continue to push forward.
quotes.author: Megan Fishpoo

quotes.quote: Printmaking provides unending, infinite opportunities for image-making. The freedom of knowing your craft and taking pride in that skill-then it is capable of capturing what we see in out imagination and making it real.
quotes.author: Megan Fishpoo

quotes.quote: Knowledge is what you get from reading the small print in a contract. Experience is what you get from not reading it.
quotes.author: Evan Esar

quotes.quote: Action expresses priorities.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: What may be done at any time will be done at no time.
quotes.author: Scottish Proverb

quotes.quote: Good things happen when you get your priorities straight.
quotes.author: Scott Caan

quotes.quote: Lack of time is actually lack of priorities.
quotes.author: Timothy Ferris

quotes.quote: What seems so necessary today may not even be desirable tomorrow.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King, Jr.

quotes.quote: Things which matter most must never be at the mercy of things which matter least.
quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.quote: Most of us spend too much time on what is urgent and not enough time on what is important.
quotes.author: Stephen R. Covey

quotes.quote: It is not a daily increase, but a daily decrease. Hack away at the inessentials.
quotes.author: Bruce Lee

quotes.quote: The mark of a great man is one who knows when to set aside the important things in order to accomplish the vital ones.
quotes.author: Brandon Sanderson

quotes.quote: The Principle of Priority states (a) you must know the difference between what is urgent and what is important, and (b) you must do what's important first.
quotes.author: Steven Pressfield

quotes.quote: I learned that we can do anything, but we can't do everything... at least not at the same time. So think of your priorities not in terms of what activities you do, but when you do them. Timing is everything.
quotes.author: Dan Millman

quotes.quote: The key is not to prioritize what's on your schedule, but to schedule your priorities.
quotes.author: Stephen Covey

quotes.quote: Decide what you want, decide what you are willing to exchange for it. Establish your priorities and go to work.
quotes.author: H. L. Hunt

quotes.quote: Sometimes when you're overwhelmed by a situation - when you're in the darkest of darkness - that's when your priorities are reordered.
quotes.author: Phoebe Snow

quotes.quote: Nobody's life is ever all balanced. It's a conscious decision to choose your priorities every day.
quotes.author: Elisabeth Hasselbeck

quotes.quote: We don't drift in good directions. We discipline and prioritize ourselves there.
quotes.author: Andy Stanley

quotes.quote: Living in light of eternity changes your priorities.
quotes.author: Rick Warren

quotes.quote: Always concentrate on the most valuable use of your time. This is what separates the winners from the losers.
quotes.author: Brian Tracy

quotes.quote: Do not let what you cannot do interfere with what you can do.
quotes.author: John Wooden

quotes.quote: Doing more things faster is no substitute for doing the right things.
quotes.author: Stephen Covey

quotes.quote: Forget about likes and dislikes. They are of no consequence. Just do what must be done. This may not be happiness, but it is greatness.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: Do the hard jobs first. The easy jobs will take care of themselves.
quotes.author: Dale Carnegie

quotes.quote: The life you have left is a gift. Cherish it. Enjoy it now, to the fullest. Do what matters, now.
quotes.author: Leo Babauta

quotes.quote: The most important thing in life is knowing the most important things in life.
quotes.author: David F. Jakielo

quotes.quote: Desires dictate our priorities, priorities shape our choices, and choices determine our actions.
quotes.author: Dallin H. Oaks

quotes.quote: You have to decide what your highest priorities are and have the courage?pleasantly, smilingly, nonapologetically, to say ?no? to other things.
quotes.author: Stephen R. Covey

quotes.quote: Set aside time to plan how you will spend your time. Think about what's most important. Then do those things first.
quotes.author: Frank Bettger

quotes.quote: Do the duty which lies nearest to you. The second duty will then become clearer.
quotes.author: Thomas Carlyle

quotes.quote: The older I get the more wisdom I find in the ancient rule of taking first things first. A process which often reduces the most complex human problem to a manageable proportion.
quotes.author: Dwight D. Eisenhower

quotes.quote: No one is going to hand you an organizational chart. You have to hand it to yourself.
quotes.author: Robert Genn

quotes.quote: In prison you've got all kinds of people. People beating up people for their commissary, people beating up people for their tennis shoes. You've got people sodomizing people, you know, just rambunctious.
quotes.author: Julius Lockett

quotes.quote: Prison is a second by second assault on the soul, a day to day degradation of the self, an oppressive steel and brick umbrella that transforms seconds into hours and hours into days.
quotes.author: Mumia Abu-Jamal

quotes.quote: The primary obligation of any prisoner is to escape. Whether that means actually leaving or simply figuring out a way to handle things so you don't go crazy is up to you.
quotes.author: Emmanuel Goldstein

quotes.quote: Most prisons have wide gates!
quotes.author: Katherine Cecil Thurston

quotes.quote: Prison experience puts distance between me and any person who hasn't been there, done that.
quotes.author: Patricia McConnell

quotes.quote: The prison life of the past looks in our own time like liberation itself.
quotes.author: Christopher Lasch

quotes.quote: In prison, those things withheld from and denied to the prisoner become precisely what he wants most of all.
quotes.author: Eldridge Cleaver

quotes.quote: Prison is a socialist paradise where equality prevails, everything is supplied, and competition is eliminated.
quotes.author: Elbert Hubbard

quotes.quote: Depression is a prison to which you have the key except you never think to look for it.
quotes.author: Kevin Hearne

quotes.quote: Being in prison for seven years was like being in an army that never drilled, never deployed, and only fought itself.
quotes.author: Raegan Butcher

quotes.quote: Prison is, simply put, the bottom rung of the welfare ladder.
quotes.author: Stephen Reid

quotes.quote: Prison is the only form of public housing that the government has truly invested in over the past 5 decades.
quotes.author: Marc Lamont Hill

quotes.quote: Prison always has been a good place for writers, killing, as it does, the twin demons of mobility and diversion.
quotes.author: Dan Simmons

quotes.quote: A prison is a cross section of society in which every human strain is clearly revealed.
quotes.author: Eugene V Debs

quotes.quote: Prisons of stone and iron may hold the body for long and painful years in darkness, but they cannot shut out the light of truth from the truth loving soul; they cannot destroy the peace of the dutiful spirit.
quotes.author: Hubbard Winslow

quotes.quote: Your mind is your prison when you focus on your fear.
quotes.author: Tim Fargo

quotes.quote: Self is the only prison that can ever bind the soul.
quotes.author: Henry Van Dyke

quotes.quote: Prison is a recruitment center for the army of crime. That is what it achieves.
quotes.author: Michel Foucault

quotes.quote: Cold walls do not a prison make, nor iron bands a bondsman.
quotes.author: Scott Lynch

quotes.quote: Prison has taught me that there is a part of you that no one can ever take from you, and that is your heart.
quotes.author: Babar Ahmad

quotes.quote: Prison is an expensive way of making bad people worse.
quotes.author: Douglas Hurd

quotes.quote: Prison itself is a tremendous education in the need for patience and perseverance. It is above all a test of one's commitment.
quotes.author: Nelson Mandela

quotes.quote: Prison is like high school with knives.
quotes.author: Raegan Butcher

quotes.quote: In prison, ones worst enemies will always be the brothers of ones own race.
quotes.author: John Greschner

quotes.quote: Our prisons and our jails are now our mental health institutions.
quotes.author: Hillary Clinton

quotes.quote: How come life in prison doesn't mean life? Until it does, we're not ready to do away with the death penalty. Stop thinking in terms of punishment for a minute and think in terms of safeguarding innocent people from incorrigible murderers.
quotes.author: Jesse Ventura

quotes.quote: We are all so guilty at the way we have allowed the world around us to become more ugly and tasteless every year that we surrender to terror and steep ourselves in it.
quotes.author: Norman Mailer

quotes.quote: The prisoner is not the one who has commited a crime, but the one who clings to his crime and lives it over and over.
quotes.author: Henry Miller

quotes.quote: Prisons are hate factories, Pastor, and society wants more and more of them.
quotes.author: John Grisham

quotes.quote: Prison make you a better judge of character. You pick up on people much faster.
quotes.author: Suge Knight

quotes.quote: Privacy is a bourgeois fantasy.
quotes.author: Johannes Grenzfurthner

quotes.quote: Privacy is a function of liberty.
quotes.author: Edward Snowden

quotes.quote: Privacy may actually be an anomaly.
quotes.author: Vint Cerf

quotes.quote: Like all security, privacy is hard.
quotes.author: Cory Doctorow

quotes.quote: You have to fight for your privacy or you lose it.
quotes.author: Eric Schmidt

quotes.quote: Any privacy in public is a hard thing to negotiate.
quotes.author: Benedict Cumberbatch

quotes.quote: All violations of essential privacy are brutalizing.
quotes.author: Katharine Fullerton Gerould

quotes.quote: Privacy is implied. Privacy is not up for discussion.
quotes.author: Mikko Hypponen

quotes.quote: If privacy is outlawed, only outlaws will have privacy.
quotes.author: Philip R. Zimmermann

quotes.quote: Privacy I think gets invaded when you start being honest.
quotes.author: Sonreal

quotes.quote: Privacy is a privilege not granted to the aged or the young.
quotes.author: Margaret Laurence

quotes.quote: Privacy is something you can sell, but you can't buy it back.
quotes.author: Bob Dylan

quotes.quote: It's hard to just kinda get some privacy and do your own thing.
quotes.author: Shaun White

quotes.quote: Human beings are not meant to lose their anonymity and privacy.
quotes.author: Sarah Chalke

quotes.quote: It's dangerous when people are willing to give up their privacy.
quotes.author: Noam Chomsky

quotes.quote: You never understand how dear your privacy is until you lose it.
quotes.author: Rosie Perez

quotes.quote: We demand privacy, yet we glorify those that break into computers.
quotes.author: Bill McCollum

quotes.quote: The only thing privacy laws accomplish is making the bugs smaller.
quotes.author: Robert A. Heinlein

quotes.quote: Privacy isn't dead, although it is fashionable for digerati to say so.
quotes.author: Andrew Curry

quotes.quote: Privacy laws are our biggest impediment to us obtaining our objectives.
quotes.author: Michael Eisner

quotes.quote: We're all torn between the desire for privacy and the fear of loneliness.
quotes.author: Andy Rooney

quotes.quote: We live in a moment in history in which our privacy may not be important.
quotes.author: Jonathan Nolan

quotes.quote: Privacy - like eating and breathing - is one of life's basic requirements.
quotes.author: Katherine Neville

quotes.quote: Privacy and loneliness were the traditional luxuries accorded to a skipper.
quotes.author: Tom Clancy

quotes.quote: Nothing is quite as bad as being without privacy and lonely at the same time.
quotes.author: Alexander Theroux

quotes.quote: For me the core principles of privacy online are transparency, choice and control.
quotes.author: Marissa Mayer

quotes.quote: Privacy is like sleep - something you don't appreciate until you have to go without it.
quotes.author: Helen McCloy

quotes.quote: Privacy matters; privacy is what allows us to determine who we are and who we want to be.
quotes.author: Edward Snowden

quotes.quote: If we don't act now to safeguard our privacy, we could all become victims of identity theft.
quotes.author: Bill Nelson

quotes.quote: Privacy. Someday, in the future, people will look back and remember how beautiful it once was.
quotes.author: Jodie Foster

quotes.quote: Maybe the private life wasn't forever. Maybe everyone got it for a little while and then spent the rest of their lives remembering.
quotes.author: Ann Patchett

quotes.quote: I don't know why people are so keen to put the details of their private life in public; they forget that invisibility is a superpower.
quotes.author: Banksy

quotes.quote: Who you are in public is a test of your conviction; who you are in private, integrity.
quotes.author: Criss Jami

quotes.quote: It's called a private life for a reason - it's mine, and it's special and sacred.
quotes.author: Lili Reinhart

quotes.quote: If the private life of the sea could ever be transposed onto paper, it would talk not about rivers or rain or glaciers or of molecules of oxygen and hydrogen, but of the millions of encounters its waters have shared with creatures of another nature.
quotes.author: Federico Chini

quotes.quote: Everyone has three lives: a public life, a private life, and a secret life.
quotes.author: Gabriel Garcia Marquez

quotes.quote: Private lives are more important than public reputations.
quotes.author: G.K. Chesterton

quotes.quote: She lived in private with her own horror.
quotes.author: Irish Murdoch

quotes.quote: Once you expose your private life, if you give one little bit, the floodgates are open and everyone's got a free range for you.
quotes.author: Jason Statham

quotes.quote: I had led a private life and wanted to die a private death.
quotes.author: Jean Harris

quotes.quote: The more of your private life you put into the public domain, the smaller your private life becomes.
quotes.author: Kevin McCloud

quotes.quote: No one's personal life is in the public interest. It's gossip, bottom line, end of story.
quotes.author: Kevin Spacey

quotes.quote: It's nothing sinister but my private life belongs to me.
quotes.author: MyAnna Buring

quotes.quote: I have a private life in which I do not permit interference. It must be respected.
quotes.author: Vladimir Putin

quotes.quote: I have a confession to make. I hate voir dire. I despise prying into other people's lives because I wouldn't want them prying into mine.
quotes.author: Paul Levine

quotes.quote: People are very reluctant to talk about their private lives but then you go to the internet and they're much more open.
quotes.author: Paulo Coelho

quotes.quote: What people do in their private lives is their business, and shouldn't be anybody else's business.
quotes.author: Rob Lowe

quotes.quote: It doesn't bother me to talk about my private life, it doesn't bother me to talk about anything. My life is like a glass of water, transparent.
quotes.author: Shakira

quotes.quote: My private life is perfect. If your private life and your life outside football is good, then it is good on the field for you.
quotes.author: David Beckham

quotes.quote: It's all mine, it's all sacred.
quotes.author: Jamie Weise

quotes.quote: I also believe that government has no business telling us how we should live our lives. I think our lifestyle choices should be left up to us. What we do in our private lives is none of the government's business. That position rules out the Republican Party for me.
quotes.author: Jesse Ventura

quotes.quote: I've never been a person to share my private life, but I can help save lives.
quotes.author: Kareem Abdul-Jabbar

quotes.quote: When people do not respect us we are sharply offended; yet in his private heart no man much respects himself.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: I'm not an overly happy person. There are times when I'm happy, and that's usually in my private life.
quotes.author: Pat Burns

quotes.quote: I do not believe the government has the right to investigate somebody's private life.
quotes.author: Rahm Emanuel

quotes.quote: It is an old adage that honesty is the best policy-this applies to public as well as private life-to States as well as individuals.
quotes.author: George Washington

quotes.quote: There is no private life which has not been determined by a wider public life.
quotes.author: George Eliot

quotes.quote: I have a private life in which I do not permit interference. It must be respected.
quotes.author: Vladimir Putin

quotes.quote: Private life, book life, took place where words met imagination without passing through the world.
quotes.author: Annie Dillard

quotes.quote: The more of your private life you put into the public domain, the smaller your private life becomes.
quotes.author: Kevin McCloud

quotes.quote: Once you expose your private life, if you give one little bit, the floodgates are open and everyones got a free range for you.
quotes.author: Jason Statham

quotes.quote: You have to fight really hard for a private life, and sometimes you don't have one. It just gets to you after a while. It's tough.
quotes.author: John Carpenter

quotes.quote: Maybe the private life wasn't forever. Maybe everyone got it for a little while and then spent the rest of their lives remembering.
quotes.author: Ann Patchett

quotes.quote: The private life of one man shall be a more illustrious monarchy,--more formidable to its enemy, more sweet and serene in its influence to its friend, than any kingdom in history. For a man, rightly viewed, comprehendeth the particular natures of all men.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Private lives are more important than public reputations.
quotes.author: G.K. Chesterton

quotes.quote: It's called a private life for a reason - it's mine, and it's special and sacred.
quotes.author: Lili Reinhart

quotes.quote: All private plans, all private lives, have been in a sense repealed by an overriding public danger.
quotes.author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quotes.quote: A private Life is to be preferred; the Honor and Gain of public Posts, bearing no proportion with the Comfort of it.
quotes.author: William Penn

quotes.quote: Private and public life are subject to the same rules; and truth and manliness are two qualities that will carry you through this world much better than policy, or tact, or expediency, or any other word that was ever devised to conceal or mystify a deviation from the straight line.
quotes.author: Robert E. Lee

quotes.quote: Personal life becomes paler as the imaginative life becomes richer.
quotes.author: Willa Cather

quotes.quote: The personal life deeply lived always expands into truths beyond itself.
quotes.author: Anais Nin

quotes.quote: In personal life, the warm glow of nostalgia amplifies good memories and minimizes bad ones about experiences and relationships, encouraging us to revisit and renew our ties with friends and family. It always involves a little harmless self-deception, like forgetting the pain of childbirth.
quotes.author: Stephanie Coontz

quotes.quote: I try to keep my private life private.
quotes.author: Jake Epstein

quotes.quote: Keeping your private life as private as possible is the smartest thing.
quotes.author: Kate Mara

quotes.quote: Your private life is your private life and you keep it to yourself. You get more respect that way.
quotes.author: Jay Kay

quotes.quote: Private life is private life. Off the pitch, there is private life, and the rest is social life, where of course you have to behave responsibly.
quotes.author: Arsene Wenger

quotes.quote: If you don't want to have your private life splashed everywhere, why go to the restaurants and the places you know you're going to be photographed?
quotes.author: Marina and the Diamonds

quotes.quote: If the private life of the sea could ever be transposed onto paper, it would talk not about rivers or rain or glaciers or of molecules of oxygen and hydrogen, but of the millions of encounters its waters have shared with creatures of another nature.
quotes.author: Federico Chini

quotes.quote: It's nothing sinister but my private life belongs to me.
quotes.author: MyAnna Buring

quotes.quote: It sounds so trite, but my private life is mine.
quotes.author: Portia de Rossi

quotes.quote: What people do in their private lives is their business, and shouldn't be anybody else's business.
quotes.author: Rob Lowe

quotes.quote: It's my private life, and it's not up for grabs.
quotes.author: Sam Shepard

quotes.quote: It's inappropriate and vulgar and absolutely unacceptable to use your private life to sell anything commercially.
quotes.author: Lauren Bacall

quotes.quote: The secret of having a personal life is not answering too many questions about it.
quotes.author: Joan Collins

quotes.quote: No one's personal life is in the public interest. It's gossip, bottom line. End of story.
quotes.author: Kevin Spacey

quotes.quote: Purity of personal life is the one indispensable condition for building up a sound education.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: Leadership is a privilege to better the lives of others. It is not an opportunity to satisfy personal greed.
quotes.author: Mwai Kibaki

quotes.quote: Understand that the right to choose your own path is a sacred privilege. Use it. Dwell in possibility.
quotes.author: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.quote: When you arise in the morning, think of what a precious privilege it is to be alive - to breathe, to think, to enjoy, to love.
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.quote: What a privilege to be here on the planet to contribute your unique donation to humankind. Each face in the rainbow of colors that populate our world is precious and special.
quotes.author: Morris Dees

quotes.quote: Being able to live without having to be defined by your skin color is the hallmark of privilege.
quotes.author: Luvvie Ajayi

quotes.quote: It is the province of knowledge to speak, and it is the privilege of wisdom to listen.
quotes.author: Oliver Wendell Holmes, Sr.

quotes.quote: When we lose the right to be different, we lose the privilege to be free.
quotes.author: Charles Evans Hughes

quotes.quote: It is the privilege of the gods to want nothing, and of godlike men to want little.
quotes.author: Diogenes

quotes.quote: When men yield up the privilege of thinking, the last shadow of liberty quits the horizon.
quotes.author: Thomas Paine

quotes.quote: The privilege of absurdity; to which no living creature is subject, but man only.
quotes.author: Thomas Hobbes

quotes.quote: That's the privilege of old age: You don't have to remember.
quotes.author: Alan Arkin

quotes.quote: It is the privilege of genius that life never grows common place, as it does for the rest of us.
quotes.author: James Russell Lowell

quotes.quote: A people that values its privileges above its principles soon loses both.
quotes.author: Dwight D. Eisenhower

quotes.quote: Privilege is the greatest enemy of right.
quotes.author: Marie Ebner-Eschenbach

quotes.quote: No price is too high to pay for the privilege of owning yourself.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.quote: Think for yourselves and let others enjoy the privilege to do so, too.
quotes.author: Voltaire

quotes.quote: It's definitely a privilege to be able to do what you love to do; it's not something that everyone gets to do, so I feel really good about that.
quotes.author: Awkwafina

quotes.quote: The privilege of a lifetime is being who you are.
quotes.author: Joseph Campbell

quotes.quote: Let us realize that: the privilege to work is a gift, the power to work is a blessing, the love of work is success!
quotes.author: David O. McKay

quotes.quote: You can be born into privilege, or you can not be born into privilege. You can be born into the opposite extreme and into poverty. I think from there on, though, you really do have to make your luck.
quotes.author: Ivanka Trump

quotes.quote: The ability to have a choice in what you do is a privilege.
quotes.author: Anton Yelchin

quotes.quote: A good deed is not just a duty, but above all, a privilege.
quotes.author: Shari Arison

quotes.quote: Being a role model is a privilege.
quotes.author: Allyson Felix

quotes.quote: We have privilege in our hands as storytellers. We need to tell stories that reflect our world.
quotes.author: Dede Gardner

quotes.quote: The more privilege you have, the more opportunity you have. The more opportunity you have, the more responsibility you have.
quotes.author: Noam Chomsky

quotes.quote: Life itself is a privilege, but to live life to the fullest- well, that is a choice.
quotes.author: Andy Andrews

quotes.quote: Wherever you turn, you can find someone who needs you. Even if it is a little thing, do something for which there is no pay but the privilege of doing it. Remember, you don't live in a world all of your own
quotes.author: Albert Schweitzer

quotes.quote: Too many women are forced to abort by poverty, by their menfolk, by their parents. A choice is only possible if there are genuine alternatives.
quotes.author: Germaine Greer

quotes.quote: Any country that accepts abortion is not teaching its people to love but to use violence to get what they want.
quotes.author: Mother Teresa

quotes.quote: Being pro-choice is trusting the individual to make the right decision for herself and her family, and not entrusting that decision to anyone wearing the authority of government in any regard.
quotes.author: Hillary Clinton

quotes.quote: Pro-choice supporters are often heard using the cool language of the courts and the vocabulary of rights. Americans who are deeply ambivalent about abortion often miss tthe sound of caring.
quotes.author: Ellen Goodman

quotes.quote: No woman wants an abortion as she wants an ice cream cone or a Porsche. She wants an abortion as an animal caught in a trap wants to gnaw off its own leg.
quotes.author: Frederica Mathewes-Green

quotes.quote: When we consider that women are treated as property it is degrading to women that we should treat our children as property to be disposed of as we see fit.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Cady Stanton

quotes.quote: If we lived in a culture that valued women's autonomy and in which men and women practiced cooperative birth control, the abortion issue would be moot.
quotes.author: Christiane Northrup

quotes.quote: No woman can call herself free who does not own and control her body. No woman can call herself free until she can choose consciously whether she will or will not be a mother.
quotes.author: Margaret Sanger

quotes.quote: The emphasis must be not on the right to abortion but on the right to privacy and reproductive control.
quotes.author: Ruth Bader Ginsburg

quotes.quote: Abortion is not the lesser of two evils. Abortion is profamily, prolife, moral, and good. For many millions of women, abortion has meant getting on with their lives and continuing to meet their responsibilities to themselves, their families, and society.
quotes.author: Patricia Lunneborg

quotes.quote: Abortion is the insurance against that fate worse than death which is called a family.
quotes.author: Peter Kreeft

quotes.quote: One method of destroying a concept is by diluting its meaning. Observe that by ascribing rights to the unborn, the nonliving, the anti-abortionists obliterate the rights of the living.
quotes.author: Ayn Rand

quotes.quote: To forbid birth is only quicker murder. He is a man, who is to be a man; the fruit is always present in the seed.
quotes.author: Tertullian

quotes.quote: Abortion should not only be safe and legal, it should be rare.
quotes.author: Bill Clinton

quotes.quote: The line between lawful and unlawful abortion will be marked by the fact of having sensation and being alive.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: No woman has an abortion for fun.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Joan Smith

quotes.quote: Choice precedes action as day precedes night.
quotes.author: John A. Andrews

quotes.quote: When you have to make choice and don't make it, that in itself is a choice.
quotes.author: William James

quotes.quote: A man cannot be too careful in the choice of his enemies.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: In eating corn on the cob or watermelon, you have a choice: you can be fastidious, or you can enjoy it.
quotes.author: Olin Miller

quotes.quote: Faced with the choice between changing one's mind and proving that there is no need to do so, everybody gets busy on the proof.
quotes.author: Vincenzo Berghella

quotes.quote: Life must be lived personally, making your own choices, making your own successes and failures.
quotes.author: Vincenzo Berghella

quotes.quote: Quality of life is a function of the choices we make.
quotes.author: Vincenzo Berghella

quotes.quote: God offers to every mind its choice between truth and repose. Take which you please - you can never have both.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Happiness is a conscious choice, not an automatic response.
quotes.author: Mildred Barthel

quotes.quote: Life is the sum of all your choices.
quotes.author: Albert Camus

quotes.quote: The strongest principle of growth lies in human choice.
quotes.author: George Eliot

quotes.quote: You can take two people in exact opposite situations and one of them will end up being a leader; the other washes out because of the choices he makes.
quotes.author: Pat Williams

quotes.quote: You build integrity every single day with the choices you make.
quotes.author: Bob Kerry

quotes.quote: Character is the result of hundreds and hundreds of choices you make that gradually turn who you are at any given moment.
quotes.author: David Deford

quotes.quote: I'm pro-life. The law protects women's right to chose, and I think there's a competing right, which is the rights of the unborn. And as you get closer to term, I think the rights of the unborn become more and more prevalent.
quotes.author: Jeb Bush

quotes.quote: The care of human life and happiness and not their destruction is the first and only legitimate object of good government.
quotes.author: Thomas Jefferson

quotes.quote: Sweeter even than to have had the joy of children of my own has it been for me to help bring about a better state of things for mothers generally, so that their unborn little ones could not be willed away from them.
quotes.author: Susan B. Anthony

quotes.quote: Give us the grace... When the sacredness of life before birth is attacked, to stand up and proclaim that no one ever has the authority to destroy unborn life.
quotes.author: John Paul II

quotes.quote: Defend the unborn against abortion even if they persecute you, calumniate you, set traps for you, take you to court or kill you.
quotes.author: Pope Francis

quotes.quote: I think the platform ought to be pro-life. It is the basis of the Republican Party. People have got to understand that abortion is not a contraceptive.
quotes.author: George W. Bush

quotes.quote: I should have known better. Pro-life arguments are now based on scientific evidence and the pro-choice arguments are not. That is a cultural, historical fact.
quotes.author: Stanley Fish

quotes.quote: The life in pro-life denotes not the quality of life, but life itself.
quotes.author: John Shimkus

quotes.quote: Give that child to me. I want it. I will care for it. I am willing to accept any child who would be aborted and to give that child to a married couple who will love the child and be loved by the child.
quotes.author: Mother Teresa

quotes.quote: A person is a person no matter how small.
quotes.author: Dr. Seuss

quotes.quote: Abortion and racism are both symptoms of a fundamental human error. The error is thinking that when someone stands in the way of our wants, we can justify getting that person out of our lives. Abortion and racism stem from the same poisonous root, selfishness.
quotes.author: Alveda King

quotes.quote: I believe that life is valuable, even when it is unwanted, even when it is physically imperfect. I believe our society has a responsibility to defend the vulnerable and the weak. And I believe our nation should set a goal that unborn children should be welcomed in life and protected in law.
quotes.author: George W. Bush

quotes.quote: Like an animal caught in a trap, trying to gnaw off its own leg, a woman who seeks abortion is trying to escape a desperate situation by an act of violence and self-loss. Abortion is not a sign that women are free, but a sign that they are desperate.
quotes.author: Frederica Mathewes-Green

quotes.quote: Abortion should be listed as a weapon of mass destruction against the voiceless.
quotes.author: E. A. Bucchianeri

quotes.quote: I've noticed that everyone who is for abortion has already been born.
quotes.author: Ronald Reagan

quotes.quote: The fundamental human right, the presupposition of every other right, is the right to life itself. This is true of life from the moment of conception until its natural end. Abortion, consequently, cannot be a human right â€” it is the very opposite. It is a deep wound in society.
quotes.author: Pope Benedict XVI

quotes.quote: The right to life is the first human right. Abortion is killing someone that cannot defend him or herself.
quotes.author: Pope Francis

quotes.quote: Human life must always be defended from its beginning in the womb and must be recognised as a gift of God that guarantees the future of humanity.
quotes.author: Pope Francis

quotes.quote: Too many people use abortion as a form of birth control. And that's very wrong. I could never, ever have an abortion.
quotes.author: Brooke Shields

quotes.quote: The Pro-Life cause is the preeminent cause of our time, and this struggle between the gospel of life and the culture of death will determine the destiny of mankind.
quotes.author: Peter Garrett

quotes.quote: This is a debate about our understanding of human dignity, what it means to be a member of the human family, even though tiny, powerless and unwanted.
quotes.author: Henry Hyde

quotes.quote: Most women â€œchooseâ€ abortion precisely because they believe they have no other choice.
quotes.author: Serrin M. Foster

quotes.quote: Pro-life includes improving life after birth.
quotes.author: Mike Huckabee

quotes.quote: It seems to me as clear as daylight that abortion would be a crime.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: I am pro-choice, but I don't consider that inconsistent at all with pro-life - there's no way that having an abortion, ever, is an easy decision, and it more often errs on the side of absolutely wrenching, not to mention physically debilitating.
quotes.author: Rachel Sklar

quotes.quote: Let us say "Yes" to life and not death. Let us say "Yes" to freedom and not enslavement to the many idols of our time. In a word, let us say "Yes" to the God who is love, life and freedom, and who never disappoints.
quotes.author: Pope Francis

quotes.quote: It's time that we recognize the Supreme Court is not the supreme being, and we change the policy to be pro-life and protect children instead of rip up their body parts and sell them like they're parts to a Buick.
quotes.author: Mike Huckabee

quotes.quote: The fight for the right to life is not the cause of a special few, but the cause of every man, woman and child who cares not only about his or her own family, but the whole family of man.
quotes.author: Mildred Jefferson

quotes.quote: Abortion is inherently different from other medical procedures because no other procedure involves the purposeful termination of a potential life.
quotes.author: Potter Stewart

quotes.quote: To be actively pro-life is to contribute to the renewal of society through the promotion of the common good. It is impossible to further the common good without acknowledging and defending the right to life, upon which all the other inalienable rights of individuals are founded and from which they develop.
quotes.author: Pope John Paul II

quotes.quote: Think proactively and dynamically. Be realistic, but set your sights high.
quotes.author: Lorii Myers

quotes.quote: We must take proactive steps to promote democracy and human rights abroad.
quotes.author: Sam Brownback

quotes.quote: Learn from yesterday, live for today, hope for tomorrow.The important thing is not to stop questioning.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: Do what today others won't, so tomorrow, you can do what others can't.
quotes.author: Brian Rogers Loop

quotes.quote: The only way to end a culture of violence is to proactively create a culture of peace.
quotes.author: Marianne Williamson

quotes.quote: Doing the best at this moment puts you in the best place for the next moment.
quotes.author: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.quote: Let's form proactive synergy restructuring teams.
quotes.author: Scott Adams

quotes.quote: Being proactive is a pillar of spiritual growth and meaningful development.
quotes.author: Eli Landa

quotes.quote: The way to bring about change is to be proactive and active.
quotes.author: Octavia Spencer

quotes.quote: The people who get on in this world are the people who get up and look for the circumstances they want, and, if they can't find them, make them.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: Nothing ever happens in your life unless you create the space for it to happen in.
quotes.author: James McCay

quotes.quote: If you're proactive, you don't have to wait for circumstances or other people to create perspective expanding experiences. You can consciously create your own.
quotes.author: Stephen Covey

quotes.quote: The beginning is the most important part of the work.
quotes.author: Plato

quotes.quote: The ability to subordinate an impulse to a value is the essence of the proactive person.
quotes.author: Stephen R. Covey

quotes.quote: The hardest thing for us was being proactive and making the proper changes for these conditions. Now we will have to do the same for the race and the race will be much different.
quotes.author: Vitor Meira

quotes.quote: Proactive people carry their own weather with them.
quotes.author: Stephen R. Covey

quotes.quote: How wonderful it is that nobody need wait a single moment before starting to improve the world.
quotes.author: Anne Frank

quotes.quote: Whatever you want to do, do it now! There are only so many tomorrows.
quotes.author: Michael Landon Jr.

quotes.quote: You have to think a little smarter, be proactive, not reactive.
quotes.author: Frank Abagnale

quotes.quote: Getting stuck is reactive, getting unstuck is proactive.
quotes.author: Sherene McHenry

quotes.quote: Everyone must be proactive and do all they can to help themselves to stay employed.
quotes.author: Stephen Covey

quotes.quote: The future depends entirely on what each of us does every day.
quotes.author: Gloria Steinem

quotes.quote: As you get older, you either become proactive about staying in shape and taking care of yourself, or, you know, time has its effect on you.
quotes.author: Mike Love

quotes.quote: You must not under any pretence allow your mind to dwell on any thought that is not positive, constructive, optimistic, kind.
quotes.author: Emmet Fox

quotes.quote: It's a very proactive thing to be dealing with your darkness and getting it out of your system. So it doesn't have to be in your system.
quotes.author: Lykke Li

quotes.quote: Tomorrow is often the busiest day of the week.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: If you can stay calm and relaxed in any given situation, you will also manage to be proactive, not reactive. We all want to be proactive.
quotes.author: Michelle Landy

quotes.quote: Action gives a decision power and finality.
quotes.author: Innocent Mwatsikesimbe

quotes.quote: Be a creator of circumstances rather than just a creature of circumstances. Be proactive rather than reactive.
quotes.author: Brian Tracy

quotes.quote: Recast your current problems into proactive goals.
quotes.author: Suze Orman

quotes.quote: Problem-solving becomes a very important part of our makeup as we grow into maturity or move up the corporate ladder.
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.quote: Creating something is all about problem-solving.
quotes.author: Philip Seymour Hoffman

quotes.quote: I've learned over decades of building that a deadline is a potent tool for problem-solving.
quotes.author: Adam Savage

quotes.quote: Too many problem-solving sessions become battlegrounds where decisions are made based on power rather than intelligence.
quotes.author: Margaret J. Wheatley

quotes.quote: Problem solving is hunting. It is savage pleasure and we are born to it.
quotes.author: Thomas Harris

quotes.quote: Never bring the problem solving stage into the decision making stage. Otherwise, you surrender yourself to the problem rather than the solution.
quotes.author: Robert H. Schuller

quotes.quote: I'm not afraid of problem-solving. There is always a way.
quotes.author: Hanneli Mustaparta

quotes.quote: We can not solve our problems with the same level of thinking that created them.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: I suppose it is tempting, if the only tool you have is a hammer, to treat everything as if it were a nail.
quotes.author: Abraham Maslow

quotes.quote: Never try to solve all the problems at once make them line up for you one-by-one.
quotes.author: Richard Sloma

quotes.quote: One thing is sure. We have to do something. We have to do the best we know how at the moment . . . ; If it doesn't turn out right, we can modify it as we go along.
quotes.author: Franklin D.Roosevelt

quotes.quote: Erroneous assumptions can be disastrous.
quotes.author: Peter Drucker

quotes.quote: Determine the thing that can and shall be done, and then we shall find the way.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.quote: It is a mistake to think you can solve any major problems just with potatoes.
quotes.author: Douglas Adams

quotes.quote: There's no use talking about the problem unless you talk about the solution.
quotes.author: Betty Williams

quotes.quote: The difference between what we do and what we are capable of doing would suffice to solve most of the world's problems.
quotes.author: Mohandas K. Gandhi

quotes.quote: The direct use of force is such a poor solution to any problem, it is generally employed only by small children and large nations.
quotes.author: David Friedman

quotes.quote: As much as we may want to withdraw into a world of pure problem solving, we have to acknowledge that the most successful architectures are the ones you can actually convince someone to implement.
quotes.author: Jesse James Garrett

quotes.quote: We experience problem-solving sessions as war zones, we view competing ideas as enemies, and we use problems as weapons to blame and defeat opposition forces. No wonder we can't come up with real lasting solutions!
quotes.author: Margaret J. Wheatley

quotes.quote: Solving big problems is easier than solving little problems.
quotes.author: Sergey Brin

quotes.quote: I think the next best thing to solving a problem is finding some humor in it.
quotes.author: Frank A. Clark

quotes.quote: When solving problems, dig at the roots instead of just hacking at the leaves.
quotes.author: Anthony J. D'Angelo

quotes.quote: Solving a problem created by debt... by creating more debt is a fool's errand.
quotes.author: Olivier Sarkozy

quotes.quote: Don't dwell on what went wrong. Instead, focus on what to do next. Spend your energies on moving forward toward finding the answer.
quotes.author: Denis Waitley

quotes.quote: Don't find fault, find a remedy.
quotes.author: Henry Ford

quotes.quote: It is wise to direct your anger towards problems--not people; to focus your energies on answers--not excuses.
quotes.author: William Arthur Ward

quotes.quote: Make small commitments and keep them. Be a light, not a judge. Be a model, not a critic. Be part of the solution, not part of the problem.
quotes.author: Stephen R. Covey

quotes.quote: There are two ways of meeting difficulties: You alter the difficulties or you alter yourself to meet them.
quotes.author: Phyllis Bottome

quotes.quote: To solve any problem, here are three questions to ask yourself: First, what could I do? Second, what could I read? And third, who could I ask?
quotes.author: Jim Rohn

quotes.quote: Whatever your problem, no matter how difficult, you can release spiritual power sufficient to solve your problem. The secret is--pray and believe.
quotes.author: Norman Vincent Peale

quotes.quote: You can't solve a dignity problem with military force.
quotes.author: Rand Paul

quotes.quote: We should not give up and we should not allow the problem to defeat us.
quotes.author: A. P. J. Abdul Kalam

quotes.quote: Every problem has in it the seeds of its own solution. If you don't have any problems, you don't get any seeds.
quotes.author: Norman Vincent Peale

quotes.quote: Inside of every problem lies an opportunity.
quotes.author: Robert Kiyosaki

quotes.quote: The greatest problem in the world today is intolerance. Everyone is so intolerant of each other.
quotes.author: Princess Diana

quotes.quote: We cannot solve our problems with the same thinking we used when we created them.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: Never bring the problem solving stage into the decision making stage. Otherwise, you surrender yourself to the problem rather than the solution.
quotes.author: Robert H. Schuller

quotes.quote: Don't bother people for help without first trying to solve the problem yourself.
quotes.author: Colin Powell

quotes.quote: When you confront a problem you begin to solve it.
quotes.author: Rudy Giuliani

quotes.quote: Life is not a problem to be solved, but a reality to be experienced.
quotes.author: Soren Kierkegaard

quotes.quote: The government solution to a problem is usually as bad as the problem.
quotes.author: Milton Friedman

quotes.quote: The world's problem is not too many people, but lack of political and economic freedom.
quotes.author: Julian Simon

quotes.quote: The definition of a good mathematical problem is the mathematics it generates rather than the problem itself.
quotes.author: Andrew Wiles

quotes.quote: To every problem there is already a solution, whether you know it or not. To every sum in there is already a correct answer, whether the mathematician has found it or not.
quotes.author: Grenville Kleiser

quotes.quote: If you have a positive attitude and constantly strive to give your best effort, eventually you will overcome your immediate problems and find you are ready for greater challenges.
quotes.author: Pat Riley

quotes.quote: A problem is a chance for you to do your best.
quotes.author: Duke Ellington

quotes.quote: Death is the solution to all problems. No man - no problem.
quotes.author: Joseph Stalin

quotes.quote: There is but one truly serious philosophical problem and that is suicide.
quotes.author: Albert Camus

quotes.quote: The problem is never how to get new, innovative thoughts into your mind, but how to get old ones out. Every mind is a building filled with archaic furniture. Clean out a corner of your mind and creativity will instantly fill it.
quotes.author: Dee Hock

quotes.quote: The problem is not that there are problems. The problem is expecting otherwise and thinking that having problems is a problem.
quotes.author: Theodore Isaac Rubin

quotes.quote: Corruption is not a problem just for some countries; this is a global issue.
quotes.author: Nguyen Tan Dung

quotes.quote: When you have solved the problem of controlling the attention of the child, you have solved the entire problem of its education.
quotes.author: Maria Montessori

quotes.quote: Expect problems and eat them for breakfast.
quotes.author: Alfred A. Montapert

quotes.quote: To a poet the mere making of a poem can seem to solve the problem of truth...but only a problem of art is solved in poetry.
quotes.author: Laura Riding

quotes.quote: A problem well stated is a problem half-solved.
quotes.author: Charles Kettering

quotes.quote: Loneliness is the universal problem of rich people.
quotes.author: Joan Collins

quotes.quote: If you procrastinate when faced with a big difficult problem... break the problem into parts, and handle one part at a time.
quotes.author: Robert Collier

quotes.quote: The best way to resolve any problem in the human world is for all sides to sit down and talk.
quotes.author: Dalai Lama

quotes.quote: Leadership is solving problems. The day soldiers stop bringing you their problems is the day you have stopped leading them. They have either lost confidence that you can help or concluded you do not care. Either case is a failure of leadership.
quotes.author: Colin Powell

quotes.quote: No problem is so formidable that you can't walk away from it.
quotes.author: Charles M. Schulz

quotes.quote: If you quit on the process, you are quitting on the result.
quotes.author: Idowu Koyenikan

quotes.quote: Writing is not just a process of creation. It is also a process of self-discovery.
quotes.author: Cristina Istrati

quotes.quote: Our progress, the realization of our dreams, and the quality of our life depend directly on the level of our commitment to the process.
quotes.author: Dr Prem Jagyasi

quotes.quote: Sometimes the process of growth looks a lot like destruction and pain. But you'll realize with time that you're not breaking; you're healing.
quotes.author: Brittany Burgunder

quotes.quote: Progress should be the Product of the Process
quotes.author: Yohann Dafeu

quotes.quote: The magic is in the process. It’s a kind of science. That’s the special sauce. Thats the secret.
quotes.author: Jill Telford

quotes.quote: We are all in the process of becoming.
quotes.author: Harmony Dust

quotes.quote: Just because the dates change, does not mean you have to change. The continuous path towards self-improvement is a timeless process.
quotes.author: Brittany Burgunder

quotes.quote: Enjoy the adventure, because that’s what it’s all about - the process, not the result. The ultimate result is death. The ultimate process is life. Fact.
quotes.author: Jolie Booth

quotes.quote: Process tells us how. Purpose tells us why. But in reality, it is academic to draw a line between them, they are part of a continuum. Process and purpose are so welded to each other that it is impossible to mark where one leaves off and the other begins, or which is which. The very process of democratic participation is for the purpose of organization rather than to rid the alleys of dirt. Process is really purpose.
quotes.author: Saul D. Alinsky

quotes.quote: A successful relationship is a process, not a goal.
quotes.author: Joseph Rain

quotes.quote: It is more important to go slow and gain the lessons you need along the journey then to rush the process and arrive at your destination empty.
quotes.author: Germany Kent

quotes.quote: Life is a process during which one initially gets less and less dependent, independent, and then more and more dependent.
quotes.author: Mokokoma Mokhonoana

quotes.quote: In our process of spiritual maturity, our faith needs to attain bigger dimensions
quotes.author: Sunday Adelaja

quotes.quote: Sometimes we make the process more complicated than we need to. We will never make a journey of a thousand miles by fretting about how long it will take or how hard it will be. We make the journey by taking each day step by step and then repeating it again and again until we reach our destination.
quotes.author: Joseph B. Wirthlin

quotes.quote: Transformation is a process, and as life happens there are tons of ups and downs. It's a journey of discovery - there are moments on mountaintops and moments in deep valleys of despair.
quotes.author: Rick Warren

quotes.quote: In the long run, we shape our lives, and we shape ourselves. The process never ends until we die. And the choices we make are ultimately our own responsibility.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.quote: If you can't describe what you are doing as a process, you don't know what you're doing.
quotes.author: W. Edwards Deming

quotes.quote: Science is the process that takes us from confusion to understanding...
quotes.author: Brian Greene

quotes.quote: Let go of that which is unnecessary to make space for that which is meaningful. This is the simplest way to begin a process that will change your life for good.
quotes.author: Dr Prem Jagyasi

quotes.quote: Acceptance is a complete process, it can never be partial.
quotes.author: Yash Thakur

quotes.quote: The mission gets missed in the process when everyone else's voice take precedence and cause you to second guess your purpose.
quotes.author: Sanjo Jendayi

quotes.quote: By accepting the process of letting go, we make people and things that we can’t stay with forever a part of our history.
quotes.author: Dr Prem Jagyasi

quotes.quote: One doesn’t become a leader in a day. It’s a gradual process that begins at birth and continues for the rest of our lives.
quotes.author: Dr Prem Jagyasi

quotes.quote: Don't let your tools become your process.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Everybody wants the platform but nobody wants the process.
quotes.author: Pastor John Gray

quotes.quote: Success is not important, It's the lessons you learn during the process that makes all the difference.
quotes.author: Somya Kedia

quotes.quote: Most people do not understand the process of achieving and fulfilling a dream
quotes.author: Sunday Adelaja

quotes.quote: We are so scared of being judged that we look for every excuse to procrastinate.
quotes.author: Erica Jong

quotes.quote: Busy not yourself in looking forward to the events of to-morrow; but whatever may be those of the days Providence may yet assign you neglect not to turn them to advantage.
quotes.author: Horace

quotes.quote: Procrastination is like a credit card; it's a lot fun until you get the bill.
quotes.author: Christopher Parker

quotes.quote: Regret for the things we did can be tempered by time; it is regret for the things we did not do that is inconsolable.
quotes.author: Sydney Harris

quotes.quote: Stop procrastinating, stop feeling guilty and just do it!
quotes.author: Bastiaan Blikman

quotes.quote: Procrastinating does nothing more than add to your do list. Do it, be done with it!
quotes.author: Catherine Pulsifer

quotes.quote: Procrastination can guard against making the wrong choice too soon. Or it could just be mental laziness.
quotes.author: Pepper Hume

quotes.quote: Procrastination is my sin. It brings me naught but sorrow. I know that I should stop it. In fact, I will--tomorrow
quotes.author: Gloria Pitzer

quotes.quote: Procrastination is something best put off until tomorrow.
quotes.author: Gerald Vaughan

quotes.quote: I don't wait for moods. You accomplish nothing if you do that. Your mind must know it has got to get down to work.
quotes.author: Baltasar Graci

quotes.quote: Nothing is so fatiguing as the eternal hanging on of an uncompleted task.
quotes.author: William James

quotes.quote: How wonderful it is that nobody need wait a single moment before starting to improve the world.
quotes.author: Anne Frank

quotes.quote: Don't put off until tomorrow what can be done today. Procrastination is a sign of weak character.
quotes.author: Carol Cox

quotes.quote: Procrastination is the soul rebelling against entrapment.
quotes.author: Nassim N. Taleb

quotes.quote: He who hesitates is last.
quotes.author: Mae West

quotes.quote: Procrastination is a sign of a perfectionist.
quotes.author: P. J. Kennedy

quotes.quote: It's easy to get distracted and procrastinate sometimes, but you can make it happen.
quotes.author: Danny Yann

quotes.quote: Don't let procrastination take over your life. Be brave and take risks. Your life is happening right now.
quotes.author: Roy Bennett

quotes.quote: The greatest thief this world has ever produced is procrastination, and he is still at large.
quotes.author: Henry Wheelter Shaw

quotes.quote: My evil genius Procrastination has whispered me to tarry 'til a more convenient season.
quotes.author: Mary Todd Lincoln

quotes.quote: Don't postpone joy until you have learned all of your lessons. Joy is your lesson.
quotes.author: Alan Cohen

quotes.quote: Procrastination is also a subtle act of corruption â€“ it corrupts valuable time
quotes.author: Amit Abraham

quotes.quote: Vagueness and procrastination are ever a comfort to the frail in spirit.
quotes.author: John Updike

quotes.quote: Procrastination may not take up a lot of effort physically but without you knowing it, it takes over the mind.
quotes.author: Stephen Hall

quotes.quote: You may not be punished for your procrastination, but for sure you will be punished by your procrastination.
quotes.author: Debasish Mridha

quotes.quote: The problem with procrastination is it's been around since the beginning of time it seems.
quotes.author: Stephen Richards

quotes.quote: Procrastination is the bad habit of putting of until the day after tomorrow what should have been done the day before yesterday.
quotes.author: Napoleon Hill

quotes.quote: Procrastination is the foundation of all disasters.
quotes.author: Pandora Poikilos

quotes.quote: Doing just a little bit during the time we have available puts you that much further ahead than if you took no action at all.
quotes.author: Byron Pulsifer

quotes.quote: The greatest amount of wasted time is the time not getting started.
quotes.author: Dawson Trotman

quotes.quote: Producers are so much better-educated in issues related to terrorism.
quotes.author: Mike Johanns

quotes.quote: Producers are not gamblers. They want a good return on their investment.
quotes.author: Max Von Sydow

quotes.quote: Humans are producers of their life circumstance not just products of them.
quotes.author: Albert Bandura

quotes.quote: The producers like to keep people guessing and keep them on the edge of their seats.
quotes.author: Daniela Ruah

quotes.quote: A producer is a saboteur who tries to infiltrate the passivity of viewers and to create impressions that are lasting.
quotes.author: BILL MOYERS

quotes.quote: As a producer, you can't break up w/your own project. It's like sleeping with someone that you don't like... Forever.
quotes.author: Nina Jacobson

quotes.quote: What's nice about being a producer is you get to roll the dice more often, and you get to be involved with lots of different kinds of music.
quotes.author: Jerry Harrison

quotes.quote: When producers want to know what the public wants, they graph it as curves. When they want to tell the public what to get, they say it in curves.
quotes.author: Marshall McLuhan

quotes.quote: A good producer brings out the best in the artist he's working with. You shouldn't be able to listen to something and say, 'So-and-so produced this album.
quotes.author: Eddie Van Halen

quotes.quote: Producers are now employees, not creators.
quotes.author: Marshall Herskovitz

quotes.quote: As a producer, you've got to be involved in helping out with solving problems.
quotes.author: Russell Brand

quotes.quote: As a producer, you have an opportunity to see the whole and bring people together.
quotes.author: Jake Gyllenhaal

quotes.quote: The beauty of having a producer is that you have someone who says, You're finished.
quotes.author: Sheryl Crow

quotes.quote: As a producer you can be more objective about the songs because you didn't write them.
quotes.author: Eric Bachmann

quotes.quote: As a producer, youre pretty much creating a body of work that an artist has to stand behind.
quotes.author: DJ Jazzy Jeff

quotes.quote: As a producer, you really have - you're able to hand-pick all the talent that you want to be surrounded with.
quotes.author: Hilary Swank

quotes.quote: We are the producers of our own thinking. Thought is not something that happens to us, but something that we do to ourselves.
quotes.author: John Spence

quotes.quote: If you’re a producer, you always spend too much money because you want that shot – and you’re willing to spend a bundle to get it.
quotes.author: Bill Kurtis

quotes.quote: It's interesting most people don't really know what a producer does and really the producer is the very first person on-site and the very last one to leave.
quotes.author: Carl Mazzocone

quotes.quote: Sometimes, things may not go your way, but the effort should be there every single night.
quotes.author: Michael Jordan

quotes.quote: Productivity is never an accident. It is always the result of a commitment to excellence, intelligent planning, and focused effort.
quotes.author: Paul J. Meyer

quotes.quote: Good well-being promotes good productivity.
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: If you're going through hell, keep going.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: Writing crystallizes thought and thought produces action.
quotes.author: Paul J. Meyer

quotes.quote: Productivity is driven at the enterprise level. Better wages, better performing workplaces, are driven at the workplace level.
quotes.author: Bill Shorten

quotes.quote: Connectivity is productivity whether it's in a modern office or an underdeveloped village.
quotes.author: Iqbal Quadir

quotes.quote: It's not knowing what to do, it's doing what you know.
quotes.author: Tony Robbins

quotes.quote: Productivity is being able to do things that you were never able to do before.
quotes.author: Franz Kafka

quotes.quote: Even though worker capacity and motivation are destroyed when leaders choose power over productivity, it appears that bosses would rather be in control than have the organization work well.
quotes.author: Margaret J. Wheatley

quotes.quote: Individual income can grow only as fast as productivity rises.
quotes.author: Alex Berenson

quotes.quote: Nothing is less productive than to make more efficient what should not be done at all.
quotes.author: Peter Drucker

quotes.quote: Improve quality, you automatically improve productivity.
quotes.author: W. Edwards Deming

quotes.quote: Start by doing what's necessary; then do what's possible; and suddenly you are doing the impossible.
quotes.author: Francis of Assisi

quotes.quote: Anyone who has never made a mistake has never tried anything new.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: Improved productivity means less human sweat, not more.
quotes.author: Henry Ford

quotes.quote: Your mind is for having ideas, not holding them.
quotes.author: David Allen

quotes.quote: Obstacles are those frightful things you see when you take your eyes off your goal.
quotes.author: Henry Ford

quotes.quote: The path to success is to take massive, determined action.
quotes.author: Tony Robbins

quotes.quote: Stressing output is the key to improving productivity, while looking to increase activity can result in just the opposite.
quotes.author: Paul Gauguin

quotes.quote: The way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing.
quotes.author: Walt Disney

quotes.quote: There is no substitute for hard work.
quotes.author: Thomas A. Edison

quotes.quote: Progress occurs where truths are questioned.
quotes.author: Aniekee Tochukwu Ezekiel

quotes.quote: If you spend too much time thinking about a thing, you'll never get it done.
quotes.author: Bruce Lee

quotes.quote: All mankind is divided into three classes: those that are immovable, those that are movable, and those that move.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: Create with the heart; build with the mind.
quotes.author: Criss Jami

quotes.quote: Don't allow idleness to deceive you, for while you give him today, he steals tomorrow from you.
quotes.author: H. Croccoquill

quotes.quote: The productivity of a work group seems to depend on how the group members see their own goals in relation to the goals of the organization.
quotes.author: Ken Blanchard

quotes.quote: My goal is no longer to get more done, but rather to have less to do.
quotes.author: Francine Jay

quotes.quote: The simple act of paying positive attention to people has a great deal to do with productivity.
quotes.author: Tom Peters

quotes.quote: Fairness is not an attitude. It's a professional skill that must be developed and exercised.
quotes.author: Brit Hume

quotes.quote: Being your own person and standing for what you believe is a critical aspect of a good professional life.
quotes.author: Patrick Pichette

quotes.quote: My personal life is lived as 'me,' but my professional life is lived as other people. In other words, when I go to the office, I lie down, dream, and become 'someone else.' That's my job.
quotes.author: Wallace Shawn

quotes.quote: The difference between an amateur and a professional is in their habits. An amateur has amateur habits. A professional has professional habits. We can never free ourselves from habit. But we can replace bad habits with good ones.
quotes.author: Steven Pressfield

quotes.quote: If you look at any successful professional - a salesperson, a marketer, a real estate agent, a trader - they all have the same qualities as the con man. The only difference is that one side uses their talents in the right direction and the con man is taking the easy way out.
quotes.author: Frank Abagnale

quotes.quote: A passive approach to professional growth will leave you by the wayside.
quotes.author: Tom Peters

quotes.quote: I don’t believe in professional dissidents. I think it’s just a phase, like adolescence.
quotes.author: Aung San Suu Kyi

quotes.quote: Amateurs work until they get it right. Professionals work until they can’t get it wrong.
quotes.author: Author Unknown

quotes.quote: Why don't you ever hear of a lawyer getting attacked by a shark at the beach? Professional courtesy.
quotes.author: Thomas F. Shubnell

quotes.quote: I came from a real tough neighborhood. Once a guy pulled a knife on me. I knew he wasn't a professional, the knife had butter on it.
quotes.author: Rodney Dangerfield

quotes.quote: In love, women are professionals, men are amateurs.
quotes.author: Francois Truffaut

quotes.quote: A professional is one who does his best work when he feels the least like working.
quotes.author: Frank Lloyd Wright

quotes.quote: Anytime you're afraid to try something new...just remember, amateurs built the ark, professionals built the titanic.
quotes.author: Drake

quotes.quote: Professional critics are incapable of distinguishing and appreciating either diamonds in the rough or gold in bars. They are traders, and in literature know only the coins that are current. Their critical lab has scales and weights, but neither crucible or touchstone.
quotes.author: Joseph Joubert

quotes.quote: You have to perform at a consistently higher level than others. That's the mark of a true professional.
quotes.author: Joe Paterno

quotes.quote: Amateurs hope, professionals work.
quotes.author: Garson Kanin

quotes.quote: There's only one proper way for a professional soldier to die. That's from the last bullet, of the last battle, of the last war.
quotes.author: General George Patton

quotes.quote: If you are a professional, the speed with which you react to a potential problem separates the men from the boys.
quotes.author: Yanni

quotes.quote: Professional men run the business started by the courageous men.
quotes.author: Amit Kalantri

quotes.quote: If you think it's expensive to hire a professional to do the job, wait until you hire an amateur.
quotes.author: Red Adair

quotes.quote: The professional does not wait for inspiration; he acts in anticipation of it.
quotes.author: Steven Pressfield

quotes.quote: Nothing is more despicable than a professional talker who uses his words as a quack uses his remedies.
quotes.author: Francois Fenelon

quotes.quote: To be a good professional engineer, always start to study late for exams because it teaches you how to manage time and tackle emergencies.
quotes.author: Bill Gates

quotes.quote: Being a professional is doing the things you love to do, on the days you don't feel like doing them.
quotes.author: Julius Erving

quotes.quote: Building a professional relationship on respect as opposed to affection is a very good idea. Running your art projects the way you'd run a dry-cleaning business is also a really good idea. You shouldn't go into work like you're going on a date, like you're hanging out with friends.
quotes.author: Penn Jillette

quotes.quote: In order for one to come off as a professional at something is to vehemently disagree with other professionals. People have blind faith in confident fools.
quotes.author: Ahmed Korayem

quotes.quote: A vital difference between the professional man and a man of business is that money making to the professional man should, by virtue of his assumption, be incidental; to the businessman it is primary. Money has its limitations; while it may buy quantity, there is something beyond it and that is quality.
quotes.author: Frank Lloyd Wright

quotes.quote: The job of a professional manager is not to like people. It is not to change people. It is to put their strengths to work.
quotes.author: Peter Drucker

quotes.quote: Nothing reinforces a professional relationship more than enjoying success with someone.
quotes.author: Harold Ramis

quotes.quote: The professional military mind is by necessity an inferior and unimaginative mind; no man of high intellectual quality would willingly imprison his gifts in such a calling.
quotes.author: H.G. Wells

quotes.quote: The greatest profit, is to make your own gain.
quotes.author: Auliq Ice

quotes.quote: Profit is sweet, even if it comes from deception.
quotes.author: Sophocles

quotes.quote: When profit is unshared, it's less likely to grow greater.
quotes.author: Malcolm S. Forbes

quotes.quote: Legitimate profit is good. What's bad is profiteering.
quotes.author: Shaffi Mather

quotes.quote: Profit is the payment you get when you take advantage of change.
quotes.author: Joseph A. Schumpeter

quotes.quote: Profit has to be a means to other ends rather than an end in itself.
quotes.author: Charles Handy

quotes.quote: Profit is not the purpose of a business, but rather the test of its validity.
quotes.author: Peter Drucker

quotes.quote: Showing a profit means touching something and leaving it better than you found it.
quotes.author: Jim Rohn

quotes.quote: Profit doesn't appear as the goal but as a side effect of pursuing motivating principles.
quotes.author: Ted Malloch

quotes.quote: To gain profit is important, but you must invest to build up assets that you can cash in in the future.
quotes.author: Akio Morita

quotes.quote: Profit is not the proper end and aim of management - it is what makes all of the proper ends and aims possible.
quotes.author: David Packard

quotes.quote: Profits are better than wages. Wages make you a living; profits make you a fortune.
quotes.author: Jim Rohn

quotes.quote: The future of profit is purpose.
quotes.author: Simon Mainwaring

quotes.quote: If you mean to profit, learn to praise.
quotes.author: Charles Churchill

quotes.quote: A small profit it better than a big loss.
quotes.author: Ron Rash

quotes.quote: Profit is a blessing, if it's not stolen.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: No profit grows where no pleasure is taken.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: A musical profit outweighs a financial loss.
quotes.author: Duke Ellington

quotes.quote: The profit on a good action is to have done it.
quotes.author: Seneca The Younger

quotes.quote: Profit is what happens when you do everything else right.
quotes.author: Yvon Chouinard

quotes.quote: The smell of profit is clean and sweet, whatever the source.
quotes.author: Juvenal

quotes.quote: Good profits simply are not inconsistent with good behavior.
quotes.author: Warren Buffett

quotes.quote: Profit is a reward for satisfying the desire of someone else.
quotes.author: Harry Browne

quotes.quote: To profit from good advice requires more wisdom than to give it.
quotes.author: Wilson Mizner

quotes.quote: Profits are what you make when not working.
quotes.author: Michael Pare

quotes.quote: Profit is a by-product of work; happiness is its chief product.
quotes.author: Henry Ford

quotes.quote: We always think of our own profit, but not in connection to others.
quotes.author: Marina Abramovic

quotes.quote: The profit we possess after study is to have become better and wiser.
quotes.author: Michel de Montaigne

quotes.quote: Too much profit is being made at the expense of unsuspecting patients.
quotes.author: Melissa Cady

quotes.quote: Profits are part of the mechanism by which society decides what it wants to see produced.
quotes.author: Henry Wallich

quotes.quote: To a profound pessimist about life, being in danger is not depressing.
quotes.author: F. Scott Fitzgerald

quotes.quote: Profound subject matter can be encompassed in small space - for proof, look at any sonnet by Shakespeare!
quotes.author: Cynthia Ozick

quotes.quote: Simplicity of character is the natural result of profound thought.
quotes.author: Hazlitt

quotes.quote: The opposite of a correct statement is a false statement. But the opposite of a profound truth may well be another profound truth.
quotes.author: Niels Bohr

quotes.quote: The most profound statements are often said in silence.
quotes.author: Lynn Johnston

quotes.quote: Profound thinkers either become astute lovers or rebellious spirit.
quotes.author: Ramana Pemmaraju

quotes.quote: The most profound joy has more of gravity than of gaiety in it.
quotes.author: Michel de Montaigne

quotes.quote: Isn't it the moment of most profound doubt that gives birth to new certainties? Perhaps hopelessness is the very soil that nourishes human hope; perhaps one could never find sense in life without first experiencing its absurdity.
quotes.author: Vaclav Havel

quotes.quote: Profound changes in ones life do not always come from sledgehammer. They can just easily come from a whisper.
quotes.author: Mr. H

quotes.quote: All profound truths startle you in the first announcement.
quotes.author: Letitia Elizabeth Landon

quotes.quote: The profound thinker always suspects that he is superficial.
quotes.author: Benjamin Disraeli

quotes.quote: A profound conviction raises a man above the feeling of ridicule.
quotes.author: John Stuart Mill

quotes.quote: Every profound spirit needs a mask: even more, around every profound spirit a mask is continually growing.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.quote: Dreams are often most profound when they seem the most crazy.
quotes.author: Sigmund Freud

quotes.quote: Sometimes the simplest things are the most profound.
quotes.author: Carolina Herrera

quotes.quote: Clarity is the counterbalance of profound thoughts.
quotes.author: Luc De Clapiers

quotes.quote: You cannot learn a lesson of profound forgiveness unless you understand what it is to be wounded and forgive that which has wounded you.
quotes.author: Ben Kingsley

quotes.quote: Profound optimism is always on the side of the tortured.
quotes.author: Andre Gide

quotes.quote: The most profound things are inexpressible.
quotes.author: Jenny Holzer

quotes.quote: The deeper thought is, the taller it becomes.
quotes.author: Dejan Stojanovic

quotes.quote: Some things scratch the surface while others strike at your soul.
quotes.author: Gianna Perada

quotes.quote: Good sense is at the bottom of everything: virtue, genius, wit, talent and taste.
quotes.author: J.J. de Chenier

quotes.quote: Genius might be the ability to say a profound thing in a simple way.
quotes.author: Charles Bukowski

quotes.quote: You can have brilliant ideas, but if you can't get them across, your ideas won't get you anywhere.
quotes.author: Lee Iacocca

quotes.quote: The obscure we see eventually. The completely obvious, it seems, takes longer.
quotes.author: Edward R. Murrow

quotes.quote: Correctness is clearly the prime quality. If a system does not do what it is supposed to do, then everything else about it matters little.
quotes.author: Bertrand Meyer

quotes.quote: A programming language is for thinking about programs, not for expressing programs you've already thought of. It should be a pencil, not a pen.
quotes.author: Paul Graham

quotes.quote: All programming is maintenance programming, because you are rarely writing original code.
quotes.author: Dave Thomas

quotes.quote: If debugging is the process of removing software bugs, then programming must be the process of putting them in.
quotes.author: Edsger Dijkstra

quotes.quote: Programming is breaking of one big impossible task into several very small possible tasks.
quotes.author: Jazzwant

quotes.quote: Programs must be written for people to read, and only incidentally for machines to execute.
