quotes.author: Harold Abelson

quotes.quote: If we wish to count lines of code, we should not regard them as lines produced but as lines spent.
quotes.author: Edsger Dijkstra

quotes.quote: Our ultimate goal is extensible programming (EP). By this, we mean the construction of hierarchies of modules, each module adding new functionality to the system.
quotes.author: Niklaus Wirth

quotes.quote: Programming is the art of writing essays in crystal clear prose and making them executable.
quotes.author: Per Brinch Hansen

quotes.quote: The proper use of comments is to compensate for our failure to express ourself in code.
quotes.author: Robert C. Martin

quotes.quote: In programming, as in everything else, to be in error is to be reborn.
quotes.author: Alan Perlis

quotes.quote: The kind of programming that C provides will probably remain similar absolutely or slowly decline in usage, but relatively, JavaScript or its variants, or XML, will continue to become more central.
quotes.author: Dennis Ritchie

quotes.quote: Programming is an explanatory activity.
quotes.author: Roman Harper

quotes.quote: A language that doesn't have everything is actually easier to program in than some that do.
quotes.author: Dennis Ritchie

quotes.quote: C makes it easy to shoot yourself in the foot. C++ makes it harder, but when you do, it blows away your whole leg.
quotes.author: Bjarne Stroustrup

quotes.quote: Always code as if the guy who ends up maintaining your code will be a violent psychopath who knows where you live.
quotes.author: Martin Golding

quotes.quote: A programming language is low level when its programs require attention to the irrelevant.
quotes.author: Alan J. Perlis

quotes.quote: Some of the best programming is done on paper, really. Putting it into the computer is just a minor detail.
quotes.author: Max Kanat-Alexander

quotes.quote: The first 90 percent of the code accounts for the first 90 percent of the development time. The remaining 10 percent of the code accounts for the other 90 percent of the development time.
quotes.author: Tom Cargill

quotes.quote: A language that doesn't affect the way you think about programming is not worth knowing.
quotes.author: Alan J. Perlis

quotes.quote: And don't ever make the mistake that you can design something better than what you get from ruthless massively parallel trial-and-error with a feedback cycle. That's giving your intelligence much too much credit.
quotes.author: Linus

quotes.quote: Debugging is twice as hard as writing the code in the first place. Therefore, if you write the code as cleverly as possible, you are, by definition, not smart enough to debug it.
quotes.author: Brian W. Kernighan

quotes.quote: Controlling complexity is the essence of computer programming.
quotes.author: Brian Kernighan

quotes.quote: Programming is usually taught by examples.
quotes.author: Niklaus Wirth

quotes.quote: Whenever more than one thread accesses a given state variable, and one of them might write to it, they all must coordinate their access to it using synchronization.
quotes.author: Brian Goetz

quotes.quote: Programming is similar to a game of golf. The point is not getting the ball in the hole but how many strokes it takes.
quotes.author: Hayley Mills

quotes.quote: Programming today is a race between software engineers striving to build bigger and better idiot-proof programs, and the universe trying to build bigger and better idiots. So far, the universe is winning.
quotes.author: Rick Cook

quotes.quote: A C program is like a fast dance on a newly waxed dance floor by people carrying razors.
quotes.author: Waldi Ravens

quotes.quote: Programming is one of the most difficult branches of applied mathematics; the poorer mathematicians had better remain pure mathematicians.
quotes.author: Edsger Dijkstra

quotes.quote: You are being programmed all day, every day. You can't stop it, but you can determine if the programming is positive or negative.
quotes.author: Randy Gage

quotes.quote: And step by step, since time began, I see the steady gain of man.
quotes.author: John Greenleaf Whittier

quotes.quote: The history of progress is written in the blood of men and women who have dared to espouse an unpopular cause, as, for instance, the black man's right to his body, or the woman's right to her soul.
quotes.author: Emma Goldman

quotes.quote: Every step of progress the world has made has been from scaffold to scaffold, and from stake to stake.
quotes.author: Wendell Phillips

quotes.quote: Progress in the spiritual life comes from climbing a ladder of which the rungs are made alternately of belief and doubt.
quotes.author: Edward Patey

quotes.quote: The scientific and technological revolutions have been truly impressive. And we have wintessed awe-inspiring progress in both these spheres in the twentieth century.
quotes.author: Wanda Sykes

quotes.quote: There is in the universe a provision by which men are helped by the Divine Spirit. God inspires us to the Christian life and helps to the development of its graces.
quotes.author: Henry Ward Beech

quotes.quote: To regret one's own experience is to arrest one's own development. To deny one's own experience is to put a lie into the lips of one's own lie. It is no less than a denial of the soul.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: So they speak soothingly about progress and the greatest possible happiness, forgetting that happiness is itself poisoned if the measure of suffering has not been fulfilled.
quotes.author: Carl Gustav Jung

quotes.quote: Discontent is the first step in the progress of a man or nation.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: Progress is the mother of problems.
quotes.author: G.K. Chesterton

quotes.quote: The slogan of progress is changing from the full dinner pail to the full garage.
quotes.author: Herbert Hoover

quotes.quote: We are the nation of human progress, and who will, what can set limits to our onward march.
quotes.author: John L. O'Sullivan

quotes.quote: Change is not always progress. A fever of newness has everywhere been confused with the spirit of progress.
quotes.author: Henry Ford

quotes.quote: Conservation means development as much as it does protection.
quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.quote: And the progress of the mind in science; is not very unlike the progress of science herself in experiment.
quotes.author: Charles Caleb Colton

quotes.quote: No man ever became in an instant the most base. The progress from virtue towards vice is gradual and insensible.
quotes.author: Lippincott

quotes.quote: As we progress along our path, our experiences help us to define our own character
quotes.author: Richard Allan Krieger

quotes.quote: The path of truth is the path of progress.
quotes.author: Richard Allan Krieger

quotes.quote: Never discourage any man who continually makes progress, no matter how slow.
quotes.author: Plato

quotes.quote: Our progress as a nation can be no swifter than our progress in education
quotes.author: John F. Kennedy

quotes.quote: The silly question is the first intimation of some totally new development.
quotes.author: Alfred North Whitehead

quotes.quote: Human progress means the regained advancement of human values in households rich with parenthood, and sustained by ties with a cohesive community.
quotes.author: Alfred Henry

quotes.quote: Development is a universal process that is also your personal challenge.
quotes.author: Alfred Henry

quotes.quote: Progress therefore is not an accident, but a necessity. It is part of nature.
quotes.author: Herbert Spencer

quotes.quote: The art of progress is to preserve order amid change--to preserve change amid order.
quotes.author: Alfred M. Whitehead

quotes.quote: Enthusiasm is the very propeller of progress.
quotes.author: B.C. Forbes

quotes.quote: Restlessness and discontent are the first necessities of progress.
quotes.author: Thomas Edison

quotes.quote: Nothing in progress can rest on its original plan. We might as well think of rocking a grown man in the cradle of an infant.
quotes.author: Edmund Burke

quotes.quote: Man is not growing better. Man is not climbing upward. Instead of progress in man himself there is degeneracy.-
quotes.author: Billy Graham

quotes.quote: No matter how advanced its progress, any generation that neglects its spiritual and moral life is going to disintegrate.
quotes.author: Billy Graham

quotes.quote: Every general prohibition creates its bootleggers.
quotes.author: Robert A. Heinlein

quotes.quote: Regardless of what one's attitude towards prohibition may be, temperance is something against which, at a time of war, no reasonable protest can be made.
quotes.author: William Lyon Mackenzie King

quotes.quote: Prohibition makes you want to cry into your beer and denies you the beer to cry into.
quotes.author: Don Marquis

quotes.quote: We find many things to which the prohibition of them constitutes the only temptation.
quotes.author: William Hazlitt

quotes.quote: Prohibition has made nothing but trouble.
quotes.author: Al Capone

quotes.quote: Prohibitions create the desire they were intended to cure.
quotes.author: Lawrence Durrell

quotes.quote: Prohibition only drives drunkenness behind doors and into dark places, and does not cure it or even diminish it.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: Prohibition was introduced as a fraud; it has been nursed as a fraud.
quotes.author: Roger Q. Mills

quotes.quote: Prohibition is an attempted cure that makes matters worse - for both the addict and the rest of us.
quotes.author: Milton Friedman

quotes.quote: Alcohol didn't cause the high crime rates of the '20s and '30s, Prohibition did. And drugs do not cause today's alarming crime rates, but drug prohibition does.
quotes.author: James Carriger Paine

quotes.quote: Complete prohibition of all chemical mind changers can be decreed, but cannot be enforced, and tends to create more evils than it cures.
quotes.author: Aldous Huxley

quotes.quote: Prohibition is a hard sounding word, worthless as a rallying cry, hard as a locked door or going to bed without your supper.
quotes.author: Nellie L. McClung

quotes.quote: Prohibition didn't work in the Garden of Eden. Adam ate the apple.
quotes.author: Vicente Fox

quotes.quote: The prohibition of drugs causes crime. You don't have to legalize, just decriminalize it.
quotes.author: Jesse Ventura

quotes.quote: Prohibition is better than no liquor at all.
quotes.author: Will Rogers

quotes.quote: The prohibition law, written for weaklings and derelicts, has divided the nation, like Gaul, into three parts - wets, drys and hypocrites.
quotes.author: Florence Sabin

quotes.quote: Making prohibition work is like making water run uphill; it's against nature.
quotes.author: Milton Friedman

quotes.quote: The more prohibitions you have, the less virtuous people will be. The more weapons you have, the less secure people will be. The more subsidies you have, the less self reliant people will be.
quotes.author: Laozi

quotes.quote: Prohibition may be a disputed theory, but none can say that it doesn't hold water.
quotes.author: Thomas L. Masson

quotes.quote: Prohibition is an awful flop. We like it. It can't stop what it's meant to stop. We like it. It's left a trail of graft and slime It don't prohibit worth a dime It's filled our land with vice and crime, Nevertheless, we're for it.
quotes.author: Franklin P. Adams

quotes.quote: Prohibition is the trigger of crime.
quotes.author: Ian Fleming

quotes.quote: Prohibition will work great injury to the cause of temperance. It is a species of intemperance within itself, for it goes beyond the bounds of reason in that it attempts to control a man's appetite by legislation, and makes a crime out of things that are not crimes. A Prohibition law strikes a blow at the very principles upon which our government was founded.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.quote: Prohibition goes beyond the bounds of reason in that it attempts to control a man's appetite by legislation and makes crimes out of things that are not crimes.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.quote: One role of prohibition is in making the drug market more lucrative.
quotes.author: Milton Friedman

quotes.quote: Prohibition... goes beyond the bounds of reason in that it attempts to control a man's appetite by legislation and makes a crime out of things that are not crimes... A prohibition law strikes a blow at the very principles upon which our government was founded.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.quote: Prohibition doesn't work, and again, they've put the evidence right there showing that responsible regulation has hugely reduced cigarette use.
quotes.author: Burce Mirken

quotes.quote: For every prohibition you create, you also create an underground.
quotes.author: Jello Biafra

quotes.quote: Communism is like prohibition, it is a good idea, but it won't work.
quotes.author: Will Rogers

quotes.quote: Drug prohibition has caused gang warfare and other violent crimes by raising the prices of drugs so much that vicious criminals enter the market to make astronomical profits, and addicts rob and steal to get money to pay the inflated prices for their drugs.
quotes.author: Michael Badnarik

quotes.quote: As restrictions and prohibitions are multiplied the people grow poorer and poorer. When they are subjected to overmuch government, the land is thrown into confusion.
quotes.author: Lao-Tzu

quotes.quote: Trying to manage a project without project management is like trying to play a football game without a game plan.
quotes.author: K. Tate

quotes.quote: A project is complete when it starts working for you, rather than you working for it.
quotes.author: Scott Allen

quotes.quote: If you have never recommended canceling a project, you haven’t been an effective project manager.
quotes.author: Woody Williams

quotes.quote: In poorly run projects, problems can go undetected until the project fails. It's like the drip.. drip.. drip of a leaky underground pipe. Money is being lost, but you don't see it until there is an explosion.
quotes.author: Joy Gumz

quotes.quote: To get a project off the ground, tell a colleague it was their idea. They will put their heart and soul into making it successful.
quotes.author: T. Wouhra

quotes.quote: How does a project get to be a year late? One day at a time.
quotes.author: Frederick Brooks

quotes.quote: True success not a project but a journey
quotes.author: Dr. Myles Munroe

quotes.quote: No matter how good the team or how efficient the methodology, if we're not solving the right problem, the project fails.
quotes.author: Woody Williams

quotes.quote: You are an endless project... changing, evolving, surprising.
quotes.author: James Patterson

quotes.quote: The middle of every successful project looks like a disaster.
quotes.author: Rosabeth Moss Kanter

quotes.quote: I've learned over the years that when I go to that place of passion within me, there's no force in the universe that can interfere with my completing a project.
quotes.author: Dr. Wayne Dyer

quotes.quote: In any project, the most important factor is the belief in success. Without faith, success is impossible.
quotes.author: William James

quotes.quote: A project without a critical path is like a ship without a rudder.
quotes.author: D. Meyer

quotes.quote: Projects progress quickly until they become 90% complete, then remain 90% complete forever.
quotes.author: Edward Butler

quotes.quote: A good plan can help with risk analyses but it will never guarantee the smooth running of the project.
quotes.author: Bentley and Borman

quotes.quote: I don't take any project lightly. Every project is important for me. In fact, every scene in every film is important.
quotes.author: Vijay Sethupathi

quotes.quote: If an IT project works the first time, it was a very small and simple project.
quotes.author: Cornelius Fitchner

quotes.quote: My personal philosophy is not to undertake a project unless it is manifestly important and nearly impossible.
quotes.author: Edwin Land

quotes.quote: No major project is ever installed on time, within budget, with the same staff that started it.
quotes.author: Edward Butler

quotes.quote: Find a happy person, and you will find a project
quotes.author: Sonja Lyubomirsky

quotes.quote: Projects are determined by missions, the project is great if it has a great mission.
quotes.author: Anton Pavlovich Chekhov

quotes.quote: Bad leaders believe that they have to project control at all times.
quotes.author: Simon Sinek

quotes.quote: Every time you do a project, you learn something new.
quotes.author: Justin Timberlake

quotes.quote: Every project starts with a story
quotes.author: Colleen Atwood

quotes.quote: The road is long from the project to its completion.
quotes.author: Moliere

quotes.quote: Running a project without a WBS is like going to a strange land without a roadmap.
quotes.author: J. Phillips

quotes.quote: Beware the time-driven project with an artificial deadline.
quotes.author: M Dobson

quotes.quote: First, have a definite, clear practical ideal; a goal, an objective. Second, have the necessary means to achieve your ends; wisdom, money, materials, and methods. Third, adjust all your means to that end.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: Trying to manage a project without project management is like trying to play a football game without a game plan.
quotes.author: K. Tate

quotes.quote: It must be considered that there is nothing more difficult to carry out nor more doubtful of success nor more dangerous to handle than to initiate a new order of things.
quotes.author: Machiavelli

quotes.quote: Project management can â€¦ be defined as a way of developing structure in a complex project, where the independent variables of time, cost, resources and human behaviour come together.
quotes.author: Rory Burke

quotes.quote: Make no little plans; they have no magic to stir men's blood make big plans, aim high in hope and work.
quotes.author: David Burnham

quotes.quote: A project without a critical path is like a ship without a rudder.
quotes.author: D. Meyer

quotes.quote: Time is the scarcest resource and unless it is managed nothing else can be managed.
quotes.author: Peter Drucker

quotes.quote: It is a mistake to look too far ahead. Only one link in the chain of destiny can be handled at a time.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: Management is, above all, a practice where art, science, and craft meet.
quotes.author: Henry Mintzberg

quotes.quote: Plans are worthless. Planning is essential.
quotes.author: Dwight D. Eisenhower

quotes.quote: Concentrate all your thoughts upon the work in hand. The sun's rays do not burn until brought to a focus.
quotes.author: Alexander Graham Bell

quotes.quote: Organization charts and fancy titles count for next to nothing.
quotes.author: Colin Powell

quotes.quote: Operations keeps the lights on, strategy provides a light at the end of the tunnel, but project management is the train engine that moves the organization forward.
quotes.author: Joy Gumz

quotes.quote: For every hour of brains, you will be charged three hours. The other two hours go to management and project management, which is to say they are wasted.
quotes.author: Robert X. Cringely

quotes.quote: To effectively communicate, we must realize that we are all different in the way we perceive the world and use this understanding as a guide to our communication with others.
quotes.author: Tony Robbins

quotes.quote: For a project plan to be effective it must equally address the parameters of â€˜activity time' and â€˜activity logic'. This logical relationship is required to model the effect schedule variance will have down stream in the project.
quotes.author: Rory Burke

quotes.quote: A well-constructed project management workshop should give people a solid foundation to build on.Â
quotes.author: Bentley & Borman

quotes.quote: Project management can be defined as a way of developing structure in a complex project, where the independent variables of time, cost, resources and human behavior come together.
quotes.author: Rory Burke

quotes.quote: Operations keep the lights on, strategy provides the light at the end of the tunnel, but project management is the train engine that moves the organization forward.
quotes.author: Joy Gumz

quotes.quote: The major reason for setting a goal is for what it makes of you to accomplish it. What it makes of you will always be the far greater value than what you get.
quotes.author: Jim Rohn

quotes.quote: Plans are only good intentions unless they immediately degenerate into hard work.
quotes.author: Peter Drucker

quotes.quote: Project management is the art of creating the illusion that any outcome is the result of a series of predetermined, deliberate acts when, in fact, it was dumb luck.
quotes.author: Harold Kerzner

quotes.quote: Have a good plan, Execute it violently, Do it today.
quotes.author: General Douglas McArthur

quotes.quote: No matter how good the team or how efficient the methodology, if we're not solving the right problem, the project fails.
quotes.author: Woody Williams

quotes.quote: You can't keep it all in your head. Project control tools are an absolute necessity for the control of large projects.
quotes.author: Louis Fried

quotes.quote: A good plan can help with risk analyses but it will never guarantee the smooth running of the project.
quotes.author: Bentley and Borman

quotes.quote: A good plan today is better than a perfect plan tomorrow.
quotes.author: Proverb

quotes.quote: The world does not need a better definition of issues, or better planning or project management. It needs the issues and the plans to have more of an impact, which is the promise of engagement.
quotes.author: Peter Block

quotes.quote: Our goal is to leverage what is already out in the field in terms of partners, but then hire in project management capability and a bit of technical capability.
quotes.author: Kevin Rollins

quotes.quote: On planning â€“ What is truth today may be falsehood tomorrow. Never confuse your plan with truth.
quotes.author: Woody Williams

quotes.quote: Always being picked up,from the prom,by a hunk.
quotes.author: faenellaith

quotes.quote: Also that same year I became prom king of my class.
quotes.author: Mario William Vitale

quotes.quote: Prom wealth and honour leads thee far astray.
quotes.author: Charles Churchill

quotes.quote: To the prom with me you'd go.
quotes.author: Marty Robbins

quotes.quote: Serving every prom queen and groupie with that vanilla smoothie.
quotes.author: Freddie Gibbs

quotes.quote: In this prom night I will be yours. Cause every night I see you in my dreams.
quotes.author: Black

quotes.quote: My high school prom is coming and I heave my daddy's warnings.
quotes.author: Insane Clown Posse

quotes.quote: I've seen prom queens, turn into prom fiends.
quotes.author: Magoo

quotes.quote: I think prom is just about enjoying yourself.
quotes.author: Victoria Justice

quotes.quote: I don't get why prom is like a mini-wedding these days...No one should spend that kind of money for a high school dance.
quotes.author: Deb Caletti

quotes.quote: Death is a lot like a prom - loud, overdone, and although the guy you came with was cool, you never know who'll end up taking you home.
quotes.author: Cecily White

quotes.quote: You can get married three or four times, but a prom is one in a lifetime experience.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Prom is an exciting time for teenagers. The perfect dress is any dress that they feel beautiful and confident wearing.
quotes.author: Christy Austin

quotes.quote: The prom is a good way to meet new members.
quotes.author: Adahlia Suicide

quotes.quote: It is one of those strange and magical nights where you are never quite sure what is going to happen.
quotes.author: Angie Combs

quotes.quote: PROM WAS AWESOME. I HAD SUCH A GREAT TIME AT PROM.
quotes.author: Annasophia Robb

quotes.quote: ADOLESCENCE ISN'T JUST ABOUT PROM OR WEARING SPARKLY DRESSES.
quotes.author: Jena Malone

quotes.quote: Getting you a date to prom is so hard that the hypothetical idea itself is used to cut diamonds.
quotes.author: John Green

quotes.quote: It wasn't that no one asked me to the prom, it was that no one would tell me where it was.
quotes.author: Rita Rudner

quotes.quote: People are not conforming to the traditional ideas of prom. They are more individualistic, more willing to do their own thing. It's just a complete change in our culture.
quotes.author: Ryan Williamson

quotes.quote: Twenty years ago prom night was the most dangerous part of a teen career. This night, more than ever, parents need to be parents.
quotes.author: Gilda Ross

quotes.quote: I think that the different styles of prom dresses goes along with the strength, confidence and maturity of young women today. They realize that they don't have to wear a ball gown. ... they can wear something that better reflects their lives.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Morgan

quotes.quote: Even the promiscuous feel pain.
quotes.author: Warren Beatty

quotes.quote: As bees their sting, so the promiscuous leave behind them in each encounter something of themselves by which they are made to suffer.
quotes.author: Cyril Connolly

quotes.quote: Promiscuity turns sex into a sport, like arm-wrestling.
quotes.author: Mason Cooley

quotes.quote: Men are more moral than they think and far more immoral than they can imagine.
quotes.author: Sigmund Freud

quotes.quote: Promiscuity is like never reading past the first page. Monogamy is like reading the same book over and over.
quotes.author: Mason Cooley

quotes.quote: Variety is the spice of love.
quotes.author: Helen Rowland

quotes.quote: Don't lose a diamond because you're busy collecting stones.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Promiscuity is the death of love.
quotes.author: Edna O'Brien

quotes.quote: The fact that the person who you are sleeping with is also sleeping with another person or other people does not necessarily mean that he or she does not love you. And the fact that you are the only person who someone is sleeping with does not necessarily mean that he or she loves you.
quotes.author: Mokokoma Mokhonoana

quotes.quote: The sexual freedom of today for most people is really only a convention, an obligation, a social duty, a social anxiety, a necessary feature of the consumer's way of life.
quotes.author: Pier Paolo Pasolini

quotes.quote: The danger in promiscuity is that it's always barking at your heels.
quotes.author: Rick Springfield

quotes.quote: You know, women are as promiscuous as men and yet, of course, people are inhibited from having an affair or a relationship because the real-world consequences are a drag.
quotes.author: Lee Child

quotes.quote: Once is a man's life, for one mortal moment, he must make a grab for immorality; if not; he has not lived.
quotes.author: Sylvester Stallone

quotes.quote: Cheating in relationship is a sign of self-regulation failure. When it happens ones, it is a mistake. When it happens twice, it is unfortunate. But when it happens thrice or more, it is a pattern indicating primitive, uncivilized inhuman behavior.
quotes.author: Abhijit Naskar

quotes.quote: Fish in another man's pond and you will catch crabs.
quotes.author: Habeeb Akande

quotes.quote: A promiscuous person is a person who is getting more sex than you are.
quotes.author: Victor Lownes

quotes.quote: Women never know what they want. Men never know what they have.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Everything good in life is either immoral, illegal or fattening.
quotes.author: Nicole Richie

quotes.quote: You were born with your legs apart. They'll send you to the grave in a Y-shaped coffin.
quotes.author: Joe Orton

quotes.quote: To be ashamed of one's immorality: that is a step on the staircase at whose end one is also ashamed of one's morality.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.quote: There is no such thing as morality or immorality in thought. There is immoral emotion.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: A lack of boundaries invites a lack of respect.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Either one is promiscuous or in a relationship - it cannot be both at the same time.
quotes.author: Abhijit Naskar

quotes.quote: Promiscuity does not equal sexual empowerment. Celibacy does not equal lack of it. It is in the quality, not quantity, that we empower ourselves sexually.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: The definition of promiscuity? One more partner than you've ever had.
quotes.author: Gloria Feldt

quotes.quote: Promiscuity in men may cheapen love but sharpen thought. Promiscuity in women is illness, a leakage of identity.
quotes.author: Camille Paglia

quotes.quote: Good girls go to heaven, bad girls go everywhere.
quotes.author: Mae West

quotes.quote: The only immorality is not to do when one hast to do it.
quotes.author: Jean Anouilh

quotes.quote: Boredom is often the cause of promiscuity, and always its result.
quotes.author: Mignon McLaughlin

quotes.quote: Girls who say "lots of guys are after me" should never forget that low prices attract the most customers.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Keep every promise you make and only make promises you can keep.
quotes.author: Anthony Hitt

quotes.quote: Promises are like crying babies in a theater, they should be carried out at once.
quotes.author: Norman Vincent Peale

quotes.quote: Nobody gets any guarantees.
quotes.author: John Engler

quotes.quote: Promises are the uniquely human way of ordering the future, making it predictable and reliable to the extent that this is humanly possible.
quotes.author: Hannah Arendt

quotes.quote: You can't trust a promise someone makes while they're drunk, in love, hungry, or running for office.
quotes.author: Joe Moore

quotes.quote: It is easy to make promises - it is hard work to keep them.
quotes.author: Boris Johnson

quotes.quote: You cannot live on other people's promises, but if you promise others enough, you can live on your own.
quotes.author: Mark Caine

quotes.quote: Some people break promises for the pleasure of breaking them.
quotes.author: William Hazlitt

quotes.quote: If being recalled is the price for keeping one's promises, then so be it.
quotes.author: Russell Pearce

quotes.quote: You can't substitute promise after promise with known violators of prior promises at the expense of protecting ourselves or setting an example.
quotes.author: Fred Thompson

quotes.quote: The promises of yesterday are the taxes of today.
quotes.author: William Lyon MacKenzie

quotes.quote: Some people still make promises and keep those they make. When they do, they help make life around them more stably human.
quotes.author: Lewis B. Smedes

quotes.quote: Few promises are more sacred than the ones we make to older Americans.
quotes.author: Tom Rooney

quotes.quote: There are certain promises you make that are more sacred than anything that happens in a court of law, I don't care how many Bibles you put your hand on.
quotes.author: Paul Castellano

quotes.quote: Better a broken promise than none at all.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: If you make the customer a promise... make sure you deliver it.
quotes.author: Merv Griffin

quotes.quote: When you make a promise, keep it.
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.quote: A promise made is a debt unpaid.
quotes.author: Robert W. Service

quotes.quote: Promise, large promise, is the soul of an advertisement.
quotes.author: Samuel Johnson

quotes.quote: Never promise more than you can perform.
quotes.author: Publilius Syrus

quotes.quote: Promise is most given when the least is said.
quotes.author: George Chapman

quotes.quote: Be able to keep a secret or promise when you know in your heart that it is the right thing to do.
quotes.author: Marilyn vos Savant

quotes.quote: Half the promises people say were never kept, were never made.
quotes.author: Edgar Watson Howe

quotes.quote: Don't ever promise more than you can deliver, but always deliver more than you promise.
quotes.author: Lou Holtz

quotes.quote: A promise must never be broken.
quotes.author: Alexander Hamilton

quotes.quote: The best way to keep one's word is not to give it.
quotes.author: Napoleon Bonaparte

quotes.quote: All promise outruns performance.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Promises are like the full moon, if they are not kept at once they diminish day by day.
quotes.author: German Proverb

quotes.quote: Better break your word than do worse in keeping it.
quotes.author: Thomas Fuller

quotes.quote: The promise given was a necessity of the past: the word broken is a necessity of the present.
quotes.author: Niccolo Machiavelli

quotes.quote: People don't get promoted for doing their jobs really well. They get promoted by demonstrating their potential to do more.
quotes.author: Tara Jaye Frank

quotes.quote: A sincere attitude of gratitude is a beatitude for secured altitudes. Appreciate what you have been given and you will be promoted higher.
quotes.author: Israelmore Ayivor

quotes.quote: If opportunity doesn’t knock, build a door.
quotes.author: Milton Berle

quotes.quote: A successful career will no longer be about promotion. It will be about mastery.
quotes.author: Michael Martin Hammer

quotes.quote: Every obstacle is a hidden step on the path to promotion.
quotes.author: Sunday Adelaja

quotes.quote: Plenty of men can do good work for a spurt and with immediate promotion in mind, but for promotion you want a man in whom good work has become a habit.
quotes.author: Henry Latham Doherty

quotes.quote: Without promotion, something terrible happens... nothing!
quotes.author: P. T. Barnum

quotes.quote: Know your limitations and be content with them. Too much ambition results in promotion to a job you can't do.
quotes.author: Ricky Gervais

quotes.quote: Promotion should not be more important than accomplishment, or avoiding instability more important than taking the right risk.
quotes.author: Peter Drucker

quotes.quote: Promotions will come and go, but your hard work will always shine and show.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Men dont avoid successful women because theyre jealous; they often do it to avoid being in competition with her next job promotion.
quotes.author: Ian K. Smith

quotes.quote: To level up your life, it is important to level up your mind.
quotes.author: Ishita Srivastava

quotes.quote: There’s always another level up. There’s always another ascension. More grace, more light, more generosity, more compassion, more to shed, more to grow.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Gilbert

quotes.quote: We cannot become what we want by remaining what we are.
quotes.author: Max Depree

quotes.quote: What's wrong with trying hard and showing up and being good at your job? We really need to look at ourselves and say we need to reevaluate this. We need to reevaluate that women who ask for a pay raise or ask for a promotion - it's actually an okay thing. It's okay to be ambitious; it's okay to be over-prepared.
quotes.author: Jessica Chastain

quotes.quote: You get in life what you have the courage to ask for.
quotes.author: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.quote: You cannot just expect a promotion to come from the sky.
quotes.author: Jesse White

quotes.quote: Being ready isn't enough; you have to be prepared for a promotion or any other significant change.
quotes.author: Pat Riley

quotes.quote: Wherever you work, work hard and educate yourself continuously. You must never forget social welfare, ethics and honesty. However, there is no guarantee for your career progression. Therefore, don't expect that only the best people will be promoted.
quotes.author: Eraldo Banovac

quotes.quote: A person who is often basking in the glare of publicity may look to the people that he is quitting his high position, but actually he might be going for a higher promotion.
quotes.author: Anuj Somany

quotes.quote: Work hard in silencee. Let success make the noise.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: If you always put limits on everything you do, physical or anything else, it will spread into your work and into your life. There are no limits. There are only plateaus, and you must not stay there, you must go beyond them.
quotes.author: Bruce Lee

quotes.quote: Rank does not confer privilege or give power. It imposes responsibility.
quotes.author: Peter Drucker

quotes.quote: You were hired because you met expectations, you will be promoted if you can exceed them.
quotes.author: Saji Ijiyemi

quotes.quote: Get the big view of your job. Think, really think your present job is important. That next promotion depends mostly on how you think toward your present job.
quotes.author: David J. Schwartz

quotes.quote: If you get a job or promotion because of your race or gender, it is no different than a subsidy. You get something you didn't earn, 'something for nothing.
quotes.author: James Cook

quotes.quote: Work to become, not to acquire.
quotes.author: Elbert Hubbard

quotes.quote: The promotion of ‘average’ individual causes a general levelling down.
quotes.author: Alain de Benoist

quotes.quote: A strong and dedicated mentor can help a young woman get her foot in the door, get a promotion and get a raise.
quotes.author: Kirsten Gillibrand

quotes.quote: All growth depends upon activity. There is no development physically or intellectually without effort, and effort means work.
quotes.author: Calvin Coolidge

quotes.quote: As a proof that we are regenerated, we must regenerate everything around us.
quotes.author: Louis Claude de Saint-Martin

quotes.quote: The proof of humanity is that sometimes, we all make mistakes.
quotes.author: Nkem Paul

quotes.quote: Proof by analogy is fraud.
quotes.author: Bjarne Stroustrup

quotes.quote: Attack is the proof that your enemy anticipates your success.
quotes.author: Mike Murdock

quotes.quote: The proof that one truly believes is in action.
quotes.author: Bayard Rustin

quotes.quote: Documents create a paper reality we call proof.
quotes.author: Mason Cooley

quotes.quote: Absence of proof isn't proof of absence.
quotes.author: Robert Buettner

quotes.quote: All proofs rest on premises.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: The final proof of greatness lies in being able to endure criticism without resentment.
quotes.author: Elbert Hubbard

quotes.quote: A proof tells us where to concentrate our doubts.
quotes.author: Morris Kline

quotes.quote: The proof of a man is the danger test, It shows him up at his worst, or his best.
quotes.author: Edgar Guest

quotes.quote: The proof of the pudding is in the eating.
quotes.author: Wilson Fortaleza

quotes.quote: The very best proof that something can be done is that someone has already done it.
quotes.author: Bertrand Russell

quotes.quote: That some achieve great success, is proof to all that others can achieve it as well.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.quote: Proof of war, when it comes, always comes too late.
quotes.author: Janet Morris

quotes.quote: By far the best proof is experience.
quotes.author: Sir Francis Bacon

quotes.quote: Scars are proof we can can survive.
quotes.author: Megan Hart

quotes.quote: A proof is a proof. What kind of a proof? It's a proof. A proof is a proof. And when you have a good proof, it's because it's proven.
quotes.author: Jean Chretien

quotes.quote: A good proof is one that makes us wiser.
quotes.author: IU?. I. Manin

quotes.quote: Do not consider it proof just because it is written in books, for a liar who will deceive with his tongue will not hesitate to do the same with his pen.
quotes.author: Maimonides

quotes.quote: Proofs exist only in mathematics and logic, not in science.
quotes.author: Satoshi Kanazawa

quotes.quote: You do not need proof for what people want to believe.
quotes.author: Thomas Sowell

quotes.quote: Proof is never definitive, after all; one has to begin again with each new person.
quotes.author: Albert Camus

quotes.quote: A proof once established is better left so.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: Propaganda proceeds by psychological manipulations, character modifications, by creation of stereotypes useful when the time comes.The two great routes that this sub-propaganda takes are the conditioned reflex and the myth
quotes.author: Jacques Ellul

quotes.quote: Propaganda replaces moral philosophy.
quotes.author: Hans J. Morgenthau

quotes.quote: The goal of modern propaganda is no longer to transform opinion but to arouse an active and mythical belief.
quotes.author: Jacques Ellul

quotes.quote: A propagandist is a specialist in selling attitudes and opinions.
quotes.author: Hans Speier

quotes.quote: All propaganda must be popular and its intellectual level must be adjusted to the most limited intelligence among those it is addressed to.
quotes.author: Adolf Hitler

quotes.quote: One of the most horrible features of war is that all the war-propaganda, all the screaming and lies and hatred, comes invariably from people who are not fighting.
quotes.author: George Orwell

quotes.quote: Propaganda is persuading people to make up their minds while withholding some of the facts from them.
quotes.author: Harold Evans

quotes.quote: Propaganda has a bad name, but its root meaning is simply to disseminate through a medium, and all writing therefore is propaganda for something. It's a seeding of the self in the consciousness of others.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Drew

quotes.quote: Propaganda begins when dialogue ends.
quotes.author: Jacques Ellul

quotes.quote: Propaganda is the art of persuading others of what you don't believe yourself.
quotes.author: Decimius Magnus Ausonius

quotes.quote: The power of propaganda is to say something enough times that it becomes the big lie.
quotes.author: Andrew Breitbart

quotes.quote: Propaganda is a topic of particular concern to peace associations. This is a matter of educating the population in general, and not least the voters.
quotes.author: Fredrik Bajer

quotes.quote: Propaganda is the executive arm of the invisible government.
quotes.author: Edward Bernays

quotes.quote: Because propaganda is pragmatic, when the social climate changes so do the propagandas, but not necessarily the propagandists.
quotes.author: Brian Anse Patrick

quotes.quote: Propaganda is amazing. People can be led to believe anything.
quotes.author: Alice Walker

quotes.quote: Propaganda must not serve the truth, especially insofar as it might bring out something favorable for the opponent.
quotes.author: Adolf Hitler

quotes.quote: The essence of propaganda consists in winning people over to an idea so sincerely, so vitally, that in the end they succumb to it utterly and can never escape from it.
quotes.author: Joseph Goebbels

quotes.quote: Propaganda, to be effective, must be believed. To be believed, it must be credible. To be credible, it must be true.
quotes.author: Hubert H. Humphrey

quotes.quote: Propaganda is the art of persuading others of what you don't believe yourself.
quotes.author: Decimius Magnus Ausonius

quotes.quote: Propaganda analysis can contribute to world peace by exposing those techniques that lead to armed conflict by creating misapprehension of reality.
quotes.author: Randal Marlin

quotes.quote: Propaganda does not deceive people; it merely helps them to deceive themselves.
quotes.author: Eric Hoffer

quotes.quote: Propaganda is that branch of the art of lying which consists in nearly deceiving your friends without quite deceiving your enemies.
quotes.author: Francis Cornford

quotes.quote: Propaganda is a soft weapon; hold it in your hands too long, and it will move about like a snake, and strike the other way.
quotes.author: Jean Anouilh

quotes.quote: The most effective way to destroy people is to deny and obliterate their own understanding of their history.
quotes.author: George Orwell

quotes.quote: Propaganda works best when those who are being manipulated are confident they are acting on their own free will.
quotes.author: Joseph Goebbels

quotes.quote: That propaganda is good which leads to success, and that is bad which fails to achieve the desired result. It is not propaganda's task to be intelligent, its task is to lead to success.
quotes.author: Joseph Goebbels

quotes.quote: Propaganda is as powerful as heroin; it surreptitiously dissolves all capacity to think.
quotes.author: Gil Courtemanche

quotes.quote: Propaganda invariably serves the long-term interests of some elite.
quotes.author: John Berger

quotes.quote: Propaganda must facilitate the displacement of aggression by specifying the targets for hatred.
quotes.author: Joseph Goebbels

quotes.quote: Propaganda is to a democracy what the bludgeon is to a totalitarian state.
quotes.author: Noam Chomsky

quotes.quote: For you know this first, that no prophecy of Scripture springs from any private interpretation. For prophecy was at no time brought by man's will, but men spoke from God as they were moved by holy spirit.
quotes.author: Apostle Peter

quotes.quote: Better to aim at a star than shoot down a well; you'll hit higher.
quotes.author: Source Unknown

quotes.quote: Persistent prophecy is a familiar way of assuring the event.
quotes.author: George Gissing

quotes.quote: Prophecy is history anticipated and contracted: while history is prophecy accomplished and dilated.
quotes.author: Bishop Newton

quotes.quote: Prophecy - To observe that which has passed, and guess it will happen again.
quotes.author: Elbert Hubbard

quotes.quote: The prophecy of a world moving toward political unity is the light which guides all that is best, most vigorous, most truly alive in the work of our time.
quotes.author: Walter Lippmann

quotes.quote: All prophecy is based on a revelation from God, but always operates at a lower level of authority than that of inspired Scripture.
quotes.author: Sam Storms

quotes.quote: Science has not yet mastered prophecy. We predict too much for the next year and yet far too little for the next 10.
quotes.author: Neil Armstrong

quotes.quote: Self-doubt is a self-fulfilling prophecy.
quotes.author: Laurell K. Hamilton

quotes.quote: The art of prophecy is very difficult, especially with respect to the future.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: The difference between heresy and prophecy is often one of sequence. Heresy often turns out to have been prophecy -- when properly aged.
quotes.author: Hubert Humphrey

quotes.quote: What are prophecies? Don't we hear them every day of the week? And if one comes true there may be seven blind and come to nothing.
quotes.author: Lady Gregory

quotes.quote: Whatever we expect with confidence becomes our own self-fulfilling prophecy.
quotes.author: Brian Tracy

quotes.quote: The self-fulfilling prophecy is, in the beginning, a false definition of the situation evoking a new behavior which makes the originally false conception come true. The specious validity of the self-fulfilling prophecy perpetuates a reign of error. For the prophet will cite the actual course of events as proof that he was right from the very beginning.
quotes.author: Robert K. Merton

quotes.quote: Prophecy today is hardly the romantic business that it used to be. The old tools of the trade, like the sword, the hair shirt, and the long fast in the wilderness, have given way to more contemporary, mundane instruments of doom --the book, the picket and the petition, the sit-in at City Hall.
quotes.author: Jane Kramer

quotes.quote: Prophecy, however honest, is generally a poor substitute for experience.
quotes.author: Benjamin Cardozo

quotes.quote: To realize that prophecy in the people is like fruit in the tree is to know the unity of life.
quotes.author: Kahlil Gibran

quotes.quote: Ages when custom is unsettled are necessarily ages of prophecy. The moralist cannot teach what is revealed; he must reveal what can be taught. He has to seek insight rather than to preach.
quotes.author: Walter Lippmann

quotes.quote: Prophecy, that universal and perpetual torch by which faith is enlightened.
quotes.author: Henri-Dominique Lacordaire

quotes.quote: In the computer field, the moment of truth is a running program; all else is prophecy.
quotes.author: Herbert Simon

quotes.quote: Many a prophecy, by the mere force of its being believed, is transmuted to fact.
quotes.author: Isaac Asimov

quotes.quote: Prophecy: Two bull's eyes out of a possible million.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: Every theory is a self-fulfilling prophecy that orders experience into the framework it provides.
quotes.author: Ruth Hubbard

quotes.quote: Prophecy resideth not but in a man who is great in wisdom and virtue.
quotes.author: Maimonides

quotes.quote: Prophecy is most dangerous when you try to make it happen... The Pattern weaves itself around you, but when you try to weave it, even you cannot hold it.
quotes.author: Robert Jordan

quotes.quote: PROPHECY â€“ The art and practice of selling one's credibility for future delivery.
quotes.author: Ambrose Bierce

quotes.quote: History is but the unrolled scroll of prophecy.
quotes.author: James A. Garfield

quotes.quote: Among all forms of mistake, prophecy is the most gratuitous.
quotes.author: George Eliot

quotes.quote: Prophecy is not an art, nor (when it is taken for prediction) a constant vocation, but an extraordinary and temporary employment from God, most often of good men, but sometimes also of the wicked.
quotes.author: Thomas Hobbes

quotes.quote: The ultimate function of prophecy is not to tell the future, but to make it. Your successful past will block your visions of the future.
quotes.author: Joel A. Barker

quotes.quote: Prophets must humbly accept the truth that they see through a glass darkly, that they know only in part. In other words, they make mistakes. Mature prophets urge everyone to who they prophesy to judge, test and compare with scripture everything they say. They are not offended when people are careful.
quotes.author: Stephen Mansfield

quotes.quote: A serious prophet upon predicting a flood should be the first man to climb a tree.
quotes.author: Stephen Crane

quotes.quote: The moment the religious population of the world begins to see the prophets what they really were mortal teachers of the mortal world, a great portion of the world's religious conflicts shall vanish into thin air.
quotes.author: Abhijit Naskar

quotes.quote: The best prophet of the future is the past.
quotes.author: Lord Byron

quotes.quote: The prophets, who were very many, proclaim and declare the one God; for, being filled with the inspiration of the one God, they predicted things to come, with agreeing and harmonious voice.
quotes.author: Lactantius

quotes.quote: False prophets come in sheep's clothing, borrow a garb of truth to conceal their ultimate design, and render their falsehoods palatable, knowing that if they were to appear in their true character they would be repelled.
quotes.author: A. Cameron

quotes.quote: When He send, His messengers will go, His prophets will prophesy, though all the world should forbid them.
quotes.author: Roger Williams

quotes.quote: The task of the prophet is not to smooth things over but to make things right.
quotes.author: Eugene H. Peterson

quotes.quote: Saying of the prophet tasks whoever makes all his tasks one task, God will help him in his other concerns.
quotes.author: Idries Shah

quotes.quote: There is the prophetic ministry of promise born of the will of the Father and there is the prophetic ministry born of flesh and the will of man. Though both are conceived through a genuine desire to fulfil God's plan and promise, the one birthed by flesh must be maintained by flesh while the one birthed by the Spirit will be sustained by the Spirit. Flesh reproduces flesh and therefore speaks directly to the desires of man. Spirit reproduces spirit and therefore speaks forth the desire of God.
quotes.author: John Bevere

quotes.quote: The prophets reveal God in all His fulness and variety of being; they speak in human ears the strains of heaven.
quotes.author: Edward Irving

quotes.quote: Prophets are those who take life as it is and expand it. They refuse to shrink a vision of tomorrow to the boundaries of yesterday.
quotes.author: Joan D. Chittister

quotes.quote: Prophecy is the gift of the gods.
quotes.author: Epimenides

quotes.quote: Prophets have no other purpose, no other mission except to serve God.
quotes.author: Joseph B. Wirthlin

quotes.quote: The prophet must be his own disciple, or he will make none. Enthusiasm is contagious: belief creates belief.
quotes.author: George Henry Lewes

quotes.quote: A biblical false prophet was a servant of the devil attempting to lead people away from the truth.
quotes.author: Walter Martin

quotes.quote: A prophet's true greatness is his ability to hold God and man in a single thought.
quotes.author: Abraham Joshua Heschel

quotes.quote: The prophetic gift represents the Father's will and lays out the pattern.
quotes.author: Sherry K. White

quotes.quote: There's a reason prophets perform miracles; language lacks the power to describe faith.
quotes.author: Mohsin Hamid

quotes.quote: The poor are always prophetic. As true prophets always point out, they reveal God's design. That is why we should take time to listen to them. And that means staying near them, because they speak quietly and infrequently; they are afraid to speak out, they lack confidence in themselves because they have been broken and oppressed. But if we listen to them, they will bring us back to the essential.
quotes.author: Jean Vanier

quotes.quote: There is often a prophetic word in the words of a prophet, but not everything said is true prophecy.
quotes.author: Iverna Tompkins

quotes.quote: A prophet is always much wider than his followers, much more liberal than those who label themselves with his name.
quotes.author: Annie Besant

quotes.quote: The prophets even express their surprise that God should take notice of man, who is too little and too unimportant to be worthy of the attention of the Creator; how, then, should other living creatures be considered as proper objects for Divine Providence!
quotes.author: Maimonides

quotes.quote: A prophet is not someone with special visions, just someone blind to most of what others see.
quotes.author: Nassim Nicholas Taleb

quotes.quote: For every prophet there are a thousand interpreters to distort the essence of the religion, to replace the bright flame with the heat of the inquisitors' pyres.
quotes.author: Sergei Lukyanenko

quotes.quote: Every prophet and every saint has a way, but all lead to God. All ways are really one.
quotes.author: Rumi

quotes.quote: The prophets accept all agony and trust it. For the water has never feared the fire.
quotes.author: Rumi

quotes.quote: Saying of the prophet reflection the faithful are mirrors, one to the other.
quotes.author: Idries Shah

quotes.quote: Borrowing and spending is not the way to prosperity.
quotes.author: Paul Ryan

quotes.quote: All prosperity begins in the mind and is dependent only on the full use of our creative imagination.
quotes.author: Ruth Ross

quotes.quote: Prosperity is only an instrument to be used, not a deity to be worshipped.
quotes.author: Calvin Coolidge

quotes.quote: Prosperity depends more on wanting what you have than having what you want.
quotes.author: Geoffrey F. Abert

quotes.quote: Prosperity is a way of living and thinking, and not just money or things. Poverty is a way of living and thinking, and not just a lack of money or things.
quotes.author: Eric Butterworth

quotes.quote: Prosperity's right hand is industry and her left hand is frugality.
quotes.author: Samuel Johnson

quotes.quote: To rejoice in the prosperity of others is to partake of it.
quotes.author: W. Austin

quotes.quote: You can't borrow your way to prosperity.
quotes.author: Terry Branstad

quotes.quote: Prosperity in the form of wealth works exactly the same as everything else. You will see it coming into your life when you are unattached to needing it.
quotes.author: Wayne Dyer

quotes.quote: Everything in the world may be endured except continual prosperity.
quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.quote: There are many roads to prosperity, but one must be taken. Inaction leads nowhere.
quotes.author: Robert Zoellick

quotes.quote: In the day of prosperity be joyful, but in the day of adversity consider.
quotes.author: King Solomon

quotes.quote: When prosperity comes, do not use all of it.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: The fact is prosperity has a purpose. It's to allow us to pursue "the better angels," to give us time to think and grow.
quotes.author: George H. W. Bush

quotes.quote: Start with big dreams and make life worth living.
quotes.author: Stephen Richards

quotes.quote: Prosperity tries the fortunate: adversity the great.
quotes.author: Rose F. Kennedy

quotes.quote: In prosperity prepare for a change; in adversity hope for one.
quotes.author: James Burgh

quotes.quote: If you always attach positive emotions to the things you want, and never attach negative emotions to the things you don't, then that which you desire most will invariably come your way.
quotes.author: Matt D. Miller

quotes.quote: The desire for economic prosperity is itself not culturally determined but almost universally shared.
quotes.author: Francis Fukuyama

quotes.quote: The world of prosperity maintains the world of adversity.
quotes.author: James Lendall Basford

quotes.quote: Prosperity tries the fortunate, adversity the great.
quotes.author: Rose Kennedy

quotes.quote: Prosperity is the best protector of principle.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: A sustainable world means working together to create prosperity for all.
quotes.author: Jacqueline Novogratz

quotes.quote: There is no way to prosperity, prosperity is the way.
quotes.author: Wayne Dyer

quotes.quote: Opportunity today, prosperity tomorrow.
quotes.author: Julian Castro

quotes.quote: As much as we need a prosperous economy, we also need a prosperity of kindness and decency.
quotes.author: Caroline Kennedy

quotes.quote: Prosperity is a way of living and thinking, and not just money or things.
quotes.author: Eric Butterworth

quotes.quote: Prosperity is the surest breeder of insolence I know.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: It is easy when we are in prosperity to give advice to the afflicted.
quotes.author: Aeschylus

quotes.quote: True prosperity is the result of well-placed confidence in ourselves and our fellow man.
quotes.author: Benjamin Burt

quotes.quote: You have to learn to protect yourself through education.
quotes.author: Frank Abagnale

quotes.quote: Protecting your treasure means to give your life for it.
quotes.author: J.R. Rim

quotes.quote: Heaven often protects valuable souls charged with great secrets, great ideas, by long shutting them up with their own thoughts.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: You protect your being when you love yourself better. That's the secret.
quotes.author: Isabelle Adjani

quotes.quote: Protect yourself like you would your cubs as a grown woman, you're no one's cub anymore.
quotes.author: Karen Finerman

quotes.quote: The best way to protect your own freedom is to watch everybody else's back.
quotes.author: Bode Miller

quotes.quote: To protect this earth is to protect the very spirit of life.
quotes.author: Sakyong Mipham

quotes.quote: Everyone wants to protect their heart, but without pain, one can never have joy.
quotes.author: Jaycee Ford

quotes.quote: The great can protect themselves, but the poor and humble require the arm and shield of the law.
quotes.author: Andrew Jackson

quotes.quote: Everyone that needs to be protected, should be protected.
quotes.author: Antonio Guterres

quotes.quote: When we protect ourselves so we won't feel pain, that protection becomes armor, like armor that imprisons the softness of the heart.
quotes.author: Pema Chodron

quotes.quote: God always protects what He considers to be a blessing for a person.
quotes.author: Sunday Adelaja

quotes.quote: If you try to protect yourself from pain, it becomes a stone in your heart. But the more you learn to face things, the more likely that stone can become a pearl.
quotes.author: Aurora

quotes.quote: We must protect our most precious resource, our environment, for future generations
quotes.author: Alma Adams

quotes.quote: You have to protect yourself at all times. What goes around comes around.
quotes.author: Floyd Mayweather, Jr.

quotes.quote: Once you bring life into the world, you must protect it. We must protect it by changing the world.
quotes.author: Elie Wiesel

quotes.quote: Protect your children with your own efforts.
quotes.author: Sam Veda

quotes.quote: We protect virtue so that virtue will protect us.
quotes.author: Ajahn Chah

quotes.quote: You must be willing to protect yourself and what you cherish, no matter what the cost.
quotes.author: Christopher Paolini

quotes.quote: The best protection for the people is not necessarily to believe everything people tell them.
quotes.author: Demosthenes

quotes.quote: Protect your spirit, because you are in the place where spirits get eaten.
quotes.author: John Trudell

quotes.quote: Protecting yourself is self defense. Protecting others is warriorship.
quotes.author: Bohdi Sanders

quotes.quote: Sometimes, staying away from people is the only protection that you have for your heart.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Safety is an illusion and perhaps it's better to challenge it sometimes, to see how far we can go, to learn about the stuff we are made of.
quotes.author: Tania Aebi

quotes.quote: Protection is not a principle, but an expedient.
quotes.author: Benjamin Disraeli

quotes.quote: Protection of private property is a fundamental right protected in a strong democracy.
quotes.author: Jim Ryun

quotes.quote: You have to get beyond the barrier of self-protection before you can really fly.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Streb

quotes.quote: A protector can't protect someone who does not wish to be protected.
quotes.author: Dan Lord

quotes.quote: They who can give up essential liberty to obtain a little temporary safety deserve neither liberty nor safety.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: To enable men to exercise that power is the object of protection.
quotes.author: Henry Charles Carey

quotes.quote: The best protection for the people is not necessarily to believe everything people tell them.
quotes.author: Demosthenes

quotes.quote: Be good to others, that will protect you against evil.
quotes.author: Abu Bakr

quotes.quote: Protection is the first necessity of opulence and luxury.
quotes.author: Joseph Conrad

quotes.quote: You're safe not because of the absence of danger, but because of the presence of God.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: One of the best protections against disappointment is to have a lot going on.
quotes.author: Alain De Botton

quotes.quote: It was easier to be brave when someone needed your protection.
quotes.author: Robert Jordan

quotes.quote: Protection of religious freedom means considering the faiths and beliefs of everyone involved.
quotes.author: Mike Quigley

quotes.quote: Even the powerful needed protection sometimes.
quotes.author: J.R. Ward

quotes.quote: Protectionism is the institutionalization of economic failure.
quotes.author: Edward Heath

quotes.quote: A man without a vote is man without protection.
quotes.author: Lyndon B. Johnson

quotes.quote: Protection of human life can be costly; but so is the neglect of that protection.
quotes.author: Max Anders

quotes.quote: It doesn't matter what's in front of her, because she knows who's behind her.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: The real protection of life and property, always and everywhere.
quotes.author: Rose Wilder Lane

quotes.quote: Protection and security are only valuable if they do not cramp life excessively.
quotes.author: Carl Jung

quotes.quote: The protection of a man's person is more sacred than the protection of his property.
quotes.author: Thomas Paine

quotes.quote: The best lightning rod for your protection is your own spine.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: When you're safe at home, you wish you were having an adventure; when you're having an adventure, you wish you were safe at home.
quotes.author: Thornton Wilder

quotes.quote: People protect their bodies from the weather and other elements. And yet, few take the time to protect their thought source - the mind.
quotes.author: John A. Andrews

quotes.quote: Where the press is free and every man able to read, all is safe
quotes.author: Bathroom Readers' Institute

quotes.quote: If we cannot end now our differences, at least we can help make the world safe for diversity.
quotes.author: John F. Kennedy

quotes.quote: Where justice is denied, where poverty is enforced, where ignorance prevails. amd where any one class ios made to feel that society is an organized conspiracy to oppress, rob and degrade them, neither persons nor property will be safe.
quotes.author: Bathroom Readers' Institute

quotes.quote: You cannot protect yourself from sadness without protecting yourself from happiness.
quotes.author: Jonathan Safran Foer

quotes.quote: The ache for home lives in all of us. The safe place where we can go as we are and not be questioned.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.quote: Only a true best friend can protect you from your immortal enemies.
quotes.author: Richelle Mead

quotes.quote: One had to build shelters. One had to make pockets and live inside them.
quotes.author: Lorrie Moore

quotes.quote: We must protect and share the world.
quotes.author: Bryant McGill

quotes.quote: He that accepts protection, stipulates obedience.
quotes.author: Samuel Johnson

quotes.quote: The best lightning rod for your protection is your own spine.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: You must be willing to protect yourself and what you cherish, no matter what the cost.
quotes.author: Christopher Paolini

quotes.quote: Be good to others, that will protect you against evil.
quotes.author: Abu Bakr

quotes.quote: The great can protect themselves, but the poor and humble require the arm and shield of the law.
quotes.author: Andrew Jackson

quotes.quote: A strong egoism is a protection.
quotes.author: Sigmund Freud

quotes.quote: Protect those who protect you.
quotes.author: Evangelos Venizelos

quotes.quote: Don't be so defensive and afraid to be proven wrong that you miss the opportunity to learn from your mistakes.
quotes.author: Karen E. Quinones Miller

quotes.quote: Safeguarding the rights of others is the most noble and beautiful end of a human being.
quotes.author: Khalil Gibran

quotes.quote: The property of power is to protect.
quotes.author: Blaise Pascal

quotes.quote: People are far more protective [of women] instinctively.
quotes.author: Zoe Bell

quotes.quote: Although being possessive and protective can be cute, but don't go overboard with.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: You can do as much diligence as possible before you go somewhere to try to protect yourself and the people around you.
quotes.author: Jeremy Scahill

quotes.quote: Protection of private property is a fundamental right protected in a strong democracy.
quotes.author: Jim Ryun

quotes.quote: A blessing is a circle of light drawn around a person to protect, heal and strengthen.
quotes.author: John O'Donohue

quotes.quote: Being protective is important.
quotes.author: Alice Eve

quotes.quote: Standing on the defensive indicates insufficient strength; attacking, a superabundance of strength.
quotes.author: Sun Tzu

quotes.quote: The defensive power of a pinned piece is only imaginary.
quotes.author: Aron Nimzowitsch

quotes.quote: Protection is not a principle but an expedient.
quotes.author: Benjamin Disraeli

quotes.quote: You do not adequately protect yourself by being half awake when other are sleeping.
quotes.author: Warren Buffett

quotes.quote: When you feel protective toward your parents, you have become an adult.
quotes.author: Mason Cooley

quotes.quote: If you hold yourself dear, protect yourself well.
quotes.author: Gautama Buddha

quotes.quote: Silence is a protective coating over pain.
quotes.author: E. Lockhart

quotes.quote: The purely defensive is doomed to defeat.
quotes.author: Napoleon Bonaparte

quotes.quote: A covenant made with God should be regarded not as restrictive but as protective.
quotes.author: Russell M. Nelson

quotes.quote: Protein, we keep being told, is the vital nutrient that will give us a boost. It will burn fat, build muscle, reduce tiredness and kill our hunger pangs. Maybe if we shake enough protein powder into our daily smoothie, we will actually morph into Gwyneth Paltrow.
quotes.author: Bee Wilson

quotes.quote: Kids nowadays...tend to go overboard [on] protein - something I believe to be totally unnecsssary...[I state in] my formula for basic good eating: Eat about one gram of protein for every two pounds of body weight.
quotes.author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

quotes.quote: As an athlete, the most important thing is the protein that you eat and the things that you put into your body. Without that, it's very hard to function throughout the day.
quotes.author: Laurie Hernandez

quotes.quote: Are you getting enough protein? The question provides its own answer: if you are worrying about the amount of protein in your diet, then you are almost certainly eating more than enough.
quotes.author: Bee Wilson

quotes.quote: The average size of a meat protein should be about the size of a deck of cards, not a roulette wheel. Get a burrito the size of a bar of soap—not a torpedo.
quotes.author: Alex Jamieson

quotes.quote: Protein bars, protein flapjacks, protein granola, protein ice cream and protein coconut water. To look at the health-food aisles, you'd think that protein was a substance no one could overeat. Even bread now comes in protein-enriched form.
quotes.author: Bee Wilson

quotes.quote: In terms of personal choices, let's all think more carefully about where we get our protein from.
quotes.author: Sylvia Earle

quotes.quote: I eat an egg every morning, and when I'm done, I almost always have the thought: 'There. Now even if I'm captured and starved, I'll be able to live off the protein of that egg for a while.'
quotes.author: Miranda July

quotes.quote: I'm on my version of the protein diet, but there ain't no protein in it. It's a Krispy Kreme doughnut between two Cinnabons. And you soak it overnight in Red Bull. Then you chase it with a Snickers.
quotes.author: J.B. Smoove

quotes.quote: I don't worry about protein. I don't worry about all that. I'm from old school. I grew up in south Georgia. They didn't worry about cholesterol or protein. They went out and worked and lived a long time, so I don't put a lot of worries in my mind.
quotes.author: Herschel Walker

quotes.quote: The nutritional composition of beef provides much-needed protein, vitamins and iron.... Let us also not gloss over what is beef's most obvious benefit: Livestock take inedible and untasty grains and convert them into a protein-packed food most humans love to eat.
quotes.author: Jayson Lusk

quotes.quote: For a slim, sexy body, it's important to eat protein every day - preferably at every meal. Be sure to ask about the origins of your meat, poultry and seafood. If you can't afford organic, free-range meats, opt for natural poultry, pork, and beef that's raised without antibiotics or hormones.
quotes.author: Suzanne Somers

quotes.quote: I believe nicotine plus caffeine equals protein.
quotes.author: John Daly

quotes.quote: Fifty percent of the weight of the soybean is protein. And what a protein! No other protein that we've known comes so nearly to the basic protein of animals and humans as soybean protein.
quotes.author: Percy Julian

quotes.quote: Protein in and of itself isn’t going to make you into a supermodel, get you to your ideal weight or make you into a lean, mean machine. You actually have to exercise and do the work to build that muscle.
quotes.author: Andrea N. Giancoli

quotes.quote: I have heard one doctor call high-protein, high-fat, low-carbohydrate diets 'make-yourself-sick' diets, and I think that’s an appropriate moniker. You can also lose weight by undergoing chemotherapy or starting a heroin addiction, but I wouldn’t recommend those, either.
quotes.author: T. Colin Campbell

quotes.quote: Every time you need protein, get yourself a boiled egg in. But your main meals would be chicken, or hummus, or white fish. You can lose about a pound a day. But you can do this stuff over a period of time, and you can have your happy days. It's about motivation and it has to be something that's realistic for you to keep up.
quotes.author: Tom Hardy

quotes.quote: High protein diets make you sick in the long and short term. Expect kidney disease, heart disease and more strokes and cancer. Plus the weight loss is temporary because you can't stay sick for long. Look at the creators of these diets—many are fat themselves.
quotes.author: John A. McDougall

quotes.quote: Restaurants stress the protein. People read menu items left to right, with the protein first. I read descriptions right to left.
quotes.author: Barton Seaver

quotes.quote: Carbs are great if you’re going to be, y’know, using that energy for something like, say, moving your laggardly slugabed body around. But writers live a sedentary existence, at least while working, and so it behooves you not to hoover a bowl of Corn Pops into your gut. Do that and the carbs will only drag you down, make you mentally foggy. Stick with protein while writing. By the way, bacon is protein. Just saying.
quotes.author: Chuck Wendig

quotes.quote: Some products labelled as high protein aren’t, and they’re quite expensive. Anyway, consuming more protein than need is wasteful in terms of money, and it’s paid down the toilet.
quotes.author: Alex Johnstone

quotes.quote: When life gives you lemons, ask for something higher in protein.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Life goes faster on protein.
quotes.author: Martin H. Fischer

quotes.quote: Is it 10g of protein more or 10g of protein less, who cares, just get started.
quotes.author: Kai Greene

quotes.quote: I think proteins are really good for your brain. And your brain is where comedy comes from.
quotes.author: Carrie Brownstein

quotes.quote: The Mongols consumed a steady diet of meat, milk, yogurt, and other dairy products, and they fought men who lived on gruel made from various grains. The grain diet of the peasant warriors stunted their bones, rotted their teeth, and left them weak and prone to disease. In contrast, the poorest Mongol soldier ate mostly protein, thereby giving him strong teeth and bones.
quotes.author: Jack Weatherford

quotes.quote: There is no existing ‘standard of protein intake’ that is based on the sure ground of experimental evidence. ... Between the two extremes of a very high and a very low protein intake it is difficult to prove that one level of intake is preferable to another. ... Physiologists, in drawing up dietary standards, are largely influenced by the dietary habits of their time and country.
quotes.author: Wallace Ruddell Aykroyd

quotes.quote: Did you know that your willpower is powered by food? No wonder it's so hard to diet. When we don't eat, our willpower goes down the drain. The best cure is a meal rich in protein, which enables the most optimal willpower.
quotes.author: Gleb Tsipursky

quotes.quote: There’s no need for anyone to have supplements. They’re a convenient way to get protein, but there’s nothing in supplements you can’t get in food. Protein bars are really just candy bars with a bit of extra protein.
quotes.author: Kevin Tipton

quotes.quote: Food is the essential thing to gaining weight. Protein, you know, that's basically it—protein.
quotes.author: Manu Bennett

quotes.quote: There may be times when we are powerless to prevent injustice, but there must never be a time when we fail to protest.
quotes.author: Elie Wiesel

quotes.quote: If people don't vote, everything stays the same. You can protest until the sky turns yellow or the moon turns blue, and it's not going to change anything if you don't vote.
quotes.author: Dolores Huerta

quotes.quote: When an individual is protesting society's refusal to acknowledge his dignity as a human being, his very act of protest confers dignity on him.
quotes.author: Bayard Rustin

quotes.quote: To sin by silence, when we should protest, Makes cowards out of men.
quotes.author: Ella Wheeler Wilcox

quotes.quote: Peaceful protest is a hallmark of our democracy. It has been in impetus for social change throughout our history.
quotes.author: Stan Van Gundy

quotes.quote: If I cannot air this pain and alter it, I will surely die of it. That's the beginning of social protest.
quotes.author: Audre Lorde

quotes.quote: Protest beyond the law is not a departure from democracy; it is absolutely essential to it.
quotes.author: Howard Zinn

quotes.quote: Sarcasm... the protest of those who are weak
quotes.author: John Knowles

quotes.quote: Not voting is not a protest. It is a surrender.
quotes.author: Keith Ellison

quotes.quote: He who passively accepts evil is as much involved in it as he who helps to perpetrate it. He who accepts evil without protesting against it is really cooperating with it.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King Jr.

quotes.quote: It is better to protest than to accept injustice.
quotes.author: Rosa Parks

quotes.quote: In such ugly times, the only true protest is beauty.
quotes.author: Phil Ochs

quotes.quote: There are always protests, whether you do something good or bad. Even if you do something beneficial, people say you do it because it's advertising.
quotes.author: Giorgio Armani

quotes.quote: My fiery protest is simply the cry of my very soul.
quotes.author: Emile Zola

quotes.quote: To protest against injustice is the foundation of all our American democracy.
quotes.author: Thurgood Marshall

quotes.quote: It's not enough to say we need to love each other, you have to go behind that and say we need to change these policies, we need to fight, we need to protest, we need to agitate for change.
quotes.author: John Legend

quotes.quote: Against eternal injustice, man must assert justice, and to protest against the universe of grief, he must create happiness.
quotes.author: Albert Camus

quotes.quote: Fear is the greatest form of oppression. The best way to rise up in protest is to live your life to its fullest.
quotes.author: Megan Mccafferty

quotes.quote: Privileged people don't march and protest; their world is safe and clean and governed by laws designed to keep them happy.
quotes.author: John Grisham

quotes.quote: You may protest if you can love the person you are protesting against as much as you love yourself.
quotes.author: Ram Dass

quotes.quote: Protesting is never a disturbance of the peace. Corruption, injustice, war and intimidation are disturbances of the peace.
quotes.author: Bryan McGill

quotes.quote: It is a sin to be silent when it is your duty to protest.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.quote: Just because your muscles start to protest, doesn't mean you have to listen.
quotes.author: Dianne Holum

quotes.quote: Protest is when I say I don't like this. Resistance is when I put an end to what I don't like. Protest is when I say I refuse to go along with this anymore. Resistance is when I make sure everybody else stops going along too.
quotes.author: Ulrike Meinhof

quotes.quote: Silence can be either protest or consent, but most times it’s fear.
quotes.author: Paul Beatty
