quotes.quote: Purity is very fragile when it takes physical manifestation. It is very, very strong in its original aspect.
quotes.author: Frederick Lenz

quotes.quote: Purity of personal life is the one indispensable condition for building up a sound education.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: Purity is something that comes from another world. It's a radiance that enters into this world of transformation and change.
quotes.author: Frederick Lenz

quotes.quote: Purity of heart means the control of the imagination and the rigorous care of the affections.
quotes.author: F.B. Meyer

quotes.quote: Purity of heart illuminates your life with light and strength of character.
quotes.author: Hector P. Perez

quotes.quote: Purity of heart is the noblest inheritance, and love the fairest ornament, of woman.
quotes.author: Matthias Claudius

quotes.quote: Purity without balance is its own corruption.
quotes.author: V.E. Schwab

quotes.quote: Purity of heart is love for the weak who constantly fall.
quotes.author: Catherine Doherty

quotes.quote: The purity of man is the absence of something, the purity of Jesus is the presence of something.
quotes.author: Ravi Zacharias

quotes.quote: Purity of speech, of the mind, of the senses, and of a compassionate heart are needed by one who desires to rise to the divine platform.
quotes.author: Chanakya

quotes.quote: The purity men love is like the mists which envelope the earth, and not like the azure ether beyond.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: Purity is a negative state and therefore contrary to nature.
quotes.author: William Faulkner

quotes.quote: It was the purest love without purpose other than love itself. Without tenure or jealousy.
quotes.author: Luis Sepúlveda

quotes.quote: Our purity of taste is best tested by its universality, for if we can only admire this thing or that, we maybe use that our cause for liking is of a finite and false nature.
quotes.author: John Ruskin

quotes.quote: Purity is when there is no anxiety, no worry, no thinking.
quotes.author: B.K.S. Iyengar

quotes.quote: Purity does not mean crushing the instincts but having the instincts as servants and not the master of the spirit.
quotes.author: Eric Liddell

quotes.quote: Purity of soul cannot be lost without consent.
quotes.author: Saint Augustine

quotes.quote: Purity is the diamond of the soul.
quotes.author: Edward Counse

quotes.quote: Purity of mind and conduct is the first glory of a woman.
quotes.author: Madame De Stael

quotes.quote: Purity of heart is to will one thing.
quotes.author: Soren Kierkegaard

quotes.quote: Purity of life is the highest and truest art.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: But purity is difficult to understand in the abstract like corruption, we understand purification best when it's concrete, physical.
quotes.author: Ashlyn Mooney

quotes.quote: A pure heart is superlatively rare and even more attractive.
quotes.author: J.S.B Morse

quotes.quote: Purity means lack of hatred, jealousy, fear, greed and lust the absence of anything that can stain consciousness.
quotes.author: Frederick Lenz

quotes.quote: Purity is the power to contemplate defilement.
quotes.author: Simone Weil

quotes.quote: The pursuit of purity is not about the suppression of lust, but about the reorientation of one's life to a larger goal.
quotes.author: Dietrich Bonhoeffer

quotes.quote: Mine the long night, the secret place where lovers meet. In long embrace in purple dark, in silvered kiss forget the world and grasp your bliss.
quotes.author: A. S. Byatt

quotes.quote: Expression is the dress of thought, and still appears more decent as more suitable. A vile conceit in pompous words expressed, is like a clown in regal purple dressed.
quotes.author: Alexander Pope

quotes.quote: And or the hills, and far away beyond their utmost purple rim, beyond the night, across the day. Through all the world she followed him.
quotes.author: Alfred Lord Tennyson

quotes.quote: Oh, grown ups cannot understand, and grown ups never will, how shorts the way to fairyland Across the purple hill.
quotes.author: Alfred Noyes

quotes.quote: The sky is already purple. The first few stars have appeared, suddenly, as if someone had thrown a handful of silver across the edge of the world.
quotes.author: Alice Hoffman

quotes.quote: I think it pisses God off if you walk by the color purple in a field somewhere and don't notice it.
quotes.author: Alice Walker

quotes.quote: White pill, blue pill, yellow pill, purple pill, it was like swallowing a rainbow every bedtime.
quotes.author: Amelia Atwater-Rhodes

quotes.quote: I won't eat any cereal that doesn't turn the milk purple.
quotes.author: Bill Watterson

quotes.quote: There is something in the autumn that is native to my blood touch of manner, hint of mood. And my heart is like a rhyme, with the yellow and the purple and the crimson keeping time.
quotes.author: Bliss Carman

quotes.quote: Poetry is a mystic, sensuous mathematics of fire, smoke stacks, waffles, pansies, people, and purple sunsets.
quotes.author: Carl Sandburg

quotes.quote: Let me give you a piece of advice. The handsome young fellow who's trying to rescue you from a hideous fate is never wrong. Not even if he says the sky is purple and made of hedgehogs.
quotes.author: Cassandra Clare

quotes.quote: Virtue shows quite as well in rags and patches as she does in purple and fine linen.
quotes.author: Charles Dickens

quotes.quote: I always wanted to get the Purple Heart. This was much easier.
quotes.author: Donald Trump

quotes.quote: Dreams are the subtle dower that make us rich an hour. Then fling us poor out of the purple door. Into the precinct raw possessed before.
quotes.author: Emily Dickinson

quotes.quote: Each day the storm clouds were opening like great purple flowers and pouring out their dark thunder. Each nightfall, the storm was laid down on their houses like a burden the day had carried.
quotes.author: Eudora Welty

quotes.quote: Night is a curious child, wandering between earth and sky, creeping in windows and doors, daubing the entire neighborhood with purple paint.
quotes.author: Frank Marshall Davis

quotes.quote: Know he lands are lit with all the autumn blaze of goldenrod, and everywhere the purple asters nod and bend and wave and flit.
quotes.author: Helen Hunt

quotes.quote: Soon it got dusk, a grape dusk, a purple dusk over tangerine groves and long melon fields; the sun the color of pressed grapes, slashed with burgundy red, the fields the color of love and Spanish mysteries.
quotes.author: Jack Kerouac

quotes.quote: One naked star has waded through the purple shallows of the night, and faltering as falls the dew it drips its misty light.
quotes.author: James Whitcomb Riley

quotes.quote: Purple haze all in my eyes, don't know if it's day or night. You've got me blowing, blowing my mind. Is it tomorrow or just the end of time?
quotes.author: Jimi Hendrix

quotes.quote: Purple Haze all in my brain, lately things just don't seem the same. Acting funny but I don't know why. Excuse me while I kiss the sky.
quotes.author: Jimi Hendrix

quotes.quote: Idiotically, it occurred to me that my pink underwear didn't match my purple bra, as if boys even notice such things.
quotes.author: John Green

quotes.quote: O, beautiful for spacious skies, for amber waves of grain, for purple mountain majesties, above the fruited plain!
quotes.author: Katharine Lee Bates

quotes.quote: Purple as tulips in May, mauve into lush velvet, purple as the stain blackberries leave on the lips, on the hands, the purple of ripe grapes sunlit and warm as flesh.
quotes.author: Marge Piercy

quotes.quote: He wrapped himself in quotations as a beggar would enfold himself in the purple of Emperors.
quotes.author: Rudyard Kipling

quotes.quote: Try to find beauty in the little things.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: This great purple butterfly, in the prison of my hands, has a learning in his eye not a poor fool understands.
quotes.author: William Butler Yeats

quotes.quote: Flower of this purple dye, hit with Cupid's archery, sink in apple of his eye.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: Everything changes when a man becomes purple.
quotes.author: Charlie McDonnell

quotes.quote: Be eccentric now. Don't wait for old age to wear purple.
quotes.author: Regina Brett

quotes.quote: The first principle of ethical power is Purpose. By purpose, I don't mean your objective or intention-something toward which you are always striving. Purpose is something bigger. It is the picture you have of yourself-the kind of person you want to be or the kind of life you want to lead.
quotes.author: Ken Blanchard

quotes.quote: Find a purpose to serve, not a lifestyle to live.
quotes.author: Criss Jami

quotes.quote: Purpose is the place where your deep gladness meets the world's needs.
quotes.author: Frederick Buechner

quotes.quote: The purpose of life is to be defeated by greater and greater things.
quotes.author: Rainer Maria Rilke

quotes.quote: The purpose of life is not to be happy. It is to be useful, to be honorable, to be compassionate, to have it make some difference that you have lived and lived well.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: The purpose of life is not to fight against evil and misfortune; it is to unveil magnificence.
quotes.author: Alan Cohen

quotes.quote: Everything in this life has a purpose, there are no mistakes, no coincidences.
quotes.author: Elisabeth Kubler-Ross

quotes.quote: Our chief usefulness to humanity rests on our combining power with high purpose. Power undirected by high purpose spells calamity, and high purpose by itself is utterly useless if the power to put it into effect is lacking.
quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.quote: There is a purpose to our lives that each day tugs at our sleeve as an annoying distraction.
quotes.author: Robert Brault

quotes.quote: The purpose of life is to glorify God in both good and hard times alike.
quotes.author: T. B. Joshua

quotes.quote: This is the true joy of life, the being used up for a purpose recognized by yourself as a mighty one.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: Having a sense of purpose is having a sense of self. A course to plot is a destination to hope for.
quotes.author: Bryant H. McGill

quotes.quote: You can come to understand your purpose in life by slowing down and feeling your heart's desires.
quotes.author: Marcia Wieder

quotes.quote: A purpose, an intention, a design, strikes everywhere even the careless, the most stupid thinker.
quotes.author: David Hume

quotes.quote: Great minds have purposes, others have wishes.
quotes.author: Washington Irving

quotes.quote: The first thing to do in life is to do with purpose what one purposes to do.
quotes.author: Pablo Casals

quotes.quote: If you can't figure out your purpose, figure out your passion. For your passion will lead you right into your purpose.
quotes.author: T. D. Jakes

quotes.quote: The purpose of life is a life of purpose.
quotes.author: Robert Bryne

quotes.quote: The purpose of life is to live it, to taste experience to the utmost, to reach out eagerly and without fear for newer and richer experience.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.quote: I think the purpose of life is to be useful, to be responsible, to be honorable, to be compassionate. It is, after all, to matter: to count, to stand for something, to have made some difference that you lived at all.
quotes.author: Leo C. Rosten

quotes.quote: Find a purpose in life so big it will challenge every capacity to be at your best.
quotes.author: David O. McKay

quotes.quote: The purpose of life is not to be happyâ€”but to matter, to be productive, to be useful, to have it make some difference that you lived at all.
quotes.author: Leo Rosten

quotes.quote: Success is... knowing your purpose in life, growing to reach your maximum potential, and sowing seeds that benefit others.
quotes.author: John C. Maxwell

quotes.quote: You can accept reality, or you can persist in your purpose until reality accepts you.
quotes.author: Robert Brault

quotes.quote: Man is fulfilling the purpose of existence who no longer needs to have any purpose except to live. That is to say, who is content.
quotes.author: Ludwig Wittgenstein

quotes.quote: I don't think life is absurd. I think we are all here for a huge purpose. I think we shrink from the immensity of the purpose we are here for.
quotes.author: Norman Mailer

quotes.quote: When you walk in purpose, you collide with destiny.
quotes.author: Ralph Buchanan

quotes.quote: The life purpose of the true social entrepreneur is to change the world.
quotes.author: Bill Drayton

quotes.quote: Everything happens for a reason and a purpose, and it serves you.
quotes.author: Anthony Robbins

quotes.quote: The secret of success is constancy to purpose.
quotes.author: Benjamin Disraeli

quotes.quote: If a man empties his purse into his head, no one can take it from him.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: No fashion has ever been created expressly for the lean purse or for the fat woman: the dressmaker's ideal is the thin millionaires.
quotes.author: Katherine Fullerton Gerould

quotes.quote: The heaviest baggage for a traveller is an empty purse.
quotes.author: Proverb

quotes.quote: A Man's management of his own purse speaks volumes about character
quotes.author: Thomas Jefferson

quotes.quote: A light purse is a heavy curse.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: As the purse is emptied, the heart is filled.
quotes.author: Victor Hugo

quotes.quote: Woman must have a purse of her own, and how can this be so long as the law denies to the wife all right to both the individual and the joint earnings?
quotes.author: Susan B. Anthony

quotes.quote: Let's talk about a decision that women have to make every morning- Big purse or little purse?
quotes.author: Lisa Scottoline

quotes.quote: I'm thinking balls are to men, what purses are to women. It's just a little bag but we'd feel naked in public without it.
quotes.author: Sarah Jessica Parker

quotes.quote: Before you consult your fancy, consult your purse.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: Take a coin from your purse and invest it in your mind. It will come pouring out of your mind and overflow your purse.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: Boys are like purses. You're always gonna have that one boy that you're always comfortable with and you know you'll always kind of like. That's your purse that you wear everywhere. Then you have that gorgeous bag that you want everyone to see you with but the gorgeous bag is usually an asshole or costs a lot of money. Then you have those other purses that you really like but you really don't want to be seen with.
quotes.author: Lauren Conrad

quotes.quote: A stomach without bread and a purse without gold have led to so many revolutions in history.
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.quote: I think what it really is, is that I date creative people. And I think that what intimidates them is not my purse; it's my mind.
quotes.author: Lady Gaga

quotes.quote: A well dressed woman, even though her purse is painfully empty, can conquer the world.
quotes.author: Louise Brooks

quotes.quote: The louder a man tells you he’s honest, the harder you must hold onto your purse.
quotes.author: Robert Jordan

quotes.quote: It is criminal to steal a purse, daring to steal a fortune, a mark of greatness to steal a crown. The blame diminishes as the guilt increases.
quotes.author: Friedrich Schiller

quotes.quote: Not to oversee workmen is to leave them your purse open.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: Going back into the negative past to find happiness is like trying to make a silk purse out of a sow's ear
quotes.author: Sydney Banks

quotes.quote: Let people be the pursuits of happiness, you be the pursuit of perfection.
quotes.author: Amit Kalantri

quotes.quote: I'm not in pursuit of happiness, I'm happiness in pursuit; ready to happen everywhere I go.
quotes.author: Bernard Kelvin Clive

quotes.quote: In pursuit of happiness, smart people often end up dumbing down themselves.
quotes.author: Erol Ozan

quotes.quote: Pursuing happiness, and I did, and I still do, is not at all the same as being happy--which I think is fleeting, dependent on circumstances...If the sun is shining, stand in it---yes, yes, yes. Happy times are great, but happy times pass--they have to because time passes. The pursuit of happiness is more elusive; it is life-long, and it is not goal-centered. What you are pursuing is meaning--- a meaningful life. There's the hap-- the fate, the draw that is yours, and it isn't fixed, but changing the course of the stream, or dealing new cards, whatever metaphor you want to use---that's going to take a lot of energy. There are times when it will go so wrong that you will barely be alive, and times when you realise that being barely alive, on your own terms, is better than living a bloated half-life on someone else's terms. The pursuit isn't all or nothing--- it's all AND nothing.
quotes.author: Jeanette Winterson

quotes.quote: As long as you are pursuing happiness, you do not have it.
quotes.author: Khang Kijarro Nguyen

quotes.quote: It is the pursuit of happiness that makes people unhappy
quotes.author: Piero Scaruffi

quotes.quote: Pursuit of happiness is a pursuit of mirage; you only realize its a delusion at the end of the road
quotes.author: A.M.M Alusi

quotes.quote: The pursuit of happiness is a most ridiculous phrase: if you pursue happiness you'll never find it.
quotes.author: Carrie Snow

quotes.quote: Now and then it's good to pause in our pursuit of happiness and just be happy.
quotes.author: Guillaume Apollinaire

quotes.quote: If there is an abiding theme in 'The Pursuit of Happiness,' it is the idea that you come into the world already shaped by other people's past histories.
quotes.author: Douglas Kennedy

quotes.quote: If you want happiness for an hour – take a nap. If you want happiness for a day – go fishing. If you want happiness for a year – inherit a fortune. If you want happiness for a lifetime – help someone else.
quotes.author: Chinese Proverb

quotes.quote: We begin from the recognition that all beings cherish happiness and do not want suffering. It then becomes both morally wrong and pragmatically unwise to pursue only one’s own happiness oblivious to the feelings and aspirations of all others who surround us as members of the same human family. The wiser course is to think of others when pursuing our own happiness.
quotes.author: Dalai Lama

quotes.quote: The Constitution only guarantees you the right to pursue happiness. You have to catch it yourself.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: Our greatest happiness does not depend on the condition of life in which chance has placed us, but is always the result of a good conscience, good health, occupation, and freedom in all just pursuits.
quotes.author: Thomas Jefferson

quotes.quote: There is no such thing as the pursuit of happiness, but there is the discovery of joy.
quotes.author: Joyce Grenfell

quotes.quote: The grand essentials of happiness are: something to do, something to love, and something to hope for.
quotes.author: Allan K. Chalmers

quotes.quote: In the pursuit of happiness, the difficulty lies in knowing when you have caught up.
quotes.author: R. H. Grenville

quotes.quote: I think the conscientious pursuit of happiness by itself can validate decisions to change, to try again, especially when failure to change will lead to lives of duplicity, dishonesty, and deceit.
quotes.author: Ben Bradlee

quotes.quote: We believe, as our founders did, that 'the pursuit of happiness' depends upon individual liberty; and individual liberty requires limited government.
quotes.author: Paul Ryan

quotes.quote: It is not in the pursuit of happiness that we find fulfillment, it is in the happiness of pursuit.
quotes.author: Denis Waitley

quotes.quote: True happiness is… to enjoy the present, without anxious dependence upon the future.
quotes.author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

quotes.quote: Happiness is the meaning and purpose of life, the whole aim and end of human existence.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: Maybe happiness is something that we can only pursue. And maybe we can actually never have it no matter what.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: […] success, like happiness, cannot be pursued; it must ensue, and it only does so as the unintended side-effect of one’s personal dedication to a cause greater than oneself or as the by-product of one’s surrender to a person other than oneself. Happiness must happen, and the same holds for success: you have to let it happen by not caring about it.
quotes.author: Viktor E. Frankl

quotes.quote: The road to happiness lies in two simple principles: find what it is that interests you and that you can do well, and when you find it put your whole soul into it-every bit of energy and ambition and natural ability you have.
quotes.author: John D. Rockefeller III

quotes.quote: There are no happier people on this planet than those who decide that they want something, define what they want, get hold of the feeling of it even before its manifestation and then joyously watch the unfolding as, piece by piece by piece, it begins to unfold. That's the feeling of your hands in the clay.
quotes.author: Esther Hicks

quotes.quote: Every so often, push your luck.
quotes.author: H. Jackson Brown, Jr.

quotes.quote: Be daring to push your ideas forward.
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: Push today for what you want tomorrow!
quotes.author: Lorii Myers

quotes.quote: Push on and faith will catch up with you.
quotes.author: Jean le Rond d'Alembert

quotes.quote: Reach for it. Push yourself as far as you can.
quotes.author: Christa McAuliffe

quotes.quote: Motivation Push us out the door towards our goal.
quotes.author: Kishore Bansal

quotes.quote: Normally, we push away the things we're scared of.
quotes.author: Jeff Bridges

quotes.quote: When mankind pushes, natures sometimes pushes back.
quotes.author: James Rollins

quotes.quote: Push your boundaries, that's what they're there for.
quotes.author: Colleen Hoover

quotes.quote: Don't push your weaknesses, play with your strengths.
quotes.author: Jennifer Lopez

quotes.quote: Learn to run when feeling the pain, then push harder.
quotes.author: William Sigei

quotes.quote: And to learn, you have to be willing to push yourself.
quotes.author: Brandi Chastain

quotes.quote: Don't push growth; remove the factors limiting growth.
quotes.author: Peter Senge

quotes.quote: Push yourself. Don't Settle. Just live well. Just LIVE.
quotes.author: Jojo Moyes

quotes.quote: Keep the goal in mind and push onward to accomplish it.
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: Push it. Examine all things intensely and relentlessly.
quotes.author: Annie Dillard

quotes.quote: We have to push ourselves to stillness - to the natural state.
quotes.author: Frederick Lenz

quotes.quote: Fate is like a secret friend that helps push you on into life.
quotes.author: Patti Smith

quotes.quote: The one thing you can do for sure is push the luck on your side.
quotes.author: Roger Federer

quotes.quote: If you push through the hard days you can get through anything.
quotes.author: Gabby Douglas

quotes.quote: You have to always push back, whatever the pressures put on you.
quotes.author: Michael Arad

quotes.quote: If you have enough push, you don't have to worry about the pull.
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.quote: You have to push through every difficulty to have a breakthrough.
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: We need people who push boundaries rather than retreat inside them.
quotes.author: Tim Fargo

quotes.quote: If you do not push the boundaries, you will never know where they are.
quotes.author: T. S. Eliot

quotes.quote: Sometimes when you push someone, you find out who that person really is.
quotes.author: Keith Ablow

quotes.quote: In case of doubt, push on just a little further and then keep on pushing.
quotes.author: George S. Patton Jr.

quotes.quote: You can only push the truth down for so long, and then it bubbles back up.
quotes.author: Cassandra Clare

quotes.quote: You must push everything to the absolute limit or else life will be boring. People Will be boring.
quotes.author: Dario Argento

quotes.quote: You have to keep pushing toward those dreams no matter what setbacks happen.
quotes.author: Anthony Hamilton

quotes.quote: If you don't stand for something you will fall for anything.
quotes.author: Malcolm X

quotes.quote: Trying to please everyone is a recipe for stress, misery and frustration. Be yourself. It'll be good to know who's down with that.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Learn the art of saying no. Don't lie. Don't make excuses. Don't over-explain yourself. Just simply decline.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: You have to decide what your highest priorities are and have the courage - pleasantly, smilingly, nonapologetically - to say 'no' to other things. And the way to do that is by having a bigger 'yes' burning inside.
quotes.author: Stephen Covey

quotes.quote: Take a stand for yourself and refuse to let people steal your joy today.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: People only treat you one wayâ€¦ the way you allow them.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: If people keep stepping on you, wear a pointy hat.
quotes.author: Joyce Rachelle

quotes.quote: A person without much power is easily influenced by others, whether they are physical or non-physical beings. Their life is easily ruined. They are blown around like a leaf in the wind.
quotes.author: Frederick Lenz

quotes.quote: Nobody is strong enough to not be influenced.
quotes.author: Fiona Apple

quotes.quote: Who naught suspects is easily deceived.
quotes.author: Petrarch

quotes.quote: Mind over matter. Weak minded people are easily influenced. Strong minded people you can't break their will.
quotes.author: Lee Boyd Malvo

quotes.quote: Stop saying yes to everything and everyon. Stop agreeing with people just so you don't upset them. You're not a pushover. You were not put on this Earth to be stressed and miserable so others can be relaxed and happy. Start protecting your time and your happiness. If others can't handle it, show them the door. Kick them out of your life and don't look back.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: You can't always be nice. That's how people take advantage of you. Sometimes you need to set boundaries.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: What you allow is what will continue.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Do not be misled by what you see around you, or be influenced by what you see. You live in a world which is a playground of illusion, full of false paths, false values and false ideals. But you are not part of that world.
quotes.author: Sai Baba

quotes.quote: The majority of people who fail to accumulate money sufficient for their needs are, generally, easily influenced by the opinion of others.
quotes.author: Napoleon Hill

quotes.quote: Learn to say 'no' without explaining yourself.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: It's easy to think that people will like you more if you do whatever they tell you to do, but it's quite the opposite. People don't appreciate pushovers - they use them.
quotes.author: Osayi Osar-Emokpae

quotes.quote: Don't be afraid to support your opinions because being non-resistant never got anyone anywhere.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Don't be one of those people who are easily influenced by the people around them, being your own person is the one thing you don't want to lose.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Life's too short to be a pushover.
quotes.author: Kelly Clarkson

quotes.quote: Say what you feel, it's not being rude, it's being real.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: One who makes himself a worm cannot complain afterwards if people step on him.
quotes.author: Immanuel Kant

quotes.quote: The main reason why your company can easily influence you is because "emotion and attitude are stronger than knowledge". What you see can overcome what you know. You can easily damp away what you already know when you are faced with the reality of what your senses tell you to do!
quotes.author: Israelmore Ayivor

quotes.quote: Being a nice person is about courtesy: you're friendly, polite, agreeable, and accommodating. When people believe they have to be nice in order to give, they fail to set boundaries, rarely say no, and become pushovers, letting others walk all over them.
quotes.author: Adam Grant

quotes.quote: Give. But don't allow yourself to be used. Love. But don't allow your heart to be abused. Trust. But don't be naÃ¯ve. Listen. But don't lose your own voice.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Givers have to set limits because takers rarely do.
quotes.author: Irma Kurtz

quotes.quote: Do not let people put you down. Believe in yourself and stand for yourself and trust yourself.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: You're not a sucker. You're just nice. You give people the benefit of the doubt.
quotes.author: Sarah Dessen

quotes.quote: If you're not confident, people push you around. That's it. It's super-simple.
quotes.author: Linda Perry

quotes.quote: I look at this life as a puzzle without all the pieces in the box.
quotes.author: Jonathan Anthony Burkett

quotes.quote: Not every puzzle is intended to be solved. Some are in place to test your limits. Others are, in fact, not puzzles at all.
quotes.author: Vera Nazarian

quotes.quote: A mechanical puzzle is a self contained object, composed of one or more parts, which involves a problem for one person to solve by manipulation using logic, reasoning, insight, luck, and/or dexterity.
quotes.author: Jerry Slocum

quotes.quote: The solution often turns out more beautiful than the puzzle.
quotes.author: Richard Dawkins

quotes.quote: Who in the world am I? Ah, that's the great puzzle.
quotes.author: Lewis Carroll

quotes.quote: A good puzzle, it's a fair thing. Nobody is lying. It's very clear, and the problem depends just on you.
quotes.author: Erno Rubik

quotes.quote: We are all important parts of a much larger system, pieces of the universe's puzzle that would not be complete without us.
quotes.author: Russell Eric Dobda

quotes.quote: The great thing about America is I've never felt like an outsider. I'm just a different piece of the puzzle.
quotes.author: Pardis Sabeti

quotes.quote: If the pieces do not fit into your puzzle.Try a different picture.
quotes.author: Cass van Krah

quotes.quote: My favorite puzzle is trying to work out the parts myself, after all it is a solo effort.
quotes.author: Adrian Belew

quotes.quote: Every problem is a new puzzle to solve.
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: I am a puzzle and a conundrum and a thunderstorm.
quotes.author: Brian Doyle

quotes.quote: The problem is that we always look for the missing piece of the puzzle instead of finding a place for the one in our hand.
quotes.author: Alina Radoi

quotes.quote: The problems of puzzles are very near the problems of life, our whole life is solving puzzles. If you are hungry, you have to find something to eat. But everyday problems are very mixed they're not clear. The Cube's problem depends just on you. You can solve it independently. But to find happiness in life, you're not independent. That's the only big difference.
quotes.author: Erno Rubik

quotes.quote: I don't think there is a hidden purpose to the universe that you have to puzzle out.
quotes.author: Robert Fulghum

quotes.quote: Puzzles are like songs.A good puzzle can give you all the pleasure of being duped that a mystery story can. It has surface innocence, surprise, the revelation of a concealed meaning, and the catharsis of solution.
quotes.author: Stephen Sondheim

quotes.quote: Sometimes the hardest pieces of a puzzle to assemble, are the ones missing from the box.
quotes.author: Dixie Waters

quotes.quote: I like to be surprised by life; it's a good thing to search for the puzzle pieces.
quotes.author: Josh McDermitt

quotes.quote: Most of the places I've been, I've been a main piece of the puzzle.
quotes.author: Eric Davis

quotes.quote: Puzzle pieces don't always connect do they?
quotes.author: Ellen Hopkins

quotes.quote: Finding your style is like putting puzzle pieces together.
quotes.author: Lara Spencer

quotes.quote: I thought I knew a lot of but in the end it was just one small piece from the puzzle.
quotes.author: Deyth Banger

quotes.quote: In the same way he's fascinated by crosswords, the puzzle of solving the murder is what drives him on.
quotes.author: John Thaw

quotes.quote: The nice thing about doing a crossword puzzle is, you know there is a solution.
quotes.author: Stephen Sondheim

quotes.quote: In every problem, there's a concealed solution, locking itself underneath, unlock, peruse, find and solve.
quotes.author: Michael Bassey Johnson

quotes.quote: Man is a puzzle-solving animal.
quotes.author: Ronald A Knox

quotes.quote: Unraveling the solution to a mystery story of to a puzzle seems to produce a kind of 'mental catharsis,' since people typically feel a sense of relief from suspense when they find the answer to the mystery or puzzle.
quotes.author: Ronald A Knox

quotes.quote: For some truly mysterious reason, human beings seem to need this kind of catharsis on a regular bases---as the popularity of mysteries and puzzles across the world and across time attests.
quotes.author: Ronald A Knox

quotes.quote: A puzzle challenges the player to get from a problem to a solution, but of course, the path isn't simple.
quotes.author: Ernest Adams

quotes.quote: Every puzzle requires that the player make choices, some of which lead to dead ends.
quotes.author: Ernest Adams

quotes.quote: The pyramid shape is said to hold many secrets and amazing properties. One of them is a sense of wonder.
quotes.author: Vera Nazarian

quotes.quote: The hour passed in jewels and alleys and winds from the Egyptian desert. The sun was golden and the Nile was muddy where it lapped down to the deltas, and there was someone very young and very quick at the top of the pyramid, laughing, calling to him to come on up the shadowy side into the sun, and he was climbing, she putting her hand down to help him up the last step, and then they were laughing on camel back, loping toward the great stretched bulk of the Sphinx, and late at night, in the native quarter, there was the tinkle of small hammers on bronze and silver, and music from some stringed instruments fading away and away and away.
quotes.author: Ray Bradbury

quotes.quote: From the heights of these pyramids, forty centuries look down on us.
quotes.author: Napoleon Bonaparte

quotes.quote: As for the pyramids, there is nothing to wonder at in them so much as the fact that so many men could be found degraded enough to spend their lives constructing a tomb for some ambitious booby, whom it would have been wiser and manlier to have drowned in the Nile, and then given his body to the dogs.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: Some men are like pyramids, which are very broad where they touch the ground, but grow narrow as they reach the sky.
quotes.author: Henry Ward Beecher

quotes.quote: Today the traveller on the Nile enters a wonderland at whose gates rise the colossal pyramids of which he has had visions perhaps from earliest childhood.
quotes.author: James Henry Breasted

quotes.quote: The same aspirations to celebrate and uplift the spirit that drove the Egyptians to build the pyramids are still driving us. The things we're doing differ only in magnitude.
quotes.author: Henry Petroski

quotes.quote: Egypt! from whose all dateless tombs arose Forgotten Pharaohs from their long repose, And shook within their pyramids to hear A new Cambyses thundering in their ear; While the dark shades of forty ages stood Like startled giants by Nile's famous flood.
quotes.author: Lord Byron

quotes.quote: You know what I'd really like to do the most right now? Climb up to the top of some high place like the pyramids. The highest place I can find. Where you can see forever. Stand on the very top, look all around the world, see all the scenery, and see with my own eyes what's been lost from the world.
quotes.author: Haruki Murakami

quotes.quote: They say the Pharaohs built the pyramids Do you think one Pharaoh dropped one bead of sweat? We built the pyramids for the Pharaohs and we're building for them yet.
quotes.author: Anna Louise Strong

quotes.quote: The pyramid that can be constructed on the diameters of earth and moon bears the precise proportions of the Great Pyramid.
quotes.author: Bonnie Gaunt

quotes.quote: Most leaders consider themselves on top of the pyramid and the people are at the base below.
quotes.author: King of Thailand

quotes.quote: Real success is shown in the inverted pyramid, where the people are on the top.	Real success is shown in the inverted pyramid, where the people are on the top.
quotes.author: King of Thailand

quotes.quote: These unhappy times call for the building of plans that...build from the bottom up and not from the top down, that put their faith once more in the forgotten man at the bottom of the economic pyramid.
quotes.author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quotes.quote: High office is like a pyramid; only two kinds of animals reach the summit, reptiles and eagles.
quotes.author: Jean le Rond d'Alembert

quotes.quote: I can recall no word / Of anything he did; / For me he is a man who died and was interred / To leave a pyramid.
quotes.author: Thomas Hardy

quotes.quote: The largest pyramid / the tragedy of history / Visitors come, / Not Knowing that you contain / Tons of blood / and mountains of Toil.
quotes.author: Hasssan Hegazy Hassan

quotes.quote: Pyramid, we built this on a solid rock / It feels just like it's heaven's touch / Together at the top, like a pyramid / And even when the wind is blowing / We'll never fall just keep on going / Forever we will stay, like a pyramid.
quotes.author: Charice

quotes.quote: The Burial chamber of the king was protected by man made mountain of stone called a pyramid.
quotes.author: David Macaulay

quotes.quote: It's four triangular sides spreading below a single peak represented the rays of the sun shining down over the pharaoh, linking him directly and for all time to Re, the God of the sun.
quotes.author: David Macaulay

quotes.quote: The pyramids continue to serve as a tribute to those who so skillfully organized the efforts of thousands of people in an attempt to deny the finality of death and the limitations of time by leaving behind something that would last forever.
quotes.author: David Macaulay

quotes.quote: We think of the pyramids as mysteries, but the stones, hieroglyphs, landscapes, and even layers of sands and debris around them hold stories.
quotes.author: Mark Lehner

quotes.quote: And so Egyptians built a passage to the heavens for the pharaoh, 50 stories of stone rising out of the desert, pointing to the sky.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Mann

quotes.quote: The pyramids were not built for people to live in. They were tombs for the pharaohs, the rulers of Egypt.
quotes.author: Dorothy Hoobler

quotes.quote: When late visitors arrived, they were astonished by what they saw. No one had seen anything like the pyramids.
quotes.author: Dorothy Hoobler

quotes.quote: Today, most of the pyramid sites are abandoned and in ruins, a cheerless situation that might persist forever— or nearly so.
quotes.author: J.P. Lepre

quotes.quote: Ascension to successive echelons in the pyramid of awareness is an act of inclusion requiring unconditional acceptance of all that lies below.
quotes.author: Gerald R. Stanek

quotes.quote: Most software today is very much like an Egyptian pyramid with millions of bricks piled on top of each other, with no structural integrity, but just done by brute force and thousands of slaves.
quotes.author: Alan K.

quotes.quote: To excavate a pyramid is the dream of every archaeologist.
quotes.author: Sarah Parcak

quotes.quote: The world has flipped upside-down. It used to be a pyramid of authority; now it's upside down. The influence actually rests with the mid-level people, who speak peer-to-peer. If they're for you, you win.
quotes.author: Richard Edelman

quotes.quote: The joy of coding Python should be in seeing short, concise, readable classes that express a lot of action in a small amount of clear code, not in reams of trivial code that bores the reader to death.
quotes.author: Guido van Rossum

quotes.quote: Python is an experiment in how much freedom programmers need. Too much freedom and nobody can read another's code; too little and expressiveness is endangered.
quotes.author: Guido van Rossum

quotes.quote: Python is executable pseudocode. Perl is executable line noise.
quotes.author: Bruce Eckel

quotes.quote: Generally the pythons are better than anything else at killing.
quotes.author: Dave Barry

quotes.quote: The skin of a python is no less precious to the snake than fur is to the fox.
quotes.author: Maneka Gandhi
